40026040	Dabudine tauna ya tava munaḡa na tauwai muriwatanama ḡarodie, da e kitedina be taudi a kenakenana, dabudine Pita ya riuena, “Taumi tokare suara rovanama tenaḡa nopone koya mia be koyai neneḡana bo ibewa?
40026041	Ko mia be koi neneḡana, be ko moiragi da nam raurubue ko beku! Aruimima moiragi e ḡoeḡoena, be tubuḡimima e vovo gwaḡagwaḡana.”
40026042	Naumeki da Bada raḡan aniwai rabuinama ya munaḡa be ya moiragina, “Mamai, deḡoda uma ḡoraḡoranama kai porenama nam kwa ḡoe, naumeki da tam am ḡoanama kwa voiena.”
40026043	Raḡanine tauna ya tava munaḡana na tauwai muriwatanama ḡarodie, da e kitedina be taudi a kena munaḡana, baninama matedima a yado kauana.
40026044	Naumeki da tauna ya gosedi da ya munaḡa, be raḡan aniwai rabuiteḡanama ya moiragi be giudima teneḡidima ya vatodina.
40026045	Be tauna na tauwai muriwatanama ḡarodie ya tava munaḡa be ya riuedina, “Taumi yaḡoro ko kena be ko sipesipere, bo? Ko kita, Banaga Natunama ta boru dobiḡena, gewagewa banegidima nimedie raḡaninama kaiteka ya tavana.
40026046	Ko midisuḡu be tà naḡona, tauboru dobiḡeguma kaiteka umanema ya tavana.”
40026047	Yesu yaḡoro ya giugiu be Judas tauna tenaḡa tauwai muriwatana matabudi 12 nopodie, tauna ya tavana. Be banaga patara ḡesaudima mate a tavana, taudi nimedie kwatikwati be kwaibubu a ragaudina. Taudi inam pirisi adi babadama, be babada dosidima a riuporedina.
40026048	Be tauborudobiḡa mataira aba e voiena, patara ya riuedina, “Deḡo baneginama yàwai suruvena, tauna vutuna ami ḡoanama, tauna ko pani be koi doka nawena!”
40026049	Naumeki da Judas tauna didimaninama ya naḡo ḡomana Yesu ḡarone, be ya riuna, “Ebom tauwai katakatai.” Naumeki da yai suruvena.
40026050	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Yau tura, uma dabudine kuya tavana, naumeki da am ḡoama kwa voiena.” Dabudine tautauḡoma Yesu a vunuḡi be a kaididina.
40026051	Inam raḡanine Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama tenaḡa, kwatikwati ya kaikai suḡuna, pirisi adi badama na taunoyama beanama ya dourakana.
40026052	Be Yesu ya riuena, “Am kwatikwatima kwa kaididi, baninama aitau da kwatikwatie ta iḡaiḡarana, inam banegidima taudi tokare kwatikwatie tai guridina.
40026053	Deḡoda taugu sibo è ḡoena, tokare Tamaguma èi baḡa be tauna waiḡapa anea toitoi ya riuporaḡana saguguma aubainama.
40026054	Be deḡoda nama yà voiana, tokare girugiruminama porane aba ya riuriuena sibo a tubuḡana, be tokare nam a tubuḡa.”
40026055	Inam dabudine Yesu patara ya riuedina, “Taumi kwaibubu be kwatikwati mate koya tavana taugu ko vunuḡigu, banaga danedanenenama maika, bo? Taugu raḡan patapatanama tempol nopone è mia be èwai katakataina, be taumi nam ko vunuḡiguna.
40026056	Be uma kauidima matabudi ta tubutubuḡana, baninama boni peroveta a girugirumidina ruvane.” Dabudine tauwai muriwatana matabudi Yesu a gose, be taudi naira a naḡona.
40026057	Be taudi aitauḡa Yesu a panipanina, naumeki da ai doka nawena pirisi adi badama Kaiyapas ḡarone. Inam dabudine tarawatu tauwai katakataidima be babada ḡesaudima mate matabudi ai rawateḡeidina.
40026058	Be Pita Yesu yai muriwatane be madanie muriḡa ya veraverauna, naumeki da ya saḡa ya naḡona anikaba etara gabune, pirisi adi badama na vadae. Dabudine tauna taubodama mate a mia be yawai rabana da nema sibo Yesu a etara bakena ya kitana.
40026059	Be pirisi adi babadama be etara babadidima matabudi, a rarau rubuna da giu kaikaiyovudima deḡo sibo a banavidi, be inam giudie Yesu sibo ai gurina.
40026060	Be matamata kaikaiyovudima toitoi dabudine a tavana, be yaḡoro taudi nam deḡo keda ti banavina da Yesu sibo ai guri. Dabudine banaga rabui a verau
40026061	be a riuna, “Uma tauḡominama umanama ya riuna, ‘Taugu teneḡinama da Mamaitua na tempolma yà katiwei be raḡan rabuiteḡa nopodie yà keri munaḡena.’”
40026062	Dabudine pirisi adi badama ya midisuḡu be ya riuna, “Uma banegidima tawai wavumna tokare kwa paribeedi bo ibewa?”
40026063	Be Yesu tauna nam aiyaba i riuena. Naumeki da pirisi adi badama Yesu ya riuena, “Mamaitua yawayawasaninama isane yà riuriu vavasaḡemna, kwa riuemai: Tam vutuna Keriso, Mamaitua Natuna, bo?”
40026064	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Ee, inam vutuna kuya vatona. Be yà riuemina: Tokare taumi Banaga Natunama Mamaitua wairewapaninama kasaunama yauwane e mia, be ma giyouna marae be e yovoyovona ko kitana.”
40026065	Dabudine pirisi adi badama tauname na garama ya sika be ya riuna, “Yodi koya vaie, tauna ewai diboḡana. Yodi nam matamata ḡesaudima tà wanedi.
40026066	Taumi nema kowai noḡota bako?” Be taudi a paribee be a riuna, “Tauna naumeki da e gurina.”
40026067	Dabudine taudi Yesu noḡonama a kaviso be a paitina. Be ḡesaudima a raunevanevakau
40026068	be a riuna, “Keriso kwai nasi, aitau kabe ya riḡam?”
40026069	Be Pita tauna anikaba etara gabunama diane ya miamia be taunoya waivinama ḡarone ya tava, be ya riuena, “Tam mate Galili Yesunama mate koya naḡonaḡona.”
40026070	Be Pita taudi matabudi noḡodie ya bovi be ya riuna, “Tam aba kwa giugiuena, taugu nam e kataiena.”
40026071	Dabudine tauna ḡavoe ya dobi ya naḡonaḡo be waivi ḡesaunama tauna ya kita, be na banagama ya riuedina, “Noa tauḡominama mate Nasaret Yesunama mate a naḡonaḡona.”
40026072	Be Pita ya bovi munaḡa, da ya rauseri be ya riuna, “Taugu inam tauḡominama nam e kataiena.”
40026073	Naumeki da a mia raḡan ḡaubonaḡa be banaga aitauḡa diane a midimidina Pita a riuena, “Inam riukaua, tam mate turedima. Tam bonapakamma ewai maḡatarana ka vaivaiena.”
40026074	Be Pita ya riu vavasaḡa be ya riuna, “Taugu yà riuriu kauana! Inam tauḡominama taugu nam e kataiena. Deḡoda taugu yà kaiyovuna, naumeki da Mamaitua tokare gewagewa ḡarogue e voiena.” Pita nama ya giugiuna inam raḡanine kamkam ya riuna.
40026075	Dabudine Yesu aba Pita ya riuriuena ya noḡotina, “Muriḡa da kamkam e riuna, tam tokare raḡan rabuiteḡa kwa bovieguna.” Dabudine Pita ya dobi ya naḡo be ya ḡaba guratana.
40027001	Raḡanboiboi kupinaḡa pirisi adi babadama matabudi, be babada ḡesaudima adi ogama a taraḡina, da Yesu tai gurina.
40027002	Dabudine taudi Yesu nimanama a panidi be ai doka nawena, be gabeman isanama Paelat nimane a boruna.
40027003	Be Judas tauborudobiḡa tauna e vaiena be Yesu waigurinama a giugiuena, inam raḡanine tauna yai sosori, be yai nuaboya kauana. Naumeki da Judas ya munaḡana pirisi adi babadama, be babada ḡesaudima ḡarodie be sirin 30 taudi ya ute munaḡedi,
40027004	be ya riuna, “Taugu gewagewa è voiena. Taugu banaga verenama è boru dobiḡa yababe be tokare tai guri, be kosininama e darorona.” Be taudi a paribeena, “Inam tam am vitama, be nam tauma ama nuaboya.”
40027005	Naumeki da Judas mane tempol nopone ya yaraiedi, be tauna ya naḡo be ya sopana.
40027006	Dabudine pirisi adi badama manedima ya tama be ya riuna, “Tarawatu nam ima waianinana, da uma manedima tempol manenama nopone tà biridi, baninama uma inam vunuḡa manenama.”
40027007	Dabudine taudi ai oga da inam manene, gurewa tauvoienama na doḡama ta gimeri be dabudine vaḡavaḡai adi kokoagama tai tubuḡina.
40027008	Vutuna aubainama inam dobunama yodi tawai isana ‘Kosina Dobunama’.
40027009	Inam kauidima peroveta Jeremaia boni aba ya riuriuena, ruvane nama ya tubuḡana, inam umanama, Israel banegidima tauna na maesama a boruna, inam sirin matabudi 30. Be inam sirindima 30 ta ragaudi
40027010	be gurewa tauvoienama na doḡama ta gimerina, Bada ya riuriuna nama.
40027011	Naumeki da Yesu gabeman noḡone ya midi be tauna Yesu yai taravirena, “Tam Jius adi guyau, bo?” Be Yesu ya riuna, “Ee, inam vutuna kuya vatona.”
40027012	Dabudine pirisi adi babadama be babada ḡesaudima taudi Yesu awai wavuna, be tauna nam aiyaba i giuena.
40027013	Naumeki da Paelat Yesu yai taravirena, “Tam banaga tawai wavumna, kwa vaivaiedi bo ibewa?”
40027014	Be Yesu nam aba i paribea rubudina. Vutuna aubainama gabeman tauna ya basena.
40027015	Be gabeman tauna na vaivaima da soi nopodie banaga adi ḡoanama aitau dibure ta vinevinena, vutuna e kaikaiporena.
40027016	Be inam raḡanine gewagewa baneginama isanama Barabas, tauna isanaḡonaḡonama dibure ya miamiana.
40027017	Be patara awai rawateḡeidina raḡanine, Paelat yai taraviredi be ya riuna, “Taumi deḡo tauna ko ḡoeḡoena yà kaipore? Barabas bo Yesu, tawai isana Keriso?”
40027018	Paelat nama ya riuna, baninama tauna ya kataie da pirisi Yesu a unurena aubainama tauna nimane a boruna.
40027019	Naumeki da Paelat etara gabune ya miamia, be na visarama vari ya riuporena tauna ḡarone be ya riuna, “Inam baneginama ḡarone nam tam aiyaba kwa voie, tauna banaga verenama. Baninama inam baneginama kana taiye taugu kupie rauboni gewagewa kaukauinama è kitana.”
40027020	Be pirisi adi babadama be babada ḡesaudima patara a riuedina da taudi sibo Barabas kaiporenama aubainama Paelat sibo ai baḡana, be Yesu sibo yai gurina.
40027021	Be Paelat patara yai taraviredi be ya riuna, “Uma banegidima rabui be taumi deḡo tauna ko ḡoeḡoena yà kaipore?” Be taudi a riuna, “Barabas kwa kaiporena.”
40027022	Dabudine Paelat ya riuna, “Be Yesu tawai isana ‘Keriso’, nema yà bake?” Be taudi matabudi a riuna, “Kwa tuparatuna!”
40027023	Be Paelat ya riuna, “Aba aubainama yà tuparatu? Tauna aiyaba gewagewanama ya voie?” Be taudi a rasa gurata be a riuna, “Kwa tuparatuna!”
40027024	Be Paelat ya raurubu be ya kita da nam keda deḡo i banavina, vutuna aubainama tauna patara matedie nimanama upae ya koḡa be ya riuna, “Taugu uma baneginama e gurina, wavunama nam taugu yà paḡo. Inam taumiḡa ami wavuma.”
40027025	Dabudine banaga matabudi a riuna, “Naumeki da tauna kosininama e rauḡini, be wavunama tauma ama sedama mate ka kiroḡina.”
40027026	Inam raḡanine Paelat tauna Barabas ya kaipore da ya naḡona, be Yesu inam na tauiḡarama nimedie ya boruna da taudi ta riḡa be ta tuparatuna.
40027027	Naumeki da tauiḡara Yesu ai doka saḡena Paelat na kaba miae. Be dabudine tauiḡara matabudi ai rawateḡeidina Yesu noḡone.
40027028	Be taudi na garama a ḡiḡi pore, be gara ḡesau sabasabanama ai kotena.
40027029	Yodibe taudi gedara a pinou be Yesu debane ai mieni be a virididina, be diḡona nimanama kasaune ai paḡona. Yodibe taudi Yesu noḡone tuapikedie a raupari, da ai varavara be a riuna, “Ebom, Jius adi guyauma.”
40027030	Naumeki da Yesu a kaviso be diḡona nimane a paḡo, be debanama a riḡa yabayababena.
40027031	Be taudi ai varavara ya kovikovina, gara sabasabanama a kaipore, be tauna na garama ai kote munaḡena. Yodibe ai doka nawena tuparatunama aubainama.
40027032	Be kedae tauḡoma tenaḡa a banavina, isanama Saemon, tauna Sairin meagainama baneginama. Dabudine tauiḡara inam tauḡominama a segeri da Yesu na korosima ya kiroḡina.
40027033	Naumeki da taudi dobu isanama ‘Golgotama’ a tavana. Riu ‘Golgota’ baninama inam ‘debagarere’.
40027034	Dabudine taudi waen be musara kavisonama mate a gwada tenaḡe, be Yesu a utena da sibo ya tegona. Be tauna ya remorubu da ei damina be tegonama ya tuaḡaiena.
40027035	Naumeki da taudi Yesu korosie a tuparatu be na garama ai kasiedina. Be aitau kasie yawai rewapanana, tauna deḡo garanama ya ḡoeḡoena, nama ya paḡona.
40027036	Be dabudine taudi a mia be Yesu a rabe be a kitakita watanina.
40027037	Be aba aubainama Yesu a tuparatuna, vutuna kai ḡaubonama bogane umanama a girumana Uma tauna Yesu, Jius adi guyauma Yodibe Yesu debane korosi bogane kainama a tutuna.
40027038	Be inam dabudine taudi banaga danedanenedima rabui mate a tuparatudina, tenaḡa Yesu kasaune be tenaḡa senine.
40027039	Be banaga aitauḡa kedaḡa a naḡonaḡona, taudi debedima a kwadiedi da Yesu ai diboḡi,
40027040	be a riuriuna, “Iyo! Tam dokane kuya riuna da tempol kwa katiwei be raḡan rabuiteḡa nopodie kwa keri munaḡena. Yodi kwai yawasana munaḡem. Deḡoda tam Mamaitua Natunama, naumeki da yodi korosi boganaḡa kwa yovo be ka kitam.”
40027041	Inam kauinama teneḡine pirisi adi babadama be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima, be babada ḡesaudima mate taudi Yesu ai varavara, be a riuna,
40027042	“Tauna banaga ḡesaudima yawai yawasanidina, be yodi taunaḡa nam tokare ei yawasana munaḡe! Deḡoda tauna Israel guyaunama, naumeki da korosi boganaḡa e yovo be tauma kai sumaḡena.
40027043	Tauna Mamaitua ewai sumaḡe be ya riuriuna, ‘Taugu Mamaitua Natunama.’ Yodi kabe tà kita Mamaitua tauna waiyawasaninama e ḡoeḡoe bo ibewa.”
40027044	Be banaga danedanenedima rabui Yesu mate a tupatuparatudina, taudi mate Yesu ai diboḡina.
40027045	Be suaratopu dobu yai kupikupina naumeki da ravie 3-okoroki paratinama.
40027046	Be ravie 3-okoroki nama Yesu bonanama dosine umanama ya riuna, “ Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani? ” Uma giunama baninama inam umanama, “Yau Mamaituama, yau Mamaituama, aba aubainama kuya gose poregu?”
40027047	Be banaga ḡesaudima dabudine diane a midimidina nama a vaivaiena, taudi a riuna, “Koi beavaia! Tauna Elaija e yokoyokoena!”
40027048	Be dabudine tauḡoma tenaḡa anitaiyo ya paḡo, be ya manini ya saḡa ya naḡo da waen ḡoraḡorane yai sonom da kai isune ya pani be Yesu sibo yai tegona,
40027049	be banaga ḡesaudima a riuna, “Nakarua, kwa gose! Elaija e yovoyovona ei yawasanina tà kitana.”
40027050	Be Yesu bonanama dosine ya yogona, naumeki da tauname aruinama ya raukaigosena.
40027051	Inam kauinama ya tubutubuḡana raḡanine, gara tempol nopone matakeda waisaurinama, ya nuasika poraḡa da ma nevana a kenana. Be doḡa ya gusu be yeku a nuasenana.
40027052	Be inam raḡanine kokoaga gayedima a nuaporaḡa be banaga babaudima guriguridima toitoi a midisuḡu munaḡana.
40027053	Be tauna na kaba midisuḡu munaḡama murine, taudi kokoaga a dobi pore be a naḡona meagai babaune, be banaga toitoi ḡarodie a maḡatarana.
40027054	Be tori matanama na tauiḡarama mate Yesu a rabe be a kitakita watanina, taudi yoyo be yaba matabudi a tubutubuḡana, nama a kitekitedina, taudi a naira kaua be a riuna, “Uma tauna inam riukaua Mamaitua Natunama!”
40027055	Be dabudine waiwaivi mate, taudi madanie a midi be awai kitana. Inam waiwaividima taudi Galilima Yesu waimuriwatanenama ai karena, be aba tauna ya ḡoeḡoena nama a sagusaguna.
40027056	Be inam waiwaividima matabudi nopodie inam Meri Magdalin, Meri Jeims be Jousep tinedima, be Sebedi natunatunama tinedima.
40027057	Be ravi ya tavatavana paratine, waiguyau baneginama Arimatia meagaine be ya tavana, isanama Jousep. Inam baneginama tauna mate Yesu tauwai muriwatanenama.
40027058	Tauna ya naḡo Paelat ḡarone be yai baḡana da Yesu tubuḡinama sibo ya paḡona. Naumeki da Paelat na tauiḡarama ya riuedi, da Yesu tubuḡinama Jousep a utena.
40027059	Naumeki da Jousep Yesu tubuḡinama ya paḡo, be gara ḡavoḡavoridie ya sumana.
40027060	Be Jousep tauname na kokoagama vaunama yeku vasivasi wainonoḡinama nopone, Yesu tubuḡinama ya boruna. Yodibe yeku dosinama yai rawakui da kokoaga matakedanama yai miditom, be ya naḡona.
40027061	Be Meri Magdalin be Meri ḡesaunama taudi kokoaga noḡone noaḡo a miamiana.
40027062	Raḡan ya tom da pomainama Sabat raḡanine, be pirisi adi babadama be Parisi a naḡo Paelat ḡarone be a riuna,
40027063	“Bada, tauma yaḡoro ka noḡonoḡotina da uma baneginama kaikaiyovunama dokane yawai yawasanana umanama ya riuna, ‘Taugu tokare raḡan aniwai rabuiteḡane yà midisuḡu munaḡana.’
40027064	Vutuna aubainama kawai baḡamna da kokoaga kwa gudu kaue be taubodama kokoaga ta rabena naumeki da raḡan wairabuiteḡanama e kovina. Deḡoda na tauwai muriwatanama ta tava be tubuḡinama ta danene, be ta naḡo da banaga ta riuedina, ‘Yesu kaite ya midisuḡu munaḡana.’ Deḡoda inam nama e tubuḡana, naumeki da inam kaiyovunama tokare kaiyovu dokanama ei moraba guratena.”
40027065	Dabudine Paelat taudi ya riuedina, “Naumeki, tauiḡara yà riuporedi da taumi mate ko naḡo be kokoaga ta rabena, be ami noḡotama ruvane nama ko gudu waikaikaina.”
40027066	Naumeki da taudi a naḡo da kokoaga a gudu waikaikai ya kovi, yodibe tauiḡara kokoaga matakedanama a midi ḡaḡari be kokoaga a rabena.
40028001	Sabat raḡaninama murine, pomainama Sande raḡantomtom, Meri Magdalin be Meri ḡesau mate a naḡona kokoaga kivunama aubainama.
40028002	Inam raḡanine anea ya yovoyovona, yoyo dosinama ya tubuḡana. Be anea ya naḡo kokoagae be yeku dosinama kokoaga matakedanama waimiditomnama yai rawakui ḡavoe ya naḡo, be tauna yekunama debane ya miana.
40028003	Be anea kitanama maika keama, be na garama ḡavoḡavora tunutununama.
40028004	Dabudine tauiḡara taudi a naira kauana, be naira ya kawa gusugusudi be a guri gidavana.
40028005	Naumeki da anea waiwaivi ya riuedina, “Nam ko naira! Taugu è kataiena da taumi Yesu a tuparatuna, vutuna ko wanewanena.
40028006	Tauna nam uma dabudine. Tauna kaite ya midisuḡu munaḡana, boni ya riuriuna maika. Ko verau be na kaba kenama gabunama ko kita.
40028007	Be waiḡapa ko naḡo da na tauwai muriwatanama umanama ko riuedina, ‘Yesu ya guri be ya midisuḡu munaḡana, be yodi ya doka be e naḡonaḡona Galilima, be dabudine taumi tokare tauna ko kitana.’ Inam vutunaḡa è riuemina.”
40028008	Naumeki da waiwaivi kokoaga a gosena, nopodima naira be mosari ya moḡavuna, be a manini a naḡona tauwai muriwatanama riuedima aubainama.
40028009	Taudi a naḡonaḡo be Yesu yai raḡantenaḡe da ḡarodie ya tava be ya riuna, “Ebom.” Be waiwaivi tauna ḡarone a naḡo da tuapikedie a raupari, be kaḡanama a kaididi be a rauduneena.
40028010	Dabudine Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Nam ko naira! Ko naḡo be tasitasiguma ko riuedi da ta naḡona Galilima. Be dabudine taudi taugu ta kitaguna.”
40028011	Naumeki da waiwaivi keda a naḡonaḡona maika, tauiḡara a naḡona meagaie pirisi adi babadama ḡarodie, be yaba matabudi a tubutubuḡana ai varidina.
40028012	Dabudine pirisi adi babadama be babada ḡesaudima mate ai boru be adi ogama a taraḡina. Yodibe tauiḡara mane dosinama a utedi
40028013	be a riuedina, “Ko naḡo be banaga umanama koi varidina, ‘Tauma kupie kè kena nuakoa, be debamaie Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama a tava be Yesu tubuḡinama a danenena.’
40028014	Be deḡoda gabeman uma giunama ima vaie, tokare tauma ka gwayedi da nam aba gewagewanama ko banavi.”
40028015	Naumeki da tauiḡara mane a ragaudi be aba pirisi be babada ḡesaudima a riuriuedina nama a voiedina. Be inam gututunama Jius nopone ya daberarana, naumeki da yodi.
40028016	Inam raḡanine tauwai muriwatana matabudi 11 a naḡona Galilima. Dabudine taudi a naḡona oyae deḡo Yesu dokane ya riuriuedina dabudine.
40028017	Be raḡanine taudi Yesu a kitakitana, dabudine a rauduneena, be ḡesaudima taudi a noḡota bekubekuna.
40028018	Naumeki da Yesu taudi ḡarodie ya tava be ya riuna, “Rewapana marae, be dobue matabudi Mamaitua taugu ya uteguna.
40028019	Vutuna aubainama ko naḡo be banaga dobu matabuna nopone ko voiedi da yau tauwai muriwatanama ta tubuḡana. Be koi babataitodina Tamanama, Natunama be Arua Babau isedie.
40028020	Be aba è riuriu vavasaḡemina, yabedima matabudi taudi koi katakataidi da ta voteyeteyedina. Be yà riuriu kauemina da taugu raḡan matabuna taumi mate, naumeki da raḡan damone.”
41001001	Mamaitua Natunama, Yesu Tauwai yawasana varinama verenama umanama yai karena.
41001002	Maika nema peroveta Aisaia ya girugirumina nama, Mamaitua ya riuna, “Taugu tokare tauwai noyanoya yà riupore dokena da tauna am kedama e sepana.
41001003	“Banaga dobu kavakavane e yokoyokona, ‘Keda ko kawa vereveredi be ko kawa didimanidi be Bada e veraverauna.’”
41001004	Naumeki da Jon dobu kavakavane ya maḡatara be yawai babataito be noḡota viravira ya rarau guguyedina da Mamaitua banaga adi gewagewama sibo ya noḡota poredina.
41001005	Banaga toitoi Juda provins nopone be Jerusalem meagaine matabudi a dobi a naḡona Jon ḡarone. Dabudine taudi adi gewagewama ai maḡataridi be Jon Jodan upane yai babataitodina.
41001006	Jon na garama kamel vuvuḡine voivoienama ya kotekotena. Be musara kopinama kwarikwarinama yai boretaie be na kanima kapau be dobira iwavinama.
41001007	Tauna banaga umanama yai varidina, “Banaga murigue e veraverauna tauna yai rewapana vavasaḡana, nam maika taugu. Taugu nam veregu da yà raudune be na kaḡasumama yà kaiporedi.
41001008	Taugu upakavakavae yàwai babataitomina, be tauna tokare Arua Babaue ei babataitomina.”
41001009	Inam raḡandie Yesu Nasaret meagaine Galili provins nopone be ya verauna, da Jon Jodan upane Yesu yai babataitona.
41001010	Raḡanine Yesu upae be ya potipoti tavana, tauna e kitana be mara yai raḡantenaḡe da ya nuaporaḡa be arua ya yovoyovona ḡarone maika kiu gabubu.
41001011	Dabudine bona marae ya riuna, “Tam taugu natuḡomiguma be taugu yàwai nuaverena ḡarome.”
41001012	Naumeki da Arua Yesu yai doka nawena dobu kavakavane.
41001013	Be inam dabudine tauna ya miana raḡan matabudi 40 be Seitan Yesu ya raurubuna. Be inam dabudine dobira museridima mate be anea a dobi be a saguna.
41001014	Raḡanine Jon dibure a boruboru nawena, murine Yesu ya naḡona Galilima be Mamaitua varinama verenama ya rauguguyena.
41001015	Yesu ya riuna, “Raḡan kaua ya tavana be Mamaitua na waiguyauma kaiteka e tavatavana da Mamaitua na waibadama ei karena. Vutuna aubainama ami gewagewama ko kuvesidi be vari verenama koi sumaḡena.”
41001016	Raḡanine Yesu Galilima yawawa dianaḡa ya naḡonaḡo be tauwai sagida rabui ya kitedina, Saemon be tasinama Endru taudi sagide iyana a konekonedina.
41001017	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Koi muriwatanegu be taugu yài katakataimi da banaga ko konedina.”
41001018	Raḡanine Yesu nama ya riuriuedina, taudi waiḡapa adi sagidama a gosaḡa be tauna ai muriwatanena.
41001019	Dabudine tauna ya taunaḡo ḡaubonaḡa be Sebedi natunatunama Jeims tasinama Jon mate wagae ya kitedina, adi sagidama a kawakawa batebatedina.
41001020	Raḡanine Yesu taudi ya kitekitedina, tauna ya yokoedi be taudi tamedima Sebedi be na yarayaragama mate wagae a gosedi be Yesu ai muriwatanena.
41001021	Yesu be na tauwai muriwatanama a verauna Kapeniam meagaine, be Sabat raḡanine Yesu ya naḡona sinagog nopone be waikatakatai yai karena.
41001022	Dabudine banaga aitauḡa na waikatakataima nama a vaivaiena, taudi a basena, baninama tauna nam maika tarawatu tauwai katakataidi be tauna na waikatakataima rewapana mate.
41001023	Dabudine penama tauḡoma kokukokunama ya saḡa sinagog nopone ya yogo be ya riuna,
41001024	“Nasaret Yesumma, tam am noyama aba tauma ḡaromaie? Tam uma dabudine kuya tavana kwa kawa gewagewamai, bo? Taugu è kataiena tam aitau. Tam Mamaitua na Taunoya babauma.”
41001025	Yesu arua gewagewanama ya riutuaḡaie be ya riuna, “Kwai nuatuḡu be tauḡominama kwa dobi pore!”
41001026	Dabudine arua gewagewanama tauḡoma ya kawa gusugusu, ya kawa yogoyogo be ya dobi porena.
41001027	Banaga matabudi a base be ai taraviravira be a riuna, “Uma aba kauina? Inam waikatakatai vauna, bo? Rewapana mate tauna arua gewegewedima mate e riuedi be ta vovo teyeteyena.”
41001028	Naumeki da dabudine Yesu varinama ya daberara makaina Galili provinsnama nopone.
41001029	Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama mate be Jeims da Jon sinagog a gose be didimaninama a naḡona Saemon be Endru adi vadae.
41001030	Saemon rawanama sida poyapoya ya paḡo be gunie ya kenakenana. Be raḡanine Yesu ya tavatavana, tauna inam sidanama ai varina.
41001031	Yesu ya naḡo waivinama ḡarone da nimane ya kaididi be ya kawa midisuḡuna. Dabudine poyapoya waivi ya gose be tauna adi kanima soienama yai karena.
41001032	Inam ravine suara ya yovoyovona murine banaga adi banagama sidesidedima be aitauḡa penama kokukokudima a verauḡedina Yesu ḡarone.
41001033	Banaga matabudi meagaie miemienidima vada matakedane ai rawateḡeidina.
41001034	Be Yesu banaga aitauḡa sida tabu be tabu ragaragaudima yai yawasanidi be penama toitoi ya tavu dobiḡedina. Be Yesu penama ya kauedi da nam aba ti giuena, baninama taudi a kataie da Yesu tauna aitau.
41001035	Raḡanboiboi kupinaḡa muriḡa da raḡan ya yanana, Yesu ya midisuḡu da vada be meagai ya gosedi be ya naḡona dobu wainuatoitoine dabudine ya moiragina.
41001036	Be Saemon na varoroma ḡesaudima mate a naḡona Yesu wanenama aubainama.
41001037	Be raḡanine Yesu a banabanavina, taudi a riuna, “Banaga matabudi tam ta wanewanemna.”
41001038	Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Tà naḡo wari kedaḡa be uma meagainama diane meagaidima ḡarodiḡa mate yà rauguguyana, baninama taugu vutuna aubainama è yovona.”
41001039	Naumeki da Yesu Galili noponaḡa ya babara naḡo be sinagog nopodiḡa ya rarau guguya be penama ya tavutavu dobiḡedina.
41001040	Tauḡoma kito paḡopaḡonama ya verau Yesu noḡone be doḡae ya raupari da sagu yai baḡe be ya riuna, “Deḡoda tam kwa ḡoena, taugu kwai yawasanigu.”
41001041	Dabudine Yesu noponama raunuatoi ya moḡavu be nimanama yai yoyo da tauḡoma ya taukoni be ya riuna, “Naumeki, taugu yà ḡoeḡoena, kwa yawasana!”
41001042	Dabudine sida kito yai raḡantenaḡe da tauḡoma ya gose be tauna ya yawasanana.
41001043	Naumeki da Yesu tauḡoma ya riupore be umanama ya riu vavasaḡena,
41001044	“Kwa kita kaua da uma kauinama nam aitau kwai vari be didimaninama kwa naḡo da pirisi ḡarone kwai maḡatara munaḡem be Mamaitua kwa tipana Mousis na tarawatuma e riuriuna nama. Kwa voie da banaga ta kita da tam kuya yawasana munaḡana.”
41001045	Be yaḡoro tauḡoma ya raukosoḡaiḡai da ya naḡo be Yesu varinama meagai matabuna noponaḡa ya giu gurate be yai daberarina. Vutuna aubainama Yesu meagaie debaḡa nam i naḡona be dobu wainuatuḡutuḡudie ya miamiana. Be yaḡoro banaga deḡo deḡo miemienidima ḡarone a tavatavana.
41002001	Raḡan bisanama a kovikovina murine Yesu ya munaḡana Kapeniamma be banaga varinama a vaie da tauna inam dabudine ya tavana.
41002002	Dabudine banaga toitoi ai rawateḡeidi da nam gabu deḡo i kena rubuna be matakeda noḡonama mate ya moḡavuna. Be Yesu vari verenama ya rauguguyena ḡarodie.
41002003	Dabudine tautauḡoma 4 tauḡoma tuera paḡopaḡonama a kiroḡi tavaitena Yesu ḡarone.
41002004	Be taudi nam teneteneḡina da Yesu ḡarone a verauḡe, baninama patara ya morabana. Vutuna aubainama taudi vada debane gaura a voiena, deḡo Yesu ya midimidie. Naumeki da tauḡoma tuera paḡopaḡonama kebana debane ma ratiratina ai dawe yovoḡena.
41002005	Raḡanine Yesu adi waisumaḡama nama ya kitakitana, tauna tauḡoma tuera paḡopaḡonama ya riuena, “Taukui, am gewagewama è noḡota porena.”
41002006	Dabudine aitauḡa tarawatu tauwai katakataidima a miamiana, taudiḡa nopodie ai nuanoḡonoḡota be a riuna,
41002007	“Aba aubainama uma tauḡominama nama e giugiu? Tauna Mamaitua ewai diboḡina. Nam aitau gewagewa e noḡota pore, be Mamaitua taunaḡa.”
41002008	Dabudine Yesu waiḡapa aruine ya kataie da taudi nopodie aba awai nuanoḡonoḡotena be ya riuedina, “Aba aubaina uma kauidima kowai nuanoḡonoḡotedi?
41002009	Deḡo tauna ya tekateka tauḡoma tuera paḡopaḡonama tà riuena, ‘Am gewagewama è noḡota porena,’ bo tà riuna, ‘Kwa midisuḡu, am gunima kwa paḡo be kwa naḡo?’
41002010	Be yodi yài kataimi be ko kataie da Banaga Natunama dobue rewapana ḡarone da gewagewa e noḡota porena.” Naumeki da Yesu tauḡoma tuera paḡopaḡonama ya riuena,
41002011	“Yà riuriuemna, kwa midisuḡu, am gunima kwa paḡo be kwa naḡo am vadae!”
41002012	Dabudine tauḡoma waiḡapa ya midisuḡu, na gunima ya paḡo be patara matedie be ya naḡona. Uma kauinama banaga matabudi a base be Mamaitua isanama a kaisuḡu be a riuna, “Tauma uma kauinama nam ama kaba kita.”
41002013	Dabudine Yesu ya munaḡana yawawa dosinama diane be patara dosinama ḡarone a verau be waikatakataidima yai karena.
41002014	Raḡanine tauna ya naḡonaḡo da kedae e kitana be Alpias natunama Livai teks tautaminama tauna na kaba noyae ya miamia be Yesu tauna ya riuena, “Kwai muriwatanegu!” Dabudine Livai ya midisuḡu be Yesu yai muriwatanena.
41002015	Muriḡa nama Livai na vadae Yesu ya kanikani be teks tautamidi, gewagewa banegidima, be na tauwai muriwatanama mate ai rawateḡeidi be a kanikani tenaḡana. Baninama taudi matabudi Yesu awai muriwatanena.
41002016	Raḡanine tarawatu tauwai katakataidima, taudi vutuna Parisi, nama ta kitana be Yesu gewagewa banegidima be teks tautamidima mate a kanikanina, taudi na tauwai muriwatanama a riuedina, “Aba aubainama tauna umanama banegidima mate ta kanikani?”
41002017	Raḡanine Yesu nama ya vaivaiena, tauna ya riuedina, “Banaga yawayawasanidima taudi nam dogeta tima ḡoeḡoena be banaga sidesidedima taudi dogeta ta ḡoeḡoena. Taugu nam e yovona banaga veredima aubaidi, taugu banaga gewegewedima aubaidima è yovona.”
41002018	Naumeki da Jon na tauwai muriwatanama be Parisi a widiwidina be banaga ḡesaudima a tava Yesu ḡarone be ai taravirena, “Nemanama da Jon na tauwai muriwatanama be Parisi adi tauwai muriwatanama taudi ta widiwidina, be tam am tauwai muriwatanama ibewa?”
41002019	Yesu ya paribeedina, “Nemanama da naḡivau tauḡominama na warema ta widina raḡanine yaḡoro tauna taudi mate? Raḡanine naḡivau tauḡominama yaḡoro taudi mate taudi nam tokare ta widina.
41002020	Be raḡan e tavana da naḡivau tauḡominama ḡavoe ta nawena, yodibe inam raḡanine ta widinana.
41002021	Nam aitau gara nuasikanama poranama e paḡo be gara vaunama mate e popo tenaḡe. Deḡoda nama e voiana, gara nuasikanama vaunama tokare gara poranama e sika pore be gaura e moraba guratana.
41002022	Be nam aitau waen vaunama e paḡo be waen koukounama poranama nopone e ḡini. Deḡoda nama e voiana, tokare koukou e nuagoru da waen e nuaḡini be rabuidi ta gewagewana. Ibewa! Tauna waen vaunama koukou vaunama nopone e ḡinina.”
41002023	Sabat tenaḡa Yesu be na tauwai muriwatanama mate yaḡoda sipinama nopodiḡa a naḡonaḡona, be na tauwai muriwatanama yaḡoda ragaudima ai karena.
41002024	Be Parisi Yesu a riuena, “Tauma ama tarawatuma e riuriuna da Sabat raḡanine nam nama sibo am tauwai muriwatanama a voia, be taudi ta voivoiana.”
41002025	Be Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taumi Deivid aba ya voivoiena koya sievi bo ibewa? Raḡanine tauna na varoroma mate kani a ḡoe kauena,
41002026	tauna Mamaitua na vadae ya naḡo be buredi Mamaitua waikatainama ya paḡo be ya kanina. Be na varoroma mate ya utedi be a kanina avedi da pirisi taudiḡa sibo a kanikanina, baninama tarawatu e riuriuna nama. Inam raḡandie pirisi adi badama isanama Abiata na raḡanie.”
41002027	Naumeki da Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Sabat e kenakenana banaga aubainama be nam Sabat banaga ei bade.
41002028	Vutuna aubainama Banaga Natunama yaḡoro Sabat ewai badena.”
41003001	Raḡan ḡesaune Yesu ya naḡo sinagog vadanama nopone be dabudine tauḡoma nimanama tuera poḡopaḡonama ya miamiana.
41003002	Inam dabudi banaga ḡesaudima mate Yesu a kitakita watanina deḡoda tauna Sabat raḡanine banaga sibo i yawasanina, dabudine taudi tokare ai samanina.
41003003	Be Yesu tauḡoma nimanama tuera poḡopaḡonama ya riuena, “Kwa saḡa be banaga matabudi nopodie kwa midi!”
41003004	Dabudine Yesu banaga yai taraviredina, “Aba dà tarawatuma e riuriuedana da tà voie: Sabat raḡanine yaba veredima tà voiedi bo yaba gewegewedima tà voiedi, banaga tài yawasani bo tài guri?” Be taudi nam aba ti riuena.
41003005	Yesu nuanama yai medi da ya kita vireviredina be ya raunuatoi kauedina, baninama taudi adi nopobadoma be adi voia waigewama aubainama. Dabudine Yesu tauḡoma ya riuena, “Nimamma kwai yoyo!” Be tauḡoma nama ya voia be nimanama ya vere munaḡana.
41003006	Dabudine Parisi sinagog a gose pore be a naḡona Herod na damma mate ai rawateḡeidi be Yesu na kasirama tomnama ai karena, da tauna sibo ai gurina.
41003007	Yesu be na tauwai muriwatanama mate a naḡona Galili yawawine be dabudine banaga patara ai muriwatanedina.
41003008	Raḡanine ta vaiena be Yesu yaba matabudi ya voivoiedina, banaga toitoi ḡarone a tavana. Taudi Judiaḡa, Jerusalemḡa, Idumeaḡa be Jodan be nuaḡo nevane Taia be Saidon banegidima mate a tavana.
41003009	Baninama patara ya morabana aubainama, Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedi da waga ḡaubonama ta kawa nonoḡina tauna aubainama, da patara nam tauna ta midi ḡuruvi be ta tauporepore.
41003010	Baninama banaga toitoi yawai yawasanidina, vutuna aubainama banaga sidesidedima toitoi a rarau rubu guratana da sibo Yesu a taukonina.
41003011	Raḡanine aitauḡa arua gewegewedima kokukokudima Yesu a kitakitana, taudi kaḡapakane a raudune be bonedima dosine a riuna, “Tam Mamaitua Natunama.”
41003012	Be taudi ya riu vavasaḡedi da nam sibo aitau a riue da tauna aitau.
41003013	Yesu ya naḡo oya debane be aitauḡa tautauḡomidima ya ḡoeḡoedina, nama ya yokoedina.
41003014	Raḡanine taudi tauna ḡarone a tavatavana, taudi 12 ya vinedi be yai isedina ‘Apasol’, da taudi tauna mate be tauna ya riupore nawedi da ta rauguguyana.
41003015	Be rewapana a paḡo da penama ta tavu dobiḡedina.
41003016	Uma banegidima 12 Yesu ya vinedina inam Saemon, Yesu yai isana Pita.
41003017	Jeims, Sebedi natunama be tasinama Jon, taudi yai isedina ‘Boaneges’, inam riunama baninama ‘parere natunatunama’.
41003018	Endru, Pilip, Batolomiu, Metiu, Tomas be Jeims, tauna Alpius natunama, Tadeas, Saemon tauna Selot.
41003019	Be Judas Iskariot, tauna Yesu tauwai karakarakutuenama.
41003020	Dabudine Yesu ya munaḡana vadae, you, yaḡoro patara Yesu ḡarone ai rawateḡeidina, be nam kaisavo deḡo, da sibo Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama mate a mia be a kani.
41003021	Raḡanine na damma uma kauinama nama a vaivaiena, taudi a naḡona Yesu waidokenama aubainama. Baninama taudi a riuna, “Tauna ya buana.”
41003022	Be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima ḡesaudima, aitauḡa Jerusalemḡa veraveraudima, a riuna, “Penama adi guyauma Yesu ya kokuna. Tauna vutuna rewapana Yesu e ute be penama ewai dobidina.”
41003023	Vutuna aubainama Yesu ya yokoedi ḡarone be wainasie ya giugiuedina, “Nemanama da Seitan tauname e tavu dobiḡa munaḡe?
41003024	Deḡo dobunama banegidima tai kawa ḡasiḡasi be ta dariḡa munaḡedina, inam dobunama tokare e kawa gewagewa munaḡena.
41003025	Be deḡo damnama tai kawa ḡasiḡasi be ta dariḡa munaḡedina, inam damnama tokare ta kawa gewagewa munaḡedina.
41003026	Be nama teneḡinama, deḡoda Seitan na waiguyauma e dariḡa munaḡena be dam ei tubuḡana, inam damdima tokare nam ta kena nonoḡa, da ta kawa gewagewa munaḡedi be tai kavena.
41003027	Tauḡoma wairewapaninama na vadama nam aitau e gigi da e saḡa be na purapurama e ragaudi, deḡoda noḡone tauḡominama wairewapaninama e pani doke be muriḡa e saḡa da inam tauḡominama na purapurama e ragaudina.
41003028	“Yà riuriu kauemina, banaga adi voia waigewa be adi waidiboḡama tokare Mamaitua e noḡota poredina.
41003029	Be deḡoda aitau Arua Babau ḡarone e riuriu viravirana, tokare Mamaitua nam e noḡota pore, baninama tauna gewagewa kenakena nonoḡinama ya voiena.”
41003030	Yesu nama ya riuna, baninama banaga ḡesaudima umanama a riuriuna, “Tauna arua gewagewanama nopone.”
41003031	Naumeki da Yesu tinana be tasitasinama a tavana. Taudi doḡae a midi kwasa be Yesu a riuwanena.
41003032	Be patara Yesu a miamia kwavivirona, taudi Yesu a riuena, “Kwa kita! Tinam be tasitasimma a tava be gabure ta midimidi be taudi tam ta ḡoeḡoemna.”
41003033	Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Aitau tinagu be aitau tasitasigu?”
41003034	Dabudine banaga Yesu a miamia kwaviviroena ya kitedi be ya riuna, “Ko kita! Umanema tinatinagu be tasitasiguma.
41003035	Aitau da Mamaitua na ḡoanama e voivoiena, tauna vutuna tasigu, nuvugu be tinaguma.”
41004001	Yesu Galili yawawinama diane waikatakatai yai kare munaḡena. Be patara dosinama a rawateḡeidina aubainama, tauna topae waga debane ya saḡa be ya miana. Be patara matabudi taudi barabarae upa diane a miana.
41004002	Tauna wainasie yaba toitoi yai katakataidi be ya riuedina,
41004003	“Koi beavaia! Raḡan tenaḡa taukuma ya naḡona pesi kumanama aubainama.
41004004	Raḡanine pesi yawai yaraiedina, ḡesaudima keda poune a ravusedina be kiu a tava be a kanidina.
41004005	Be ḡesaudima yeku debedie a ravusedina, dabudine nam doḡa dosina aubainama pesi a gogo makaina, baninama doḡa nam i potopoto guratana.
41004006	Be raḡanine suara ya tavatavana, pesi ya kara gabedi be a pokina, baninama taudi waramidima nam ti yovo guratana.
41004007	Be pesi ḡesaudima gedara nopodie a ravusedi be gedara pesi a gogogona a yavanidina. Vutuna aubainama taudi nam ti banina.
41004008	Be yaḡoro pesi ḡesaudima doḡa verene a gogona. Naumeki da a gogotava, a moraba be a banina, ḡesaudima banidima 30, ḡesaudima 60, bo 100.”
41004009	Dabudine Yesu ya riuna, “Deḡoda beemima ta kenana, koi beavaia!”
41004010	Raḡanine Yesu taunaḡa, be banaga aitauḡa tauna a vaivaiena, tauwai muriwatana 12 mate a tava be tauna ai baḡa da tauna na wainasima baninama aba.
41004011	Naumeki da Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taumi Mamaitua na waiguyauma semosemonama ya utemina. Be banaga ḡesaudima ḡavoe miemienidima, taudi yaba matabudi wainasie yà riuedina:
41004012	‘Vutuna aubainama taudi ta kitakitana be nam tima kitakita kauena, be vaienama ta vaivaiena be nam tima vaivaiena, vutuna aubainama taudi nam Mamaitua ḡarone tima tavatava be adi gewagewama ima noḡonoḡota poredina.’
41004013	Dabudine Yesu yai taraviredina, “Taumi uma wainasinama nam ko kataie, bo? Be nema wainasi ḡesaudima ko katai bakedi?
41004014	Taukuma Mamaitua riunama ewai yaraiedina.
41004015	Be banaga ḡesaudima maika pesi keda debane ravuravusedima, deḡo Mamaitua riunama ya kumakumae. Raḡanine riu ta vaivaiena, Seitan waiḡapa e tava be Mamaitua riunama nopodie kumakumanama e kaikaiporaḡana.
41004016	Be banaga ḡesaudima maika pesi yeku debedie ravuravusedima. Taudi riu ta vaie be raḡan tenaḡa ma nuaveredi ta paḡopaḡona,
41004017	baninama taudi nam waramidi aubainama taudi nam ta midi gurata. Raḡanine gewagewa bo raukivigewagewa e tavana, baninama Mamaitua riunama aubainama, taudi waiḡapa tai daberaridina.
41004018	Be mate ḡesaudima maika pesi gedara nopodie ravuravusedima, riu ta vaivaiena,
41004019	be dobu yawasanidima nuaboyedi, dobu waiguyaudima be yaba ḡesaudima adi wainuapaḡoma mate ta saḡa be Mamaitua riunama ta yavanidi be nam tima banibanina.
41004020	Be banaga ḡesaudima taudi maika pesi doḡa verene kumakumanama, taudi riu ta vaie, ta paḡopaḡo, ta vovo teyeteyedi, be votedima ḡesaudima 30, ḡesaudima 60 bo 100.”
41004021	Yesu ya riuedina, “Nam aitau kodam ya saḡe be gurewa dibune bo vatara dibune ya boru. Bo tokare ḡavoe koyai midiri bo ibewa?
41004022	Aba da moimoisirinama tokare e neganegana be aba rupurupunama tokare e maḡatarana.
41004023	Aitauḡa da beemima e kenakenana, koi beavaia kauana!
41004024	Aba yà riuriuemina, koi beavaia kaua!” Mate ya riuedina, “Ruvanama ko rarau ruvena teneḡine nama Mamaitua taumi e ruvemina bo e tausaḡena.
41004025	Aitau uma yabedima kwa katakataiedina, tam tokare Mamaitua debane e taipotodina. Deḡoda aitau uma yabedima nam ku kataiedina, tam tokare avedi da ḡaubonama ḡarome be Mamaitua matabudi e kaiporaḡana.”
41004026	Be mate Yesu ya riuedina, “Mamaitua na waiguyauma maika umanama: Tauḡoma pesi na sipie yai yaraiedina.
41004027	Be kupi da suara tauna e kenakena bo e miamia nuababaḡana, be nam ima katakataiena nema pesi ta gogogogo bakona.
41004028	Be doḡa taunaḡa e voie da pesi ta gogo be ta banibanina, noḡone rugudima ta biridina, murine ta rovena, yodibe banidima nopodie ta biridina.
41004029	Raḡanine yaḡoda ta ḡouḡouna, tauḡoma na biriukoma e paḡo be taraḡidima ei karena, baninama dariḡa na raḡanima ya tavana.”
41004030	Yesu yai taravirana, “Mamaitua na waiguyauma nema tà giu bake, bo aba wainasinama tà voie da e kawa didimani?
41004031	Inam maika gaga pesinama, nito ḡominama doḡa nopone ko kumakumana nama.
41004032	Raḡanine e gogogona, tauna e moraba guratana, nam maika pesi ḡesaudima sipie ta gogogona nama. Be tauna raga yaveyaveḡinama vagurune kiu ḡavoḡa rovorovodima ta verau be ta raunoḡina.”
41004033	Yesu wainasi toitoi banaga ḡarodie ya rauguguyena, maika uma wainasinama nama ya giu guratedi da banaga ta kataiedina.
41004034	Tauna nam airaḡan wainasi i gose be ḡarodie i giu ḡomana, be raḡanine na tauwai muriwatanama mate taudiḡa be tauna yaba matabuna ḡarodie ya giu waibatena.
41004035	Inam raḡaninama teneḡine ravie, Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina, “Yawawa tà davu be tà naḡo noaḡo nevane.”
41004036	Naumeki da patara a gosedi be Yesu deḡo wagane ya miamiae dabudine tauwai muriwatana a geru be tauna mate a naḡona. Be waga ḡesaudima dabudi mate.
41004037	Yai raḡantenaḡe da sive bagibaginama ya tava be rabama ya nuayemra da ḡaubonaḡa sibo waga nopone upa ya moḡavuna.
41004038	Be Yesu tauna waga murine, debanama kunuane ya boru be ya kenakenana. Be na tauwai muriwatanama a rawaḡosori be a riuna, “Tauwai katakatai kwa kitakita bo ibewa da kaiteka tà gurina. Tam nam kumawai nuaboyeda, bo?”
41004039	Yesu ya midisuḡu da sive ya riutuaḡaie be ya riuna, “Kwai nuatuḡu!” Be rabama ya riuedina, “Ko rautamtamḡota!” Dabudine sive yai nuatuḡu be daumora dosinama ya kenana.
41004040	Naumeki da Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina, “Aba aubainama ko nainaira? Taumi nam ḡaromie waisumaḡa, bo?”
41004041	Taudi a ḡosoridi, a base be adi banagama adi banagama a riuedina, “Uma baneginama aitau? Tauna sive be rabama e riuedi be ta vovo teyeteyena.”
41005001	Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama mate a naḡona Galili yawawinama nuaḡo nevane, Gerasi banegidima adi dobue.
41005002	Raḡanine Yesu wagae ya dobidobina, inam dabudi tauḡoma guri adi gubae miemieninama ya verauna Yesu ḡarone. Inam tauḡominama arua gewagewanama nopone.
41005003	Tauna guri adi gubaḡa ya miamia naḡona. Be nam aitau teneteneḡina da tokare ya vunuḡi be ya rauseini,
41005004	baninama raḡan patapatanama tauna kaḡanama be nimanama seinie a panipanidina, be ya rakerakedina. Be kaḡane irama ya vava kotovidina. Tauna yai rewapana kauana, nam aitau teneteneḡina da ya taiparapara.
41005005	Kupi da suara tauna oya debediḡa be guri adi gubaḡa ya yogo naḡo da sabira ya ragau be ya nigonigo munaḡena.
41005006	Tauna madanie be raḡanine Yesu ya kitakitana, tauna ya manini ya naḡo da Yesu noḡone tuapikanama doḡae yai tutumidiri
41005007	be bonanama dosine ya riuna, “Yesu, Mamaitua saḡasaḡa vavasaḡinama natunama! Tam aba ḡarogue kwa ḡoeḡoe? Mamaitua isane yàwai baḡamna, nam kwa kovoḡigu!”
41005008	Tauḡoma nama ya riuna, baninama noḡone Yesu ya riuna da arua gewagewanama uma tauḡominama sibo ya dobi porena.
41005009	Dabudine Yesu tauḡoma yai taravirevirena, “Tam isamma nema?” Be tauna ya paribeena, “Taugu isaguma ‘patara’ be kè toi kauana.”
41005010	Be arua gewegewedima yaḡoro Yesu awai baḡana da nam wari dobue sibo ya riupore nawedina.
41005011	Dabudine bawa netarinama dosinama maida oya babane a yabayabana.
41005012	Naumeki da penama Yesu ai baḡana, “Kwa riupore nawemai bawa ḡarodie be kwai aninemai da nopodie ka saḡa.”
41005013	Naumeki da Yesu arua gewegewedima yai aninedi da tauḡoma a dobi pore be a naḡona bawa nopodie. Netari tabutabunama bawa sievinama 2 tausand nama dere boganaḡa a manini yovo be dakie a beku be yawawa nopone a tonedina.
41005014	Dabudine tauyosi aitauḡa bawa a raberabedina, a manini ḡoma meagaie be meagai diane, be uma varinama ai daberarina. Dabudine banaga a dobi a naḡona aba ya tubutubuḡana kitanama aubainama.
41005015	Be raḡanine taudi Yesu ḡarone a tavatavana, taudi tauḡoma penama ḡumnama tauna nopone miemienidima a kitana. Tauna yai gara be na noḡotama didimanine ya miamiana. Be taudi matabudi a nairana.
41005016	Taudi aitauḡa nama a kitakitana, banaga a riuedi da tauḡoma penama kokukokunama be bawa mate ḡarodie aba ya tubuḡana.
41005017	Vutuna aubainama taudi Yesu ai baḡa da adi dobuma sibo ya gosena.
41005018	Raḡanine Yesu waga nopone ya saḡasaḡana maika, tauḡoma penama a gosegose porena, tauna Yesu yai baḡana da sibo mate a naḡona.
41005019	Be Yesu nam i aninena, be ya riuna, “Kwa naḡo vadae, am damma ḡarodie be bada na raukiviverema be abaḡa ḡarome ya voivoiedina, nama kwa riuedina!”
41005020	Dabudine tauḡoma ya midisuḡu be ya naḡona Dekapolis noponaḡa, be Yesu aba tauna ḡarone ya voivoiena giuedima yai karena. Be banaga aitauḡa nama a vaivaiena, taudi a basena.
41005021	Yesu wagae yawawa ya davu be ya naḡona noaḡo nevane, dabudi yawawa diane patara dosinama tauna a midi ḡuruvina. Inam dabudine
41005022	sinagog taurabenama tenaḡa isanama Jaeras ya tava da e kitana be Yesu, naumeki da Yesu noḡone tuapikane ya raupari
41005023	be nuanama tabutabune yai baḡe be ya riuna, “Taugu natuguma waivinama ḡaubonama e gurigurina. Yàwai baḡamna da nimamma debane kwa boru da e yawasana be e mianana.”
41005024	Naumeki da Yesu tauna mate naḡo ai karena. Be patara mate a naḡo be Yesu a tauporeporena.
41005025	Be dabudine waivi tenaḡa waikosina vutuvutu ya paḡona na modima 12 a kovina.
41005026	Tauna yai nuatoitoi kauana, be na purapurama matabudi dogeta ḡarodie yawai yakaredina deḡo e yawasana kabe da yaḡoro ya kaikai guratena.
41005027	Raḡanine tauna Yesu varinama ya vaivaiena, tauna patara nopodie Yesu na garama ya taukonina,
41005028	baninama tauna ya noḡotina, “Deḡoda taugu Yesu na garama yà taukoni ḡomena, taugu tokare yà yawasanana.”
41005029	Raḡanine tauna Yesu na garama ya tautaukonina, dabudine yai raḡantenaḡe da kosina manimanininama yai kave be tuninama mayanama ya dami da tauna na wainuatoitoie ya yawasanana.
41005030	Inam dabudine Yesu mayanama ya dami da rewapana ḡarone ya dobi porena. Naumeki da tauna yai tauvitare patara ḡarodie yai taravira be ya riuna, “Aitau yau garama ya taukonidi?”
41005031	Be na tauwai muriwatanama a paribee da a riuna, “Kwa kita da patara ta midimidi ḡuruvim be ta tatau poreporemna. Be nemanama da kwa riuriuna, ‘Aitau ya taukonigu?’”
41005032	Yesu yaḡoro ya waitau kitakitana da aitau ya voiana sibo ya kitana.
41005033	Dabudine waivi ya katai munaḡe da ḡarone aba ya tubuḡana, vutuna aubainama tauna ḡarone ya verau be naira ma gusuna Yesu kaḡapakane tuapikane ya raupari be yaba matabuna yai maḡataridina.
41005034	Yesu waivi ya riuena, “Moumou, am waisumaḡama yai yawasanimna. Ma nuasubam kwa naḡona, be am wainuatoitoie kwa yawasanana!”
41005035	Dabudine Yesu yaḡoro ya giugiu be tautauḡoma ḡesaudima Jaeras tauna sinagog taurabenama na vadae be a tava da Jaeras a riuena, “Natumma waivinama ya gurina. Aba aubainama tauwai katakatai kwa tatai nuaraḡaraḡa?”
41005036	Yesu taudi aba a giugiuedina ya vaia yababedi be tauna Jaeras ya riuena, “Nam am noḡotama e beku be kwai sumaḡa ḡoma!”
41005037	Naumeki da Yesu nam aitau i anine da tauna mate ti naḡo, be tauna Pita, Jeims tasinama Jon taudiḡa mate a naḡona.
41005038	Raḡanine taudi sinagog taurabenama na vadae a tavatavana, dabudine Yesu e vaiena be banaga patara ai nuaboya be bonedima ḡavoḡa a ḡabaḡabana ya kitedina.
41005039	Yesu vada nopone ya saḡa be ya riuna, “Aba aubainama kowai nuaboya be ko ḡabaḡaba? Gomana nam i gurina, tauna e kenakena ḡomana.”
41005040	Be taudi Yesu ai kwatekwatevena, vutuna aubainama tauna banegidima ya riupore dobiḡedi be tauna gomana tamana, tinana be na tauwai muriwatanama rabuiteḡa mate a naḡona deḡo gomana ya kenakenae.
41005041	Naumeki da Yesu gomana waivinama nimane ya kaididi be Hibru bonane ya riuena, “Talita kum!” Uma riunama baninama inam, ‘Moumou, yà riuriuemna, kwa midisuḡu!’
41005042	Dabudine gomana waivinama yai raḡantenaḡe da ya midisuḡu be naḡo yai karena. Inam gomeninama na modima 12. Raḡanine uma kauinama nama ya tubutubuḡana, taudi matabudi a base kauena.
41005043	Be Yesu ya riu vavasaḡedi da uma kauinama nam aitau tenaḡa sibo ai vari, be tauna ya riuedi da aiyaba sibo gomana a ute da ya kanina.
41006001	Yesu inam dobunama ya gose be ya munaḡana na vadae na meagaie, be na tauwai muriwatanama mate ai muriwatanena.
41006002	Be Sabat ya tavatavana raḡanine, tauna sinagog nopone waikatakatai yai kare be banaga a riuna, “Uma tauḡominama uma kauidima deḡo ya ragaudi? Uma nuauyauyanama deḡo ya paḡo da tauna mataira mate e voivoiedi!
41006003	Tauna kabe Meri natuna tauwai kamda, be Jeims, Jousep, Judas be Saemon tuaḡedi? Be nuvunuvunama mate yodi ḡarode.” Vutuna aubainama taudi a tuaḡaiena.
41006004	Be Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Peroveta dobu ḡesaudie ta vovo teyeteyena, be na meagaima banegidi be na banaga ḡomama be na vadama banegidima ta tuatuaḡaiena.”
41006005	Vutuna aubainama tauna inam dabudi nam aba matairidima i voiedina. Be nimane banaga raubisaḡa sidesidediḡa ya taukonidi be yai yawasanidina.
41006006	Be Yesu ya basedina, baninama taudi adi waisumaḡama ibewa.
41006007	Tauna tauwai muriwatana 12 ya yokoedi be ma turana ma turana ya riuporedina. Be tauna rewapana ya utedi da taudi arua gewegewedima ta tavu dobiḡedina.
41006008	Dabudine ya riu vavasaḡedi be ya riuna, “Ami vaḡaie nam aba ko ragaudi, nam kani, nam tana, nam mane bogemie. Be diḡona taunaḡa ko paḡo.
41006009	Be mate kaḡasuma ko kotedina, be nam kwama ḡidoidima mate ko ragaudi!”
41006010	Be mate ya riuedina, “Raḡanine deḡo vadane tai aninemi be ko saḡana, inam dabudine ko miana, naumeki da inam meagainama ko gose porena.
41006011	Be deḡoda banaga nam ta ḡoemi, naumeki da kaḡemima popokaudima ko rawakurukuruvidi, be inam meagainama ko gose porena, da dabudi taudi ta kita be ta kataie da taudime adi wavuma.”
41006012	Dabudine taudi a dobi a naḡo be a rauguguyana da banaga adi gewagewama sibo a kuvesidina.
41006013	Be mate banaga ḡarodie penama toitoi a tavu dobiḡedi, be oerie banaga sidesidedima toitoi tunidima a viredi be ai yawasanidina.
41006014	Guyau Herod uma kauinama nama ya vaiena, baninama Yesu a katai vavasaḡe be varinama ya moramorabana. Vutuna aubainama tauna ya riuna, “Jon tauwai babataito ya guri be ya midisuḡu munaḡana. Vutuna aubainama tauna rewapana ya paḡo da uma matairidima e voivoiedina.”
41006015	Be ḡesaudima a riuriuna, “Tauna Elaija.” Be yaḡoro banaga ḡesaudima a noḡonoḡoti da, tauna maika bonideḡo perovetedima nama.
41006016	Raḡanine Herod nama ya vaivaiena, tauna ya riuna, “Tauna inam Jon tauwai babataito, gadonama è tomna be gurie ya midisuḡu munaḡana.”
41006017	Be boni Herod tauiḡara ya riuedi da Jon a vunuḡi da seinie a pani be dibure a boruna. Herod nama ya voiana, baninama tauna tuaḡa ḡominama Pilip na waivima isanama Herodias ya naḡina.
41006018	Vutuna aubainama Jon Herod umanama ya riuriuena, “Inam nam i verena da tuaḡama na waivima kwa naḡi!”
41006019	Vutuna aubainama Herodias nuanama yai medina Jon ḡarone da ya ḡoeḡoena sibo yai gurina. Be tauna nam teneteneḡina da nama sibo ya voiana,
41006020	baninama Herod tauna Jon ya naire be ya raberabe kauena, baninama ya kataie da Jon tauna banaga didimanina be tauḡoma babaunama. Be Herod tauna Jon na giuma vaienama ya ḡoeḡoe kauena, avedi da tauna ya tatai nuaraḡaraḡana, be yaḡoro na giuma vaienama ya ḡoeḡoena.
41006021	Dabudine Herodias keda ya banavina da Jon ei gurina. Inam raḡanine Herod na kaba tubuḡama soine. Tauna soi ya voiena gabegabeman adi babadama, iḡeiḡeridima adi babadama be Galili babadidima mate aubaidima.
41006022	Dabudine Herodias natunama guguininama ya saḡa da ya bigana, be Herod na warema mate nuedima ya paḡo kauena. Dabudine Guyau Herod gomeninama ya riuena, “Aba kwa ḡoeḡoena kwa paḡo? Taugu aiyaba kwa ḡoeḡoena nama yà utemna.”
41006023	Ya sauga wape be ya riuna, “Aba kwai baḡena yà utemna, avedi da yau waiguyauma be nevanama tokare yà utemna.”
41006024	Dabudine gomana waivinama ya dobi ya naḡo be tinanama yai taravire be ya riuna, “Dudua, aiyaba yài baḡe?” Dabudine tinanama ya pribee be ya riuna, “Jon tauwai babataito debanama yà ḡoeḡoena.”
41006025	Inam gomeninama guguininama yai raḡantenaḡe da ya manini ya naḡona guyau ḡarone be na ḡoanama ya riuena. “Taugu yà ḡoeḡoena tam yodi uma dabudi Jon debanama teboe kwa boru be kwa uteguna.”
41006026	Be uma giunama guyau ya kawa nuaboya kauena, be tauna nam teneteneḡina da gomana ya rawaḡaiḡaiena, baninama tauna noḡone na warema matedie ya sauga wapana.
41006027	Vutuna aubainama guyau na taubodamama ya giu yaḡe be ya riupore da Jon debanama e verauḡena. Naumeki da taubodama ya naḡo dibure be Jon gadonama ya tom,
41006028	da teboe ya boru be gomana guguininama ya ute da ya kiroḡi be tinanama ya utena.
41006029	Raḡanine Jon na tauwai muriwatanama uma giunama a vaivaiena, taudi a verau be tubuḡinama a kiroḡa nawe be a dobona.
41006030	Apasol Yesu ḡarone a tava munaḡa be yaba matabuna a voivoiedi be awai katakataina tauna ai varina.
41006031	Dabudine banaga toitoi a saḡasaḡa be a yovoyovona, be Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama nam teneteneḡina da sibo a mia be a kani. Vutuna aubainama tauna ya riuedina, “Taumiḡa muriguḡa ko verau gabu wainuatuḡune be raḡan ḡaubonaḡa ko siperena!”
41006032	Dabudine taudiḡa wagae a naḡona gabu wainuatuḡutuḡune.
41006033	Be dabudine patara ta kitana be Yesu da na tauwai muriwatanama mate a naḡonaḡona, taudi a kitedi be a kataiedina aubainama taudi meagai matabuna a gosedi da noḡodima a tom be a tava dokana.
41006034	Raḡanine Yesu wagae ya ḡotaḡotana, tauna patara dosinama ya kitedi be ya raunuatoiedina, baninama taudi maika sipu be nam taurabedi. Naumeki da tauna yaba matabuna waikatakataidima yai karena.
41006035	Raḡanine ravi ya tavatavana, tauna na tauwai muriwatanama ḡarone a tava be a riuna, “Uma dobu wainuatoitoinama be kaiteka suara e kovikovina.
41006036	Banaga kwa riupore nawedi meagaiḡa be meagai murisairidie be mabidie adi kanima ta gimara be ta kanidi.”
41006037	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Taumi koi kanidi!” Be tauwai muriwatanama tauna a riuena, “Tam kwa ḡoeḡoena tauma ka naḡo be Denari 200 vutuna ruvanama buredi ka gimara be banaga kai kani bagibagidi, bo?”
41006038	Be Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina, “Taumi buredi bisa ḡaromie? Ko naḡo be ko kitedi!” Dabudine a noḡota banavi be tauna a riuena, “Buredi 5 be iyana rabui.”
41006039	Dabudine Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedi da banaga ta dariḡedina, naumeki da taudi banaga a dariḡedi be mui gidegidevidima debedie a miana.
41006040	Naumeki da banaga a daridariḡana, dariḡidima nopodie banaga ḡesaudima 100 be ḡesaudima 50-nama a miana.
41006041	Dabudine Yesu buredi 5 be iyana rabui ya ragaudi da gunuma yai kita saḡa be Mamaitua yai kaiwe, be buredi ya givedina, yodibe na tauwai muriwatanama ya utedi da taudi a soiedi be banaga a utedina. Be iyana rabui mate ya soiedina.
41006042	Banaga matabudi a kani da a kani siauana.
41006043	Be tauwai muriwatana buredi be iyana kanikani gosedima a tama be posa matabudi 12 ai moḡavudina.
41006044	Tautauḡoma aitauḡa a kanikanina sievidima 5 tausand.
41006045	Naumeki da Yesu waiḡapa na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedi da waga nopone a saḡa da Yesu a gose be taudi a naḡonaḡo dokana Betsaidama maika, tauna patara ya riuporedina.
41006046	Murine tauna ya naḡona oyae moiragi aubainama.
41006047	Raḡanine ravi na parate be waga yawawa poune ya midimidina, be Yesu taunaḡa gerese ya midimidina.
41006048	Tauna e kitana be na tauwai muriwatanama ma nuaboyedi a yareyarena, baninama sive dosinama ya kiroḡidi be a wewewesana. Raḡantomtom suara 3 be 6-nama poudie be Yesu topa debanaḡa ya naḡo be ḡarodie ya tavana. Tauna sibo ḡaubonaḡa yai muridina,
41006049	be taudi a kita be ai noḡotana kabe ḡaḡarua.
41006050	Be bonedima dosine a rasana, baninama taudi a naira kauana. Dabudine Yesu yai raḡantenaḡe be ya riuedina, “Nam nuemima e rovo! Inam taugu. Nam ko naira!”
41006051	Dabudine Yesu ya saḡana waga nopone taudi ḡarodie be sive yai nuatuḡuna. Be taudi a base kauena,
41006052	baninama taudi tautauḡoma 5 tausand awai kanidina na banima nam ti kataiena, be debedima ya buana.
41006053	Taudi yawawa a davu be a verauna Genesaret geresine a ḡota be ai anikana.
41006054	Raḡanine taudi waga a dobidobi porena, banaga Yesu a kita be a katai ḡomena.
41006055	Taudi Genesaret dobunama matabuna a naḡo popoe be banaga sidesidedima ma ratiratidi a kiroḡa be deḡo deḡo Yesu ya naḡonaḡona nama sida a kirokiroḡa tavaitedina.
41006056	Be Yesu deḡo meagai murisairidiḡa ya naḡonaḡona, nama taudi banaga sidesidedima anikune gabudie a tavatavaitedina. Be taudi Yesu ai baḡa da tauna sibo yai aninedi da na garama isunama sibo a taukonina, be aitauḡa a tautaukonina, taudi a yawasanana.
41007001	Parisi be tarawatu tauwai katakatai ḡesaudima aitauḡa Jerusalemḡa a tavatavana, matabudi Yesu ḡarone a rawateḡeidi da
41007002	ta kitana be Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ḡesaudima ma nimamiredi a kanikanina, inam waikatakatai dosi poredie saḡasaḡanama adi tarawatuma nam ti kaiwatanina.
41007003	Parisi be Jius matabudi nam tima kanikani yababana, noḡone nimedima ta koḡedina, adi dosima adi waikatakataima poredie a paḡopaḡona nama.
41007004	Raḡanine anikune gabune be ta tavana, taudi nam ta kani be noḡone nimedima ta raukoḡana. Be taudi tarawatu poredima ḡesaudima toitoi ta kaikai watanedina, maika redu, tebo be gurewa koḡedima.
41007005	Vutuna aubainama Parisi be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima Yesu ai taravirena, “Aba aubainama tam am tauwai muriwatanama uma waikatakatainama dosi poredie ya yovoyovona nam timawai muriwatane, be taudi ma nimamiredi ta kanikanina?”
41007006	Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taumi waikaikaiyovu banegimima. Aisaia tauna na waiperovetae ya riu kauana, tauna umanama ya girugirumina, ‘Uma banegidima mududiḡa ta riuriuna, ‘Mamaitua’, be nopodima madanie.
41007007	Taudi nam teneteneḡina da taugu ta rauduneegu, baninama taudi tarawatu banaga a voivoiedina tawai katakataidina, da inam kabe vutudi Mamaitua na tarawatu.’
41007008	Taumi Mamaitua na riuvavasaḡama ḡavoe koya taurie be banaga ḡoma adi waikatakataima ko vovo teyeteyedina.”
41007009	Be ya riuedina, “Taumi koya katai ḡaḡa be Mamaitua na tarawatuma koya varie be taumiḡa ami vaivaie kowai muriwatanedina.
41007010	Baninama Mousis ya riuna, ‘Tamamma be tinamma kwa viviredi!’ be ‘Aitau tamanama bo tinanama e kunukunurena tauna gurie e miana.’
41007011	Be taumi ko riuriuna, deḡoda banaga yaba ya paḡona maika kani bo yaba ḡesaudima da tamanama bo tinanama sibo ya sagudina, be tauna e riuriuedina, ‘Uma Korban’ - inam riunama baninama: Puyo Mamaitua taunaḡa aubainama.
41007012	Taumi ami waikatakataima kadi taiye tauna nam tamana bo tinanama ima sagusagudina.
41007013	Inam kededie waikatakatai ewai raudavudavuna, banaga ḡesaudima ḡarodie be Mamaitua riunama e kawakawa koakoana. Be yaba ḡesaudima a toi rereḡedina mate ko voivoiedina maika uma taudi.”
41007014	Dabudine Yesu patara ya yoko munaḡedi ḡarone be ya riuedina, “Koi beavaiegu matabumi, be uma yabedima yodi yà giuedina ko noḡotidi!
41007015	Nam aiyaba ḡavoe tokare e saḡa banaga nopone be ei mira, ibewa da aba banaga nopone e dobidobina, inam vutuna taunaḡa ewai mirana.”
41007017	Raḡanine Yesu patara ya gosedi be vada nopone ya saḡasaḡana, tauna na tauwai muriwatanama ai baḡa da uma wainasinama baninama sibo ya giu yaḡedina.
41007018	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Taumi nam ko kataie, bo? Taumi sibo koya kataie da yaba ḡavoe be banaga nopone e saḡasaḡana tokare nam ei mira.
41007019	Baninama inam nam nuapoune ima yovoyovona, ibewa da kapone da noveḡo e dobidobina.” Uma riunama nama Yesu ewai maḡatarana da kani matabudi anikani.
41007020	Na giuma ya kaiwatani be ya riuna, “Aba banaga nopone e dobidobina, inam vutuna tauna ewai mirana.
41007021	Baninama banaga nopone nuapoune noḡota gewegewedima ta tavatavana, maika badara, danene, vunuḡa, turanama debane mui e porena,
41007022	waigogo be noḡota ḡesaudima gewegewedima tabu be tabu e voivoiedina, maika waikaikaiyovu, kaua waimata warewaredi bo waideba subesubedima, unura, boruwaideḡa, moraba be bua kauidima e voivoiedina.
41007023	Uma kauidima gewegewedima banaga nopone ta tavatavana, taudi vutudi banaga tawai mirana.”
41007024	Dabudine Yesu inam meagainama ya gose be ya naḡona dobu dosine Taiya meagainama diane. Tauna vada nopone ya saḡa be ya ḡoeḡoena da banaga nam sibo a kataie da tauna inam dabudine, be yaḡoro tauna nam i mia moisirina.
41007025	Gomana waivinama arua gewagewanama kokukokunama tinanama, Yesu varinama ya vaivaiena, yai raḡantenaḡa ya verau Yesu noḡone be tuapikane ya rauparina.
41007026	Waivi tauna eteni Gurik nama be meagai dosinama Ponitia nopone ya tubuḡana Siriama, waivi Yesu yai baḡa da tauna natunama nopone penama sibo ya tavu dobiḡena.
41007027	Be Yesu ya paribee be ya riuna, “Kwa gose da noḡone seda ta kani doka. Nam i verena da seda adi kanima tà paḡo be daḡadaḡasi ḡarodie tà pore nawe.”
41007028	Waivi ya paribee be ya riuna, “Bada! Be yaḡoro daḡadaḡasi vatara dibune miemienidima seda adi kanima kurekuredima tokare mate ta kanidina.”
41007029	Dabudine Yesu waivi ya riuena, “Nama kuya giuna aubainama, yodi tam kwa munaḡa am vadae, be dabudine tokare kwa kita da penama natumma waivinama ya dobi porena.”
41007030	Naumeki da waivi ya munaḡa vadae da e kitana be penama gomana waivinama ya dobi pore be gomeninama tauna na kaba kenae ya kenakenana ya kitana.
41007031	Dabudine Yesu Taiama be Saidonḡa ya dobi ya naḡona Dekapolis nopone Galili yawawinama paratine.
41007032	Dabudine banaga ḡesaudima tauḡoma beanama potapotanama be nam giugiuna a verauḡena Yesu ḡarone be ai baḡa da nimanama sibo tauḡoma tunine ya boruna.
41007033	Naumeki da patara nopodie be Yesu tauḡominama taunaḡa yai doka dobiḡe ḡavoe be nimarakurakunama tauḡoma beane ya sivudi, da nimanama kavisone yai vira be tauḡoma menanama ya taukonina.
41007034	Naumeki da Yesu gunume yai kita saḡa da yavutu bagibaginama ya taupore, be tauḡoma ya riuena, “Epata!” Inam riunama baninama ‘Kwa nuaporaḡa’.
41007035	Inam raḡanine tauḡoma beanama ya raunuaḡari be mudune ya giu yaḡana.
41007036	Be Yesu banaga ya riu vavasaḡedi da nam aitau tenaḡa ta riue, be ya riuriu nonoḡedina, be taudi yaḡoro a giugiu watanena.
41007037	Be taudi aitauḡa a vaivaiena a base kaue be a riuna, “Tauna yaba matabuna ya voia kauedina. Tauna e voie da avedi beapotapotanama be ei beavaiana, be avedi gumgum be e giuna.”
41008001	Nam dauna inam raḡanine, patara ḡesaunama dosinama mate ai rawateḡeidina. Be dabudine nam aiyaba i kenakenana da taudi sibo a kani, dabudine Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya yokoedi ḡarone be ya riuna,
41008002	“Taugu uma banegidima è raunuatoiedina, baninama raḡan rabuiteḡa nopodie taudi taugu mate, be yodi nam aiyaba da ta kani.
41008003	Be deḡoda taudi ma kaniguridi yà riuporedina, tokare kedae ta raugurerena. Baninama banaga ḡesaudima madanie be a verauna.”
41008004	Dabudine na tauwai muriwatanama a paribee be a riuna, “Uma mutuyua dobunama. Deḡo kani tà paḡo be uma banegidima tài kani bagibagidi?”
41008005	Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taumi ḡaromie buredi bisa?” Be taudi a riuna, “Buredi 7.”
41008006	Naumeki da Yesu patara ya riuedi da doḡae a miana. Be dabudine tauna buredi matabudi 7 ya ragaudi, Mamaitua yai kaiwe, ya givedi be na tauwai muriwatanama ya utedi da taudi sibo a soiedina patara ḡarodie, be taudi nama a voiena.
41008007	Be taudi iyana ḡauḡaubodima bisaḡa mate a ragaudina. Be Yesu inam iyenidima aubaidima yai kaiwa be na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedi da uma taudi mate ta soiedina.
41008008	-
41008009	Dabudine banaga sievinama 4 tausand nama a kani da a kani siauana. Naumeki da na tauwai muriwatanama kani kanikani gosedima posa matabudi 7 ai moḡavudina. Be dabudine Yesu banaga ya riuriupore nawedina,
41008010	tauna waiḡapa na tauwai muriwatanama mate wagae a saḡa be a naḡona Dalmatia distrik nopone.
41008011	Be Parisi ḡesaudima a tava Yesu ḡarone be waitaravirevirenama ai karena. Taudi a ḡoeḡoena sibo Yesu a raurubuna, vutuna aubainama mara matairinama ai baḡe da sibo ya voie be dabudi a kita be a kataie da Yesu tauna Mamaitua ḡaronama.
41008012	Dabudine Yesu yavutu bagibaginama ya taupore be ya riuna, “Aba aubainama yodi raḡaninama banegidima mataira tawai baḡedi? Ibewa! Yà riuriu kauemina da nam tokare mataira uma banegidima ḡarodie e tubutubuḡa.”
41008013	Naumeki da tauna ya gose poredi da waga nopone ya saḡa munaḡa be yawawa a davu da noaḡo nevane a naḡona.
41008014	Tauwai muriwatana nuedima ya koana, buredi toitoi kabe ti ragaragau da tenaḡa kavakava a paḡona ḡarodie wagae.
41008015	Dabudine Yesu nuedima ya boru be ya riuedina, “Parisi be Herod adi waikaikaiyovuma maika yist. Koi kita kauana!”
41008016	Naumeki da tauwai muriwatana uma kauinama ai giu vivivire be a riuna, “Tauna nama ya riuna, baninama tauda ḡarode nam buredi.”
41008017	Yesu ya kataiedi da taudi aba a giugiuena, vutuna aubainama tauna yai taraviredi, “Aba aubainama ko riuriuna da taumi ḡaromie nam buredi? Taumi yaḡoro nam ko kita be ko kataie, bo? Taumi koya nuababaḡa, bo?
41008018	Taumi matemima e kenakenana be nam komawai kita, beemima e kenakenana be nam komawai beavaia, bo? Be ko noḡonoḡoti bo ibewa
41008019	da raḡanine taugu buredidima matabudi 5 è givedina banaga 5 tausand aubaidima, be kani kanikani gosedima posedima moḡamoḡavudima bisa koya ragau?” Be tauwai muriwatana a paribee be a riuna, “Matabudi 12.”
41008020	“Raḡanine taugu buredidima matabudi 7 è givedina banaga 4 tausand aubaidima be kani kanikani gosedima posedima moḡamoḡavudima bisa koya ragau?” Be taudi a paribee be a riuna, “Matabudi 7.”
41008021	Be Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina, “Taumi yaḡoro nam koma katakataie, bo?”
41008022	Raḡanine taudi Betsaidama a tavatavana banaga ḡesaudima tauḡoma matapotapotanama ai doka verauḡe Yesu ḡarone be ai baḡana da sibo ya taukonina.
41008023	Naumeki da tauna tauḡoma matapotapotanama nimane ya kaididi da meagai a dobi pore be ḡavoe a naḡona. Dabudine Yesu tauḡoma matanama ya kavisodi be nimanama tauḡoma matane ya sivudi da yai taravire be ya riuna, “Aba kwa kitakita bo ibewa?”
41008024	Be tauna ya tausuḡu be ya riuna, “Taugu banaga yà kitekitedina be kitedima maika kai kabe ti naḡonaḡo.”
41008025	Naumeki da Yesu nimanama tauḡoma matane ya sivu munaḡedina. Dabudine tauḡoma matanama ya vere be yai kita munaḡana, be yaba matabudi ya kita kauedina.
41008026	Be Yesu tauḡoma ya riupore da ya naḡona na vadae be ya riuna, “Nam meagai banegidima kwa riuedi da aba ya tubuḡana.”
41008027	Yesu be na tauwai muriwatanama mate Seseria-Pilipai diane meagaidiḡa nama a naḡona. Da kedae be yai taraviredi da ya riuna, “Banaga ta riuriu da taugu aitau?”
41008028	Be taudi a paribeena, “Banaga ḡesaudima ta riuriuna da tam kabe Jon tauwai babataito, be ḡesaudima ta riuriuna da tam kabe peroveta Elaija, be ḡesaudima ta riuriu da tam kabe boni perovetedima.”
41008029	Be tauna ya riuedina, “Be taumi nemanama ko noḡonoḡoti bake da taugu aitau?” Be Pita ya paribeena, “Tam Keriso, vutuna Mamaitua ya sausaugena ya riupore yovoḡena.”
41008030	Dabudine Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riu vavasaḡedi da nam aitau tenaḡa tai vari.
41008031	Dabudine Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama waikatakataidima yai kare be ya riuedina, “Banaga Natunama tokare ei nuatoitoina yaba toitoi ḡarodie be babada dosidima, Parisi adi babadama be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima, taudi matabudi ta tuaḡaie be tai gurina. Be raḡan wairabuiteḡane tauna tokare e midisuḡu munaḡana.”
41008032	Tauna uma kauidima ya giu kauedina, vutuna aubainama Pita Yesu yai doka nawe ḡavoe be riutuaḡaienama yai karena.
41008033	Be raḡanine Yesu yai tauvitare da na tauwai muriwatanama ya kitedi be Pita ya riutuaḡaie be ya riuna, “Seitan! Murigue kwa naḡo, tam am noḡotama nam Mamaitua ḡarone tima yovoyovona be banaga ḡomae.”
41008034	Naumeki da Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama be patara ya yokoedi ḡarone be ya riuedina, “Aitau waimuriwataneguma e ḡoena, naumeki da na ḡoanama matabuna e gosedi, be na korosima e kiroḡi da ei muriwataneguna.
41008035	Baninama deḡoda aitau tame am yawasanama kwa kaididi be kwa raberabena, tokare am yawasanama kwa kawa gewagewana, be tam aitau am yawasanama kuyai utaena taugu be vari verenama kama taiye, tam tokare am yawasanama kwa banavina.
41008036	Be deḡoda aitau dobu yabedima matabudi e ragaragaudi be raḡanine e gurina, inam yabedima nema tauna ta sagu bake da tauna yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama e paḡo?
41008037	Bo aba banaga ei utae da na yawasanama e paḡo munaḡe?
41008038	Deḡoda banaga aitau taugu be riuguma giuenama e tunitunimayaḡena, uma kimtinama nam waisumeḡidi be gewagewa tauvoiedima nopodie, naumeki da tokare, raḡanine Banaga Natunama Tamanama neneḡarine be anea babau mate ta verauna, tauna mate e tuaḡaiena, baninama noḡone ya tunimayaḡeguna aubainama.”
41009001	Be Yesu na giuma ya kaiwatani da ya riuna, “Taugu yà riuriu kauemina da taumi ḡesaumima yodi uma dabudi ko midimidina, tokare nam ko guri naumeki da Mamaitua na waiguyauma rewapana mate e verauna ko kitana.”
41009002	Raḡan 6 a kovikovina murine Yesu Pita, Jeims be Jon yai dokedi be a naḡona oya daudaunama debane, taudiḡa dabudine a tavana. Be dabudine taudi noḡodie matedie Yesu kitanama ya boru vitarena.
41009003	Be na garama a rawarawa keyekeyemidi be a ḡavora da a ḡavora kauana, nam aitau dobue teneteneḡina da nama e kawa ḡavori.
41009004	Dabudine tauwai muriwatana rabuiteḡa noḡodie be Elaija da Mousis a maḡatara be Yesu mate awai giuna.
41009005	Be Pita ya riuna, “Tauwai katakatai, ya vere kaua da tauda mate uma dabudi. Be agunai tauma kape rabuiteḡa ka keridi, da tenaḡa tam aubaimma, tenaḡa Mousis aubaina be tenaḡa Elaija aubainama.”
41009006	Pita nama ya riuna, baninama tauna na banagama rabui mate a naira kauana, be Pita nam i kataie da aba sibo ya giue, vutuna aubainama ya giu yabayababana.
41009007	Dabudine giyou ya dobi be ya ruputawedina. Be inam giyounama nopone bona ya yovo be ya riuna, “Uma tauna taugu natuḡomiguma, tauna vutuna taugu nuaguma e paḡopaḡona, koi beavaie!”
41009008	Taudi ai raḡantenaḡe da aitau kitakita be nam aitau tenaḡa ti kitana, be ḡarodie Yesu taunaḡa.
41009009	Raḡanine taudi oya debane be a yovoyovona raḡanine, Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riu vavasaḡedi da matedie aba a kitakitana nam aitau tenaḡa tai vari, naumeki da Banaga Natunama gurie e midisuḡu munaḡana.
41009010	Taudi inam giudima a nuevidi be taudiḡa ai giu vivivira da, gurie midimidisuḡunama na banima aba.
41009011	Be taudi Yesu ai taravirena, “Aba aubainama tarawatu tauwai katakataidima ta riuriuna da, Elaija tokare e tava doka?”
41009012	Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Inam riukaua, Elaija tauna tokare e tava dokana, be tauna tokare yaba matabudi e kawa didimanidina. Be you, aba aubainama girugiruminama porane e riuriuna da Banaga Natunama tokare ei nuatoitoi kaua be ta tuaḡaiena?
41009013	Be yà riuriuemina da Elaija maiḡone ya tavana, be aba banaga a noḡonoḡotina, nama ḡarone a voiena, maika girugiruminama porane ya riuriuena nama.”
41009014	Raḡanine taudi a dobidobi munaḡana, tauwai muriwatana ḡidoidima mate ai rawateḡeidi be ta kitana be patara dosinama a midi ḡuruvidi be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima mate awai saḡasaḡana.
41009015	Dabudine banaga matabudi Yesu a kitakitana, taudi a ḡosoridi da a manini ḡarone a naḡo be ai kaiwena.
41009016	Be Yesu yai taraviredi be ya riuna, “Taumi aba aubainama taudi mate kowai saḡasaḡa?”
41009017	Naumeki da tauḡoma tenaḡa patara poune ya paribee be ya riuna, “Tauwai katakatai, taugu natuguma è verauḡena ḡarome. Tauna penama ya koku be ya kaue da nam ima giugiuna.
41009018	Kana raḡanie penama gomana e vunuvunuḡina raḡanine, tauna gomana doḡae ewai bekuna. Be tauna kasampuropuro gayane ta dobidobina, da mokanama e gidedi be tuninama ta badobadona. Be taugu am tauwai muriwatanama èi baḡedina da sibo peneminama a tavu dobiḡena, be taudi nam teneteneḡina.”
41009019	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Taumi kimta nam waisumeḡimi! Taugu taumi mate tà mia ḡaḡa be ami vitama yà kiroḡa ḡaḡae? Gomana ko verauḡe ḡarogue.”
41009020	Naumeki da gomana a verauḡena Yesu ḡarone. Be raḡanine penama Yesu ya kitakitana, tauna yai raḡantenaḡe da gomana ya kawa kokeri be doḡae yai bekuna. Dabudine gomana yai kunukunuvira be gayane kasampuropuro a tavatavana.
41009021	Be Yesu gomana tamanama yai taravirena, “Raḡan bisa tauna umanama ya voia?” Be gomana tamanama Yesu ya paribee be ya riuna, “Raḡanine tauna ḡaubone da yodi.
41009022	Be penama raḡan matabuna gomana kai matane bo upae yawai bekuna waigurinama aubainama. Be deḡoda tam teneteneḡinama aba kwa voiena, naumeki da kwa raunuatoiemai da kwa sagumai!”
41009023	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Aba aubainama kuya riuna, ‘Deḡoda tam teneteneḡina’? Tauna aitau ewai sumaḡana, ḡarone yaba matabuna teneteneḡinama.”
41009024	Naumeki da gomeninama tamanama yai raḡantenaḡe da bonanama dosine ya riuna, “Taugu nam amawai sumaḡa kauana, be kwa kaisagugu da yài sumaḡa guratana.”
41009025	Raḡanine Yesu e kitana be patara ya moramorabana, vutuna aubainama tauna penama ya riutuaḡai be ya riuna, “Penama beapotapota be gumgum penemima, yà riuriu vavasaḡem da gomana kwa dobi pore be nam nopone kwa saḡa munaḡa!”
41009026	Dabudine penama gomana ya kawa yogoyogo, ya kawa kokeri gurate be gomana ya dobi porena. Be gomeninama kitanama maika guri kabe i kenakena. Vutuna aubainama banaga ḡesaudima a riuna, “Tauna ya gurina!”
41009027	Naumeki da Yesu gomana nimane ya kaididi da ya soruwai midisuḡu be ya midina.
41009028	Raḡanine Yesu vada nopone ya saḡasaḡana murine, be na tauwai muriwatanama taudiḡa ai taravire be a riuna, “Aba aubainama tauma penama nam ke tavu dobiḡe?”
41009029	Be Yesu ya paribeedi da ya riuna, “Nam aiyabae tokare uma peneminama nama e tavu dobiḡe, ibewa da moiragi taunaḡa.”
41009030	Naumeki da Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama mate inam dobunama a gose pore be Galili noponaḡa a naḡona. Be Yesu nam i ḡoeḡoena da aitau tenaḡa sibo ya kataiedi da taudi aikedae,
41009031	baninama tauna na tauwai muriwatanama yawai katakataidina. Be ya riuedina, “Banaga Natunama tokare ta boru dobiḡena banaga nimedie. Taudi tai guri be raḡan rabuiteḡa murine tauna e midisuḡu munaḡa.”
41009032	Dabudine na tauwai muriwatanama nam ti kataiena da uma giunama baninama aba, be taudi waitaravirevirenama a nairena uma giunama aubainama.
41009033	Naumeki da taudi Kapeniamma a tava da vada nopone a saḡa a mia be Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina, “Taumi kedae aba koyawai saḡasaḡae?”
41009034	Be taudi ai nuatuḡutuḡuna, baninama kedae taudi awai saḡasaḡana da aitau poudie ya saḡa gurata.
41009035	Dabudine tauna ya mia yovo da na tauwai muriwatanama 12 ya yokoedi be ya riuedina, “Deḡoda aitau moraba e ḡoena, naumeki e kaue da e ḡaubo be banaga matabudi adi taunoyama e tubuḡana.”
41009036	Dabudine tauna gomana ḡaubonama nimane ya kaididi be na tauwai muriwatanama poudie yai midirina. Be gomeninama yai yaubabe, be ya riuedina,
41009037	“Aitau seda umanama maika kitedima tenaḡa isague ewai turanena, tauna taugu ewai turaneguna, be aitau taugu ewai turaneguna, tauna tauriuporeguma ewai turanena.”
41009038	Jon ya riuna, “Tauwai katakatai, tauma tauḡoma tenaḡa kè kitana isame penama ya tavutavu dobiḡedi be tauma kè riutuaḡaiena, baninama tauna nam tauda mate tama noyanoya tenaḡana.”
41009039	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Nam ko riutuaḡaie! Baninama aitau da isague mataira e voivoiedina, tauna nam teneḡina da mainokomḡo raḡandie isaguma e kawa gewagewa,
41009040	baninama banaga aitau nam imawai ḡaviedana, tauna inam tauda turadama.
41009041	Taugu yà riuriu kauemina, deḡoda aitau isague upa e uteutemina, baninama taumi Keriso ḡaronama, tauna teneteneḡinama na maesama tokare e paḡona.
41009042	“Be deḡoda aitau uma sededima tenaḡa ewai sumaḡegu be e kaue da gewagewa e voiena, ya verena da tauna yeku dosinama gadone ta pani be egasie ta pore nawena.
41009043	Deḡoda nimamma e kauem da gewagewa kwa voiena, naumeki da kwa douraka pore! Ya verena da nimamma tenaḡa mate yawasana nopone kwa saḡa be nam nimamma rabui mate da gienae kwa naḡo, dabudine kai karakarata watanine.
41009045	Be deḡoda kaḡamma e kauem da gewagewa kwa voiena, naumeki da kwa douraka pore. Ya verena da kaḡamma tenaḡa mate yawasana nopone kwa saḡana be nam kaḡamma rabui mate da gienae ta pore nawem.
41009047	Deḡoda matamma e kauem da gewagewa kwa voiena, naumeki da kwa kaipore. Ya verena da matamma tenaḡa kwa kunavai be Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone kwa saḡana, be nam matamma rabui mate da gienae ta pore nawemna.
41009048	Inam dabudine motamota taudi ta kanikanidina nam ta guri, be kai e karakaratidina nam e guri.
41009049	Be nama kai karakaratidima banaga matabudi tunidie ta yaraiedina.
41009050	“Buta inam yaba verenama, be deḡoda buta dininama e gewagewana, nema kwa voia bake da e dini munaḡa? Buta ko paḡo nopomie be ami banagama mate subae ko miana.”
41010001	Naumeki da Yesu inam dobunama ya gose pore be ya naḡona Judia provinsnama nopone be upa Jodan ya davuna. Dabudine patara ḡarone a tava munaḡa be yai katakataidina tauna na vaivaie nama.
41010002	Be Parisi ḡesaudima Yesu ḡarone a tava be tauna raurubuna aubainama ai taravirena, “Kwa riuemai, tarawatu ewai anina bo ibewa da tauḡoma na waivima e riupore?”
41010003	Be Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Mousis na tarawatuma nopone nema ya riu bakemi?”
41010004	Be taudi a riuna, “Mousis yai anina da tauḡoma waigosaḡa pepanama e girumi be waivi e riuporena.”
41010005	Dabudine Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Mousis inam tarawatunama ya girumina, baninama taumi noḡota poraḡa ḡarone debemima ya bado kauana.
41010006	Be pakane Mamaitua yaba matabuna yawai tubuḡidina raḡanine, tauna tauḡoma be waivi ya voiedina.
41010007	Vutuna aubainama tauḡoma tamanama be tinanama e gosedi be na waivima mate tai rawateḡeidina
41010008	da taudi tubuḡa tenaḡa ta tubuḡana. Vutuna aubainama taudi yodi nam tubuḡa rabui, ibewa da tenaḡa.
41010009	Naumeki da aba Mamaitua yawai rawateḡeidina nam aitau ei yamonedi!”
41010010	Raḡanine taudi a munaḡa vadae a tava be na tauwai muriwatanama uma giunama aubainama Yesu ai taravirena.
41010011	Be Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Ai tauḡoma na waivima e gose be waivi ḡesaunama e naḡina, tauna na waivima debane mui e poreporena.
41010012	Be kauinama teneḡinama, deḡoda ai waivi na tauḡomama e gose be tauḡoma ḡesaunama e naḡina, tauna na tauḡomama debane mui e poreporena.”
41010013	Banaga ḡesaudima seda ḡauḡaubodima Yesu ḡarone a verauḡedi da tauna sibo ya taukonidina, be na tauwai muriwatanama inam banegidima a riutuaḡaiedina.
41010014	Be raḡanine Yesu nama ya kitakitana, tauna nuanama yai medi be na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina, “Seda ḡauḡaubodima ko gosedi da ḡarogue ta verau be nam ko riutuaḡaiedi, baninama Mamaitua na waiguyauma inam banaga maika uma sededima nama aubaidima.
41010015	Taugu yà riuriu kauemina da aitau nam Mamaitua na waiguyauma i paḡona, maika gomana ḡaubonama nama, tauna tokare nam waiguyaunama nopone e saḡa.”
41010016	Naumeki da Yesu seda ya tikedi da nimanama debedie ya sivudi be yai aiainidina.
41010017	Dabudine Yesu na naḡoma yai kare munaḡe be tauḡoma tenaḡa ya manini tava da Yesu noḡone be tuapikane ya raupari be yai taravirena, “Tauwai katakatai veremma, aba yà voie be yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama yà paḡo?”
41010018	Be Yesu ya riuena, “Aba aubainama kwawai isaguna veregu? Nam aitau verena be Mamaitua taunaḡa.
41010019	Tam tarawatu poranama girugiruminama kuya kataiedina, Nam kwa vunuḡa! Nam am visarama bo am tauḡomama debane mui kwa pore! Nam kwa danene! Nam kwa kaiyovu! Nam kwa uta gigibu! Tamamma be tinamma kwa viviredi!”
41010020	Dabudine tauḡominama ya riuna, “Tauwai katakatai, taugu ḡaubogue da yodi uma tarawatudima matabudi è voteyeteyedina.”
41010021	Yesu tauḡominama ya kita da nuanama ya paḡo be ya riuna, “Yaba tenaḡa sibo kuya voiena. Kwa naḡo be yaba matabudi ḡarome kwa raugimaredi be inam manedima banaga waikaruwaḡewaḡedima kwa utedi, be tam tokare marae kwai guyauna. Yodibe kwa verau be kwai muriwatanegu!”
41010022	Be raḡanine uma riunama ya vaivaiena tauḡominama yai nuaboya be ma nuaboyana ya naḡona, baninama tauna yai purapura kauana.
41010023	Yesu yai kita kwaviviro be na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina, “Waiguyau banegidima ḡarodie ya piripiri kaua da tokare Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone ta saḡa.”
41010024	Tauwai muriwatana uma riunama nama a vaivaiena, taudi a ḡosoridina. Be Yesu ya riu munaḡana, “Seda, Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone saḡanama ya piripiri kauana.
41010025	Kamel ya bagibagi kauana da seyau gavogavone e sonaḡa, be maika nama waiguyau baneginama ya bagibagi da ya bagibagi kauana da Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone e saḡa.”
41010026	Dabudine tauwai muriwatana a ḡosori kauedi be adi noḡotama ya kovina. Be adi banagama adi banagama a riuedina, “Yodi aitau tokare e yawasana?”
41010027	Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya kita dididi, ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Banaga ḡarone nam teneteneḡina be Mamaitua ḡarone tauna teneteneḡinama da waiguyau banegidima e voiedi da tokare Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone ta saḡana.”
41010028	Dabudine Pita ya riuna, “Be tauma yaba matabudi kè gosa poraḡa be tam kèi muriwatanemna!”
41010029	Be Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taugu yà riuriu kauemina, aitau na vadama bo tuatuaḡanama, bo novunovunama, bo tinana, bo tamana, bo seda, bo sipi e gosedina taugu isague be vari verenama aubainama,
41010030	tauna yaba veredima toitoi yodi raḡanine e banavidina. Tauna tokare na vadama, tuatuaḡanama, novunovunama, tinatinanama, na sedama, be na sipima ta toi vavasaḡa, 100 be ei murina. Be raukivigewagewa mate be raḡan e tavana, tauna tokare yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama e paḡona.
41010031	Be toitoi yodi ta dokadokana tokare ta murina, be aitauḡa yodi ta murimurina tokare ta dokana.”
41010032	Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama mate taudi kedaḡa a saḡa a naḡonaḡona Jerusalemma, Yesu ya dokadokana be na tauwai muriwatanama muriḡa a saḡasaḡana nuedima ya karatina, be banaga aitauḡa awai muriwatanedina taudi a naira kauana. Dabudine Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama 12 yai doka nawedi ḡavoe be ya riuedina da tauna ḡarone abaḡa ta tubuḡana,
