41010033	“Koi beavaia! Tauda tà saḡa tà naḡona Jerusalemma, dabudine Banaga Natunama tokare ta boru dobiḡena pirisi adi babadama be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima ḡarodie, taudi tokare ta etare be eteni banegidima nimedie ta boru nawena waigurinama aubainama.
41010034	Be taudi tokare tai varavara, ta kaviso, ta kwapu be tai gurina. Be raḡan wairabuiteḡane tauna tokare e midisuḡu munaḡana.”
41010035	Naumeki da Sebedi natunama Jeims be Jon Yesu ḡarone a tava be a riuna, “Tauwai katakatai, tauma ka ḡoeḡoena aubaimaima yaba tenaḡa kwa voiena.”
41010036	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Aba ko ḡoeḡoena aubaimima yà voie?”
41010037	Taudi a paribee be a riuna, “Am waiguyauma na raḡanie kwai aninemai da tenaḡa kasaume e mia be tenaḡa senime.”
41010038	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Taumi nam ko kataiena aba kowai baḡena. Taumi teneteneḡina da taugu ḡoraḡoranama yà tegona nama ko tego bo babataitonama yà paḡona nama ko paḡo, bo?”
41010039	Taudi a paribee be a riuna, “Tauma teneteneḡinama!” Dabudine Yesu ya riuedina, “Taumi tokare ḡoraḡoranama ko tegona be yà babataitona nama tokare ko babataitona.
41010040	Be kasaugue be senigue mieninama, inam tokare nam taugu yài anina. Inam gabunama taudi aitauḡa vinevinedima aubaidima Mamaitua ya vokaukauena.”
41010041	Raḡanine tauwai muriwatana ḡesaudima 10-nama a vaivaiena, taudi nuedima yai medina Jeims be Jon ḡarodie.
41010042	Vutuna aubainama taudi matabudi Yesu ya yokoedi ḡarone be ya riuedina, “Taumi koya kataiena da eteni banegidima adi babadama eteni ḡarodie tawai badabadana. Be babadidima ai rewapana vavasaḡana aubainama da taudi matabudi tawai badedina.
41010043	Uma kauinama nama taumi ḡaromie nam e tubuḡa! Be deḡoda aitau tenaḡa nopomie moraba e ḡoena, naumeki tauna e kaue da matabumi ami taunoyama e tubuḡana.
41010044	Be aitau saḡa gurata e ḡoena, naumeki da ei taunoyana ḡaromie.
41010045	Baninama avedi da Banaga Natunama ya verauna nam banaga tauna aubainama ta noya, be tauna taudi aubaidima e noyana, be na yawasanama ei utae da banaga toitoi e kuvesidina.”
41010046	Naumeki da Yesu be na tauwai muriwatanama a tavana Jerikoma. Dabudine taudi be patara dosinama meagainama a gose be tauḡoma matapotapotanama isanama Batimeus keda diane ya mia be ya kiḡikiḡina, tauna inam Timias natunama.
41010047	Raḡanine tauna e vaiena be Nasaret Yesunama, tauna ya yoko be ya riuna, “Yesu, Deivid natunama kwa raunuatoiegu!”
41010048	Banaga toitoi a riupasakare be a riutuaḡaiena da sibo yai nuatuḡuna. Be dabudine tauna ya yoko gurata be ya riuna, “Deivid natunama kwa raunuatoiegu!”
41010049	Dabudine Yesu ya midi kwasa be ya riuna, “Ko riue be e verau!” Naumeki da taudi tauḡoma matapotapotanama a yokoe be a riuena, “Nam kwai nuaboya! Kwa midisuḡu! Tauna e yokoyokoemna.”
41010050	Dabudine tauḡoma ya midisuḡu, na garama ya gose pore be ya verauna Yesu ḡarone.
41010051	Yesu tauḡoma yai taravire be ya riuna, “Aba kwa ḡoeḡoena aubaimma yà voie?” Dabudine tauḡoma matapotapotanama ya riuna, “Tauwai katakatai, taugu yà ḡoeḡoena yài kitana.”
41010052	Dabudine Yesu ya riuna, “Kwa naḡo, am waisumaḡama yai yawasanimna.” Naumeki be yai raḡantenaḡe da matanama yai kita munaḡa be Yesu yai muriwatanena kedaḡa.
41011001	Raḡanine Jerusalem diane a tavatavana, taudi a verauna Betpage be Beteni meagaidie oya isanama ‘Olip’ yauwane. Dabudine Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama rabui ya riupore nawe dokedi
41011002	be ya riuedina, “Ko naḡona noḡomie meagaine, be raḡanine meagaine ko saḡasaḡana, dabudine ko kitana donki natunama a nigorina. Inam nam aitau i geru rubuena. Ko kuvesi be ko verauḡena uma!
41011003	Be deḡoda aitau ei taraviremina, ‘Aba aubainama umanama ko voivoie?’ da ko riuena, ‘Bada e ḡoeḡoena, raḡan ḡaubonaḡa be ka verauḡa munaḡena.’”
41011004	Naumeki da taudi a naḡona, kedae be vada noḡone donki natunama nigonigorinama a kitana. Raḡanine taudi a kuvekuvesina,
41011005	banaga ḡesaudima inam dabudine midimididima taudi ai taraviredina, “Aba aubainama donki natunama ko kuvekuvesi?”
41011006	Be taudi Yesu ya riuriuedina nama a paribeedina, vutuna aubainama taudi ai aninedi be a naḡona.
41011007	Taudi donki natunama Yesu ḡarone a tavaite be adi garama donki natunama debane a yesidi be Yesu debane ya miana.
41011008	Banaga toitoi adi garama a yesiyesidina maika banaga ḡesaudima kairugurugu wapue a taraḡa a tavaitedi be kedaḡa a yesidina.
41011009	Banaga aitauḡa a dokadokana be aitauḡa Yesu murine a saḡasaḡana a yogo be a riuna, “Hosana! Waiaiaininama, tauna vutuna Bada isane e veraverauna!
41011010	Mamaitua, tauma tamamaima guyau Deivid na waiguyauma e veraverauna kwai aiaini! Mamaitua ka kaisuḡum!”
41011011	Naumeki da Yesu Jerusalem nopone ya saḡa be ya naḡona tempol nopone, dabudine yaba matabudi ya kita rovodina, be kaiteka ravi aubainama, tauna na tauwai muriwatanama 12 mate a dobi a naḡona Betenima.
41011012	Pomainama taudi Beteni a gose be a munamunaḡana, be Yesu kani ya karatina.
41011013	Dabudine tauna ei kita naḡona be damaya ya kitana, ya kinikini. Naumeki da tauna ya naḡona kitanama aubainama deḡoda banidima tima kenakena. Be raḡanine damaya pakane e tavana be damayinama nam i banina be rugukavanaḡa ya kitana. Baninama damaya nam yodi na iri kaua da damayinama sibo ya bani.
41011014	Naumeki da Yesu damayinama ya riutuaḡaie be ya riuna, “Tam damayimma nam airaḡan kwa bani munaḡa!” Dabudine nama ya riuriuna na tauwai muriwatanama a vaiena.
41011015	Raḡanine taudi Jerusalemma a tavatavana, tauna tempol nopone ya saḡa be banaga aitauḡa a kunekune be a gimagimarana ya tavu dobiḡedina. Tauna mane taurabedima adi vatarama yai tauviredi be aitauḡa kiu gabubu taurau gimaredima adi kaba miama mate yai tauviredina,
41011016	be nam aitau tenaḡa i anine da na taragaima e kiroḡa be tempol noponaḡa e naḡo.
41011017	Taudi yai katakataidi be dabudine ya riuedina, “Giruma porane Mamaitua ya riuna, ‘Taugu yau tempolma tai isana moiragi kana vadama dobu matabuna aubaidima.’ Be taumi koya voie da kabe ‘taudanedanene adi gabu.’”
41011018	Naumeki da pirisi adi babadama be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima uma kauinama a vaiena, vutuna aubainama taudi keda a wanewanena da nema sibo Yesu ai guri bakena, be taudi a nairena, baninama patara matabudi na waikatakataima a basebasena.
41011019	Naumeki da ravi ya tava be Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama mate meagainama a dobi pore be a naḡona.
41011020	Pomainama raḡanboiboi taudi a naḡonaḡona maika, kedae damaya waramine da damone matabuna ya pokina a kitana.
41011021	Dabudine aba ya tubutubuḡana Pita ya noḡoti be Yesu ya riuena, “Tauwai katakatai, damaya kuya riuriutuaḡaiena kwa kita, ya pokina!”
41011022	Naumeki da Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Koi sumaḡa Mamaitua ḡarone!
41011023	Yà riuriu kauemina deḡoda aitau uma oyanama e riuena, ‘Kwa midisuḡu be kwa pore nawem egasie!’ Be tauna nopone nam e noḡota bekubeku be ei sumaḡa da aba ya riuriuena e tubuḡana, tokare teneteneḡinama aubainama e tubuḡana.
41011024	Vutuna aubainama yà riuemina aba moiragie koi baḡena, koi sumaḡa da taumi kaite koya paḡo. Da inam tokare taumi ḡaromima.
41011025	Raḡanine ko midi da ko moiragi be ko noḡoti da aitau aba ḡaromie ya voia waigewana, naumeki da ko noḡota porena, yodibe tamemima marae tokare taumi mate ami gewagewama e noḡota porena.”
41011027	Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama mate Jerusalemma a tava munaḡa be raḡanine tauna tempol noponaḡa ya naḡonaḡona, dabudine pirisi adi babadama, tarawatu tauwai katakataidima be babada ḡesaudima Yesu ḡarone a tava,
41011028	da ai taravire be a riuna, “Tam aba waibadane umanama yabedima kwa voivoiedi? Bo aitau uma waibadanama ya utem?”
41011029	Dabudine Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taugu yau waitaravirama tenaḡa yài taraviremi da ko paribeegu be muriḡa da taugu yà riuemi da taugu aba waibadane uma yabedima yà voivoiedi.
41011030	Ko riuegu! Jon deḡo dabudi waibada ya paḡo da yawai babataito, Mamaitua ḡarone bo banaga ḡarodie?”
41011031	Dabudine taudiḡa ai saḡasaḡa be a riuna, “Nema tà riu bako? Deḡoda tà riuna Mamaitua ḡarone, tauna tokare umanama ei taraviredana, ‘Be aba aubainama da taumi Jon nam koi sumaḡe?’
41011032	Be deḡoda tauda tà riuna ‘banage’ taudi banaga a nairedina, baninama banaga matabudi a noḡonoḡotina da Jon tauna peroveta.”
41011033	Vutuna aubainama taudi Yesu a paribee be a riuna, “Tauma nam ke kataiena.” Dabudine Yesu ya riuedina, “Taugu mate nam yà riuemi da taugu aba waibadane uma yabedima yà voivoiedi.”
41012001	Naumeki da Yesu wainasie banaga umanama ya riuedina, “Tauḡoma tenaḡa gureipi sipinama ya voie be ya gana kukuna. Naumeki da waen anibuyonama domnama ya keri be kweyaḡa vadanama mate ya kerina. Yodibe gureipi sipinama tausipi ḡesaudima nimedie ya boru da a raberabe be tauna vaḡaie ya naḡona.
41012002	Raḡanine gureipi taminama na raḡaninama ya tavatavana, tauna na taunoyama ya riupore nawena sipi taurabenama ḡarodie da na dariḡama sibo ya paḡona.
41012003	Be taudi a vunuḡi, a riḡa be nimakavakavanama a riupore nawena.
41012004	Naumeki da taupaka na taunoyama ḡesaunama ya riupore nawena ḡarodie, dabudine sipi taurabenama inam tauḡominama debanama a riḡa be a kaue da a kawa tunimayaḡina.
41012005	Be taupaka yaḡoro na taunoyama ḡesaunama ya riupore, be sipi taurabenama inam tauna a katigabana. Be taupaka banaga ḡesaudima mate toitoi ya riuporedi be ḡidoidima a riḡedi, be ḡidoidima a kati gabedina.
41012006	Be yodi tenaḡa kavakava a taugosena. Be inam tauna, taupaka natunama tauḡominama, tauna vutuna ewai nuapaḡoena. Naumeki da na damone tauna natunama ya riupore be ya riuna, ‘Yà noḡonoḡotina da taudi tokare natuguma ta vivirena!’
41012007	Be sipi taurabenama taudiḡa ai giu vivivira be a riuna, ‘Uma tauna tokare tamanama na buderima e paḡona, vutuna aubainama tài guri be buderinama tài buderie!’
41012008	Naumeki da taudi a vunuḡi be ai guri da gureipi sipinama nopone, be a pore dobiḡena.”
41012009	Dabudine Yesu yai taraviredi be ya riuna, “Sipi taupakinama tokare e verau be aba e voie? Tauna tokare e verau be sipi taurabedima ei guridi be gureipi sipinama banaga ḡesaudima e utedina.
41012010	Taumi riuwai noḡota poranama nopone girugiruminama koya sievi bo ibewa, da ‘Vada taukerinama yekue vada a kerikeri be yeku tenaḡa a pore kaiyatina, baninama inam yekunama taudi nam ti ḡoena. Be Mamaitua yekunama poreporenama ya paḡo be ya voie da na vadama e kerikerina yasinama ya tubuḡana.
41012011	Be inam kauinama Bada ya voie da uma kauinama anikitanama ḡarode ya vere kauana.’”
41012012	Dabudine pirisi adi babadama, Jius babadidima be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima a ḡoeḡoena da Yesu sibo a vunuḡina, baninama mayedima a paḡo da Yesu taudi yawai nasiedina. Be taudi patara a nairedina, vutuna aubainama tauna a gose be a naḡo porena.
41012013	Muriḡanama taudi Parisi be Herod na tauwai muriwatanama ḡesaudima mate a riupore nawedi Yesu ḡarone be waitaravirae Yesu a raurubu be a vaia kaue da Yesu aba sibo ya vato waigewana.
41012014	Taudi Yesu ḡarone a tava be a riuna, “Tauwai katakatai, tauma kè kataie da tam riukaue kwa giugiu. Am giue tam nam banaga kuma nainairedina, baninama tam banaga nam kuma siesievidi da taudi nema maika kitedi, be Mamaitua na ḡoanama riukaue kwai katakataidina. Kwa riuemai, inam naumeki bo ibewa da tauma Sisa ḡarone kai teks bo avedi? Tauma kai maesa bo ibewa?”
41012015	Be dabudine Yesu adi noḡotama kaikaiyovudima ya kataie be ya riuna, “Aba aubainama taumi ko rarau rubugu? Sirinnama ko verauḡe be yà kita!”
41012016	Naumeki da Sirin a paḡo verauḡe ḡarone be Yesu yai taraviredina, “Aitau noḡona be isanama Sirin bogane ta kenakena?” Be a paribee be a riuna, “Uma Sisa noḡonama.”
41012017	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Naumeki da Sisa ḡaronama Sisa ko ute, be Mamaitua ḡaronama Mamaitua ko ute!” Be dabudine taudi Yesu a basena.
41012018	Jius nopodie dam ḡaubonama isanama Sadisi, a riuriuna da banaga e guri be nam e midisuḡu munaḡa, taudi a verau Yesu ḡarone, ai taravire be a riuna,
41012019	“Tauwai katakatai, Mousis uma tarawatunama aubaimaima ya girumina, deḡoda banaga tauḡominama ya guri be na visarama e gose porena nam waisedasedana, naumeki da tasinama bo tuaḡanama sibo kaiyababinama ya naḡi be seda sibo yai tubuḡana tuaḡanama gurigurinama aubainama.
41012020	“Naumeki da tautauḡoma 7 a tubuḡana tina tenaḡa ḡarone, be tauḡoma tautuaḡa waivi ya naḡi da nam ti natunatuna be tauḡominama ya gurina.
41012021	Be tauḡoma wairabuinama inam kaiyababinama ya naḡina, be tauna mate seda nam i tikedi be ya gurina, kauinama teneḡinama tauḡoma wairabuiteḡanama ḡarone ya tubuḡana.
41012022	Naumeki da tautauḡoma 7 kauinama namaḡa nam ti natunatuna da a guri rovona. Naumeki da a gurigurina damone inam waivinama ya guri ḡavutana.
41012023	Be raḡanine midisuḡu munaḡa na raḡanie uma waivinama tautauḡoma 7 a naḡinaḡina, be inam waivinama tokare aitau na waivi?”
41012024	Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taumi koya riu waigewana, baninama taumi girugiruminama porane nam ko katai kauena be Mamaitua na rewapanama mate nam ko kataiena.
41012025	Raḡanine guri ta midisuḡu munaḡa, be taudi tokare maika anea marae be tokare nam tai naḡi.
41012026	Be yodi guri kawakawa midisuḡunama na giuma taumi Mousis na bukama koya sievi bo ibewa? Deḡo ya riuna gedara rageragetinama nopone Mamaitua Mousis ya riuena umanama, ‘Taugu inam Eibraham, Aisik be Jeikob adi Mamaituama’.
41012027	Mamaitua, nam banaga guriguridima adi Mamaitua, be tauna banaga yawayawasanidima adi Mamaituama. Taumi naumeki koya bua kauana.”
41012028	Tarawatu tauwai katakataidima tenaḡa dabudine mate adi giuma yawai beavaiena. Dabudine tauna e vaiena be Yesu na giuma didimanine Sadisi adi giuma ya pariparibeedina. Vutuna aubainama tauna Yesu yai taravire be ya riuna, “Riuvavasaḡa matabudi namaḡa, be deḡo tauna ya saḡa vavasaḡa?”
41012029	Yesu ya paribee be ya riuna, “Riuvavasaḡa dosinama tenaḡa inam umanama, ‘Israel koi beavaia! Bada da Mamaituama, tauna taunaḡa Bada.
41012030	Bada Mamaitua nuanuamma e paḡo, nuanuamma tabutabune, aruimma tabutabune, am noḡotama tabutabune be am rewapanama tabutabune.’
41012031	Be riuvavasaḡa dosinama aniwai rabuinama inam umanama, ‘Turamma nuanuamma e paḡona maika tam kwa ḡoeḡoe munaḡemna nama.’ Nam deḡo aba riuvavasaḡidima ti saḡa vavasaḡana maika uma taudi.”
41012032	Tarawatu tauwai katakatainama Yesu ya riuena, “Inam riukaua tauwai katakatai, kuya riuna maika da Bada taunaḡa Mamaitua be nam deḡo mamaitua ḡesaudi, ibewa da tauna, taunaḡa.
41012033	Be banaga nuanama tabutabune, na noḡotama tabutabune, be na rewapanama tabutabune Mamaitua ei nuapaḡoe, be turanama ei nuapaḡoena maika tauname ewai nuapaḡo munaḡena nama. Uma riudima riuvavasaḡa rabui dosidima tà voteyeteyedina, taudi nam maika musara be puyo ḡesaudima tà gabudi be Mamaitua tà uteutena nama.”
41012034	Raḡanine Yesu ya kataie da tauna na paribeama ya vere kauana, aubainama tauna tarawatu tauwai katakatainama ya riuena, “Tam kaiteka Mamaitua na waiguyauma diane kwa tavatavana.” Inam dabudine nam aitau Yesu waitaravira munaḡenama i ḡoena, baninama taudi a nairana.
41012035	Raḡanine Yesu tempol nopone yawai katakataina maika, tauna yai taravira be ya riuna, “Nemanama da tarawatu tauwai katakataidima ta riuriuna da Keriso tauna Deivid natunama?
41012036	Be Arua Babau Deivid nopone ya yovo be tauna ḡominama umanama ya riuena, ‘Mamaitua yau Badama ya riuena, Kasaugue kwa miana naumeki da taugu am ḡaviama kaḡamma dibudie yà biridina’.
41012037	Deivid ḡominama Keriso yawai isana: Bada! Be yodi nemanama da Keriso tauna Deivid natuna?” Dabudine patara dosinama ma nuaveredi Yesu awai beavaiena.
41012038	Be raḡanine Yesu yawai katakataidi be ya riuna, “Koi kita kauana tarawatu tauwai katakataidima ḡarodie! Taudi ta ḡoeḡoena gara veredima ta kotedi be debaḡa ta rauguyaguyau naḡona be banaga taudi tai kaiwedina vivira mate.
41012039	Be taudi sinagog nopodie be soi nopodie gabu verediḡa be gabu dosidiḡa ta ragaragaudina.
41012040	Be taudi kaiyababa waikaruwaḡewaḡedima adi vadama be adi purapurama ta kwayekwayedina be moiragi daudaudima kaikaiyovudima ta voivoiedina. Taudi tokare kovoḡa dosinama ta banavina.”
41012041	Yesu tempol nopone mane adi kaba boruma diane ya mia be patara mane a boruboruna ya kitekitedina. Be banaga waimanedima toitoi a saḡa be mane toitoi a biribiridina.
41012042	Be kaiyababa waikaruwaḡawaḡanama ya saḡa be mane dubedima ḡauḡaubodima rabui ya biridina, inam peni tenaḡa na ruvama.
41012043	Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya yokoedi da ḡarone be ya riuedina, “Yà riuriu kauemina da uma kayababinama waikaruwaḡawaḡanama tauna puyo ya moraba kauana mane tanane ya suvekina, nam maika banaga ḡesaudima nama.
41012044	Baninama banaga ḡesaudima mane ai maure be ragisidima a saḡa be a rarau puyoedi. Be kaiyababa waikaruwaḡawaḡanama, tauna na manema ḡaubonama sibo na kanima ya gimerina be ya raupuyoena.”
41013001	Raḡanine Yesu tempol ya gosegosena, na tauwai muriwatanama tenaḡa ya riuna, “Tauwai katakatai, kwa kita! Vada yekue kerikeridima kitedima a vere ḡaḡa.”
41013002	Be Yesu ya paribee be ya riuna, “Uma vadedima dosidima ko kitekitedina. Nam ai yeku tenaḡa dabudine tokare na gabue e kena. Matabudi tokare ta rawadabuririḡidina.”
41013003	Yesu oya Olip debane ya mia be tempol yauwanine yawai kitanaḡo be Pita, Jeims, Jon be Endru moisirie be ḡarone a tava da Yesu ai taravire be a riuna,
41013004	“Kwa riuemai, uma kauidima aba raḡanine ta tubuḡa be abaḡa matairidima ta tubuḡa be ka kitedi da uma kauidima ta tubutubuḡana?”
41013005	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Koi kita kaua da nam aitau ei kedadoka waigewemi.
41013006	Banaga toitoi tokare isague ta tava be ta riuna, ‘Taugu vutuna Keriso!’ Be taudi tokare banaga toitoi tai kedadoka waigewedina.
41013007	Be raḡanine iḡara guguridima maida ko vaie be madanie varidima ko vaiedina, nam koi nuaboya! Uma kauidima nama tokare ta tubuḡana, be nam ko noḡoti da inam raḡan damona, ibewa!
41013008	Dobu da dobu tai kawa ḡasiḡasina, be waiguyau turanama waiguyau mate tai kawa ḡasiḡasina. Be dobu matabuna yoyo be meiḡara tai verau tatena. Uma kauidima matabudi ta tubuḡana maika gomana kaevounama e tubutubuḡana tunimuyanama nama, inam tepa pakanama.
41013009	“Taumiḡa ko kita kauemina. Taumi tokare tapanimina etara aubainama, taumi tokare sinagog nopodie ta riḡemina, taumi tokare babada dosidima be guyaguyau noḡodie ko midi be isague vari verenama ko riuedina.
41013010	Muriḡa da raḡan damonama e tavana, be noḡone vari verenama ta rauguguyena dobu matabuna banaga ḡarodie.
41013011	Raḡanine ta panimi be etara aubainama ta nawemina, nam koi nuaboya dokadoka da nema sibo koya giu bako. Raḡanine inam raḡaninama e tavana giu aba da e uteutemina ko giuena, baninama giu aba da ko giuena inam nam nuemie tokare ko giu, ibewa da Arua Babau e giuna.
41013012	“Tautauḡoma tasitasidi bo tuatuaḡedima ta biri dobiḡedi da tai guridina, be seda tametamedima kauinama teneḡinama adi sedama ḡarodie ta kauena, be seda nama adi dosima mate tai kawa ḡasiḡasi be tai guridina.
41013013	Be banaga matabudi ta tuaḡaiemina, baninama taumi taugu kowai sumaḡeguna aubainama. Be aitau e midi bagibagi be e raudamoena, tauna tokare e yawasanana.
41013014	“Tausiava, uma giunama baninama ko katai kauena: Taumi tokare ko kita da gewagewa waimatawarawara vavasaḡinama deḡo nam sibo ya midi, be tokare e midina. Be taudi aitauḡa Judiama miemienidima oyae sibo a naḡona.
41013015	Be aitau da na vadama debane, be nam tauna teneteneḡina da tokare e dobi e naḡo na vadama nopone be na purapurama e ragaudi.
41013016	Be nam aitau sipie be e munaḡa vadae na garama ragaudima aubaina.
41013017	Inam raḡandie waiwaivi bogebogedi be waitatau vaudima ḡarodie e gewagewa kauana.
41013018	Mamaitua ḡarone ko moiragi da uma kauidima nam bodubodue ta tubuḡa,
41013019	baninama nuaboya inam raḡandie ta tubuḡana e gewagewa vavasaḡana, nam maika Mamaitua dobu pakane yawai tubuḡie nama i tubuḡa rubuna, naumeki da yodi raḡandie ta tubuḡana. Tokare uma kauinama nama nam e tubuḡa munaḡa.
41013020	Be deḡoda Bada inam raḡandima nam sibo i taitupodi, tokare nam aitau tenaḡa ya yawasana. Be baninama tauna na banagama vinevinedima kadi taiye, tauna uma raḡandima ya taitupodina.
41013021	“Be inam raḡandie deḡoda aitau e riuemina, Keriso umanema! Bo noanema! Nam koi sumaḡe!
41013022	Baninama Keriso kaikaiyovudi be peroveta kaikaiyovudima tokare ta maḡatara be mataira be anibasa kauidima ta voiedina, be deḡoda Mamaitua na vinevinema banegidima mate tai kedadoka waigewedina.
41013023	Vutuna aubainama ko kita kaua, yaba matabuna è riu wainonoḡimina, muriḡa da inam raḡandima ta tavana.
41013024	“Be inam nuaboyedima raḡandima muridie, suara ei kupi, be nawaravi tokare nam e yana munaḡa.
41013025	Be kipora gunume ta kuruva be gunuma rewapanidima matabudi e gusu waidaberaridina.
41013026	Be dabudine Banaga Natunama ta kitana giyou nopone e maḡatara be e yovona ma rewapanina be neneḡarinama dosinama mate.
41013027	Dabudine tauna na aneama e riuporaḡa da dobu kawa susunama 4, be dabudine Mamaitua na banagama vinevinedima ta rawateḡeteḡeidina dobu isudie da isudie be gunuma isudie da isudie.
41013028	“Naumeki ko gose da damaya kainama ei katakataimi! Raḡanine damaya ragedima ta kini be rugudima ta gidagidavana, inam raḡanine ko kataie da inam bodubodu raḡaninama maida e tavatavana.
41013029	Uma kauinama teneḡinama nama, raḡanine taumi uma kauidima gewegewedima ko kitedi be ta tubutubuḡana, dabudine taumi ko kataie da Bada na kaba verauma raḡaninama kaiteka maida.
41013030	Taugu yà riuriu kauemina, da uma kimtinama nam ei kave naumeki da uma kauidima tokare matabudi ta tubuḡa dokana.
41013031	Mara be dobu tokare tai kavena be taugu riuguma nam airaḡan tai kave.
41013032	“Nam aitau tenaḡa raḡan be awa i kataie rubuna da airaḡan inam raḡaninama e tava. Nam ai anea marae bo Natunama tauḡominama, be ibewa Tamaguma taunaḡa ya kataiena.
41013033	Be koi kita kaua be koi neneḡana, baninama nam ko kataiena da airaḡan inam raḡaninama e tava.
41013034	Inam maika tauḡoma na taunoyama ya gosedi da na vadama a raberabe be tauna ya naḡo poredina vaḡai aubainama. Tauna na taunoyama tenaḡaḡa adi noyama ya utedina, be matakeda taurabenama ya riue da ei neneḡana kauana.
41013035	Vutuna aubainama taumi raḡan matabuna koi neneḡana, baninama taumi vada taupakinama na kaba verauma nam ko kataiena da airaḡan e verau munaḡa, deḡoda ravie bo nubautuae bo raḡantomtom kamkam ta riuriue nama bo raḡanboiboi suara e tavatavana raḡanine!
41013036	Baninama deḡoda ei raḡantenaḡe be e tavana, nam ko kenakena be e kitemi.
41013037	Taugu aba yà riuriuemina, nama banaga matabudi yà riuriuedina, koi neneḡana!”
41014001	Raḡan rabui muridie, da sibo Naḡopore be Buredi-Nam-Sasasanina soinama, be pirisi adi babada be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima taudi keda a wanewanena, be semoe Yesu kana kasirama a tomtomna da sibo a vunuḡi be ai gurina.
41014002	Be taudi a riuna, “Nam soi nopone be nama tà voia, deḡoda banaga tokare kada iḡarama ta suruena.”
41014003	Yesu tauna Betenima, tauḡoma isanama Saemon Kito, tauna na vadae Yesu ya miamiana. Dabudine Yesu ya kanikani be waivi upa ḡabuḡabunama maesinama dosinama duginama ya kiroḡi be ya tavana. Inam upanama yaba isanama Nad a voiena. Naumeki da waivi dugi vikinama ya kaipore be upa ḡabuḡabunama Yesu debane ya ḡinina.
41014004	Dabudine banaga ḡesaudima nama a kitakitana, taudi adi banagama adi banagama a riuedina, “Aba aubainama upa ḡabuḡabunama ewai yakare?
41014005	Inam sibo a raugimare da mane Denari 300 be mainokoiḡo nama sibo a paḡo, be manenama banaga waikaruwaḡewaḡedima sibo a utedina.” Be taudi bonedima bagibagine waivi a riu virevirena.
41014006	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Ko gosepore! Aba aubainama ko kawakawa nuaboya? Tauna kaua verenama ya voiena ḡarogue.
41014007	Taumi raḡan ya toi kauana banaga waikaruwaḡewaḡedima mate ko miana, kana raḡanie ko ḡoeḡoena, nama ko sagudina. Be taugu nam uma dabudi taumi mate tà mia nonoḡa.
41014008	Tauna aba verenama ya noḡonoḡotina nama, yodi ya voiena aubaiguma. Tauna upa ḡabuḡabunama tunigue ya ḡini wainonoḡina waikokoagiguma aubainama.
41014009	Taugu yà riuriu kauemina, deḡo deḡo dobu matabuna vari verenama ta rarau guguyena, be uma waivinama aba ya voivoiena noḡotinama tokare mate ta giu watanena.”
41014010	Be dabudine Judas Iskariot tauna tenaḡa tauwai muriwatana 12 nopodie, be tauna ya dobi ya naḡo pirisi adi babadama ḡarodie da Yesu sibo nimedie ya boru nawena.
41014011	Taudi nuedima ya vere kauana da Judas aba e vatona ta vaiena, be taudi a sauga da mane tauna ta utena. Vutuna aubainama Judas keda ya wanewanena da Yesu sibo taudi nimedie ya boru nawena.
41014012	Naumeki da Buredi-Nam-Sasasanina soinama raḡaninama yawai karena. Inam raḡanine sipu natunatudima Naḡopore soinama aubainama a vunuvunuḡana, be tauwai muriwatana Yesu ai taravire be a riuna, “Deḡo dabudi kwa ḡoeḡoemaina ka naḡo be Naḡopore soinama ka vokaukaue tam aubaimma da kwa kani?”
41014013	Naumeki da na tauwai muriwatanama rabui ya riuporedi be umanama ya riuedina, “Ko naḡo meagai nopone be tauḡoma upa duginama e kirokiroḡina ko banavina, tauna vutuna koi muriwatane
41014014	da deḡo vadanama nopone e saḡana. Inam dabudine vada taupakinama umanama ko riuena, ‘Tauwai katakatai umanama ya riuna: Deḡo gabunama taugu ware yau gabu da taugu be yau tauwai muriwatanama mate dabudi Naḡopore soinama ka kani?’
41014015	Be tauna vada nopone vatavatara rabui, be debane vatarine dabudine gabu dosinama yaba matabudi kawakawa nonoḡidima ei kataimina, be inam dabudine aubaidama ko vokaukauana.”
41014016	Naumeki da tauwai muriwatana a naḡona, raḡanine taudi meagaie a tavatavana yaba matabuna Yesu ya riuriuedina nama a banavidina, dabudine taudi Naḡopore soinama a vokaukauena.
41014017	Naumeki da ravi ya tavatavana, Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama 12 mate a tavana.
41014018	Be raḡanine taudi vatara debane a kanikani be Yesu ya riuedina, “Taugu yà riuriu kauemina, aitau tenaḡa poumie tokare taugu e boru dobiḡeguna. Tauna aitau taugu mate ka kanikanina, tauna vutuna.”
41014019	Dabudine tauwai muriwatana nuedima yai poya be tenatenaḡaḡa Yesu ai taravirena, “Bada, taugu teika?”
41014020	Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taumi 12 nopomie, aitau tenaḡa na buredima taugu mate teboe kai gayo tenaḡedina, tauna vutuna.
41014021	Be girugiruminama poranama e riuriuna maika nama tokare Banaga Natunama e gurina, be ya gewagewa kauana tauna baneginama ḡarone aitau Banaga Natunama e boru dobiḡena! Ya verena da inam baneginama avedi sibo ya tubuḡa!”
41014022	Naumeki da taudi a kanikanina maika, Yesu buredi tenaḡa ya paḡo be moiragie yai kaiwana, ya giva da na tauwai muriwatanama ya utedi be ya riuna, “Ko paḡo! Uma tauna taugu tubuḡiguma.”
41014023	Naumeki da Yesu keyaka ya paḡo Mamaitua ḡarone yai kaiwa, be na tauwai muriwatanama ya utedi da keyekine a rautegona.
41014024	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Uma tauna taugu kosiniguma e rauḡinina waianina vaunama aubainama. Yodibe Mamaitua banaga ei yawasanidina.
41014025	Taugu yà riuriu kauemina da taugu tokare nam waen yà tego munaḡe, naumeki da Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone waen tegonama yài kare munaḡena.”
41014026	Naumeki da taudi kaisuḡu sarenama a sare be a naḡona oya olipma.
41014027	Yesu ya riuedina, “Taumi matabumi tokare ko gosegu be koi naḡo teḡateḡana, baninama girugiruminama porane ya riuna da, ‘Mamaitua tokare tauyosi ei guri, be sipu matabudi tai daberaridina.’
41014028	Be raḡanine gurie be yà midisuḡu munaḡana, taugu tokare yà naḡo dokana Galilima, be muriḡa taumi.”
41014029	Pita ya riuna, “Avedi da ḡesaudima tokare ta gosemna, be taugu tokare nam yà gosem.”
41014030	Dabudine Yesu Pita ya riuena, “Taugu yà riuriu kauemna da manaka kupine muriḡa da kamkam raḡan aniwai rabuinama e riuna, be tam tokare raḡan rabuiteḡa kwa bovieguna da tam nam taugu ku kataieguna.”
41014031	Be Pita bonanama bagibagine ya riuna, “Taugu tokare nam yà boviem, teneteneḡinama deḡoda tam mate tà gurina!” Be tauwai muriwatanama ḡesaudima mate giunama teneḡinama nama a giuna.
41014032	Naumeki da Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama mate a naḡo dobu isanama Getsemenima a tava be tauna ya riuedina, “Uma dabudi ko miamia be taugu yà naḡo yà moiragina.”
41014033	Tauna na tauwai muriwatanama rabuiteḡa Pita, Jeims be Jon yai dokedina. Dabudine tauna nuanama yai poya be nuaboya noponama ya kukutomna,
41014034	be taudi ya riuedina, “Nuaboya nopogue ya moraba kaua da ḡaubonaḡa èi guriguna. Be taumi uma dabudi ko mia be ko taibanabanagigu be kowai neneḡana!”
41014035	Naumeki da tauna ya taunaḡo ḡaubonaḡa da moiragi aubainama ya beku yovo doḡae be ya moiragina, deḡoda teneteneḡina bo ibewa da tauna nam sibo ḡoraḡoranama e veraverauna nopone ya naḡo.
41014036	Dabudine tauna ya moiragi be ya riuna, “Mamai, Tamaguma, yaba matabuna tam ḡarome teneteneḡinama. Be ḡoraḡoranama uma yà siguena ḡarogue kwa kaipore! Naumeki da nam taugu yau ḡoanama yà voie be am ḡoanama nama e tubuḡana!”
41014037	Dabudine tauna ya munaḡa na tauwai muriwatanama ḡarodie, da e kitana be taudi a kenakenana. Naumeki da Yesu Pita ya riuena, “Saemon, tam kwa kenakena, bo? Tam nam tokare kuya mia da suara rovanama tenaḡa, bo?”
41014038	Be tauna taudi ya riuedina, “Koi neneḡana be ko moiragi da nam raurubue ko beku! Arua e ḡoeḡoena, be tubuḡa e vovo gwaḡagwaḡana.”
41014039	Naumeki da Yesu ya munaḡa be moiraginama teneḡinama ya moiragina.
41014040	Raḡanine tauna na tauwai muriwatanama ḡarodie ya tava munaḡa da e kitana be taudi yaḡoro a kenakenana, baninama taudi yaḡoro matedima ya guri kauana. Be taudi nam ti kataiena da aba sibo Yesu ḡarone a vato.
41014041	Be raḡan aniwai rabuiteḡane tauna ya tava munaḡa be ya riuedina, “Taumi yaḡoro ko kenakena be ko sipesipere, bo? Naumeki koya kenana! Raḡaninama kaiteka ya tavana, ko kita, Banaga Natunama a boru dobiḡena gewagewa banegidima nimedie.
41014042	Ko midisuḡu be tà naḡo, tauboru dobiḡeguma kaiteka umanema ya tavana.”
41014043	Dabudine Yesu yaḡoro ya giugiu be Judas tauna tenaḡa tauwai muriwatana matabudi 12 nopodie, be ya tavana. Dabudine banaga patara ḡesaudima mate nimedie kwatikwati be kwapu mate, taudi pirisi adi babadama, tarawatu tauwai katakataidima be babada dosidosidima a riuporedina.
41014044	Be tauborudobiḡa patara umanama ya riuedi da tauna tokare waimatarara aba e voiena, “Deḡo baneginama yàwai suruvena, tauna vutuna ami ḡoanama, tauna ko pani be koi doka nawena!”
41014045	Raḡanine Judas ya tavatavana, tauna waiḡapa didimaninama ya saḡa, ya naḡona Yesu ḡarone be ya riuna, “Tauwai katakatai!” da yai suruvena.
41014046	Dabudine taudi Yesu a vunuḡi be a kaididi guratena.
41014047	Dabudine banaga tenaḡa diedie ya midimidina, na kwatikwatima ya kaisuḡu be pirisi adi badama na taunoyama beanama yai miarakana.
41014048	Dabudine Yesu ya riuedina, “Taumi kwapu be kwatikwati mate koya tavana taugu ko vunuḡigu, maika kabe banaga taudanedanene, bo?
41014049	Taugu raḡan matabuna taumi mate tempol nopone èwai katakataina, be taumi nam taugu ko vunuḡiguna. Be girugiruminama porane e riuriuna naumeki da nama e tubuḡana.”
41014050	Dabudine tauwai muriwatana matabudi Yesu a gosepore be a naḡona.
41014051	Be inam raḡanine tauḡoma yaraginama tenaḡa nam aba ḡesaunama i kotena, be gara ḡavoḡavorinama ya kote be Yesu yawai muriwatanena. Raḡanine taudi tauna a kaikaididina,
41014052	tauna na garama ya gosaḡa be ma kavakavana naira ya manini be ya naḡona.
41014053	Naumeki da Yesu ai doka nawena pirisi saḡasaḡa vavasaḡinama na vadae, be dabudine pirisi adi babadama, tauwai tarapiri babadidima be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima matabudi ai rawateḡeidina.
41014054	Be Pita Yesu yawai muriwatane be muriḡa ya veraverauna, naumeki da ya saḡa ya naḡona anikaba etara gabuna pirisi saḡasaḡa vavasaḡinama na vadae. Dabudine tauna taubodama mate kai diane a mia be yawai kaimaririna.
41014055	Be pirisi adi babadama be waibabada matabudi riukaua a wanewanena da nema sibo Yesu ai gurina, be nam aitau ḡarone riukaua ti banavina.
41014056	Baninama banaga toitoi kaiyovue Yesu na kauama a giugiuena, be adi giuma matabudi nam teneḡidi.
41014057	Be mate dabudine banaga ḡesaudima a midisuḡu be kaiyovue Yesu na kauama umanama a giuena,
41014058	“Tauma kè vaiena umanama ya riuna, ‘Taugu tokare uma tempolnama banaga nimedie a kerikerina yà katiweina, be raḡan rabuiteḡa nopodie natabu yà keri munaḡena, nam maika banaga nimedie a kerikerina nama.’”
41014059	Be yaḡoro adi giuma matabudi nam teneḡidi.
41014060	Naumeki da pirisi saḡasaḡa vavasaḡinama banaga noḡodie ya midisuḡu be Yesu yai taravirena, “Tam uma banegidima adi giuma ta saḡesaḡedina ḡarome nam am paribea, bo?”
41014061	Be Yesu naumeki da yai nuatuḡu be nam aba i giuena. Dabudine pirisi saḡasaḡa vavasaḡinama Yesu yai taravira munaḡena, “Tam Keriso, Mamaitua Natuna, bo?”
41014062	Dabudine Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taugu vutuna! Be taumi matabumi tokare Banaga Natunama Mamaitua wairewapana vavasaḡinama nimanama kasaune e mia be marae ma giyouna e veraverauna ko kitana.”
41014063	Naumeki da pirisi saḡasaḡa vavasaḡinama na garama ya sikedi be ya riuna, “Tauma yodi nam matamata ḡesaudima kama ḡoeḡoedina!
41014064	Yodi tauna na waidiboḡama koya vaiena. Be nema kowai noḡota bako?” Be taudi matabudi ai anine da Yesu sibo gurie a boruna.
41014065	Dabudine banaga ḡesaudima Yesu a kaviso be matanama a suma da a riḡa be a riuna, “Yodi kwai peroveta kabe aitau ya riḡam?” Naumeki da taubodama Yesu ai doka nawe be a raunevaneva kauna.
41014066	Pita tauna yaḡoro anikaba etara gabunama dibune ya miamiana, be pirisi saḡasaḡa vavasaḡinama na taunoyama waivinama tenaḡa ḡarone ya tavana.
41014067	Raḡanine waivinama Pita e kitana be yawai kaimaririna, tauna Pita ya kitadidi be ya riuna, “Tam mate Nasaret Yesunama mate koya naḡonaḡona.”
41014068	Be Pita ya bovie be ya riuna, “Taugu nam e kataiena tam aba kwa giugiue.” Be tauna matakedae be ya dobina doḡae.
41014069	Raḡanine taunoyanama waivinama ya kitakitana, taudi aitauḡa dabudi midimididima ya riu munaḡedina, “Tauna mate Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama!”
41014070	Be Pita ya bovi munaḡana, dabudine aitauḡa diedie midimididima Pita a riuena, “Inam riukaua, tam mate turedima, baninama tam mate Galili banagimma.”
41014071	Be Pita taudi ḡarodie ya sauga wapa be ya riuna, “Taugu yà riuriu kauana! Deḡoda taugu ama kaiyovu, naumeki da Mamaitua sibo ya kovoḡigu. Taumi aba tauḡominama ko giugiue, taugu nam e kataiena!”
41014072	Naumeki da yai raḡantenaḡe da kamkam raḡan aniwai rabuinama ya riuna. Dabudine Yesu nema ya giugiu bakona Pita ya noḡotina: “Muriḡa da kamkam raḡan aniwai rabuinama e riuna be tam tokare raḡan rabuiteḡa kwa boviegu da tam taugu nam ku kataieguna.” Dabudine Pita yai nuaboya kaua be ya ḡaba guratana.
41015001	Naumeki da raḡanboiboi kupinaḡa, pirisi adi babadama, tauwai tarapiri babadidima mate, tarawatu tauwai katakataidima be waibabada matabudi ai rawateḡeidi be ai giu da aba ta voiena. Dabudine Yesu a pani be ai doka nawena Paelat ḡarone.
41015002	Naumeki da Paelat Yesu yai taravire be ya riuna, “Tam Jius adi guyau, bo?” Be tauna ya riuna, “Ee! Vutuna kuya vatona.”
41015003	Dabudine pirisi adi babadama yaba matabuna ḡarone Yesu ai wavuna.
41015004	Vutuna aubainama Paelat umanama Yesu yai taravirena, “Tam nam aba tokare kwa paribeedi, bo? Kuya vaie da yaba matabuna ḡarone tawai wavumna.”
41015005	Be yaḡoro Yesu nam aba giunama tenaḡa maika i vato rubuna. Vutuna aubainama Paelat ya basena.
41015006	Be Naḡopore soinama modi matabuna nopodie Paelat tauna na vaivaima da banaga dibure miemienidima tenaḡa nama e kaikaiporena, deḡo baneginama ta ḡoeḡoena nama.
41015007	Be inam raḡanine tauḡoma isanama Barabas be banaga medimedidima ḡesaudima iḡara nopone a rauvunuḡana mate dibure a miamiana.
41015008	Naumeki da patara a rawateḡeidi be Paelat ai baḡana da noḡone tauna nema ya voivoia bakona, nama sibo taudi aubaidima ya voiana.
41015009	Be Paelat taudi yai taraviredi be ya riuna, “Taumi ko ḡoeḡoena Jius guyaunama taumi aubaimima yà kaipore, bo?”
41015010	Be Paelat ya katai kauena da pirisi adi babadama Yesu a verauḡena tauna ḡarone, baninama taudi a unurana.
41015011	Dabudine pirisi adi babadama patara a kawa nuaḡoreḡoredi be Paelat ai baḡana da Barabas sibo ya kaiporena, be nam Yesu.
41015012	Naumeki da Paelat patara yai taravira munaḡedi be ya riuna, “Uma tauna kowai isana Jius guyaunama, yodi nema yà bake?”
41015013	Taudi a rasa be a riuna, “Kwa tuparatu!”
41015014	Be Paelat ya riuna, “Aba aubaina? Tauna aba gewagewanama ya voie?” Be taudi matabudi a rasa gurata be a riuna, “Kwa tuparatu!”
41015015	Naumeki da Paelat patara adi nuasubama aubainama Barabas ya kaiporena, be Yesu kwapue a riḡa be taudi nimedie ya boruna tuparatunama aubainama.
41015016	Naumeki da tauiḡara Yesu ai doka saḡena vadae, deḡo Paelat na kaba miae be tauiḡara ḡesaudima a riuedi da a rawateḡeidina.
41015017	Dabudine taudi gara gatugatunama Yesu ai kotena, be gedara a pipini be pinounama Yesu debane ai kunuboboena.
41015018	Be taudi Yesu waivaravarae ai kaiwe be a riuna, “Ebom, Jius guyauma!”
41015019	Naumeki da taudi kwapue Yesu debanama a riḡa yabayababe, a kaviso, tuapikedie a raupari be a rauduneena.
41015020	Raḡanine taudi ai kwatekwateve ya kovikovina, taudi gara gatugatunama a kaipore, be tauna na garaḡomama ai kote munaḡena. Dabudine taudi ai doka dobiḡa nawena tuparatunama aubainama.
41015021	Be kedae tauḡoma tenaḡa isanama Saemon, tauna na sipie be ya saḡasaḡana a banavina. Dabudine tauiḡaiḡara inam tauḡominama a segeri da Yesu na korosima e kiroḡina. Saemon tauna Sairin tauḡominama, tauna inam Alexanda be Rupas tamedima.
41015022	Naumeki da patara Yesu ai doka nawena gabu isanama ‘Golgota’, inam riunama baninama ‘debagarere’.
41015023	Dabudine taudi a ḡoeḡoena da waen be bunama muya anibosonama isanama ‘Maera’ mate wairawateḡeinama Yesu sibo ai tegona, be tauna nam i tegona.
41015024	Naumeki da tauiḡara Yesu korosie a tuparatu be na garama ai kasiedina, be aitau kasie yawai rewapanana, tauna na ḡoanama garanama nama ya paḡopaḡona.
41015025	Be raḡanboiboi suara rovanama 9-okorokinama Yesu a tuparatuna.
41015026	Dabudine Yesu debane kai ḡaubonama bogane a giruma da aba aubainama Yesu a tuparatu. Taudi umanama a girumana Jius adi guyauma!
41015027	Inam dabudine taudi taudanedanene rabui mate a tuparatudina, tenaḡa Yesu kasaune be tenaḡa senine.
41015029	Be banaga ḡesaudima noḡodiḡa a saḡasaḡa be a yovoyovona, taudi debedima a kwadiedi da Yesu ai diboḡi be a riuna, “Iyo! Tam godekai kuya riuna, ‘Tempol kwa katiwei be raḡan rabuiteḡa nopodie kwa keri munaḡena.’
41015030	Yodi korosie kwa dobi be kwai yawasana munaḡem!”
41015031	Inam kauinama teneḡine pirisi adi babadama be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima Yesu ai kwatekwateve be adi banagama adi banagama a riuedina, “Tauna banaga ḡesaudima yawai yawasanidina be yodi tauna nam tokare ei yawasana munaḡe!
41015032	Yodi Keriso, Israel guyaunama, tà kita korosi bogane e dobi be tài sumaḡe!” Be taudi aitauḡa taudanedanene rabui Yesu mate a tupatuparatudina, taudi mate Yesu ai diboḡina.
41015033	Dabudine suaratopu, be dobu yai kupikupina, naumeki da ravi.
41015034	Be ravie 3-okoroki Yesu bonanama dosine umanama ya riuna, “ Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani? ” Uma giunama baninama inam umanama, “Yau Mamaituama, yau Mamaituama, aba aubainama kuya gose poregu?”
41015035	Be banaga ḡesaudima dabudine diane a midimidina nama a vaie be a riuna, “Koi beavaia! Tauna Elaija e yokoyokoena!”
41015036	Be dabudine tauḡoma tenaḡa anitaiyo ya paḡo, be ya manini, ya saḡa ya naḡo da waen ḡoraḡorane yai sonom da kai isune ya pani be Yesu sibo yai tegona, be dabudine a riuna, “Nakarua! Deḡoda Elaija e yovoyovona Yesu korosie be e dobiḡena tà kitana.”
41015037	Naumeki da Yesu bonanama dosine ya riuriuna, naumeki da ya gurina.
41015038	Be gara tempol nopone matakedae waisaurinama ya nuasika poraḡa da ma nevana a kenana.
41015039	Be raḡanine tauiḡara adi badama dabudine Yesu noḡone ya midimidina, tauna Yesu bonanama ya vaie be ya kita da Yesu nema ya guri bakona, dabudine tauna ya riuna, “Riukaua, uma tauḡominama naumeki da tauna Mamaitua Natunama!”
41015040	Be dabudine waiwaivi ḡesaudima mate, taudi madanie be awai kitana, be taudi nopodie Meri Megdalin, Meri Jeims ḡaubonama be Joses tinedima be Salome.
41015041	Raḡanine Yesu tauna Galilima ya miamiana, uma waiwaividima matabudi Yesu awai muriwatane be tauna na ḡoanama nama a sagusaguna. Be waiwaivi toitoi ḡesaudima Yesu mate Jerusalemma a saḡasaḡana, taudi mate dabudine.
41015042	-
41015043	Naumeki da ravi ya tavatava be Jousep tauna Arimatia tauḡominama ya tavana tauwai tarapiri nopodie, tauna mate tenaḡa be a vivivivirena. Tauna Mamaitua na waiguyauma ya veraverauna ya raberabena. Be inam raḡanine Sabat na vokaukauama raḡaninama, be pomai inam Sabat na raḡanima. Vutuna aubainama Jousep ma raudebatorana ya naḡona Paelat ḡarone be yai baḡana Yesu tubuḡinama aubainama.
41015044	Be Paelat nama ya vaie be ya base da Yesu tauna kaite ya gurina. Vutuna aubainama Paelat tauiḡara adi badama ya yokoe be yai taravirena, deḡoda Yesu kaite ya guri bo ibewa.
41015045	Be raḡanine Paelat tauiḡara adi badama na giuma ya vaie ya kovikovina, Jousep ya riuporena da tauna Yesu tubuḡinama e paḡona.
41015046	Naumeki da Jousep gara ḡavoḡavoridima ya gimara, yodibe Yesu tubuḡinama korosie ya kiroḡa dobiḡe be gara ḡavoḡavoridie ya sumana. Naumeki da guba yeku nopone voivoienama, dabudine Yesu yai kenana. Yodibe Jousep yeku yai raurie be guba matakedanama yai kenatomna.
41015047	Meri Megdalin be Meri Jousep tinanama taudi Jousep deḡo Yesu tubuḡinama yai kenana a kitana.
41016001	Naumeki da Sabat ya kovi be murine, Meri Megdalin, Salome, be Meri, Jeims tinanama, taudi bunama a gimarana Yesu tubuḡine ḡininama aubainama.
41016002	Pomainama Sande raḡanboiboi suara ya tavatavana nama, taudi a naḡona kokoagae.
41016003	Be kedae taudi adi banagama adi banagama mate ai giu vivivira be a riuna, “Aitau tokare yeku kokoaga matakedane e taurie aubaidama?”
41016004	Raḡanine taudi a tausuḡudi da ta kitana be yekunama dosinama kaite ya raunuariana.
41016005	Raḡanine taudi kokoaga nopone a saḡasaḡana, kasaudima yauwanine tauḡoma yaraginama gara ḡavoḡavorinama ya kote be ya miamiana, a kita be a nairana.
41016006	Dabudine tauḡoma ya riuna, “Nam ko naira! Taugu è kataiena taumi Nasaret Yesunama a tupatuparatuna ko wanewanena. Tauna nam uma dabudi, tauna ya midisuḡu munaḡana! Ko kita, umanema awai kenana gabunama.
41016007	Yodi ko naḡo be na tauwai muriwatanama be Pita mate uma varinama ko riuedina: Bada Yesu kaite ya doka be e naḡonaḡona Galilima, dabudine taumi tokare ko kitana, noḡone ya riuriuemina nama.”
41016008	Naumeki da waiwaivi kokoaga a dobi pore be a base be ma nuagusugusudi a manini be a naḡona. Taudi nam aitau ḡarone aba ti giuena, baninama taudi a naira kauana.
41016009	Raḡanine Sande raḡanboiboi Yesu gurie be ya midimidisuḡu munaḡana, tauna Meri Megdalin ḡarone penama matabudi 7 ya tavu dobiḡedina, tauna vutuna ḡarone ya maḡatara dokana.
41016010	Naumeki da inam waivinama ya munaḡa be na banagama, aitauḡa ai nuaboya be a ḡabaḡabana ya riuedina.
41016011	Dabudine taudi ta vaiena be Meri ya riuna da Yesu ya yawasana munaḡana, be tauna ya kitana, be yaḡoro taudi nam ti sumaḡena.
41016012	Be uma kauinama murine, tauwai muriwatana rabui kedaḡa a naḡonaḡo be Yesu kitanama ya boru vitare be ḡarodie ya maḡatarana.
41016013	Dabudine taudi a munaḡa be adi banagama a riuedina, be taudi yaḡoro nam ti sumaḡana.
41016014	Muriḡanama tauwai muriwatana matabudi 11 a kanikani be Yesu ḡarodie ya maḡatarana. Tauna ya ḡasiedina, baninama taudi nam nopodie waisumaḡa. Taudi adi nopobadoma aubainama banaga ḡesaudima Yesu ya midisuḡu munaḡana a giugiuena, be taudi yaḡoro nam ti sumaḡedina.
41016015	Dabudine Yesu taudi umanama ya riuedina, “Ko naḡo dobu matabuna nopodiḡa be riu verenama ko rauguguyena banaga ḡarodie!
41016016	Be aitau ei sumaḡa be e babataitona, tauna tokare e yawasanana. Be aitau nam ei sumaḡa, Mamaitua tokare tauna e kovoḡina.
41016017	Tauwai sumaḡa taudi tokare rewapana è utedi da mataira ta voiedina. Taudi tokare isague penama ta tavu dobiḡedi, be bona vaudima tabu be tabu ta giuedina.
41016018	Deḡoda taudi mota gewegewedima nimedie ta ragaudi bo aniwai guri upedima ta tegodina, taudi tokare nam nema ta bako. Be nimedima banaga sidesidedima tunidie ta biridina, inam banegidima tokare ta yawasanana.”
41016019	Dabudine Bada Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama mate a giugiu kovina murine, Mamaitua Yesu ya nawena marae be Mamaitua kasaunama yauwane ya miana.
41016020	Naumeki da tauwai muriwatana dobu matabuna a naḡo be a rauguguyana, be Bada tauna taudi mate a noyanoya be mataira a voivoiedina. Be banaga taudi a kitedi da taudi adi rauguguyama naumeki riukaua.
42001001	Kapore Tiopilas! Banaga toitoi kaite a raurubu da voia nopode a tubutubuḡana a girumidina.
42001002	Taudi voia pakane matedie a kitakitana be beedie a vaivaiena a riuriuedina nama a girumidina.
42001003	Vutuna aubainama taugu uma voiedima è kita yaḡedi da adi didimanae yà girugirumina tam aubaimma,
42001004	baninama tam sibo kuya kataie da aba awai katakataimna inam matabudi riukaua.
42001005	Yau giuma pakanama yai karena, inam Herod tauna Judia provins guyaunama. Inam raḡandie pirisi ya miamiana isanama Sakaraias. Tauna Abia na waipirisima damnama nopone be na visarama Elisabet tauna Eron na waipirisima damnama nopone ya tubuḡana.
42001006	Sakaraias be Elisabet taudi rabuidi yawasana didimanine a mianana Mamaitua noḡone, be Mamaitua na riuvavasaḡama matabudi a voteyeteyedina, be nam aba tenaḡa ti voia waigewana.
42001007	Be taudi nam ti natunana, baninama Elisabet tauna yai kaikaipokina, be taudi rabuidi ai rawadosina.
42001008	Raḡan tenaḡa Sakaraias Jerusalemma tempol nopone ya noyanoyana, baninama Abia na waipirisima damnama adi noyama na raḡanima.
42001009	Inam damnama nopone Sakaraias a vinena da tauna Bada na tempolma nopone e saḡa be piupiu e gabuna.
42001010	Naumeki da Sakaraias tempol nopone piupiu ya gabugabuna maika, banaga ḡesaudima gabure a mia kwasa, be a moimoiragina.
42001011	Sakaraias tempol nopone piupiu ya gabugabuna maika, Bada na aneama piupiu oltanama diane ya maḡatarana, Sakaraias kasaunama yauwane.
42001012	Sakaraias anea ya kitakitana, tauna ya ḡosori be ya naira kauana.
42001013	Be anea ya riuena, “Sakaraias, nam kwa naira! Mamaitua am moiragima ya paribeena, da am visarama Elisabet gomana tauḡominama tokare e tikana, be tam inam gomeninama kwai isana Jon.
42001014	Inam gomeninama tam ei nuaverem be banaga toitoi tai nuaverena inam gomeninama ya tubuḡana aubainama.
42001015	Baninama Bada matane tauna tokare banaga dosinama e tubuḡana. Tauna tokare nam waen bo upa bagibagidima e tegodi, ibewa. Be tauna tinanama kapone da nokoi ya naḡona Arua Babau noponama e moḡavuna.
42001016	Tauna Israel banegidima toitoi e verauḡa munaḡedina Bada adi Mamaituama ḡarone.
42001017	Be tauna Bada na kedadokadokama be tauna Elaija na aruama be na wairewapanama maika e noyana. Be tauna dosi nuedima e vitaredi da adi sedama nuedima ta paḡona. Be banaga rawarawa ḡaiḡaidima nuedima e vitaredi da Mamaitua na nuauyauyama ta kataie be yawasana didimanine ta miana. Inam yabedima matabudi e voiedi, da banaga e vokaukauedina Bada na kaba verauma aubainama.”
42001018	Be Sakaraias anea ya riuena, “Nemanama yà kataie bake da tam kwa riuriu kaua? Baninama taugu yau visarama mate kaiteka kèi rawadosina.”
42001019	Dabudine anea Sakaraias ya paribee be ya riuna, “Taugu Geibriel. Taugu Mamaitua noḡone yà midimidina, tauna ya riuporeguna da uma riunama verenama yà riuriuemna,
42001020	be tam nam kui sumaḡeguna, aubainama yodi tam gumgum kwa miana naumeki da uma yabedima matabudi adi raḡan kaue ta tubuḡana.”
42001021	Banaga yaḡoro doḡae awai rabana da Sakaraias sibo ya dobina, be taudi a nuababaḡana aba aubainama Sakaraias tempol nopone e miamia gurata.
42001022	Tauna doḡae ya dobidobina raḡanine, nam aba i giuena, be matairaḡa ya voiena. Dabudi banaga a kataie da tauna mataḡomine rauboni ya kitana, be Sakaraias tauna naumeki da gumgum ya mianana.
42001023	Naumeki da tauna na noyama taparoronama ya kovikovina, tauna ya munaḡana na vadae.
42001024	Inam kauidima muridie tauna na visarama Elisabet ya boga be semoe ya miana naumeki da nawaravi 5 a kovina. Be Elisabet ya riuna,
42001025	“Bada na raukiviveree ya raunuatoiegu be yau tunimayaḡama ya kaiporena.”
42001026	-
42001027	Raḡanine Elisabet na nawaravima aniwai 6-nama murine, Mamaitua anea Geibriel ya riupore da ya naḡona matatapu isanama Meri ḡarone, tauna Jousep mate ai ḡoapaparana. Jousep tauna guyau Deivid na damma nopone. Taudi rabuidi Nasaret meagaine a mianana Galili provinsnama nopone.
42001028	Dabudine anea ya saḡa da Meri ya riuena, “Ebom tam waivima waiaiainimma, Bada ḡarome.”
42001029	Inam raḡanine Meri ya nuababaḡana be anea aba ya giugiuena tauna nam i kataiena, be tauna yawai nuanoḡonoḡotana da inam giudima banidima aba.
42001030	Be anea ya riuena, “Meri nam kwa naira! Tam Mamaitua kwawai nuavaina.
42001031	Tam tokare kwa boga be gomana tauḡominama kwa tikana, be inam gomeninama kwai isana Yesu.
42001032	Tauna tokare banaga dosinama be Mamaitua saḡasaḡa vavasaḡinama natunama e tubuḡana. Be Yesu guyau Deivid na dame e tubuḡana aubainama Mamaitua Deivid na waiguyauma natunama Yesu e utena.
42001033	Be tauna Israel ḡarodie ei bada nonoḡana, be na waiguyauma nam e kovi.”
42001034	Be Meri anea yai taravirena, “Inam nemanama? Taugu tauḡoma nam mayanama e paḡona.”
42001035	Be anea ya paribee be ya riuna, “Arua Babau tokare e tava ḡarome be saḡasaḡa vavasaḡinama na rewapanama vagurunama e rupumna. Inam vutuna aubainama tam tokare gomana babaunama kwa tikana, tauna Mamaitua Natunama.
42001036	Kwa noḡoti da am dame Elisabet avedi yai rawadosina be gomana tauḡominama tokare e tikana. Banaga a riuna da tauna kaikaipoki be yodi Elisabet tauna kaite na nawaravima 6 a kovina,
42001037	baninama Mamaitua aba ya riuedina tokare matabudi ta tubuḡana.”
42001038	Be Meri ya riuna, “Taugu Bada na taunoyama, be aba kuya riueguna tokare naumeki da e tubuḡana.” Naumeki da anea Meri ya gose be ya naḡona.
42001039	Inam kauinama murine Meri ya midisuḡu be ya naḡona oyae Judia provins nopone
42001040	Sakaraias na meagaie, Elisabet kitanama be waikaiwenama aubainama.
42001041	Be Elisabet Meri na waikaiwama ya vaivaiena raḡanine, tauna kapone gomana yai dagudagu be Elisabet noponama Arua Babau ya moḡavuna.
42001042	Be bonanama dosine ya riuna, “Waiwaivi nopodie tam Mamaitua yai aiaina vavasaḡemna, tam be votamma mate!
42001043	Aina, taugu kamai banabanaga be aba aubainama kitaguma kuya tava? Tam Bada tinanama be.
42001044	Taugu am waikaiwama è vaievaiena raḡanine, kapogue gomana nuanama ya vere be ya potina.
42001045	Tam Mamaitua yai aiainimna, baninama kuyai sumaḡa da Bada riunama ḡarome e tubuḡana.”
42001046	Meri ya riuna, “Taugu Bada yà kaisuḡu
42001047	be nuaguma ya verena, baninama Mamaitua tauwai yawasaniguma.
42001048	Taugu waivi kavakava be yaḡoro tauna ya noḡotiguna. Be yodi da nokoi ya naḡona kimta da kimta tokare ta riuna da riukaua taugu Mamaitua yai aiainiguna,
42001049	baninama Mamaitua tauna vutuna babau be wairewapana vavasaḡinama tauna aubaiguma yaba dosinama ya voiena.
42001050	Tauna na raunuatoima kimta be kimta aitauḡa tauna ta vivivivirena e utedina.
42001051	Tauna nimanama wairewapanine yaba dosidima ya voiedina be banaga raurau guyaguyaudima yai daberaridina.
42001052	Tauna banaga wairewapanidima adi waibadae ya biri dobiḡedina, be banaga wainuatoitoidima ya biri tavaitedina.
42001053	Tauna banaga kanikaniguridima vere ya utedina, be banaga waimauridima nimakavekavedima ya riuporedina.
42001054	Tauna na taunoyama Israel e saguda, e noḡotida be e raunuatoi nonoḡedana,
42001055	maika boni Eibraham be na damma ya riuedina nama.”
42001056	Meri Elisabet mate a miana nawaravi rabuiteḡa, be muriḡa ya munaḡana na vadae.
42001057	Yodi Elisabet na wainatunama raḡaninama ya tavana da gomana tauḡominama ya tubuḡana.
42001058	Elisabet na banagama be na damma inam varinama a vaie be matabudi nuedima ya vere kauana, baninama Mamaitua tauna Elisabet ya raunuatoi kauena.
42001059	Be gomana na raḡanima aniwai 8-nama, inam raḡanine taudi matabudi a tavana kopitom aubainama. Be taudi a ḡoeḡoena da gomana sibo tamanama isane ai isana Sakaraias.
42001060	Be tinanama ya riuna, “Ibewa! Tauna isanama Jon.”
42001061	Be taudi a riuna, “Aba aubaina? Tam am dame inam nama isanama nam ima kenakenana.”
42001062	Dabudine taudi gomana tamanama waibuae ai taravire da gomana isanama nema.
42001063	Dabudine Sakaraias anigiruma ya ḡoena da a ute be bogane umanama ya girumana, “Tauna isanama Jon”, be taudi inam isanama a basena.
42001064	Be yai raḡantenaḡe da Sakaraias ya giu munaḡa be Mamaitua isanama ya kaisuḡusuḡuna.
42001065	Be na banagama inam kauidima a kitekitedina, taudi Mamaitua na rewapanama a base be Judia provins matabuna nopone inam yabedima banaga ai giugiuedina.
42001066	Banaga matabudi aitauḡa nama giudima a vaivaiedina, taudi ai nuanoḡonoḡote be a riuna, “Uma gomeninama tokare aba e tubuḡa, baninama yodi tà kitakitana da Mamaitua tauna mate.”
42001067	Be Jon tamanama Sakaraias noponama Arua Babau yai moḡavu be Mamaitua riunama yawai perovetaena.
42001068	“Bada Israel Mamaituanama yà kaikai suḡusuḡuna. Tauna ya verauna na banagama kuvesidima be waiyawasanidima aubainama.
42001069	Tauna na taunoyama Deivid na dame Tauwai yawasana wairewapaninama ya riuporena tauda aubaidama,
42001070	maika boni Mamaitua peroveta ḡarodie ya giugiuna nama,
42001071	da tauna banaga aitau ta tuatuaḡaiedana bo dà ḡaviama nimedie be tauna ei yawasanidana.
42001072	Tauna e rarau nuatoina waḡawaḡadama waḡewaḡedima ḡarodie be riuwainoḡota babaunama e noḡotina
42001073	vutuna tauna tamadama Eibraham ḡarone boni ya sausaugana nama.
42001074	-
42001075	Tauna dà ḡaviama adi rewapanae be ei yawasanidana da tauda babaudama tà tubuḡa be nuadama torane be didimana mate Mamaitua tai yaragena raḡan matabuna.
42001076	Be tam yau gomanama tam tokare Mamaitua saḡasaḡa vavasaḡinama na perovetama. Baninama tam tokare kwa doka be Bada na kedama kwa sepana.
42001077	Tam banaga kwa riuedina da Mamaitua taudi ei yawasanidina, baninama yodi raḡan ya tavana da Mamaitua adi gewagewama e noḡota poredina.
42001078	Baninama Mamaitua na raunuatoima dosinama kapoyaninama marae be ḡarode yovonama ewai karena,
42001079	da yana e yovoḡena aitauḡa guri na waikupikupie ta miamiana ḡarodie. Be tauna ei dokeda be suba kedanama ei kataidana.”
42001080	Naumeki da gomana ya moraba da arue yai rewapanana. Be tauna dobu kavakavane ya miana naumeki da na raḡan kauama ya tavana, yodibe patara nopodie na noyama yai karena Israel banegidima ḡarodie.
42002001	Inam raḡandie Sisa Augastas na riuma ya boru da dobu matabuna deḡo banaga ta miamiana, nama sensus ta voiena.
42002002	Noḡone nam sensus i kenakenana, be uma raḡandie yodi sensus ai karena. Inam raḡanine Kwirinias tauna Siria provins nopone yawai primiana.
42002003	Vutuna aubainama banaga matabudi a munaḡana adi meagaie sensus aubaina.
42002004	Naumeki da Jousep mate tauna Nasaret meagainama Galili provins nopone ya gose be ya naḡona Betliemma, guyau Deivid na meagaie Judia provins nopone, baninama Jousep tauna Deivid na damma nopone.
42002005	Be Jousep na ḡoapaparama Meri ma bogana, taudi a naḡona sensus aubainama.
42002006	Be taudi Betliemma be gomana na kaba tubuḡama raḡaninama ya tavana,
42002007	naumeki da Meri gomana kaevounama tauḡominama ya tikana. Be barekie nam deḡo gabu i kenakenana aubainama, tauna gomana garae ya paiwi be musara adi ḡobee yai kenana.
42002008	Inam kupine sipu taurabedima wapue a miana be adi sipuma a kitakita watanidina.
42002009	Be Bada na aneama ḡarodie ya dobi be Bada neneḡarinama yai yanedi be taudi a naira kauana.
42002010	Dabudine anea ya riuedina, “Nam ko naira! Taugu vari verenama yà yovoyovoḡena ḡaromie da tokare banaga matabuna tai nuaverena,
42002011	baninama manaka Deivid na meagaie Tauwai yawasana ya tubuḡana taumi aubaimima. Tauna Bada Keriso.
42002012	Taumi gomana umanama ko kitana, tauna a paiwi be musara adi ḡobee e kenakenana, be inam nama ko kataiena da inam tauna.”
42002013	Be yai raḡantenaḡe da anea damnama dosinama a maḡatara be inam aneanama mate Mamaitua a kaisuḡusuḡu be a riuriuna,
42002014	“Kawasaḡe be kaisuḡusuḡu Mamaitua ḡarone ta kena, baninama tauna saḡasaḡa vavasaḡinama aubainama. Be aitauḡa dobue didimanaḡa ta naḡonaḡona, Mamaitua taudi na subama e uteutedina.”
42002015	Raḡanine anea tauyosi a gosedi be a munamunaḡana marae, dabudine tauyosi adi banagama adi banagama a riuedina, “Tà naḡo Betliemma be Bada ya riuriuedana ya tubuḡana tà kitana.”
42002016	Naumeki da a naḡo makamakai da Jousep, Meri be gomana musara adi ḡobee ya kenakenana a banavidina.
42002017	Taudi inam kauinama a kitakita kovina, murine anea gomana varinama ya riuriuedina, inam dabudi ai daberarina.
42002018	Be banaga matabudi aitauḡa tauyosi adi giuma a vaivaiena, taudi a basena.
42002019	Be Meri tauna inam riudima nuane ya taudididi be yawai nuanoḡonoḡotedina.
42002020	Naumeki da tauyosi a munaḡa be Mamaitua a kawa saḡe be a kaisuḡuna yaba matabuna a kitakita be a vaivaiena aubainama. Yaba matabuna anea ya riuriuedina, nama a tubuḡana.
42002021	Yodi gomana na raḡanima aniwai 8-nama, inam kopitom raḡaninama ya tavana, be dabudine taudi gomana ai isana ‘Yesu’. Inam isanama anea Meri ya riu dokena, muriḡa da Meri ya bogana.
42002022	Raḡanine Meri gomana tauḡominama ya tikana murine, Mousis na tarawatuma e riuriuna ruvane Meri nam waiḡapa i naḡona Mamaitua na vadae. Ibewa da ya miana da na raḡanima 40 a kovina. Be murine Jousep be Meri Yesu a tika saḡena Jerusalemma Bada waikatainama aubainama,
42002023	baninama Bada na tarawatuma umanama ya riuna, “Banaga be musara tautauḡomidima kayevoudima matabudi ko saḡedi be Bada ko utena.”
42002024	Be puyo bunebune rabui bo gabubu natunatudima rabui mate a saḡedina Bada na tarawatuma ya girugirumina nama.
42002025	Inam raḡanine banaga tenaḡa Jerusalemma ya miamiana, isanama Simeon. Tauna yawasana didimanine ya mia be Mamaitua ya vivivivirena be Arua Babau tauna noponama ya moḡavu, be Israel tauwai yawasaninama ya raberabena.
42002026	Be Arua Babau Simeon ya riuena da tauna nam sibo ya guri naumeki da noḡone Bada na Kerisoma e kitana.
42002027	Naumeki da Meri be Jousep gomana Yesu a saḡena tempol nopone da tarawatu aba ya riuriuedina voiedima aubainama. Inam raḡanine Arua Simeon yai doka nawena tempol nopone.
42002028	Be dabudine Simeon nimane gomana ya tika be Mamaitua ya kaisuḡusuḡuna be umanama ya riuna,
42002029	“Naumeki Bada, yodi taugu am taunoyama nuasubae yà gurina kuya riuriueguna nama,
42002030	baninama Tauwai yawasana kuya riuriuporena, yodi matague è kitana.
42002031	Tauna dobu matabuna aubainama kuya riuporena.
42002032	Tauna dam matabudi e rawayanedi be tam ta kataiemna. Be mate tauna e voie da am banagama Israel ta kawa saḡedina.”
42002033	Be Simeon gomana nema ya giugiu bakena, gomana na dosima inam giudima a basedina.
42002034	Dabudine Simeon taudi yai aiainidi be gomana tinanama Meri ya riuena, “Israel banegidima toitoi adi yawasanae ta bekuna be toitoi adi yawasanae ta midisuḡuna, uma gomeninama kana taiye. Tauna Mamaitua ewai matairena aubainama banaga toitoi ta riuvirevirena
42002035	be adi wainua noḡonoḡotama tauna ei maḡataridina. Inam voiedima matabudi aubaidima tam tokare ta voiem da kwai nuaboya kauana, maika kea gamgamnama kabe nuapoume i midimidi.”
42002036	Be peroveta waivinama poranama isanama Hana, tauna mate dobudi tempol nopone. Tauna Panuel natunama be Aser na damma nopone. Hana na badama mate ai naḡi be a mianana modi 7
42002037	murine tauna yai kaiyababana. Be yodi tauna na suarama 84 be kupi da suara tempol nopone ya miamiana. Be nam airaḡan tempol i gose rubuna. Tauna na noyama ya widiwidina be ya moimoiragina.
42002038	Naumeki da Simeon gomana na dosima mate a giugiuna raḡanine, Hana ya saḡa da Mamaitua ya kaisuḡusuḡu be banaga aitauḡa Jerusalem na Tauwai yawasanama a raberabena ḡarodie gomana na kauama ya giuedina.
42002039	Raḡanine Jousep be Meri yaba matabuna Bada na tarawatuma ya riuriuena a voia rovodina, murine taudi a munaḡana adi meagaie Nasaretma, Galili provins nopone.
42002040	Dabudine gomana ya moraba be yai rewapanana, be nuauyauya noponama ya moḡavu be Mamaitua na raukiviverema tauna ḡarone ya kenana.
42002041	-
42002042	Naumeki da Yesu na suarama 12, be na dosima mate a naḡona Jerusalemma Naḡopore soinama aubainama. Inam taudi adi vaivaima aubainama, taudi modi matabuna ta naḡonaḡona Jerusalemma, inam soinama aubainama.
42002043	Raḡanine inam soinama ya kovikovina murine, taudi naḡo munaḡa meagaie ai karena, be gomana Yesu ya mia kwasana Jerusalemma, be na dosima taudi nam ti kataiena.
42002044	Taudi ai noḡotana kabe na banagama mate ti naḡonaḡo naumeki da a naḡo ravina. Be ravie gomana wanenama ai karena na dosima be na banagama ḡesaudima ḡarodie.
42002045	Be taudi gomana nam ti banavina aubainama waiwanawana a munaḡana Jerusalemma.
42002046	Raḡan aniwai rabuiteḡane taudi gomana tempol nopone a banavina. Yesu tauna tauwai katakatai poudie ya mia be tauna taudi mate awai giuna be yawai beavaiedina.
42002047	Be banaga matabudi aitauḡa gomana a vaivaiena, na kataima be na paribeama a base kauena.
42002048	Raḡanine na dosima a banavina, nuedima yai medi be tinanama ya riuena, “Taukui, aba aubainama umanama kuya voia ḡaromaie? Tamamma rabuigu ma nuaboyamai kè wanewanemna.”
42002049	Be tauna ya riuedina, “Aba aubainama koya wanewanegu? Taumi sibo koya kataie da taugu Tamaḡomiguma na vadae yà miamiana.”
42002050	Be gomana aba ya riuriuena, taudi na giuma baninama nam ti kataiena.
42002051	Naumeki da tauna na dosima ya voteyeteyedi be taudi mate a naḡona Nasaretma, be tinanama inam giudima matabudi nuane ya taudididina.
42002052	Be Yesu tauna na nuauyauyama be na suarama a moraba tenaḡana, be na wainuapaḡoma Mamaitua ḡarone be banaga ḡarodie mate.
42003001	Raḡanine Sisa Tiberius tauna na waibadae ya miana na modima 15, be inam raḡanine Pontis Paelat tauna Judia provins primianama, be Herod tauna Galili provins na guyauma be tasinama Pilip, tauna Ituraia be Trakontis adi guyauma, be Lisanias tauna Abilene guyaunama.
42003002	Be Hanas be Kaiyapas taudi pirisi dosidima. Inam banegidima adi waibadama raḡanine, Jon tauna dobu kavakavane ya miamiana be Mamaitua na riuma ya yovona, Sakaraias natunama Jon ḡarone.
42003003	Jon ya naḡona upa Jodan dianama matabuna nopodie be banaga ḡarodie ya rauguguya be ya riuriuna, “Ami gewagewama ko gosedi be ko babataito da Mamaitua ami gewagewama e noḡota poredina.”
42003004	Jon yaba matabuna nema peroveta Aisaia na bukae ya girugirumidina, nama ya voiedina. Peroveta Aisaia umanama ya riuna, “Banaga dobu kavakavane e yokoyokona, ‘Bada na kedama ko sepa, keda ko kawa didimanidina Bada na kaba verauma aubainama.
42003005	Gaugauba matabudi ko ḡuruvidi be oya matabudi debedima ko keri waiwapudina. Be yawasana barebaredima ko kawa didimanidi be keda pikepikedima ko keri yaḡoyaḡotidina.
42003006	Yodibe banaga matabudi Mamaitua nema ei yawasana bakedina ta kitana.’”
42003007	Banaga ḡumnama a dobina Jon ḡarone babataito aubainama, be tauna ya riuedina, “Taumi maika mota sarama natunatudima! Taumi aitau ami wainua noḡonoḡotama ya voie da Mamaitua na kovoḡama ko naḡo pore, wa?
42003008	Noḡone ko munaḡa da ami yawasanama ko vitaredi be yawasana banidima veredima koi maḡataridi da banaga ta kitedina, be nam ko noḡota munaḡemi be ko riuna, ‘Tauda Eibraham natunatunama aubainama ḡarode nam tokare gewagewa aba e tubuḡa.’ Yà riuriuemina da Mamaitua sibo i ḡoena, tokare teneteneḡinama kaua yekudie seda yai tubuḡidina Eibraham aubainama.
42003009	Bada tamiyoko kaite kai bogane ya boruna, be ai kaiḡa nam banidima veredi matabudi e taraḡa poraḡa be e gabugorudina.”
42003010	Dabudine banaga ḡumnama a riuna, “Yodi aba tà voie?”
42003011	Be Jon ya paribeedina, “Aitauḡa ḡaromie kwama rabui, tenaḡa turamma nam waikwamana kwa utena, be kani mate nama ko voiena.”
42003012	Teks tautaminama mate a verauna babataito aubainama be ai taravirena, “Tauwai katakatai, tauma aba ka voie?”
42003013	Be Jon ya riuedina, “Teks a riuriuemina na ruvae nama ko ragauna be nam ko tausaḡe.”
42003014	Be banaga iḡeiḡeridima mate ai taravirena, “Tauma nema ka voie bako?” Be tauna ya riuedina, “Nam banaga ko raukivi gewegewedi be nam ko riu waigusudi be adi waiyabama ko paḡo avedi, taumi ami maesama inam naumeki ewai nuasubemina.”
42003015	Dabudine banaga matabudi Tauwai yawasana a raberabena, be awai noḡotana da kabe Jon tauna vutuna Tauwai yawasana.
42003016	Be tauna umanama ya riuedina, “Taugu upakavakavae yàwai babataitomina be banaga murigue e veraverauna, tauna banaga dosinama be wairewapana vavasaḡinama, be taugu nam veregu da na kaḡasumama yà kaipore. Tauna tokare Arua Babaue be kaie ei babataitomina.
42003017	Tauna banaga vere be gewagewa e vinevinedina maika raisi. Raisi tauna e tutu, be sive nopone e ḡini be sive mui e suve be ḡavoe e dobidobina be baninama ḡavoe e dobidobina. Muriḡa tauna banidima e ragaragaudina, be muinama kai karakaratine e gabu gorudi be ta karakara nonoḡana.”
42003018	Be giu ḡesaudima mate Jon na rauguguyae banaga ya sagudi da adi yawasanama a vitaredina. Nama tauna riu verenama ya rauguguyena.
42003019	Jon patara nopodie guyau Herod ya riuvirevirena, baninama tasinama na visarama Herodias ya kwayana be na gewagewama ḡesaudima mate aubainama.
42003020	Vutuna aubainama Herod Jon dibure ya boru be you, na gewagewama ya taipotona.
42003021	Muriḡa da Herod Jon dibure ya boruna, noḡone Jon banaga matabudi yai babataito rovodi be Yesu mate yai babataitona. Be Yesu ya moimoiragina raḡanine, mara ya nuaporaḡa
42003022	be Arua Babau ya yovona Yesu ḡarone maika kiu gabubu. Be marae bona ya dobina, “Tam taugu natuguma nuaguma kwa paḡopaḡona, be taugu yawai nuaverena tam ḡarome.”
42003023	Yesu tauna na suarama 30 be patara nopodie na noyama yai karena. Banaga ai noḡotana Yesu kabe Jousep natuna, be Jousep tauna Eli natunama,
42003024	be Eli tauna Matat natunama, be Matat tauna Livai natunama, be Livai tauna Melki natunama, be Melki tauna Janai natunama, be Janai tauna Jousep natunama,
42003025	be Jousep tauna Matatias natunama, be Matatias tauna Amos natunama, be Amos tauna Naum natunama, be Naum tauna Esli natunama, be Esli tauna Nagai natunama,
42003026	be Nagai tauna Mat natunama, be Mat tauna Matatias natunama, be Matatias tauna Simei natunama, be Simei tauna Josek natunama, be Josek tauna Joda natunama,
42003027	be Joda tauna Joanan natunama, be Joanan tauna Resa natunama, be Resa tauna Serubabel natunama, be Serubabel tauna Sealtiel natunama, be Sealtiel tauna Neri natunama,
42003028	be Neri tauna Melki natunama, be Melki tauna Adi natunama, be Adi tauna Kosam natunama, be Kosam tauna Elmadam natunama, be Elmadam tauna Er natunama,
42003029	be Er tauna Josua natunama, be Josua tauna Elieser natunama, be Elieser tauna Jorim natunama, be Jorim tauna Matat natunama, be Matat tauna Livai natunama,
42003030	be Livai tauna Simeon natunama, be Simeon tauna Juda natunama, be Juda tauna Jousep natunama, be Jousep tauna Jonam natunama, be Jonam tauna Elaiakim natunama,
42003031	be Elaiakim tauna Melea natunama, be Melea tauna Mena natunama, be Mena tauna Matata natunama, be Matata tauna Natan natunama, be Natan tauna Deivid natunama,
42003032	be Deivid tauna Jese natunama, be Jese tauna Obed natunama, be Obed tauna Boas natunama, be Boas tauna Salmon natunama, be Salmon tauna Nason natunama,
42003033	be Nason tauna Aminadab natunama, be Aminadab tauna Admin natunama, be Admin tauna Arni natunama, be Arni tauna Esron natunama, be Esron tauna Peres natunama, be Peres tauna Juda natunama,
42003034	be Juda tauna Jeikob natunama, be Jeikob tauna Aisik natunama, be Aisik tauna Eibraham natunama, be Eibraham tauna Tara natunama, be Tara tauna Nahor natunama,
42003035	be Nahor tauna Seruk natunama, be Seruk tauna Ragu natunama, be Ragu tauna Palek natunama, be Palek tauna Eber natunama, be Eber tauna Sala natunama,
42003036	be Sala tauna Kainam natunama, be Kainam tauna Arpaksad natunama, be Arpaksad tauna Sem natunama, be Sem tauna Noa natunama, be Noa tauna Lamek natunama,
42003037	be Lamek tauna Metusala natunama, be Metusala tauna Inok natunama, be Inok tauna Jaret natunama, be Jaret tauna Malaleel natunama, be Malaleel tauna Kainan natunama,
42003038	be Kainan tauna Enos natunama, be Enos tauna Set natunama, be Set tauna Adam natunama, be Adam tauna Mamaitua natunama.
42004001	Yesu Arua Babau noponama ya moḡavu be Jodan ya gose porena. Arua tauna yai doke be a naḡona dobu kavakavane na raḡanima 40.
42004002	Inam dabudine Diaboro Yesu ya raurubuna. Inam raḡandie Yesu tauna nam aiyaba i kani rubuna, naumeki da raḡan 40 a kovikovina, Yesu tauna kani ya karatina.
42004003	Be Diaboro Yesu ya riuena, “Deḡoda tam Mamaitua Natunama, naumeki da uma yekunama kwa riue da ei rawaburedi.”
42004004	Be Yesu ya paribee be ya riuna, “Girugiruminama poranama umanama ya riuna, ‘Banaga nam buredi ḡomae e mia.’”
42004005	Dabudine Diaboro yai doka nawena oya daudaunama debane, be dobu matabuna na waiguyauma yai kataina.
42004006	Be Diaboro Yesu ya riuena, “Uma rewapanidima be uma yabedima waimatakanikanidima matabudi Mamaitua taugu ya uteguna. Vutuna aubainama aitau yà ḡoeḡoena nama yà utena.
42004007	Be deḡoda tam taugu kwa rauduneeguna, inam yabedima matabudi tam yà utemna.”
42004008	Be Yesu ya paribee be ya riuna, “Girugiruminama poranama umanama ya riuna, ‘Bada, am Mamaituama taunaḡa kwa raudunee, be ḡarone kwa noyana.’”
42004009	Dabudine Diaboro Yesu yai doka nawena Jerusalemma tempol daudaunama debane, be ya riuena, “Deḡoda tam riukaua Mamaitua Natunama, naumeki da uma dobudine kwa potina,
42004010	baninama girugiruminama poranama umanama ya riuna, ‘Mamaitua na aneama e riuporedi da tam ta rabemna.
42004011	Be nimedie ta kaisuḡum da nam yekue kaḡamma kwai tutu.’”
42004012	Be Yesu ya paribeena, “Girugiruminama poranama mate umanama ya riuna, ‘Bada, am Mamaituama nam kwa raurubu.’”
42004013	Raḡanine Diaboro na raurubuma ya kovikovina, naumeki da tauna Yesu ya taugosena raḡan ḡaubonaḡa.
42004014	Arua Babau na wairewapanae Yesu ya munaḡana Galili provins nopone, be banaga matabudi inam dabudi tauna a giugiuena.
42004015	Be tauna taudi sinagog nopone yai katakataidi be taudi tauna isanama a kaisuḡusuḡuna.
42004016	Be Yesu ya naḡona Nasaretma deḡo ya moramorabe. Be Sabat raḡanine ya naḡona sinagog nopone maika nema Sabat matabuna ya voivoiana nama. Be tauna ya midisuḡu da girugiruminama sievinama aubainama.
42004017	Peroveta Aisaia na bukama tauna a ute be ya tapa da deḡo giruma ya riuna,
42004018	“Bada Aruinama nopogue, baninama tauna ya vineguna da riukaua yà rarau guguyena banaga waikaruwaḡewaḡedima ḡarodie. Be tauna ya riuporeguna da banaga panipanidima yà riuedi da ta kuvesidina. Be banaga matapotepotedima tai kita munaḡa. Taugu è yovona banaga adi banagama ta rarau kivi gewegewedina yài ḡakedina.
42004019	Be tauna ya riuporegu da yà giugiuna, yodi raḡan ya tavana da Bada na banagama ei yawasanidina.”
42004020	Dabudine Yesu buka ya gudu be taunoya ya ute munaḡe da ya miana, be sinagog nopone banaga matabudi matedima Yesu ḡarone.
42004021	Dabudi Yesu giu yai kare be ya riuedina, “Manaka inam riudima koya vaivaiedina, baninama ya tubuḡana.”
42004022	Be banaga matabudi Yesu isanama a kaisuḡusuḡu, be taudi Yesu na giuma veredima aubainama a basena. Be taudi a riuna, “Tauna Jousep natunama! Be nemanama da umanama e giugiu?”
42004023	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Taugu è kataiena da uma riunama tokare ko riueguna, ‘Dogeta kwai yawasana munaḡem!’ Be mate ko riueguna, ‘Tauma kè vaiem be Kapeniamma yaba kuya voivoiedina, nama uma dabudine am meagaie kwa voiedi.’”
42004024	Be tauna ya riuna, “Taugu yà riuriu kauemina, peroveta na dobue banaga na giuma vaienama nam tima ḡoeḡoena.
42004025	Taugu yà riukauemina, peroveta Elaija na raḡanie banaga nam ti sipisipina, baninama modi 3 ½ marakapo ya karatana. Be inam raḡanine Israel nopone kaiyababa toitoi a miamiana.
42004026	Be Bada nam Elaija i riupore i naḡona inam kaiyababidima ḡarodie, ibewa be ya riupore ya naḡona kaiyababa ḡesau ḡarone. Inam kaiyababinama tauna Sarepama miemieninama dobu isanama Saidon nopone.
42004027	Be peroveta Elisa na raḡanie Israel nopone banaga toitoi sida kito ragaragaudima be inam dobudine Bada nam aitau tenaḡa i yawasanina be Naeman Siriaḡa tavatavanama taunaḡa yai yawasanina.”
42004028	Sinagog nopone banaga matabudi inam riunama nama a vaivaiena raḡanine, taudi nuedima yai medi kauana.
42004029	Dabudine taudi a midisuḡu da Yesu a soru dobiḡe da a nawena daki debane meagai diane. Dabudine kabe tauna dakie ta kiroḡa pore.
42004030	Be Yesu patara nopodiḡa ya dobi be ya naḡona.
42004031	Dabudine Yesu ya dobi ya naḡona Kapeniam meagaine Galili provins nopone. Be Sabat raḡandie tauna banaga yawai katakataidina.
42004032	Be banaga na waikatakataima a basena, baninama na waikatakataima yai rewapana kauana.
42004033	Be sinagog nopone banaga penama kokukokunama, tauna bonanama dosine ya yogo be ya riuna,
42004034	“Ei! Nasaret Yesumma, tam aba ḡaromaie kwa ḡoeḡoe? Tam kuya verauna kwa kawa gewagewamai, bo? Taugu è kataiena tam aitau. Tam Babaumma Mamaitua ḡaronama.”
42004035	Be Yesu ya riutuaḡaie be ya riuna, “Kwai nuatuḡu be inam baneginama kwa dobi pore!” Dabudine penama banaga ya dobi pore be ya gosena, be nam banaga i kawa gewagewana.
42004036	Banaga matabudi a ḡosoridi be adi banagama mate a giu yabayababa be a riuna, “Uma aba giudima nama? Tauna na rewapanae penama e riuedi be ta dobidobina.”
42004037	Be inam dobunama matabuna Yesu varinama a vaiena.
42004038	Yesu tauna sinagog ya gose be ya naḡona Saemon na vadae. Be inam dabudine Saemon rawanama tauna poyapoya dosinama ya paḡona be taudi Yesu ai baḡa da tauna e saguna.
42004039	Dabudine tauna diane ya midi be poyapoya ya riutuaḡaiena, be poyapoya visara ya gose porena. Be yai raḡantenaḡe da visara ya midisuḡu be taudi adi kanima ya vokaukauena.
42004040	Be ravi ya tavatavana raḡanine, banaga toitoi adi banagama sida tabu be tabu ragaragaudima a verauḡedina Yesu ḡarone, be tauna banaga tenatenaḡaḡa nimane ya taikonidi be yai yawasanidina.
42004041	Be mate penama toitoi ma yogoyogodi banaga a dobi poredi be a riuriuna, “Tam Mamaitua Natunama!” Be Yesu taudi ya riutuaḡaiedina da nam ta giu, baninama taudi a kataiena da tauna Keriso.
42004042	Raḡan ya tomna da Yesu inam dobunama ya gose pore be dobu wainuatuḡune ya naḡona. Be banaga tauna a wanewanena, be a banavina raḡanine, taudi a ḡoeḡoe da tauna nam sibo ya gose poredi.
42004043	Be Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Taugu meagai ḡesaudie mate yà naḡo be Mamaitua na waiguyauma yà rauguguyena. Baninama Mamaitua ya riuporeguna vutuna aubainama.”
42004044	Be tauna Galili be Judia sinagog nopodiḡa ya rarau guguya naḡona.
42005001	Raḡan tenaḡa Yesu tauna Genesaretma yawawa diane ya midimidina. Be banaga tauna a midi ḡuruvi be Mamaitua riunama a vaibeavaiena.
42005002	Be tauna waga rabui ya kitedina gerese a midimidina, be tauwai sagida adi wagama a gosedi da adi sagidama a koḡekoḡedina.
42005003	Yesu Saemon na wagae ya saḡa be yai baḡana da waga sibo ya tauriena topae, yodibe tauna ya mia yovo wagae be banaga yai katakataidina.
42005004	Raḡanine na giuma ya kovikovina, tauna Saemon ya riuena, “Waga kwa dobiḡe topa poune be ami sagidama koi dawe dobiḡedi be iyana ko konedi!”
42005005	Be Saemon ya paribeena, “Bada, tauma kupi daudaunama sagida kè raurubu rereḡa da nam aba ke kona rubuna, be tam am riuma aubainama da yà raurubu munaḡana.”
42005006	Raḡanine a rarau rubu munaḡana, iyana toitoi a konedi be sagida ḡaubonaḡa sibo a nuagigina.
42005007	Be taudi adi banagama waga ḡesaune a raumataḡuiedina da taudi sibo a verau be a sagudina. Naumeki da adi banagama a verau a sagudi da iyana waga rabui ai moḡavudina, be waga ḡaubonaḡa sibo a monuna.
42005008	Be Saemon Pita uma kauinama ya kitakitana tauna tuapikane ya raupari Yesu noḡone be ya riuna, “Bada, kwa gosegu be ḡavoe kwa naḡo, baninama taugu banaga gewagewaguma!”
42005009	Tauna nama ya giuna, baninama tauna na banagama mate a base be a nairana iyana toitoi a vunuḡana aubainama.
42005010	Be nama Saemon na banagama Jeims be Jon, Sebedi natunatunama. Be Yesu Saemon ya riuena, “Nam kwa naira! Yodibe nokoi ya naḡona tam banaga toitoi kwa konedina.”
42005011	Raḡanine barabarae adi wagama a sorusoru tavaitedina, taudi yaba matabuna a goseporedi be Yesu ai muriwatanina.
42005012	Raḡan tenaḡa Yesu tauna meagai tenaḡa nopone ya miamiana be tauḡoma tenaḡa ya verauna tuninama kito ya moḡavuna. Inam tauḡominama Yesu ya kitakitana, tauna Yesu noḡone ya raupari be yai baḡana, “Bada, tam deḡoda kwa ḡoena, naumeki da kwai yawasanigu.”
42005013	Be Yesu ya riuena, “Naumeki, taugu yà ḡoeḡoena, kwa yawasana!” Dabudine Yesu nimanama yai yoyo be ya taukonina. Be yai raḡantenaḡe da sida kito tauḡoma ya gosena.
42005014	Be Yesu inam tauḡominama ya riu vavasaḡena, “Nam aitau kwa riue. Be kwa naḡo da pirisi ḡarone be tauna e kaiviramna. Be murine Mamaitua kwa tipana Mousis na tarawatuma e riuriuna nama. Inam kedane banaga tokare ta kitam be ta kataiena da tam kuya yawasana munaḡana.”
42005015	Be yaḡoro da Yesu varinama ya moraba be ya daberarana. Be banaga toitoi Yesu waibeavaienama be ei yawasanidina aubainama a tavatavana.
42005016	Be Yesu banaga ya gosedi be ya naḡona dobu wainuatoitoine moiragi aubainama.
42005017	Raḡan tenaḡa Yesu yawai katakataina be Parisi be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima taudi mate a mia be awai beavaiena. Inam banegidima meagai matabudi Galili provins be Judia provins nopodiḡa be Jerusalemḡa a verau be awai beavaiena. Be Bada na rewapanama Yesu ḡarone vutuna aubainama tauna sida yawai yawasanidina.
42005018	Naumeki da banaga ḡesaudima tauḡoma tuera paḡopaḡonama ratiratinama a kiroḡa verauḡe da kabe vadae ta saḡe be Yesu noḡone tai kena.
42005019	Be taudi nam teneteneḡina da vadae sibo a saḡa, baninama patara ya moraba kauana. Vutuna aubainama taudi vada debane a saḡa be vada debane gaura a voie da tauḡoma ma ratiratina ai dawe dobiḡena patara poudie Yesu noḡone.
42005020	Raḡanine Yesu adi waisumaḡama ya kitakitana, tauna ya riuna, “Tauḡoma, am gewagewama è noḡota porena.”
42005021	Dabudine Parisi be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima umanama wainua noḡonoḡota ai karena, “Uma aitau baneginama nama ewai diboḡa, wa? Tauna e ḡoeḡoena da Mamaitua gabunama e paḡo, bo? Mamaitua taunaḡa tokare gewagewa e noḡota poredina, be nam aitau ḡesau.”
42005022	Be Yesu taudi adi wainua noḡonoḡotama ya kataiedina aubainama yai taraviredina, “Aba aubainama taumi inam yabedima nuemie kowai nuanoḡonoḡotedi?
42005023	Aba riunama ya tekateka, ‘Am gewagewama è noḡota porena’ bo ‘Kwa midisuḡu be kwa naḡo?’
42005024	Be yodi yài kataimi be ko kita da Banaga Natunama dobue rewapana ḡarone e kenakenana da gewagewa e noḡota poredina.” Naumeki da Yesu tauḡoma tuera paḡopaḡonama ya riuena, “Yà riuriuemna, kwa midisuḡu, am gunima kwa paḡo be kwa naḡona am vadae.”
42005025	Yai raḡantenaḡe tauḡoma noḡodie ya midisuḡu da na gunima ya paḡo be ya naḡona na vadae, Mamaitua isanama ya kaisuḡusuḡuna.
42005026	Dabudi banaga matabudi a base be taudi mate Mamaitua isanama a kaisuḡusuḡuna. Be matabudi a ḡosoridi be a riuna, “Manaka tauda kaua dosinama tè kitana.”
42005027	Uma kauinama murine Yesu ya dobi be ya naḡonaḡo da teks tautaminama isanama Livai ya kitana. Livai tauna na kaba noyae ya miamiana, be Yesu tauna ya riuena, “Kwai muriwatanegu!”
42005028	Naumeki da Livai ya midisuḡu be yaba matabuna ya gosedi be Yesu yai muriwatanena.
42005029	Dabudine Livai na vadae soi dosinama ya voiena Yesu aubaina, be teks tautamidima toitoi be banaga ḡesaudima mate dabudine a kanikanina.
42005030	Vutuna aubainama Parisi be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima taudi Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama a riusinḡaḡayedi be a riuna, “Aba aubainama taumi teks tautamidima be gewagewa banegidima mate ko kanikani be ko tegotego?”
42005031	Dabudine Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Banaga yawayawasanidima taudi nam dogeta tima ḡoeḡoena, be banaga sidesidedima taudi dogeta ta ḡoeḡoena.
42005032	Taugu nam e yovona banaga veredima aubaidi, ibewa da banaga gewegewedima yà riuedi da adi noḡotama ta vitaredina.”
42005033	Be taudi Yesu a riuena, “Jon na tauwai muriwatanama be Parisi adi tauwai muriwatanama matabudi kana raḡanie ta widiwidina be ta moimoiragina, be tam am tauwai muriwatanama taudi ta kanikani be ta tegotego yabayababana.”
42005034	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Naḡivau tauḡominama taumi mate ko miamiana raḡanine, taumi nam ko voie da naḡinaḡi kadi warema ta widina.
42005035	Be raḡan e tavana da naḡivau tauḡominama ḡavoe ta nawena, inam raḡanine taudi ta widinana.”
