42015029	Be tauna tamanama ya riuena, ‘Kwa kita, taugu suara toitoi aubaimma è noya guratana be nam airaḡan, am riuma è rawaḡaiḡaiena. Be taugu nam airaḡan musara ḡaubonama ku ute rubugu da yau banagama mate kei nuaverena,
42015030	be natumma inam am mane be yaba matabuna yai yakaredina toretore waiwaividima ḡarodie. Be yodi ya tavatava munaḡana tam kau natunama momomoninama tauna aubainama kuyai gurina.’
42015031	“Be tamanama ya riuna, ‘Taukui, tam raḡan matabuna taugu mate tà miamiana, be yaba matabuna taugu ḡaroguma, inam tam ḡaromma.
42015032	Be yodi inam ya verena da tauda tà soi be tài nuaverena, baninama tasimma ya guri, be yodi ya yawasana munaḡana. Tauna ya kwakona, be yodi è banava munaḡena.”
42016001	Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina, “Stoa taupakinama ḡarone stoa taurabenama ya miamiana. Be banaga stoa taupakinama a riuena da tauna na stoama taurabenama mane ya danedanenedina.
42016002	Dabudine stoa taupakinama yodi stoa taurabenama ya yokoe be ya riuena, ‘Inam aba giunama ḡarome è vaie? Am noyama kuya voivoiena yà kita. Tam nam airaḡan yau stoama kwa rabe munaḡe.’
42016003	“Be stoa taurabenama taunaḡa ya riu munaḡena, ‘Aba yodi yà voie, bada yau noyama ya kaiporena aubainama? Taugu nam wairewapanigu da noya dosinama yà voiedi, be banaga kiḡiedima taugu è tunimayaḡana.
42016004	Yodi è kataiena aba yà voie da banaga ḡesaudima ta rabeguna yau noyama e kovikovina raḡanine.’
42016005	“Naumeki da stoa taurabenama banaga aitauḡa stoe awai bukinna banegidima ya riuedi da ḡarone a tavana. Be dokadokanama ya riuena, ‘Am bukinma bisa yau badama ḡarone?’
42016006	Be tauna ya paribeena, ‘Oeri duramdima 100.’ Be stoa taurabenama ya riuena, ‘Am bukinma pepanama kwa paḡo, be kwa girumina 50.’
42016007	Be murine ḡesau ya riuena, ‘Tam, am bukinma bisa yau badama ḡarone?’ Be tauna ya riuna, ‘Wit begidima 1 tausand.’ Be stoa taurabenama ya riuena, ‘Am bukinma pepanama kwa paḡo be kwa girumina 800.’
42016008	“Be stoa taupakinama tauna na stoama taurabenama kaikaiyovunama ya basena, baninama stoa taurabenama na nuauyauyae na yawasanama kedanama ya voivoiena aubainama.” Be Yesu ya riuna, “Uma dobunama natunatunama mane mate waitureninama a katai kauena, nam yana natunatunama maika,
42016009	vutuna aubainama yà riuriuemina, banaga ḡesaudima manee gewagewa ta voivoiedina, be taumi ami manee banaga ko sagudi da bada ta banavina. Inam taudi taumi ami banagama, be tokare mane e kovina raḡanine, taumi marae tai aninemina.
42016010	“Deḡoda tam yaba ḡauḡaubodie be vere kwa voiedina, naumeki da tam teneteneḡinama tokare yaba dosidie vere kwa voiedina. Be deḡoda tam yaba ḡauḡaubodie nam vere kwa voiedi, naumeki da tam tokare nam teneteneḡina da yaba dosidie vere kwa voiedi.
42016011	Deḡoda taumi dobu yabedima nam ko rabe kauedi, naumeki da taumi tokare Mamaitua nam ei sumaḡemi be mara yabedima e utemi.
42016012	Be deḡoda taumi banaga ḡesaudima adi purapurama nam ko rabe kauedi, naumeki da taumi tokare Mamaitua nam ei sumaḡemi be purapura e utemi.
42016013	“Nam ai taunoya teneteneḡina da babada rabui ḡarodie ei yaraga. Deḡoda e ḡoena, naumeki da noḡone badanama e tuaḡaie be murine badanama e ḡoena, bo noḡone badanama e ḡoena, murine badanama e tuaḡaiena. Taumi nam mane be Mamaitua ḡarodie koi yaraga tenaḡa!”
42016014	Raḡanine Parisi uma riudima a vaivaiedina, taudi Yesu ai kwatekwatevena, baninama mane nuedima ya paḡona aubainama.
42016015	Be Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Taumi banaga matedie ko voivoia munaḡemina da kabe veremi, be Mamaitua taumi nuemima noponama ya kataiena. Yaba banaga e noḡonoḡotina da kabe yaba dosidi, be inam yabedima Mamaitua matane a gewagewa vavasaḡana.
42016016	“Noḡone taumi Mousis na tarawatuma be peroveta adi girumama ḡaromie a kenakenana. Raḡanine Jon tauwai babataito ya tavatavana, dabudine taudi adi raḡanima ya kovina. Be dabudine vari verenama Mamaitua na waiguyauma riunama yà rarau guguyena. Be banaga matabudi ta rarau rubuna da Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone sibo a saḡana.
42016017	Mara be dobu teneteneḡinama da ta samoana, be Mamaitua na tarawatuma, avedi da ḡauboḡominama be tokare nam e samoa.
42016018	“Aitau na visarama e gose be waivi ḡesaunama e naḡina, tauna na waivima debane mui e poreporena. Be deḡo tauḡominama na waivima e tuaḡaie be e gosena, be wari tauḡoma inam waivinama e naḡina, tauna turanama debane mui e poreporena.”
42016019	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Raḡan tenaḡa purapura baneginama tauna na garama waimatakanikanidima ya kotekotedina maesidima dosidima. Be vada maesadonanama nopone ya miamiana. Be dabudine na purapurama damnama a kenakenana. Be tauna raḡan matabuna yawai nuaverena.
42016020	Be na vadama matakedane taukiḡikiḡi wainuatoitoinama ya kenakenana, tauna isanama Lasares. Be tauna tuninama kerokero ya moḡavuna.
42016021	Be Lasares tauna ya kena be yawai noḡotana da purapura baneginama na kanima kurekuredima sibo ya kanidina. Be daḡadaḡasi a tavana da keronama a remoremodina.
42016022	Naumeki da raḡan tenaḡa Lasares ya guri be anea a kiroḡa nawe da Eibraham diane ya miana. Murine purapura baneginama ya guri be a dobona.
42016023	Be banaga guriguridima aruidima adi gabue tauna ma tunimuyana ya miamiana. Be ei kitasaḡana be madanie Eibraham be diane Lasares ya miamiana ya kitedina.
42016024	“Dabudine ya yokona, ‘Mamai Eibraham, kwa raunuatoiegu be Lasares kwa riupore da upa nimarakurakune ei buta be e yovo da menaguma ei subana, baninama taugu yàwai nuatoitoina uma kai menamenane.’
42016025	“Be Eibraham ya riuna, ‘Natuguma, tam am raḡanie kwa noḡoti! Yaba matabudi vereveredima tam ḡarome, be Lasares tauna yaba matabuna ya marumaruabiedina. Vutuna aubainama yodi Lasares nuanuanama e subasubana, be tam kwawai nuatoitoina.
42016026	Be yaba ḡesaudima mate inam, tam be tauma poude siḡuḡu dosinama e kenakenana. Vutuna aubainama banaga ḡarome veraunama ta ḡoeḡoena be nam teneteneḡina. Be kauinama teneḡinama nama banaga tauma ḡaromaie veraunama ta ḡoeḡoena be nam teneteneḡina.’
42016027	“Naumeki da purapura baneginama ya riuna, ‘Inam naumeki mamai, be yàwai baḡamna da Lasares kwa riupore nawena tamaguma na vadae
42016028	da tasitasiguma 5 nuedima e boru da taudi nam uma tunimuya dosi kaukauinama gabune ta verau, maika taugu.’
42016029	“Be Eibraham ya riuna, ‘Tasitasimma taudi Mousis be peroveta riudima ḡarodie da tai beavaiedina.’
42016030	“Be purapura baneginama ya riuna, ‘Ibewa mamai Eibraham, inam nam teneteneḡina, be deḡoda banaga gurigurinama sibo i midisuḡu munaḡa be i naḡona ḡarodie, inam raḡanine taudi tokare adi noḡotama a vitaredina.’
42016031	“Be Eibraham ya riuna, ‘Deḡoda taudi Mousis be peroveta adi giuma nam tai beavaiedi, naumeki da tokare banaga gurigurinama sibo i midisuḡu munaḡana, taudi yaḡoro nam ai sumaḡe.’”
42017001	Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina: “Raḡan matabuna yaba ḡesaudima banaga ta raurubudi da gewagewa ta voivoiedina. Be taumi aitauḡa ami banagama raurubue ko biridi be gewagewa ta voivoiedina, ko kita kauana.
42017002	Deḡoda tam aitau yau banagama bo yau sedama gewagewae kwa biri nawedina, ya verena da tam gadome sibo yeku dosinama a pani be egasie sibo a pore nawemna. Be nam i verena da Mamaitua tokare kovoḡa dosinama e utem.
42017003	Vutuna aubainama aba ko voivoiena, ko kita kauana. Deḡoda tauwai sumaḡa ḡesau gewagewa e voivoiena, naumeki da kwa riutuaḡaiena. Be deḡoda tauna na noḡotama e vitarena, naumeki da na gewagewama kwa noḡota porena.
42017004	Be deḡoda ḡarome gewagewa 7 ya voiedina raḡan tenaḡa nopone, be e noḡota vitara be raḡan 7 e verau ḡarome be e riuna, ‘Ebom, taugu gewagewa ḡarome è voiedina’, naumeki da na gewagewama kwa noḡota poredina.”
42017005	Be apasol Bada a riuena, “Ama waisumaḡama kwai morebi!”
42017006	Be Bada ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Deḡoda taumi ami waisumaḡama ḡaubonama yauḡana pesinama maika, inam teneteneḡinama da tokare uma kainama mobiri ko riuena, ‘Kwa nuakamoḡa ma waramim be egasie kwa pore nawem!’ Be tauna tokare e voteyeteyemina.
42017007	“Deḡoda tam aitau sibo ḡarome taunoya be tauna ya suasuata bo sipu ya raberabedina. Be raḡanine na noyama yai kovi be ya tavana vadae, tam tokare umanama kuya riu bo ibewa, ‘Yodi kwa mia be kwa kani’?
42017008	Ibewa, tam agunai tokare umanama kuya riuna, ‘Taunoya, yau kanima kwa raubuka’, be muriḡa sibo kuya riuna, ‘Yau kanima kwa vokaukaue be yà kanina. Be raḡanine taugu yà kani be yà tego rovona, murine tam kwa mia da kwa kani be kwa tegona.’
42017009	Inam raḡanine bada bonanama na taunoyama ya voteyeteyena aubainama, tokare ei kaiwe bo ibewa? Ibewa!
42017010	Inam nama taumi, raḡanine yaba matabuna Mamaitua e riuriuemi be ko voivoiedina, naumeki da taumi umanama ko riuna, ‘Tauma taunoya yababa. Naumeki da ama noyama kè voiena.’”
42017011	Yesu ya nanaḡona Jerusalemma maika, tauna Samaria be Galili provins poudiḡa ya naḡonaḡona.
42017012	Be raḡanine meagaie ya tavatavana, dabudi tautauḡoma kito ragaragaudima matabudi 10 Yesu ḡarone a tavana da ḡavoe a midi be bonedima dosine a yokona,
42017013	“Yesu, Bada, kwa raunuatoiemai!”
42017014	Yesu ya kitedi be ya riuedina, “Ko naḡo pirisi ḡarodie be koi kataiemina!” Naumeki da taudi pirisi ḡarodie a naḡonaḡona maika, taudi kedae a vere munaḡana.
42017015	Dabudine tauḡoma tenaḡa ya kita munaḡe da tauna ya yawasanana, naumeki da ya munaḡa be bonanama dosine Mamaitua isanama ya kaisuḡusuḡuna.
42017016	Be inam tauḡominama Yesu kaḡapakane noḡone ya beku da ya raudunee be yai kaiwena. Be inam tauḡominama, tauna Samaria baneginama.
42017017	Be dabudine Yesu ya riuna, “Banaga matabudi 10 a yawasanana, be banaga ḡesaudima 9 deḡo?
42017018	Aba aubainama uma madani baneginama taunaḡa Mamaitua waikaiwenama ya tava, be ḡesaudima ibewa?”
42017019	Be Yesu inam tauḡominama ya riuena, “Kwa midisuḡu be kwa naḡo, am waisumaḡama yai yawasanimna.”
42017020	Be Parisi Yesu ai taravirena, “Airaḡan Mamaitua na waiguyauma e verau?” Be Yesu umanama ya paribeedina, “Mamaitua na waiguyauma nam aiyaba maika e verau be tokare ko kita,
42017021	be nam aitau e riuna, ‘Ko kita, umanema’ bo ‘Ko kita noanema.’ Baninama Mamaitua na waiguyauma inam nopomie.”
42017022	Dabudine na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina, “Raḡan e veraverauna e tavana raḡanine, taumi koya ḡoeḡoe guratena da Banaga Natunama na raḡanima sibo koya kitana, be tokare nam ko kita.
42017023	Inam raḡandie banaga tokare ta riuemina, ‘Ko kita, Keriso umanema!’ bo ‘Ko kita, Keriso noanema!’ Be nam ko naḡo bo koi muriwatanedi!
42017024	Banaga Natunama na raḡanima ei raḡantenaḡe be keama maika e kidi be gunuma matabuna e yana porena.
42017025	Be noḡone tauna ei nuatoitoi guratana be uma kimtinama banegidima tauna ta tuaḡaiena.
42017026	“Banaga Natunama na raḡanima inam Noa na raḡanie maika:
42017027	Banaga a kanikani, a tegotego, awai naḡi be awai naḡidina. Nama a voivoia be Noa waga ak nopone ya saḡana, be kabaita ya tubuḡa da banaga matabudi yai guridina.
42017028	“Bo Banaga Natunama na raḡanima inam Lot na raḡanie maika: Banaga a kanikani, a tegotego, a gimagimara, awai kawa gimagimara, a kumakuma be a vadavada kerina.
42017029	Inam raḡanine Lot Sodom ya gosena, be kai menanama be yeku monamonaunidima isedima salfa marae a kuruva dobi be banaga matabudi ai guri rovodina.
42017030	Inam kauidima teneḡidima nama banaga tokare ta voivoiedi be Banaga Natunama e maḡatarana.
42017031	Inam raḡanine aitau da vada debane kuya miamia be am purapurama vada nopone, nam kwa naḡo be kwa ragau. Be aitau da sipie, nam vadae yaba kuya gosagosaḡana kwa noḡotidi!
42017032	Lot na visarama ḡarone aba ya tubuḡana ko noḡoti!
42017033	Aitau na yawasanama dobue e raberabena, tokare na yawasanama ḡarogue e kawa gewagewana. Be aitau na yawasanama ewai utaena, naumeki da yawasana ḡarogue ya banavina.
42017034	Yà riuriuemina, inam kupine gunie banaga rabui ta kenakena be tenaḡa tokare ta nawena, be ḡesau e kena kwasana.
42017035	Banaga rabui ta rarau riti be tenaḡa e kaiporena be ḡesau e mia kwasana.”
42017037	Be na tauwai muriwatanama ai taravirena, “Bada, uma kauidima deḡo dabudi ta tubuḡa?” Be tauna ya riuedina, “Deḡo musara gurinama e kenakenana, dabudine naboduba ta rawateḡeidina.”
42018001	Naumeki be Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama wainasi ya riuedi be yai katakataidi da taudi raḡan matabuna sibo a moimoiragina, be nam a tunituaḡai.
42018002	Tauna uma wainasinama ya riuedina, “Meagai tenaḡa nopone tauwai tarapiri ya miamiana. Tauna Mamaitua nam i nainaire be banaga nam i viviviviredina.
42018003	Be inam meagaine kaiyababa mate ya miamiana. Tauna tauwai tarapiri ḡarone ya verau be yawai baḡana, ‘Kwa kaisagugu, baninama tauwai wavuguma raḡan matabuna ewai ḡavieguna.’
42018004	Be kaiyababa raḡan bisanama tauwai tarapiri yai baḡana be nam i sagu rubuna. Be raḡan tenaḡa tauwai tarapiri tauname ya riu munaḡena, ‘Avedi taugu Mamaitua nam ama nainairena bo banaga nam ama viviviviredina,
42018005	be uma kaiyababinama e riuriu ḡasakirieguna, vutuna aubainama naumeki da yà kaisaguna, muriḡa be waiveraverau e kawa nuaḡaroguna.’”
42018006	Be Bada ya riuna, “Tauwai tarapiri gewagewanama nema ya riu bakona, taumi koya vaie?
42018007	Taumi ko noḡonoḡotina Mamaitua na vinevinema banegidima kupi da suara sagu ta ḡabeḡabena, nam adi nuaboyae e sagudi, bo? Bo tokare nuatauḡa e sagudi, bo?
42018008	Ibewa! Tauna waiḡapa adi nuaboyae e sagudina. Be raḡanine Banaga Natunama e tava munaḡana dobue, tauna tokare banaga waisumeḡidima e banavidi bo ibewa?”
42018009	Banaga aitauḡa ta noḡonoḡotina da taudi kabe banaga veredi, be banaga ḡesaudima ta kitakita tuaḡaiedina. Vutuna aubainama Yesu uma wainasinama inam banegidima ya riuedina:
42018010	“Raḡan tenaḡa banaga rabui a saḡa a naḡona tempol nopone moiragi aubainama, tenaḡa Parisi be ḡesau teks tautaminama.
42018011	Be Parisi taunaḡa ya miditeḡa be tauname aubainama ya moiragi be ya riuna, ‘O Mamaitua, yàwai kaiwemna da taugu nam ama noḡonoḡota munaḡegu be ama danedanenena, be taugu yau visarama debane nam mui ama poreporena, banaga ḡesaudima maika. Yàwai kaiwemna da taugu nam noa baneginama teks tautaminama maika.
42018012	Taugu wiki tenaḡa nopone raḡan rabui yà widiwidinana be yau purapurama yà rawadamdamdi da matabudi 10 be tenaḡa tam yà uteutemna.’
42018013	“Be teks tautaminama tauna noa madanie ya midimidina nam ḡaubonaḡa noḡonama i tausuḡuna marae. Tauna nimane nuakadanama ya rauriḡa be ya riuna, ‘O Mamaitua, kwa raunuatoiegu, taugu gewagewa banegiguma.’
42018014	Taugu yà riuriuemina, Mamaitua teks tautaminama ya kawa didimani be ya naḡona na vadae, be Parisi ibewa. Baninama banaga aitau tauname e kawakawa saḡe munaḡena, tokare Mamaitua tauna e boru dobiḡena. Be banaga aitau tauname e boruboru dobiḡa munaḡena, tokare Mamaitua tauna e kawa saḡena.”
42018015	Banaga ḡesaudima Yesu ḡarone adi sedama a veraverauḡedina da sibo yai aiainidina. Be na tauwai muriwatanama nama a kitekitedina, taudi a riutuaḡaiedina.
42018016	Be Yesu seda ya riuedi da ḡarone be ya riuna, “Seda ko gosedi da ḡarogue ta verauna, be nam koi ḡakedi, baninama Mamaitua na waiguyauma inam banaga maika umanama sededima aubaidima.
42018017	Uma ko noḡoti, aitau da nam Mamaitua na waiguyauma e paḡo gomana ḡaubonama maika, naumeki da tauna inam waiguyaunama nopone nam e saḡa.”
42018018	Jius adi badama tenaḡa Yesu yai taravirena, “Tauwai katakatai veremma, aba yà voie da yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama yà paḡo?”
42018019	Be Yesu ya riuena, “Aba aubainama kwawai isaguna vere? Nam aitau verena be Mamaitua taunaḡa.
42018020	Tam riuvavasaḡa kuya kataiedi bo ibewa? Nam monaḡemma debane mui kwa pore, nam kwa vunuḡa, nam kwa danene, nam kwa kaiyovu, tamam be tinamma kwa viviredi!”
42018021	Be tauḡoma ya paribee be ya riuna, “Raḡanine taugu vaugue da yodi uma riudima matabudi è vovo teyeteyedina.”
42018022	Be Yesu nama riunama ya vaivaiena, tauna ya riuna, “Yaḡoro yaba tenaḡa tam kwa gosegosena. Tam yaba matabudi ḡarome kwa gimaredi be mane banaga waikaruwaḡewaḡedima kwa utedina, be tam marae kwai purapurana. Yodibe tam taugu kwai muriwataneguna!”
42018023	Be raḡanine tauḡoma uma riunama ya vaivaiena, tauna yai nuaboya kauana, baninama tauna yai purapura kauana aubainama.
42018024	Yesu inam tauḡominama ya kita be ya riuna, “Purapura banegidima taudi Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone saḡanama ḡarodie ya piripiri kauana.
42018025	Kamel ya bagibagi kauana da seyau gavogavone e sonaḡana, be nama purapura baneginama tauna Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone saḡanama ya bagibagi da bagibagi kauana.”
42018026	Be banaga aitauḡa nama a vaivaiena ai taravirana, “Tauma kè noḡoti da purapura banegidima kabe ta naḡona marae. Be yodi deḡoda purapura banegidima nam ta yawasana, naumeki da nam aitau tokare e yawasana, bo?”
42018027	Be Yesu ya paribeedina, “Aiyaba banaga ḡarodie nam teneteneḡina, Mamaitua ḡarone inam teneteneḡinama.”
42018028	Dabudine Pita ya riuna, “Aiyo! Tauma yaba matabudi kè gosedina tam waimuriwatanemma aubainama.”
42018029	Dabudine Yesu ya riuedina, “Yà riuriu kauemina, aitau da na meagaima bo na dosima bo tuatuaḡanama bo na visarama bo na sedama ya gosedina Mamaitua na waiguyauma aubainama,
42018030	naumeki da tauna yawasana veredima toitoi yodi raḡandie e banavidina. Be mate tokare yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama e veraverauna e paḡona.”
42018031	Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama 12 yai doka nawedi ḡavoe be ya riuedina, “Tauda tà saḡa tà naḡonaḡona Jerusalemma be dabudine yaba matabudi Banaga Natunama ḡarone ta tubuḡana, nema boni peroveta a girugirumina nama:
42018032	Jius taudi Banaga Natunama eteni banegidima nimedie ta boruna. Be taudi tai varevare, ta ḡasie, ta kaviso
42018033	be dabudine ta kwapu be tai gurina. Be raḡan wairabuiteḡane tauna e midisuḡu munaḡana.”
42018034	Be tauwai muriwatana uma yabedima Yesu ya giugiuedina banidima taudi nam ti kataiedina. Be uma riudima semosemodima, vutuna aubainama taudi nam ti kataiedina.
42018035	Raḡanine Yesu Jeriko meagainama diane ya tavatavana, dabudine tauḡoma matapotapotanama keda diane ya mia be mane ya kiḡikiḡiena.
42018036	Be raḡanine e vaiena be banaga patara dianaḡa a naḡonaḡona, naumeki da tauna yai taravirana, “Aba e tubutubuḡa?”
42018037	Taudi a riuena, “Yesu Nasaretma ya verau be e naḡonaḡona.”
42018038	Dabudine tauna ya yoko be ya riuna, “Yesu, Deivid natunama, kwa raunuatoiegu!”
42018039	Be aitauḡa a dokadokana a riutuaḡaie be a riuna, “Kwai nuatuḡu!” Be tauna ya rasa guratana, “Yesu, Deivid natunama, kwa raunuatoiegu!”
42018040	Dabudine Yesu ya midi kwasa be banaga ya riuedi da tauḡoma matapotapotanama sibo a verauḡena ḡarone. Be raḡanine tauḡoma maida ya tavatavana, Yesu tauna yai taravirena,
42018041	“Aba kwa ḡoeḡoena yà voie aubaimma?” Be tauna ya riuna, “Bada, taugu yà ḡoeḡoena sibo èi kitana.”
42018042	Be Yesu ya riuena, “Kwai kita! Am waisumaḡama yai yawasanimna.”
42018043	Be yai raḡantenaḡe da tauḡoma matanama yai kitana. Dabudine tauna Yesu yai muriwatane be Mamaitua isanama ya kaisuḡuna. Inam raḡanine banaga matabudi nama a kitakitana, taudi mate Mamaitua isanama a kaisuḡusuḡuna.
42019001	Be Yesu Jerikoma ya tava be ya naḡonaḡona.
42019002	Be dabudi banaga tenaḡa isanama Sakias, tauna teks tautaminama banegidima adi badama, be tauna purapura baneginama.
42019003	Tauna ya ḡoeḡoena Yesu sibo ya kitana, tauna nema maika kitana, be nam Yesu i kitana, baninama tauna banaga tuponama be patara ya moraba kauana aubainama.
42019004	Vutuna aubainama tauna ya manini doka be kai damaya ya saḡaina Yesu kitanama aubainama, baninama Yesu inam kedanaḡa ya veraverauna aubainama.
42019005	Raḡanine Yesu deḡo Sakias ya miamiae dabudi ya tavatavana, tauna ya midi kwasa da ya kitasaḡe be ya riuna, “Sakias, kwa yovo makai! Taugu manaka tam am vadae yà miana.”
42019006	Naumeki da Sakias ya dobi makai be ma nuavereverena Yesu yai kaiwena.
42019007	Banaga matabudi umanama kauinama a kitakitana raḡanine, taudi a momodu be a riuna, “Uma baneginama yodi gewagewa baneginama ḡarone e miana.”
42019008	Dabudine Sakias ya midisuḡu be Bada ya riuena, “Bada, yau purapurama nevedima banaga waikaruwaḡewaḡedima ya utedina. Be deḡoda aitau ḡarone kaiyovue yaba tenaḡa è paḡopaḡona, naumeki da debane rabui be rabui yà taipoto be yà ute munaḡena.”
42019009	Naumeki da Yesu tauna ya riuena, “Manaka kuvesa uma vadane ya saḡana, baninama Sakias tauna yodi ewai maḡatara munaḡena da tauna Eibraham natunama.
42019010	Banaga Natunama ya verauna, baninama tauna banaga kwakokwakodima e wanedi be ei yawasanidina.”
42019011	Dabudine banaga awai beavaia be awai noḡotana da Mamaitua na waiguyauma kabe vutuna i tavatava, baninama Yesu kaiteka Jerusalem diane ya tavana aubainama. Vutuna aubainama Yesu wainasi ḡesaunama ya riuedina adi noḡotama kawa didimaninama aubainama.
42019012	Naumeki da Yesu ya riuna, “Guyau tenaḡa natunama ya naḡo wari dobue be waiguyau ya paḡona, yodibe ya munaḡana.
42019013	Vutuna aubainama guyau na taunoyama matabudi 10 ya riuedi be mane isanama Mina matabudi 10 ya utedi be ya riuedina, ‘Mane ko noyedi da ta toina, muriḡa da yà tava munaḡana.’
42019014	Be na dobuma banegidima tauna a tuaḡaie be riu murine a riupore be Sisa a riuena, ‘Tauma inam baneginama nam kama ḡoeḡoena ḡaromaie ei bada.’
42019015	“Be tauna yaḡoro na waibadama ya paḡo be ya munaḡana na dobue. Dabudine na taunoyama aitauḡa mane ya uteutedina ya riuedi da ḡarone a tavana, baninama tauna ya ḡoeḡoena da sibo ya kataiena, da tenaḡaḡa mane bisa a voiedi.
42019016	Naumeki da taunoya dokadokanama ya tava be ya riuna, ‘Bada, mane kuya uteuteguna anitai potonama mate debane matabudi 10.’
42019017	Be na Badama ya paribeena, ‘Ya vere kauana, tam taunoya veremma. Baninama tam mane ḡaubonama be kuya noya kauena, vutuna aubainama rewapana yà uteutemna da tam meagai 10 kwai badedina.’
42019018	“Naumeki da taunoya wairabuinama ya verau be ya riuna, ‘Bada, mane kuya uteuteguna anitai potonama mate debane matabudi 5.’
42019019	Be na badama ya paribeena, ‘Tam yodi rewapana yà uteutemna da meagai 5 kwai badedina.’
42019020	“Naumeki da taunoya ḡesau ya verau be ya riuna, ‘Bada, am manema garae è suma be è semosemona umanema,
42019021	baninama tam banaga ḡasiḡasimma aubainama è nairemna. Yaba nam tam ḡarom be kwa ragaragaudina, tam nam kusipina be kwa ragaragaudina.’
42019022	“Bada na taunoyama ya riuena, ‘Tam taunoya gewagewamma, tam aba kuya riuriueguna, nama tam yà etaremna. Tam kwa noḡonoḡotina da taugu kabe banaga gewagewagu be yaba taugu nam ḡarogu be yà ragaragaudina, be taugu nam e sipina be yà ragaragaudina.
42019023	Be aba aubainama yau manema nam banike ku boru? Taugu yodi è tava munaḡana, yau manema anitai potonama mate sibo è paḡona.’
42019024	“Dabudine tauna banaga aitauḡa diane a midimidina ya riuedina, ‘Inam taunoyanama gewagewanama ḡarone mane ko paḡo be ko naḡo da taunoya aitau ḡarone mane 10, tauna ko utena!’
42019025	Be banaga Bada a riuena, ‘Bada, tauna kaite mane 10 ya ragaudina!’
42019026	“Be tauna ya paribeedina, ‘Yà riuriuemina, aitau yaba ḡarone e taipotona, naumeki tauna yaba ḡesaudima mate yà utena, be aitau da ḡarone yaba nam i taipotona, naumeki da tauna avedi da ḡaubonama ḡarone, be taugu yaḡoro yà kaiporedina.
42019027	Be yodi aitauḡa yau ḡaviama nam ti ḡoeḡoena da taugu sibo ḡarodie èi bada, ko verauḡedi uma dabudi be noḡogue koi guridina!’”
42019028	Be Yesu nama ya giugiuna murine, tauna ya doka ḡome be ya saḡa ya naḡona Jerusalemma.
42019029	Tauna oya Olip, diane meagai Betpage be Betanima ya tavatavana, dabudine na tauwai muriwatanama rabui ya riuporedi
42019030	be ya riuna, “Ko naḡo noḡomie meagaine. Be raḡanine meagaie ko saḡasaḡa, dabudi ko kitana donki natunama a nigorina. Inam donkinama natunama nam aitau i geru rubuena, vutuna ko kuvesi be ko verauḡena!
42019031	Be deḡoda aitau ei taraviremina, ‘Aba aubainama ko kuvekuvesi?’, naumeki da ko riuena, ‘Bada e ḡoeḡoena.’”
42019032	Naumeki da taudi a naḡo be aba Yesu ya riuriuedina, nama a banavidina.
42019033	Raḡanine taudi donki natunama a kuvekuvesina, taupaka ya riuedina, “Aba aubainama ko kuvekuvesi?”
42019034	Be taudi a riuna, “Bada e ḡoeḡoena.”
42019035	Taudi ai doka nawe Yesu ḡarone be adi garama donki debane a yesidi be Yesu a boru tavaitena donki debane.
42019036	Be raḡanine tauna kedaḡa ya naḡonaḡona, banaga adi garama kedaḡa a yesidina.
42019037	Raḡanine tauna oya Olip isune ya tavatavana, na tauwai muriwatanama matabudi bonedima dosine Mamaitua isanama kaisuḡusuḡunama ai karena, baninama mataira matabudi a kitekitedina aubainama.
42019038	Be taudi a riuna, “Guyau isanama tà kaisuḡu, tauna Bada isane e veraverauna!”
42019039	Dabudine Parisi ḡesaudima patara nopone Yesu a riuena, “Tauwai katakatai, am tauwai muriwatanama kwa riutuaḡaiedi!”
42019040	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Yà riuriuemina, deḡoda taudi tai nuatuḡuna, naumeki da yeku tokare ta yogona.”
42019041	Be raḡanine Jerusalem diane ya tava be meagainama ya kitakitana, Yesu ya ḡabana Jerusalem aubainama
42019042	be ya riuna, “Taumi manaka sibo suba koya paḡona, be yodi ya semona aubainama, taumi nam ko kita.
42019043	Tokare raḡan e tavana da ami ḡaviama ta verau be ta babavivirimi be ta vaḡuruvimina.
42019044	Be taudi tokare taumi be ami sedama mate tai miagudemina. Be ami ḡaviama tokare nam aiyaba ta taugose. Uma yabedima ḡaromie ta voiedina, baninama taumi Mamaitua na kaba verauma mayanama nam ko paḡona.”
42019045	Dabudine Yesu ya naḡona tempol nopone be banaga a kunekunena ya tavu dobiḡedi
42019046	be ya riuedina, “Girugiruminama porane umanama ya riuna, ‘Taugu yau vadama inam moiragi kana vadama’ be taumi ko voivoiena da kabe anidanene gabuna.
42019047	Be raḡan matabuna tauna tempol nopone yawai katakataina. Be pirisi adi babadama be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima be babada ḡesaudima mate a rawateḡeidi be a rarau rubuna da sibo Yesu ai gurina.
42019048	Be taudi nam deḡo aniwai gurinama kedanama ti banavina da sibo ai guri, baninama banaga matabudi tauna na giuma nuedima ya paḡo be yaḡoro awai beavaiena.
42020001	Raḡan tenaḡa Yesu tempol nopone banaga yawai katakataidi be vari verenama ya rarau guguyena, be pirisi adi babadama be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima be babada ḡesaudima mate a rawateḡeidi be a saḡana Yesu ḡarone,
42020002	be a riuena, “Kwa riuemai, tam aba waibadana be uma yabedima kwa voivoiedi, bo aitau uma waibadanama ya utem?”
42020003	Yesu ya paribeedina, “Be taugu mate taumi yai taraviremina, ko riuegu,
42020004	Jon na waibadama aitau ya ute be yawai babataito, Mamaitua bo banaga?”
42020005	Dabudine taudiḡa ai saḡasaḡa be a riuna, “Deḡoda tà riuna, ‘Mamaitua ḡarone’, tauna tokare ei taraviredana, Be aba aubainama nam Jon koi sumaḡe?
42020006	Be deḡoda tà riuna, ‘Banage’, tokare banaga matabudi yekue ta kati gabadana, baninama banaga matabudi ta noḡonoḡotina da Jon tauna Mamaitua na perovetama.”
42020007	Vutuna aubainama taudi a riuna, “Tauma nam ke kataiena Jon waibada aikedae ya paḡo.”
42020008	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Naumeki, taugu mate nam yà riuemi da taugu aba waibadane uma yabedima yà voivoiedi.”
42020009	Yesu banaga uma wainasinama ya riuedina, “Raḡan tenaḡa banaga sipi ya voie be gureipi ya kumedina. Be banaga ḡesaudima ḡarodie sipi ya gosepore da taudi a rabena, be tauna ya naḡona wari kedae be ya mia guratana.
42020010	Be gureipi taminama na raḡanie, tauna na taunoyama tenaḡa ya riuporena sipi taurabenama ḡarodie da na badama na dariḡama sibo ya paḡona. Be sipi taurabenama taunoya a riḡa be nimakavakavanama a riupore munaḡena.
42020011	Dabudine bada na taunoyama ḡesau ya riuporena, be sipi taurabenama inam taunoyanama mate a riḡa be yaba ḡesaudima mate a voie da tauna a kawa tunimayaḡi be nimakavakavanama a riupore munaḡena.
42020012	Naumeki be bada na taunoyama wairabuiteḡanama ya riuporena. Be tauna mate a vunuḡi da ai kero be a rubu dobiḡena.
42020013	“Dabudine gureipi sipinama taupakinama ya riuna, ‘Yodi aba yà voie? Agunai natuguma tauḡominama, nuaguma e paḡopaḡo kauena, tauna yà riupore be taudi ta kita be dabudine ta vivirena.’
42020014	Be raḡanine sipi taurabedima tauna a kitakitana, ai giu vivivirana, ‘Tauna tokare tamanama na buderima e paḡona, aubainama tà vunuḡi be tauda tài buderiena.’
42020015	Naumeki da tauna sipie be a pore dobiḡe be ai gurina. “Be yodi taumi aba ko noḡonoḡoti, sipi taupakinama aba e voie sipi taurabedima ḡarodie?
42020016	Tauna tokare e yovo be sipi taurabedima ei guridi be gureipi sipinama waria e utedina.” Be raḡanine banaga Yesu nama ya riuriuna a vaivaiena, taudi a riuna, “Uma riunama tokare nam e tubuḡa!”
42020017	Be Yesu ya kitadididi be yai taraviredina, “Deḡoda taugu ama kaikaiyovu, naumeki girugiruminama poranama nopone riu uma ya girugirumina, baninama aba, ‘Vada taukerinama taudi yekue vada a kerikerina, be yeku tenaḡa a pore kaiyatina, baninama taudi ai noḡotana kabe inam yeku gewagewana. Be Mamaitua inam yekunama porepore kaiyatinama ya paḡo be ya voie da na vadama yasinama ya tubuḡana.’
42020018	Be banaga matabudi ta beku be uma yekunama debane ta ravusedina, taudi tokare tai mia gorugorudina. Be yekunama banaga aitau debedie e ravusena, taudi tokare ei mia mutumutudina.”
42020019	Dabudine pirisi adi babadama be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima a ḡoeḡoena waiḡapa sibo Yesu a vunuḡina, baninama mayedima a paḡo da tauna taudi yawai nasiedina. Be taudi banaga a nairedina.
42020020	Be taudi Yesu a kitakita watanina, be taukita wataninama banegidima a riuporaḡana. Taudi a voivoiana da maika kabe banaga veredi be a raurubuna da sibo Yesu a kaiyovue da aba sibo ya vato waigewana, yodibe babada dosidima ḡarodie a nawena etarenama aubainama.
42020021	Dabudine taukita wataninama Yesu ai taravirena, “Tauwai katakatai, tauma kè kataiena da tam raḡan matabuna kwa giugiu be kwawai katakataina matabuna riukaua. Be tam banaga nam kuma nainairedi, be Mamaitua na kauama matabuna kwa giugiuena inam riukaua.
42020022	Kwa riuemai, inam naumeki bo ibewa da tauma Sisa ḡarone kai teks?”
42020023	Be Yesu ya kataiena da taudi a ḡoeḡoena da sibo a kaiyovuena, be Yesu ya riuedina,
42020024	“Sirin koi kataigu! Aitau noḡona be isanama sirin bogane ta kenakena?” Be taudi a paribeena, “Sisa noḡonama be isanama ta kenakenana.”
42020025	Dabudine Yesu ya riuedina, “Naumeki da Sisa ḡaronama Sisa ko utena, be Mamaitua ḡaronama Mamaitua ko utena!”
42020026	Inam raḡanine taudi nam teneteneḡina da Yesu sibo a kaiyovue be aba ya vato waigewa. Be taudi dabudine na giuma a base be ai nuatuḡutuḡuna.
42020027	Jius nopodie dam ḡaubonama isanama Sadisi. Taudi a riuriuna da banaga e guri be nam tokare e midisuḡu munaḡa. Taudi a verau Yesu ḡarone be ai taravirena,
42020028	“Tauwai katakatai, Mousis ya giruma be ya riuna, deḡoda tauḡoma ya guri be na visarama e goseporena nam waisedasedana, naumeki da tasinama tuaḡanama kaiyababinama sibo ya naḡi be seda yai tubuḡana tuaḡanama aubainama.
42020029	Deḡoda tautauḡoma 7 dam tenaḡa nopone be dokadokanama waivi ya naḡi da nam ti natuna be tauḡoma ya gurina,
42020030	naumeki da tauḡoma wairabuinama
42020031	inam kaiyababinama ya naḡina. Be namaḡa da tauḡoma aniwai 7-nama ḡarone ya dobina. Be yaḡoro nam ti natunana.
42020032	Muriḡa waivinama mate ya gurina.
42020033	Yodi nemanama? Midisuḡu munaḡa na raḡanie uma waivinama tautauḡoma 7 a naḡinaḡina, tokare aitau na waivi?”
42020034	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Banaga uma raḡandie ta miamiana, naumeki taudi tawai naḡina.
42020035	Be Mamaitua na banagama gurie ta midisuḡu munaḡana raḡanine, taudi Mamaitua na dobuma ḡesaune ta mia nonoḡana, be inam raḡanine taudi nam tai naḡi.
42020036	Be nam ta guri munaḡa, ibewa, be taudi ta miana maika anea. Taudi Mamaitua na sedama, baninama taudi gurie be a midisuḡu munaḡana aubainama.
42020037	“Be taumi Mousis na gututuma gedara kodekoderinama ko noḡoti. Inam dabudine Mousis mate yai kataidana da banaga gurie be ta midisuḡu munaḡana, baninama Mamaitua umanama Mousis ya riuena, ‘Taugu Eibraham, Aisik be Jeikob adi Mamaituama.’
42020038	Dabudine tà kataie da Mamaitua nam banaga guriguridima adi Mamaitua, ibewa da tauna banaga yawayawasanidima adi Mamaituama. Baninama taune yaba matabudi ta yawayawasanana.”
42020039	Dabudi tarawatu tauwai katakataidima ḡesaudima Yesu a riunena, “Tauwai katakatai, tam kuya giu kauana.”
42020040	Inam raḡanine nam aitau teneteneḡina da sibo ai taravira munaḡe, matabudi a nairana.
42020041	Be yodi Yesu yai taraviredina, “Nemanama da tarawatu tauwai katakataidima ta riuriuna da Keriso tauna kabe guyau Deivid natuna?
42020042	Be buka Salamo nopone Deivid tauna ya riuna, ‘Bada yau Badama ya riuena, Kasaugue kwa mia.
42020043	Be taugu am ḡaviama yà vaḡaḡaridi be kaḡamma dibune yà biridina maika guni.’
42020044	Be yodi tà kita da Deivid Keriso ya riuena ‘Yau Badama’, be yodi nemanama da Keriso Deivid natuna?”
42020045	Dabudine banaga matabudi awai beavaia be Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina,
42020046	“Koi kita kauana tarawatu tauwai katakataidima ḡarodie. Taudi gara veredima ta kotedi be ta rarau guyaguyau naḡona, be adi ḡoanama banaga debae taudi tai kaiwedina, be sinagog nopodie bo soi nopodie taudi gabu verediḡa ragaudima ta ḡoeḡoedina.
42020047	Be taudi kaiyababa waikaruwaḡewaḡedima adi vadama ta danedanenedi be moiragi daudaudima kaikaiyovudima ta voivoiedina da banaga kabe ta kitedi be ta basedi. Inam nama banegidima taudi tokare kovoḡa dosinama ta banavina.”
42021001	Be Yesu yawai kita be mane banegidima ya kitekitedina tempol nopone mane a boruboruna.
42021002	Be tauna kaiyababa waikaruwaḡawaḡanama mate ya kitana, penipeni dubedima rabui ya biridina.
42021003	Dabudine Yesu ya riuna, “Yà riuriuemina da uma kaiyababinama waikaruwaḡawaḡanama tauna na puyoma ya moraba kauana, nam maika banaga ḡesaudima nama.
42021004	Baninama taudi ḡesaudima mane ai maurena, be tautaugosedima a raupuyoedina. Be kaiyababa tauna na manema ḡaubonama sibo na kanima ya gimarana, be matabuna ya raupuyoena.”
42021005	Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ḡesaudima a riuna da tempol kitanama ya vere vavasaḡana, baninama banaga tempol yeku waimatakanikanidie ai siana, be puyo veredima mate a raupuyoedina Mamaitua ḡarone. Be Yesu ya riuna,
42021006	“Yodi uma yabedima matabudi ko kitekitedina, be raḡan e tavana uma yabedima matabudi tai kavena. Nam ai yeku tenaḡa tokare na gabue e kena.”
42021007	Be taudi ai taravirena, “Tauwai katakatai, airaḡan uma kauidima ta tubuḡa be aba matairidima ka kitedi be ka kataie?”
42021008	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Ko kita kaua da nam aitau ei kedadoka waigewemi, baninama banaga toitoi tokare isague ta tava be ta riuna, ‘Taugu vutuna Keriso, be raḡan damonama ya tavana.’ Be nam koi muriwatanedi!
42021009	Be raḡanine ḡavia bo iḡara riudima ko vaiedina, nam ko naira! Inam yabedima matabudi ta tubuḡa dokana, be raḡan damonama tokare nam e tava makai.”
42021010	Be na giuma ya kaiwatani be ya riuna, “Tokare dobu turanama dobu mate, be waiguyau turanama waiguyau mate tai kawa ḡasiḡasina.
42021011	Be dobu ḡesaudie yoyo dosidima ta tubuḡana, be meiḡara be guriguri raḡandima ta tavana. Be yaba wainua nainairidima be mataira dosidima gunume ta tubuḡana.
42021012	“Muriḡa da uma kauidima ta tubuḡana noḡone, banaga taumi ta vunuḡimi be ta raukivi gewegewemina. Be etare ta biri nawemina, sinagog banegidima be guyaguyau be babada dosidima noḡodie, da taumiḡa ko gudutaraḡa munaḡemina. Be dabudine taumi dibure ta biri nawemina, baninama taumi taugu kowai sumaḡeguna aubainama.
42021013	Inam kauidima ta tubutubuḡana raḡanine, taumi taugu aubaiguma koi matamatana.
42021014	Be taumi nema sibo koya giu bakona, nam yodi koi nuaboye.
42021015	Baninama taugu tokare giu be nuauyauya yà utemi da ami ḡaviama nam teneteneḡina da ami giuma ta riḡa bo ta mediemi.
42021016	Taumi ami dosiḡomama, tuatuaḡemima, ami damma be ami banagama taudi tokare ta biri dobiḡemina. Be ḡesaumima tokare taudi tai gurimina.
42021017	Be banaga matabudi ta tuaḡaiemina, baninama taumi taugu kowai sumaḡeguna aubainama.
42021018	Be taumi deba vuvuḡimima nam tenaḡa tokare e beku waiyakare, vutuna aubainama nam koi nuaboya.
42021019	Ko midi bagibaginaḡa da aruimima koi yawasanina.
42021020	“Taumi ko kitakita be iḡara banegidima Jerusalem ta midi kwa vivirona, inam raḡanine ko kataie da ḡaubonaḡa Jerusalem ta kawa gewagewana.
42021021	Dabudine aitauḡa Judiama, taudi sibo a naḡona oyae. Be aitauḡa Jerusalem nopone, taudi sibo a dobi a naḡona. Be aitauḡa Jerusalem diane miemienidima, taudi nam sibo a saḡa Jerusalem nopone.
42021022	Baninama inam biwa raḡaninama e tavana, boni peroveta a girugirumina, ruvane nama e tubuḡana.
42021023	Inam raḡandie tokare waiwaivi bogebogedima be waitatau vaudima ḡarodie e gewagewa kauana, baninama inam raḡanine tokare wainuatoitoi dosinama e tubuḡana dabudine, baninama Mamaitua nuanama yai medi kauana banegidima ḡarodie aubainama.
42021024	Dabudine banaga ḡesaudima tai guridina, be ḡesaudima ta ragaudi be dobu matabuna nopodie dibure ta biri nawedina. Be eteni banegidima taudi Jerusalem ta vagudagudana, naumeki da adi raḡanima boruborune e kovina.
42021025	“Be inam raḡandie mataira ta tubuḡana suara, nawaravi be kipora bogedie. Be dobu matabuna tokare wainuatoitoi dosinama ta banavina, be banaga matabudi egasi gavasinama be rabaminama e rawanapedina.
42021026	Inam raḡanine banaga tokare naira e kawa raugureredina, baninama taudi ta nainaira kauana da aiyabaḡa ḡesaudima gewegewedima dobue ta tubuḡana. Be rewapana matabudi gunume ta rawadaberaridina.
42021027	Yodibe Banaga Natunama ma giyouna e yovona, rewapana be neneraḡinama dosinama mate, be banaga matabudi tokare ta kitana.
42021028	Be inam yabedima matabudi ta tubuḡana raḡanine nam ko naira, be taumi ko tausuḡumi be koi nuaverena, baninama raḡan ya tavana, da taugu yà yovoyovona yài yawasanimina aubainama.”
42021029	Dabudine Yesu uma wainasinama ya riuedina, “Damaya kainama be kai ḡesaudima mate ko noḡotidi!
42021030	Taumi kai ta kinikinina raḡanine ko kitedi be ko kataikataiena da inam bodu raḡaninama e tavatavana.
42021031	Be inam kauinama teneḡinama nama raḡanine inam kauidima ta tubutubuḡana ko kitekitedina, dabudine ko kataie da Mamaitua na waiguyauma raḡaninama e tavatavana.
42021032	Taugu yà riuriu kauemina, da uma kimtinama nam ei kave be inam kauidima matabudi Jerusalemma ta tubuḡana.
42021033	Mara be dobu tokare tai kavena be taugu riuguma nam airaḡan ei kave!
42021034	“Ko kita kauemi da kanidobidobi be tegobua bo dobu yawasanidima nuaboyedima nam ta taimatakoekoemi, deḡoda raḡan damonama ei raḡantenaḡe be ei ḡosorimina.
42021035	Baninama inam raḡaninama tokare banaga matabudi dobue e kamotidina maika kwaro!
42021036	Vutuna aubainama taumi koi neneḡana be raḡan matabuna ko moiragi da taumi tokare teneteneḡinama da uma kauidima ta tubutubuḡana, nopodiḡa ko naḡo be Banaga Natunama noḡone ko midina, be nam tokare ko tunimayaḡa.”
42021037	Yesu suare tempol nopone yawai katakataina, be kupie ya dobi be ya naḡonaḡona oya Olip debane, kena aubainama.
42021038	Be banaga matabudi raḡantomtom a naḡona tempol nopone tauna waibeavaienama aubainama.
42022001	Buredi-Nam-Sasasanina soinama raḡaninama ya tavatavana, isanama ‘Naḡopore soinama’.
42022002	Pirisi adi babadama be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima, taudi Yesu waigurinama kedanama a wanewanena nema sibo ai guri bakena, be taudi banaga a nairedina.
42022003	Be Judas, tawai isana ‘Iskariot’, tauna nopone Seitan ya saḡana. Tauna tenaḡa tauwai muriwatana 12 nopodie.
42022004	Vutuna aubainama tauna ya naḡona pirisi adi babadama be babada ḡesaudima mate ai tarapiri da nema sibo tauna Yesu ya boru dobiḡa bakena ḡarodie.
42022005	Be taudi nuedima ya vere kaua be ai aninana da Judas sibo mane a utena.
42022006	Naumeki da Judas mate yai aninana da tauna inam noyanama e voiena. Be keda ya wanewanena da patara matakoedie sibo Yesu ya boru dobiḡena.
42022007	Buredi-Nam-Sasasanina soinama raḡaninama ya tavana. Be inam raḡanine dam matabudi adi sipuma tenaḡaḡa ai guridina Naḡopore soinama aubainama.
42022008	Dabudine Yesu tauna Pita be Jon ya riuporedi be ya riuna, “Ko naḡo be Naḡopore soinama ko vokaukaue be tà kanina.”
42022009	Be taudi ai taravirena, “Deḡo dabudi kwa ḡoeḡoemaina soi ka vokaukaue?”
42022010	Be tauna ya riuedina, “Taumi ko naḡo be raḡanine meagaie ko tavatavana, dabudine banaga ko banavina upa duginama e kirokiroḡina. Inam baneginama koi muriwatane da na vadae ko tavana.
42022011	Be vada taupakinama ko riuena, ‘Tauwai katakatai umanama ya riuemna: Deḡo ware adi gabu da taugu be yau tauwai muriwatanama mate Naḡopore soinama ka kani?’
42022012	Be tauna vada vatavatara rabui nopone be debane vatarine dabudine gabu dosinama be yaba matabuna kawakawa nonoḡidima tauna ei kataimina. Be inam dobudine kani ko vokaukauena.”
42022013	Dabudine taudi a naḡo be Yesu ya riuriuedina yabedima nama a banavidina, naumeki da Naḡopore soinama taudi a vokaukauena.
42022014	Naumeki da soi na raḡanima ya tavatavana, Yesu na apasolma mate a miana kani aubainama.
42022015	Dabudine tauna ya riuedina, “Nuaguma ya poyapoya vavasaḡena da uma Naḡopore soinama taumi mate sibo tè kanina, be muriḡa da taugu yài nuatoitoina.
42022016	Baninama yà riuriuemina da taugu Naḡopore soinama nam airaḡan yà kani munaḡe naumeki da uma soinama baninama e maḡatarana Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone.”
42022017	Be ya giugiuna murine Yesu keyaka ya paḡo, yai kaiwa be ya riuna, “Uma ko paḡo be ko soiena!
42022018	Baninama yà riuriuemina da yodi be nokoi ya naḡona taugu nam waen yà tego munaḡe naumeki da Mamaitua na waiguyauma e tavana.”
42022019	Be tauna buredi ya paḡo, yai kaiwa, ya giva da ya utedi be ya riuna, “Uma taugu tubuḡiguma yà uteutemina. Yodi be nokoi e naḡona uma ko voiena taugu aninoḡotiguma aubainama.”
42022020	Be kani murine keyaka ya paḡo be ya riuna, “Uma keyekinama inam waianina vaunama, baninama kosiniguma e rauḡinina taumi aubaimima.
42022021	“Be banaga aitau tokare e boru dobiḡeguna, be tauborudobiḡeguma tauna mate yodi uma dabudine tà miamiana.
42022022	Banaga Natunama tokare e gurina, inam naumeki. Be aitau da ya boruboru dobiḡena, tauna tokare gewagewa dosinama e banavina.”
42022023	Dabudine apasol taudiḡa ai taraviravira munaḡedina, da aitau uma kauinama e voie.
42022024	Dabudine apasol waisaḡasaḡa ai karena, da aitau poudie ya saḡa gurata.
42022025	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Dobu guyaguyaudima adi banagama ḡarodie awai badabadana, be banaga a riuedi be taudi awai isedina ‘Raukivivere banegimima’.
42022026	Be taumi nam sibo nama! Banaga dosinama nopomie tauna sibo maika gomana, be ami badama tauna sibo maika taunoya.
42022027	Aba taumi ko noḡonoḡoti, aitau ya saḡa gurata? Banaga e mia be e kanikanina, bo kani tausoienama? Banaga e mia be e kanikanina, tauna ya saḡa guratana! Be taugu poumie maika taunoya.
42022028	Taumi banagimima taugu yau wainuatoitoie koya riu vaivaiteguna.
42022029	Vutuna aubainama taugu rewapana yà uteutemina da taumi koi badana, taugu yau waiguyauma, Tamaguma ya uteuteguna nopone.
42022030	Dabudine taumi tokare ko kani be ko tegona yau waiguyauma nopone. Be taumi waibadae ko mia be Israel damnama 12 taumi tokare ko etaredina.”
42022031	Be Bada ya riuna, “O Saemon! Seitan Mamaitua yai baḡana da matabumi e raurubumi be e dariḡemina maika banaga raisi banidima be muidima ta daridariḡedina nama, taumi veree be e nawemina gewagewae.
42022032	Be taugu aubaimma è moiragina da am waisumaḡama nam e beku, be raḡanine am noḡotama e verau munaḡana ḡarogue, naumeki da tam am banagama kwa voiedi da tai rewapanana.”
42022033	Be Pita ya riuna, “Bada, taugu è vokaukauana da tam mate tà naḡona dibure be tam mate tà gurina.”
42022034	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Yà riuriuemna Pita, tam manaka raḡan rabuiteḡa kwa bovieguna da tam nam ku kataieguna, muriḡa da kamkam e riuna.”
42022035	Dabudine Yesu yai taraviredina, “Boni taugu è riuporemina, be nam mane, nam tana be nam kaḡasuma mate, inam raḡanine taumi aba koya maruabie bo ibewa?” Be taudi a riuna, “Ibewa!”
42022036	Dabudine ya riuedina, “Be yodi na tabu, aitau ḡarone mane bo tana da e paḡona. Be aitau ḡarone kwatikwati ibewa, naumeki da tauna na rupue kwatikwati e gimerina,
42022037	baninama girugiruminama poranama nopone a girumina taugu aubaiguma, ‘Taudi tauna a voiena maika kabe tauvunuvunuḡa.’”
42022038	Be apasol a riuna, “Bada, uma kwa kita, kwatikwati rabui.” Be tauna ya riuna, “Inam nakarua!”
42022039	Yesu vada ya dobi pore be na kaba naḡoe ya naḡona oya Olip debane. Be na tauwai muriwatanama mate ai muriwatanena.
42022040	Be raḡanine taudi Yesu ḡarone a tavatavana, tauna ya riuedina, “Ko moiragi da nam raurubue ko beku!”
42022041	Dabudine na tauwai muriwatanama ya gosedi be ya naḡo da yeku ruburubunama ruvane nama, be tuapikane doḡae ya raupari da ya moiragi
42022042	be ya riuna, “Mamai, taugu nam ama ḡoeḡoena ḡoraḡoranama yà sigue, be naumeki da tam am ḡoanama yà voiena, be nam taugu yau ḡoana.”
42022043	Dabudine anea marae ya yovo be ya kawa rewapanina.
42022044	Yesu na nuaboyama ya moramoraba guratana, vutuna aubainama tauna ya moiragi gurata, be poya kosina maika a tositosina doḡae.
42022045	Dabudine ya midisuḡu munaḡa be ya naḡona na tauwai muriwatanama ḡarodie da e kitana be taudi matabudi ai nuaboya kaua be a kenakenana.
42022046	Be tauna ya riuedina, “Aba aubainama ko kenakena? Ko midisuḡu be ko moiragi da taumi nam raurubue ko beku!”
42022047	Yesu tauna yaḡoro ya giugiu be banaga toitoi a tavana, be apasol 12 nopodie apasol tenaḡa isanama Judas, tauna inam banegidima yai dokedokedina, be Judas tauna ya saḡa da Yesu yai suruvena.
42022048	Be Yesu ya riuena, “Judas, tam Banaga Natunama waisuruvae kwa boruboru dobiḡe, bo?”
42022049	Be raḡanine Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama nama kauinama a kitakitana, taudi a riuna, “Bada, kwa ḡoeḡoemaina tauma ama kwatikwatima ka kwadiedi, bo?”
42022050	Naumeki da tauḡoma tenaḡa kwatikwati ya kwadie be pirisi adi badama na taunoyama beanama kasaunama yai miarakana.
42022051	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Avedi! Ko gose pore!” Dabudine Yesu inam tauḡominama beanama ya taukoni be yai yawasanina.
42022052	Be Yesu pirisi adi babadama, tempol babadidima be banaga adi babadama ḡesaudima mate ya riuedina, “Taumi kwapu be kwatikwati koya kiroḡa be koya verauna taudanedanene ko vunuḡi, bo?
42022053	Taugu raḡan matabuna taumi mate tempol nopone tè miamiana, be dabudine taumi nam ko vunuḡiguna. Be naumeki da yodi taumi ami raḡanima. Yodi tadiwanawana na waibadama raḡaninama.”
42022054	Dabudine taudi Yesu a pani be a nawena pirisi adi badama na vadae. Be Pita muriḡa yai muriwatanedina.
42022055	Be inam banegidima taudi pirisi na vadama diane anikaba etare, dabudi kai a dena be diane a miamiana, be dabudine Pita mate diedie ya miamiana.
42022056	Be taunoya waivinama tenaḡa e kitana be Pita kai diane ya miamiana, dabudine ya kita yaḡeyaḡe be ya riuna, “Kaua tauḡominama mate Yesu murinaḡa ya naḡonaḡona!”
42022057	Dabudine tauna ya bovi be ya riuna, “Ibewa! Taugu Yesu nam e kataiena!”
42022058	Be a mia da raḡan ḡaubonaḡa be banaga ḡesau e kitana be ya riuna, “Tam mate Yesu turanama!” Be Pita ya riuna, “Ei, nam taugu!”
42022059	Naumeki da a taumia raḡan ḡaubonaḡa be tauḡoma ḡesau ya riu gurata be ya riuna, “Ee, riukaua inam tauna mate Yesu yawai muriwatanena, baninama tauna Galili provins baneginama!”
42022060	Be Pita ya riuna, “Ei badam, tam aba kwa giugiuena taugu nam e kataiena.” Be Pita yaḡoro nama ya giugiu be kamkam ya riuna.
42022061	Dabudine Bada yai tautinamuri be Pita ya kitadidina. Inam raḡanine Pita Yesu na giuma uma ya noḡotina, ‘Tam raḡan rabuiteḡa kwa bovieguna da tam nam taugu ku kataieguna, muriḡa da kamkam e riuna.’
42022062	Be dabudine Pita ya dobi doḡae be ya ḡaba da ya ḡaba guratana.
42022063	Be banaga aitauḡa Yesu taukita wataninama taudi Yesu waivarevarenama be riḡanama ai karena.
42022064	Taudi Yesu matanama a suma be a riuriuena, “Kwai peroveta da aitau kabe ya riḡam.”
42022065	Be taudi ḡasi gewegewedima toitoi mate tauna a riuriuena.
42022066	Raḡantomtom babada a rawateḡeidina, taudi inam pirisi adi babadama, tarawatu tauwai katakataidima be banaga adi babadama. Yodibe Yesu ai doka verauḡena ḡarodie.
42022067	Yodibe taudi Yesu ai taravirena, “Kwa riuemai, tam Keriso, bo?” Be tauna ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Deḡoda taugu yà riuemina, taumi tokare nam koi sumaḡegu,
42022068	be deḡoda taugu taumi sibo èi taraviremina, taumi nam tokare koya paribeegu.
42022069	Be yodi da nokoi ya naḡona Banaga Natunama Mamaitua wairewapana vavasaḡinama nimanama kasaune e miana.”
42022070	Dabudine taudi matabudi ai taravirena, “Tam Mamaitua Natuna, bo?” Be tauna ya riuedina, “Taumi aba ko vatovatona, vutuna taugu.”
42022071	Be taudi a riuna, “Tauma yodi nam matamata ḡesaudima kama ḡoeḡoedina, baninama tauma matabumai kè vaiena tauna aba ya vatona.”
42023001	Dabudine banaga matabudi borue a midisuḡu be Yesu a nawena Paelat ḡarone.
42023002	Be dabudi taudi waiwavunama ai karena be a riuna, “Tauma kè vaie da uma baneginama tauna banaga yawai doka waigewedi, be ya riuna da nam sibo Sisa ḡarone ai teks, be mate tauna ya riuna da taunaḡa guyau be Keriso.”
42023003	Vutuna aubainama Paelat Yesu yai taravirena, “Tam Jius adi guyau, bo?” Be tauna ya riuna, “Vutuna kwa vatovatona.”
42023004	Be Paelat, pirisi adi babadama be patara ya riuedina, “Taugu nam aba gewagewanama uma baneginama ḡarone e banavina.”
42023005	Be taudi a riu vavasaḡana, “Tauna Jius nopone na waikatakataima, aubainama banaga nuedima ya sorusoru viviridina. Tauna Galili nopone waikatakatai yai karena da uma dobudine ya tavana.”
42023006	Raḡanine Paelat e vaiena be banaga Galili provins a vatovatona, dabudine tauna yai taravidedina, “Tauna Galili provins banegina, bo?”
42023007	Be dabudine e vaiena be Yesu Herod na waiguyauma nopone, naumeki da tauna ya riuporena Herod ḡarone. Baninama inam raḡanine tauna Jerusalemma ya miamiana aubainama.
42023008	Raḡanine Herod Yesu ya kitakitana, tauna nuanama ya vere kauana, baninama tauna bonideḡo be ya ḡoeḡoena sibo Yesu ya kitana. Baninama Yesu yaba toitoi yawai tubuḡidina ya vaiena, vutuna aubainama Herod yawai noḡotana Yesu sibo mataira ya voie be tauna ya kitana.
42023009	Be Herod giu toitoi Yesu yai taravirevirena, be Yesu nam i paribeena.
42023010	Dabudine pirisi adi babadama be tarawatu tauwai katakataidima a midisuḡu be Yesu ai wavu vavasaḡena.
42023011	Be Herod na tauiḡarama mate Yesu ai varavara be a raukivi gewagewa kauena. Be Herod gara waimata kanikaninama Yesu yai kote be ya riupore nawe munaḡena Paelat ḡarone.
42023012	Inam raḡanine Paelat be Herod ai turana kauana. Be noḡone taudi awai mia taurina.
42023013	Paelat, pirisi adi babadama, babada ḡesaudima be banaga ya rawateḡeidi
42023014	be ya riuedina, “Taumi uma baneginama koya verauḡe ḡarogue be koya riuna da tauna banaga ya sorusoru viviridina, be taugu noḡomie è etare be è banavi da taumi ami waiwavuma matabudi nam banidi.
42023015	Be teneḡinama Herod nama, be ya riupore munaḡena ḡarode, baninama tauna nam aiyaba i banavina da Yesu sibo ai guri.
42023016	Vutuna aubainama taugu yodi tauna yà kovoḡi be yà riupore da e naḡona.”
42023018	Be banaga matabudi a rauyogo tenaḡa be a riuna, “Koi guri, be Barabas ko kaiporena tauma ama ḡoanama!”
42023019	Be Barabas tauna dibure a boruna, baninama tauna meagai nopone iḡara dosinama yai kare, be banaga yai gurina.
42023020	Be Paelat banaga ya riu munaḡedina, baninama tauna ya ḡoeḡoena Yesu sibo ya kaiporena aubainama.
42023021	Be taudi Paelat a rauyogoe be a riuriuna, “Kwa tuparatu, kwa tuparatu!”
42023022	Be Paelat raḡan wairabuiteḡanama ya riu munaḡedina, “Be uma baneginama aba gewagewanama ya voie? Taugu nam aba e banavina da yài guri! Taugu yà kovoḡi be yà riupore be e naḡona.”
42023023	Be taudi a mia rasarasa be a ḡoeḡoena sibo Yesu a tuparatuna korosie. Be taudi yaḡoro a rasarasana.
42023024	Dabudine Paelat nuanama ya vitare da banaga adi ḡoanama nama e voiena.
42023025	Be tauḡoma meagai nopone iḡara yai kare be banaga yawai gurina, tauna dibure be Paelat ya riupore da ya naḡona, banaga adi ḡoanama ruvane. Be tauna Yesu taudi nimedie ya boru da adi ḡoanama nama a voiena.
42023026	Dabudine Yesu ai doka dobiḡe da a nawenawe, be kedae tauḡoma tenaḡa a banavina isanama Saemon, tauna Sairin meagainama tauḡominama. Tauna sipie be ya munamunaḡana meagaie. Naumeki da tauna a vunuḡi be korosi ai kiroḡina, be tauna Yesu ya sagu da korosi ya kiroḡina.
42023027	Be patara dosinama tauna murinaḡa a naḡonaḡona, be nopodie waiwaivi mate, be taudi Yesu ai nuaboye be a ḡabaḡabana.
42023028	Dabudine Yesu yai tautinamuri be ya riuedina, “Taumi Jerusalem waiwaivimima nam ko ḡabegu, be taumi be ami sedama mate ko ḡaba munaḡemina!
42023029	Baninama raḡan ta tavana da taumi ko riuna, ‘Nuavere dosinama waiwaivi kaikaipokidima ḡarodie be aitauḡa nam ti bogana be susudie nam seda ti susurubudina.’
42023030	Inam raḡanine banaga oya ta riuedina, ‘Debamaie ko beku da ko dobotawamai!’ Be oya ḡauḡaubodima ta riuedina, ‘Ko ruputawamai!’
42023031	Deḡoda taugu kai gidegideviguma ḡarogue nama banaga ta voivoiana, naumeki da banaga maika kai pokidima ḡarodie tokare aba e tubuḡa?”
42023032	Be tauiḡaiḡara banaga gewegewedima rabui mate ai doka tenaḡedina waiguridima aubainama.
42023033	Raḡanine taudi dobu isanama ‘Debagarere’ dabudi a tavatavana, taudi korosie Yesu a tutuna, be banaga gewegewedima rabui mate. Tenaḡa Yesu kasaunama yauwane be tenaḡa seninama yauwane.
42023034	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Mamai kwa noḡota poredi, baninama taudi nam ti kataiena aba ta voivoiena!” Be tauiḡara Yesu na garama a kasiedina.
42023035	Be banaga patara dabudine a midi be yaba matabuna a kitekitedina. Be babada Yesu ai kwatekwateve be a riuriuna, “Banaga ḡesaudima yai yawasanidina, be yodi taunaḡa ei yawasana munaḡe deḡoda tauna Keriso, Mamaitua na vinevinema!”
42023036	Be tauiḡaiḡara mate waikwatekwatevenama, aubainama taudi waen wairurunama ai tego be a riuna,
42023037	“Deḡoda tam Jius adi guyauma, naumeki da kwai yawasana munaḡem!”
42023038	Be kai ḡaubonama bogane a girumana raḡan rabuiteḡa, Gurik bonane, Letin bonane be Hibru bonane be a riuna: Uma tauna Jius adi guyauma be korosi bogane a tutuna Yesu debane.
42023039	Be gewagewa tauḡominama tenaḡa dabudi ya dawedawena yai diboḡi be ya riuna, “Tam Keriso da kwai yawasanim be kwai yawasanimai!”
42023040	Be gewagewa baneginama ḡesaunama turanama ya riutuaḡaie be ya riuna, “Tam wainuatoitoi teneḡinama kwa paḡopaḡona maika Yesu, vutuna aubainama tam Mamaitua sibo kuya vivirena nam kuyai diboḡi,
42023041	baninama tauda tà gurina dà gewagewama aubaidima inam naumeki, be tauna nam aba gewagewanama i voiena da sibo ya guri.”
42023042	Be dabudine ya riuna, “Yesu tam am waiguyauma nopone kwa saḡasaḡana raḡanine, kwa noḡotiguna.”
42023043	Be Yesu ya riuena, “Yà riuriu kauemna da tam manaka taugu mate paradaisie tà miana.”
42023044	-
42023045	Naumeki be suaratopunama suara ya duba be dobu matabuna yai kupikupina, be nama ya kenana da ravie nama be dobu ya yana munaḡa. Inam raḡanine gara tempol nopone matakeda awai saurina poune ya nuasika poraḡa da ma nevana a kenana.
42023046	Be Yesu bonanama dosine ya riuna, “Mamai, aruiguma nimame yà boruboruna!” Tauna nama ya riuriuna, naumeki da ya gurina.
42023047	Dabudine Rom adi badama aba a tubutubuḡana nama ya kitakitana, tauna Mamaitua isanama ya kaisuḡu be ya riuna, “Naumeki riukaua, uma tauna inam didimana baneginama.”
42023048	Be banaga matabudi a veraverauna Yesu tuparatunama kitanama aubainama, raḡanine aba ya tubutubuḡana nama a kitekitedina, taudi ai nuaboya kaua be nimedima nuakadedie a biridi be a munaḡana.
42023049	Dabudi Yesu na banagama matabudi be waiwaivi Galilima be awai muriwatanena, taudi mate ḡavoe a midi be yaba matabudi a tubutubuḡana a kitekitedina.
42023050	Dabudine tauḡoma tenaḡa isanama Jousep. Tauna tenaḡa tauwai tarapiri badanama, be tauna na yawasanama verenama be didimaninama. Be tauna
42023051	Mamaitua na waiguyauma ya raberabena da sibo ya tavana. Be inam baneginama tauna na banagama yaba matabudi a giugiuedi be a voivoiedina tauna nam i aninedina. Tauna Jius meagaine, isanama Arimatiama, be ya verauna.
42023052	Naumeki be tauna ya naḡona Paelat ḡarone be Yesu tubuḡinama aubainama yai baḡana.
42023053	Yodibe ya kiroḡa dobiḡe da garae ya suma be kokoaga guba voivoienama nopone ya boruna, noḡone nam aitau inam kokoagine ti boru rubuna.
42023054	Inam raḡaninama vokaukaua na raḡanima, be Sabat raḡaninama ḡaubonaḡa e tava.
42023055	Be dabudine waiwaivi aitauḡa Yesu Galili provins nopone ai muriwatane be a veraverauna, taudi Jousep ai muriwatane da kokoagae be nema Yesu tubuḡinama e boru bakena, vutuna kitanama aubainama.
42023056	Dabudine waiwaivi a munaḡana vadae da upa be bunama ḡabuḡabudima a vokaukauedina Yesu tubuḡinama aubainama. Be Sabat raḡanine taudi a siperena, adi tarawatuma e riuriuna nama.
42024001	Sande raḡantomtom waiwaivi upa be bunama ḡabuḡabudima voivoia wainonoḡidima a kiroḡa be a naḡona kokoagae.
42024002	Be taudi kokoagae a tavatavana, ta kitana be kokoaga matakedanama yeku waimiditomnama ya rawakui da ḡavoe ya naḡona.
42024003	Naumeki da taudi kokoaga nopone a saḡana, be Bada Yesu tubuḡinama nam dabudine.
42024004	Be taudi uma kauinama awai riu nuababaḡe be tautauḡoma rabui, adi garama waimatakanikanidima, ai raḡantenaḡe da diedie a maḡatarana.
42024005	Dabudine waiwaivi a naira kaua be noḡodima doḡae ya yovona, be tautauḡoma rabui a riuna, “Aba aubainama taumi banaga yawayawasaninama banaga guriguridima nopodie ko wanewane?
42024006	Tauna nam uma dobudi. Ya midisuḡu munaḡana. Tauna boni taumi mate Galilima be nema ya riuriu bakemina, vutuna ko noḡoti!
42024007	Tauna umanama ya riuna, ‘Mamaitua ya ḡoena da Banaga Natunama banaga gewegewedima nimedie ta boru nawe da korosie ta tuparatuna. Be tauna raḡan wairabuiteḡane e midisuḡu munaḡana.’”
42024008	Dabudine waiwaivi riunama a noḡotina
42024009	be kokoaga a gose pore da a munaḡana apasol 11 be tauwai muriwatana ḡesaudima mate ḡarodie. Be waiwaivi yaba matabudi tauwai muriwatana a riuedina.
42024010	Inam waiwaividima taudi Meri Magdalin, Joana be Meri tauna Jeims tinanama. Taudi be waiwaivi ḡesaudima mate uma kauidima apasol a riuedina.
42024011	Be apasol ai noḡotana waiwaivi adi riuma kabe kaiyovu aubainama, taudi nam ti sumaḡedina.
42024012	Dabudine Pita ya midisuḡu, ya manini be kokoagae ya naḡona. Be tauna ya raudune yovo da garaḡa ya kitedina be nam aba ḡesau. Naumeki da ya munaḡana vadae, be ya nuababaḡana aba ya tubuḡa.
42024013	Inam raḡaninama teneḡine tautauḡoma rabui taudi a naḡonaḡona meagaie, uma meagainama isanama Emaus. Be inam meagaine da Jerusalem na madanima inam 10 kilomita.
42024014	Be taudi ma turana yaba matabudi Jerusalemma a tubutubuḡana awai giugiuedina.
42024015	Dabudine taudiḡa awai giugiu naḡo be Yesu ya tava da taudi mate a naḡonaḡona.
42024016	Be taudi Yesu a kitana be nam ti kataiena da tauna aitau.
42024017	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Taumi aba kowai giugiu naḡoe?” Naumeki da taudi ma nuaboyedi a midi kwasa
42024018	be tauḡoma tenaḡa isanama Kleopas, tauna Yesu ya riuena, “Tamḡa Jerusalem nopone nam ku kataie da aba a tubuḡa uma raḡandie?”
42024019	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Aba yabedi?” Be taudi a paribeena, “Yaba matabuna Nasaret Yesunama ḡarone a tubutubuḡana, vutuna ka giugiuedina. Tauna peroveta be na giuma be na voiama matabudi ai rewapana kauana yai maḡataridina, Mamaitua be banaga matedie.
42024020	Pirisi adi babadama be tauma ama babadama ai utaena Rom ḡarodie da korosie a tuparatu be ya gurina.
42024021	Be tauma kè noḡotana da tauna kabe Israel damnama ei yawasanidi, be uma kauidima a tubuḡana yodi raḡan rabuiteḡa a kovina.
42024022	Be manaka waiwaivi ḡesaudima ḡaromaie a riuwai nuababaḡimaina, baninama taudi raḡan tomtom a naḡona kokoagae
42024023	be Yesu tubuḡinama nam ti banavina. Be taudi a verau munaḡa be a riuna da anea ḡarodie a maḡatara be a riuna da Yesu ya yawasanana.
42024024	Naumeki da tauma ama banagama ḡesaudima a naḡo kokoagae a tavana, be aba waiwaivi a riuriuena nama a kitana. Taudi Yesu nam ti kitana.”
42024025	Dabudine Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Taumi buebuemima. Aba aubainama peroveta a riuriuna taumi nam koi sumaḡedi?
42024026	Keriso tauna uma yabedie ei nuatoitoina muriḡa be e naḡona na neneḡarae.”
42024027	Be dabudine Yesu peroveta adi giuma girugiruminama poranama nopone, matabudi tauna na kauama a giugiuena, taudi ya giu waibatedina. Tauna Mousis na bukae giu yai karena da peroveta ḡesaudima ḡarodie ya tavana.
42024028	Be taudi meagai diane a tavatavana raḡanine, Yesu ya voie da kabe i dokadoka.
42024029	Be taudi a riu vavasaḡena, “Suara ya kovina, kaiteka kupi, tauma mate tà miana!” Naumeki da tauna adi vadae ya saḡa be dabudi a miana.
42024030	Be raḡanine kani aubainama dabudi Yesu buredi ya paḡo, da Mamaitua yai kaiwe, yodibe ya giva da ya utedina.
42024031	Be dabudine taudi matedima ya kaya be Yesu a kataiena, be inam dabudine yai raḡantenaḡe da tauna ya samoana.
42024032	Inam dabudine taudiḡa ai giugiu be a riuna, “Kwa noḡonoḡoti bo ibewa raḡanine kedae girugirumidima poranama ya giuedi be nuadama kai maika ya karatina.”
42024033	Inam raḡaninama teneḡine taudi a midisuḡu be a naḡona Jerusalemma apasol 11 be ḡesaudima mate ḡarodie.
42024034	Be taudi raḡanine Jerusalemma vadae a saḡasaḡana, dabudine tauwai muriwatana inam banegidima rabui a riuedina, “Bada riukaua ya midisuḡuna, tauna Saemon ḡarone ya maḡatarana.”
42024035	Dabudine tautauḡomidima rabui aba kedae ḡarodie ya tubutubuḡana tauwai muriwatana ai varidina. Be mate taudi ai varidina da Yesu buredi ya givagivana raḡanine, taudi a kataiena da tauna aitau.
42024036	Taudi inam kauinama yaḡoro a giugiue be Yesu tauna ḡominama poudie ya raumidire be ya riuedina, “Suba ḡaromie e kenana.”
42024037	Be taudi a ḡosoridi be naira nopodima ya moḡavuna, baninama taudi ai noḡotana kabe ḡaḡarua ti kitakita.
42024038	Be tauna ya riuedina, “Taumi aba aubainama ko nainaira be nopomima e vovo raḡaraḡa?
42024039	Nimagu be kaḡaguma ko kitedi be ko kataie da inam taugu. Be ko taukonigu da ko kataiegu da taugu nam ḡaḡarua, baninama ḡaḡarua taudi nam visiḡodi bo turiḡidi taugu maika.”
42024040	Yesu nama ya riuriuna, naumeki da tauna nimana be kaḡanama yai kataidina.
42024041	Inam raḡanine taudi nuedima ya vere kaua be a mosamosari koena be nam ti sumaḡena. Vutuna aubainama tauna ya riuedina, “Kani ḡaromie e kenakena bo ibewa da taugu yà kani?”
42024042	Be taudi iyana gabugabunama nevanama a utena.
42024043	Be tauna ya paḡo be matedie ya kanina.
42024044	Dabudine Yesu ya riuedina, “Dokane taugu taumi mate raḡanine be è riuemina da yaba matabudi Mousis na tarawatuma, peroveta be Salamo nopodie a girugirumidina taugu aubaiguma, nama yodi ta tubutubuḡana.”
42024045	Dabudine Yesu taudi noḡota ya sagudi da taudi girugiruminama poranama a noḡoti be a kataiena,
42024046	be ya riuedina, “Girugiruminama porane umanama a girumina: Keriso ei nuatoitoi be raḡan wairabuiteḡane guriguridima nopodie tauna e midisuḡu munaḡana.
42024047	Be tauna na rewapanae noḡota vitara be noḡota poraḡa dobu matabudi nopodie ta rauguguyedina. Be rauguguya inam Jerusalemma tai karena.
42024048	Be taumi inam kauidima matabudi adi matamatama.
42024049	Taugu Tamaguma aba ya riuriueguna, tokare yà riuporena taumi ḡaromie. Be taumi Jerusalem meagaine ko miana, naumeki da Mamaitua na rewapanama ko paḡona.”
42024050	Naumeki da Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama Jerusalem meagaine be yai doka nawedina Betenima. Dabudine tauna nimanama ya kaisuḡudi be na tauwai muriwatanama yai aiainidina.
42024051	Be tauna yawai aiainidina maika, Mamaitua tauna ya nawena marae.
42024052	Be tauwai muriwatana tauna a raudunee be nuedima ya vere vavasaḡana, be ma mosaridi a munaḡana Jerusalemma.
42024053	Be raḡan matabuna taudi tempol nopone a mia be Mamaitua isanama a kaikai suḡusuḡuna.
43001001	Boni pakane muriḡa da dobu ya tubuḡana, Riu taunaḡa ya kenakenana. Be Riu tauna Mamaitua mate. Be inam Riunama vutuna tauna Mamaitua.
43001002	Inam Riunama tauna boni pakane Mamaitua mate a miamiana.
43001003	Inam Riune yaba matabudi a tubuḡana. Be tauna ibewa, yaba yodi ta kenakenana tokare nam a tubuḡa.
43001004	Tauna ḡarone yawasana ya kenakenana. Be inam yawasaninama vutuna banaga adi kodamma.
43001005	Be inam kodamnama tadiwanawanae e yanayanana, be tadiwanawana nam teneteneḡina da inam kodamnama sibo ya suragaba.
43001006	Be Mamaitua banaga tenaḡa ya vinena isanama Jon,
43001007	be ya riu pore da banaga ḡarodie inam kodamnama e giuena, be inam giune banaga matabudi sibo ai sumaḡa.
43001008	Jon tauna nam kodam. Ibewa, tauna ya verauna kodamnama e rauguguyena.
43001009	Riukaua kodamnama ya veraverauna dobue, vutuna banaga ewai yanedina.
43001010	Tauna vutuna dobu be yaba matabuna ya voiedina. Be tauna dobue ya miamiana raḡanine, banaga yaḡoro tauna a nuababaḡena.
43001011	Tauna ya yovona na dobue, na banaga ḡomama ḡarodie, be taudi nam ti aninena.
43001012	Be aitauḡa tauna ai anine be isane awai sumaḡana, taudi vutudi yai aninedi da Mamaitua natunatunama a tubuḡana.
43001013	Taudi nam banaga kosinine ti tubuḡana. Be taudi nam tubuḡa na ḡoane bo banaga na ḡoane ti tubuḡana, ibewa da Mamaitua ḡarone a tubuḡa vitarana.
43001014	Riu yai rawabanaga be ḡarode dobue ya miana. Tauna raukivivere be riukaua noponama ya moḡavuna. Be Mamaitua na neneḡarama matabuna nuanuanama Natunama tenaḡa ḡominama ya uteutena tauma kè kitana.
43001015	Jon inam baneginama vutuna ya rauguguye be ya riuna, “Uma baneginama vutuna boni umanama è riuriuemina, ‘Banaga murigue e veraverauna tauna ya saḡa vavasaḡana, nam maika taugu. Baninama muriḡa da taugu è tubuḡana, tauna boni nama miemieninama.’”
43001016	Be na raukiviveree tauna vere toitoi tabu be tabu ya utedana,
43001017	raukivivere be riukaua Yesu Kerisoe a verauna. Be Mousis tauna tarawatu taunaḡa ya utedana.
43001018	Nam aitau airaḡan Mamaitua i kita rubuna, be Natunama tenaḡa ḡominama tauna vutuna Mamaitua, Tamanama nuanuane miemieninama, vutuna Mamaitua ḡarode yai maḡatarina.
43001019	Jerusalemma Jius babadidima taudi pirisi be Livait banegidima a riupore nawedina Jon ḡarone, da ai taravire be sibo a kataiena tauna aitau.
43001020	Be Jon riukaue ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taugu nam Tauwai yawasana.”
43001021	Dabudine taudi ai taravira munaḡena, “Be tam aitau? Peroveta Elaija, bo?” Be tauna ya riuna, “Ibewa.” Be taudi ai taravira munaḡena, “Mamaitua ya sausaugena peroveta raḡan damone e tavana, vutuna tam, bo?” Be tauna ya riuna, “Ibewa.”
43001022	“Be yodi tam aitau? Tam giu baninama kwa ute yaḡemai be tauma ka paḡo da ka munaḡe be tauriuporemaima kai varidina. Tam nema kwa noḡonoḡota bakem, tam aitau?”
43001023	Be tauna ya paraibeedi be peroveta Aisaia na giue ya riuedina, “Taugu vutuna banaga dobu kavakavane bonanama dosine umanama e riuriu, ‘Bada na kedama ko kawa didimani.’”
43001024	Dabudine Parisi adi banagama a riuriuporedina Jon waitaravirenama aubainama.
43001025	Taudi Jon ai taravire be a riuna, “Deḡoda tam nam Keriso bo Elaija bo Mamaitua peroveta ya sausaugena, naumeki da aba aubainama tam yodi banaga kwawai babataitodi?”
43001026	Be Jon ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taugu upae yàwai babataitona be banaga tenaḡa poumie nam ko kataiena,
43001027	tauna vutuna tokare murigue e tavana, be taugu nam veregu da tauna na kaḡasumama yà kaiporaḡa.”
43001028	Inam kauidima matabudi Betenima a tubuḡana, upa Jodan be noaḡo nevane. Inam dabudine Jon banaga yawai babataitodina.
43001029	Pomainama Jon Yesu ya kitana, ḡarone ya veraverauna, be Jon ya riuna, “Ko kita, tauna vutuna Mamaitua Na Sipuma. Banaga sipu natunama ta vunuḡi be ta tipatipana, nama Mamaitua Na Sipuma yai utaena da banaga adi gewagewama dobue e koḡa poredina.
43001030	Uma baneginama vutuna boni taugu umanama è riuriuemina, ‘Banaga murigue e veraverauna, tauna ya saḡa vavasaḡana, nam maika taugu. Baninama muriḡa da taugu è tubuḡana, tauna boni nama miemieninama.’
43001031	Noḡone taugu nam e kataiena da aitau Keriso, be taugu è verau be upae banaga èi babataitodina da tauna Israel banegidima ḡarodie e maḡatarana.”
43001032	Be Jon umanama ya riuna, “Taugu è kitana Arua Babau marae be ya yovona kiu gabubu maika, be Yesu debane ya miana.
43001033	Noḡone taugu nam e kataiena da tauna Keriso be Mamaitua taugu upae waibabataito aubainama ya riuriuporeguna raḡanine, umanama ya riueguna, ‘Tam tokare Arua kwa kitana e yovo be banaga aitau debane e miana, tauna vutuna tokare Arua Babaue ei babataitona.’
43001034	Taugu uma kauinama nama è kitana Yesu ḡarone ya tubuḡana. Vutuna aubainama yà riuriu kauemina da tauna vutuna Mamaitua Natuḡominama.”
43001035	Pomainama Jon ya tava munaḡa be na tauwai muriwatanama rabui mate a midimidina.
43001036	Be raḡanine Jon e kitana be Yesu dianaḡa ya naḡonaḡona, inam dabudine tauna ya riuna, “Ko kita, tauna vutuna Mamaitua Na Sipuma.”
43001037	Be Jon na tauwai muriwatanama rabui inam riunama a vaivaiena raḡanine, taudi Yesu ai muriwatanena.
43001038	Dabudine Yesu yai tautinamuri da taudi ya kitedi be yai taraviredina, “Aba ami ḡoana?” Be taudi a paribee be a riuna, “Rabai, tam deḡo dabudine am kaba mia?” (Giu ‘Rabai’ baninama inam ‘Tauwai katakatai’)
43001039	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Ko verau ko kita.” Naumeki da 4 okoroki nama taudi tauna mate a naḡona na kaba miae be dabudine a mia kupina.
43001040	Inam tauwai muriwatanidima rabui, be tauḡoma tenaḡa isanama Endru, tauna Saemon Pita tuaḡanama.
43001041	Dabudine Endru aba ya voiena inam noḡone ya naḡo tasinama Saemon ya wane, be ya riuena, “Tauma Mesaia kè banavina.” Mesaia baninama inam Keriso.
43001042	Naumeki da Endru Saemon yai doka verauḡena Yesu ḡarone, be Yesu Saemon ya kita be ya riuena, “Tam Saemon, Jon natunama be yodi tokare yài isamna ‘Kipas’ inam baninama ‘Pita’.”
43001043	Pomainama Yesu Galili naḡonama yai taina. Be kedae tauna Pilip ya banavi be ya riuena, “Kwai muriwatanegu!”
43001044	Pilip tauna Betsaida baneginama maika Endru be Pita.
43001045	Naumeki da Pilip Nataniel ya banavi be ya riuena, “Tauma Tauwai yawasana kè banavina. Inam Nasaret Yesunama Jousep natunama. Tauna vutuna Mousis na tarawatue be peroveta adi bukae a girugirumina.”
43001046	Be Nataniel yai taravirena, “Tam aitau ya riuem da tokare Nasaretma vere e tubuḡa?” Be Pilip ya riuena, “Kwa verau be kwa kita.”
43001047	Be Yesu e kitana, be Nataniel tauna ḡarone ya veraverauna. Dabudine Yesu ya riuna, “Uma riukaua Israel baneginama, tauna nam kaiyovu nopone ima kenakenana.”
43001048	Dabudine Nataniel Yesu yai taravirena, “Tam nemanama taugu kuya katai bakegu?” Be Yesu ya paribeena, “Taugu tam kai damaya pakane è kitamna, muriḡa da Pilip ya riuem be koya verauna.”
43001049	Dabudine Nataniel Yesu ya riuena, “Tauwai katakatai, tam riukaua Mamaitua Natunama, be Israel guyaunama tam.”
43001050	Be Yesu ya riuena, “Tam kai damaya pakane è kitam be è riuemna aubainama kuyai sumaḡa, bo? Be nam inam vutunaḡa, tam yaba ḡesaudima dosidima mate tokare kwa kitedina.
43001051	Be yà riuriu kauemina da taumi tokare ko kitana mara e nuaporaḡa be Mamaitua na aneama ta saḡasaḡa be ta yovoyovona Banaga Natunama ḡarone.”
43002001	Raḡan wairabuiteḡane matakopa soinama Keina meagaine ya tubuḡana Galili provins nopone. Be Yesu tinanama mate dabudine.
43002002	Yesu be na tauwai muriwatanama mate a kokonedina inam soinama aubainama.
43002003	Be waen ya kovina raḡanine, Meri Yesu ya riuena, “Banaga adi waenma ya kovina.”
43002004	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Tam be taugu dà noyama dabudine nam ima kenakenana. Taugu yau raḡanima nam i tavana.”
43002005	Dabudine Yesu tinanama taunoya ya riuedina, “Aba tauna e riuriuemina, naumeki da ko voiena.”
43002006	Inam dabudine vaivai raukoḡanama kadi dugima matabudi 6 a midimidina. Dugidima a moraba vavasaḡana, tenatenaḡaḡa 100 lita ruvanama.
43002007	Be Yesu taunoya ya riuedina, “Uma dugidima matabudi upa koi moḡavudina.” Naumeki da taudi dugi upa ai moḡavu taritaridina.
43002008	Yodibe taudi ya riuedi da upa dugi nopone a redu be soi taupakinama a utena. Yesu aba ya riuriuena, nama taudi a voiena.
43002009	Be soi taupakinama upa e tego rubuna be upa yai rawawaenna. Be soi taupakinama nam i kataiena da uma waennama aikedae be ya tava, be taunoya aitauḡa upa tauredunama, taudiḡa a kataiena. Dabudine soi taupakinama naḡivau tauḡominama ya riue da ḡarone ya tava
43002010	be umanama ya riuena, “Tam waen dinidininama vutuna sibo kuya soi dokena, be ware a tegotego buana murine, tam waen ḡesaudima tometomedima sibo kuya soiedina. Tam aba aubainama waen verenama kuya rabe kwase be yodi kuya dobiḡe?”
43002011	Uma inam Yesu mataira pakanama voienama yai karena Keina meagaine, Galili provins nopone. Inam kedane tauna neneḡarinama yai maḡatari be na tauwai muriwatanama ai sumaḡena.
43002012	Matakopa soinama murine Yesu be tinanama, tasitasinama be na tauwai muriwatanama mate a naḡona Kapeniam meagaine. Be taudi dabudine a taumiana raḡan bisanama.
43002013	Be Naḡopore soinama raḡaninama ya tavatavana aubainama, Yesu ya saḡa ya naḡona Jerusalemma.
43002014	Be dabudine tempol nopone taukune banegidima ya kitedina, taudi kau, sipu be kiu bunebune a gimagimaredina. Be mane tauwai sensinama banegidima mate ya kitedina dabudine a miamiana.
43002015	Dabudine Yesu kwapu taie ya voie, yodibe taukune, sipu, kau mate, matabudi tempol nopone be ya tavu dobiḡedina. Be mate mane tauwai sensinama banegidima adi vatarama ya rika be mane doḡae yai yaraiedina.
43002016	Be taudi aitauḡa kiu bunebune a rarau gimaredina ya riuedina, “Uma yabedima ko nawedi ḡavoe! Tamaguma na vadama nam ko voie da anikune gabunama e tubuḡa!”
43002017	Uma kauinama ya tubutubuḡana raḡanine, na tauwai muriwatanama aba giruma porane a girugirumidina vutuna a noḡotina: “Taugu am vadama nuaboyanama nopogue kai maika e vakivakina.”
43002018	Dabudine Jius babadidima Yesu a riuena, “Mataira kwa voie be tauma ka kita be ka kataie da tam ḡarome rewapana e kenakenana, aubainama uma kauidima kwa voivoiedina.”
43002019	Be Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Uma tempolnama ko katiwei be taugu raḡan rabuiteḡa nopodie tokare yà keri munaḡena.”
43002020	Be Jius a paribee be a riuna, “Uma tempolnama modi matabudi 46 nopodie a kerina. Be tam nema raḡan rabuiteḡa nopodie kwa keri munaḡa bake?”
43002021	Be Yesu aba tempolnama ya giugiuena, inam tauna tubuḡa ḡominama ya giugiuena.
43002022	Be Yesu ya guri be ya midimidisuḡu munaḡana raḡanine, na tauwai muriwatanama uma giudima Yesu ya vatovatodina a noḡotidina. Be taudi Yesu na giuma be girugiruminama poredie aba a riuriuena ai sumaḡedina.
43002023	Raḡanine Yesu Jerusalemma Naḡopore soinama nopone ya miamiana maika, tauna mataira toitoi ya voiedina, dabudine banaga toitoi mataira a kitedi be Yesu isane ai sumaḡana.
43002024	Be Yesu inam banegidima adi yawasanama nemanama, tauna ya kataiedina, vutuna aubainama tauna nam i sumaḡedina.
43002025	Tauna nam i ḡoeḡoena da aitau tenaḡa ya naḡo tauna ḡarone be banaga adi yawasanama sibo ya giue, baninama tauna kaite banaga nopodima matabuna ya kataiedina.
43003001	Raḡan tenaḡa Nikodimas tauna Yesu ḡarone ya tavana. Nikodimas tauna Parisi, Jius adi badama tenaḡana.
43003002	Tauna kupie giu aubainama Yesu ḡarone ya verau be ya riuna, “Tauwai katakatai, tauma kè kataiena da tam Mamaitua ya riuporemna tauma waikatakataimaima aubainama. Baninama am matairama tawai maḡatarana da tam Mamaitua ya riuporemna.”
43003003	Be Yesu ya paribee be ya riuena, “Yà riuriu kauemna, deḡoda tam nam kwa tubuḡa vitara, Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone tokare nam kwa saḡa.”
43003004	Dabudine Nikodimas ya riuna, “Deḡoda banaga kaite ya moraba poraḡana, tauna tokare nema e tubuḡa vitara bako? Nema tinanama kapone e saḡa munaḡa bako be e tubuḡa vitara?”
43003005	Be Yesu ya paribee be ya riuena, “Yà riuriu kauemna, banaga upae be Arua Babaue nam e tubuḡa vitara, tauna tokare Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone nam e saḡa.
43003006	Tubuḡa yawasaninama inam banage e tubutubuḡana, be yawasana arue inam Arua Babaue e tubutubuḡana.
43003007	Taugu è riuna da tam sibo kuya tubuḡa vitarana, be inam riunama nam ei basem.
43003008	Sive e manimaninina na ḡoane nama e naḡonaḡona. Tam gugurinama kwa vaivaiena, be deḡo yai kare be aikedae e naḡonaḡona nam ku kataiena. Inam kauinama teneḡinama nama aitau da Arue e tubutubuḡana, tam tokare nam kwa kataie.”
43003009	Be Nikodimas Yesu yai taravirena, “Uma kauinama nema tokare e tubuḡa bako?”
43003010	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Tam Israel adi tauwai katakataima be uma kauinama nam ku kataie, bo?
43003011	Taugu yà riuriu kauemna, tauma aba kè katakataiena vutuna ka giugiuena, be aba kè kitekitedina kawai maḡataridina. Be yaḡoro taumi banegimima tauma ama giuma nam komawai aninedina.
43003012	Taugu dobu kauidima è giuemi be nam koi sumaḡedina, vutuna aubainama anikitanama mara yawasanidima yà giuedina, be taumi tokare nam koi sumaḡa.
43003013	Nam aitau marae i naḡo rubuna, ibewa da Banaga Natunama taunaḡa noteḡo ya yovona.
43003014	Boni Mousis dobu kavakavane mota brons voivoienama kai bogane yai dawena. Inam kauinama teneḡinama nama Banaga Natunama tokare kai bogane tai dawena,
43003015	be aitauḡa tauna tawai sumaḡena, taudi tokare yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama ta paḡona,
43003016	baninama Mamaitua dobu nuanama ya paḡo vavasaḡena aubainama, nuanuanama Natunama tenaḡa ḡominama yai utaena. Be aitauḡa tauna tawai sumaḡena, taudi tokare nam ta kodena, ibewa da yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama ta paḡona.
43003017	Mamaitua nam dobu kovoḡinama bo kawa gewagewanama aubainama Natunama i riuporena, ibewa da tauna dobu waiyawasaninama aubainama ya riuporena.
43003018	“Aitau da tauna ewai sumaḡena, Mamaitua inam baneginama nam imawai tara tautauena. Be aitau da tauna nam imawai sumaḡena, Mamaitua inam baneginama kaite yai tara tautaue be e miamiana, baninama inam baneginama Mamaitua Natunama tenaḡa ḡominama isanama nam i sumaḡena aubainama.
43003019	“Baninama uma aubainama waitaratautau ya tubuḡana: Yana dobue ya yovona be banaga tadiwanawana a ḡoe vavasaḡena, nam maika yana, baninama taudi adi voiama matabudi gewegewedima aubainama.
43003020	Banaga aitauḡa gewagewa ta voivoiedina taudi yana nam tima ḡoeḡoena. Inam banegidima tokare nam yana nopone ta verau, baninama taudi ta nainairana deḡoda adi gewagewama tima maḡatara aubainama.
43003021	Be banaga aitauḡa da riukaue ta miamiana, taudi yana nopone ma nuaveredi ta veraverauna, da banaga matabudi taudi sibo a kitedi be a kataie da taudi Mamaitua na ḡoanama ta voivoiedina.”
43003022	Inam kauidima muridie Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama mate a naḡona Judia provinsnama nopone be dabudine taudi raḡan bisanama a rautapa miana be banaga awai babataitodina.
43003023	Inam raḡanine Jon mate tauna Salim diane Aionma yawai babataitona, baninama dabudine upa dosinama aubainama. Be banaga raḡan matabuna a tavatavana babataito konorinama.
43003024	Uma kauinama noḡone ya tubuḡana, muriḡa da Jon dibure a boru nawena.
43003025	Naumeki da raḡan tenaḡa vaivai raukoḡanama debane waikawa riuriu ya nuasarina Jon na tauwai muriwatanama be Jius baneginama tenaḡa mate.
43003026	Jon na tauwai muriwatanama a verau tauna ḡarone be a riuena, “Tauwai katakatai, tauḡoma noḡone Jodanma be noaḡo nevane tè banavi be tam kuya riuna tauna Tauwai yawasana, tauna vutuna yodi banaga ewai babataitodina. Be banaga matabudi tauna ḡarone ta naḡonaḡona.”
43003027	Be Jon ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Mamaitua marae tauna banaga tenatenaḡaḡa adi noyama e vinevinedina.
43003028	Taumi koya kataiena da taugu patare è riuemina da taugu nam Tauwai yawasana. Mamaitua taugu ya riuporeguna da Bada na kedama yà kawa didimanina, inam vutunaḡa.
43003029	Waivi tokare e naḡona na ḡoapaparama ḡarone. Be waivi na ḡoapaparama ḡarone e tavatavana raḡanine, tauḡoma turanama tokare nuanama e vere kauana. Be tauḡoma turanama inam taugu.
43003030	Tauna banaga dosinama e tubuḡana, be taugu naumeki da yà ḡaubona.
43003031	“Tauna marae be ya yovona aubainama, tauna yaba matabuna ya saḡa poredina. Be taugu dobu banegiguma, vutuna aubainama taugu yau noḡotama na ruvae yaba yà giugiuedina. Be tauna marae be ya yovona, vutuna aubainama tauna ya saḡa vavasaḡana.
43003032	Tauna marae yaba ya kitekitedi be ya vaivaiedina, vutudi ya riuedana. Be banaga raubisaḡa tawai sumaḡena.
43003033	Be banaga aitauḡa da tauna na giuma tawai sumaḡena, taudi tawai kawa riukauana da Mamaitua tauna riuriu kauinama.
43003034	Be Mamaitua banaga ya riuriuporena, tauna Mamaitua riunama e giugiuena, baninama tauna noponama Mamaitua Aruinama yai moḡavu taritarina.
43003035	Tamanama Natunama nuanama ya paḡo kaue be yaba matabuna Natunama nimane ya biridina.
43003036	“Aitau da Mamaitua Natunama ei sumaḡena, tauna yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama ya paḡona. Be aitau da Mamaitua Natunama e tuatuaḡaiena, tauna tokare nam yawasana e banavi, baninama Mamaitua na medima tauna ḡarone tokare e kena nonoḡana.”
43004001	Parisi ta vaiena be Yesu ya naḡo be banaga toitoi yai babataitodi be tauna awai muriwatanena, be na tauwai muriwatanama a toi kauana, nam maika Jon.
43004002	Be Yesu tauna nam banaga iwai babataitodina, ibewa, tauna na tauwai muriwatanama taudiḡa banaga awai babataitodina.
