43004003	Raḡanine Yesu e vaiena be tauna aba ya voivoiena, Parisi kaite a kataiena, vutuna aubainama tauna Judia ya gose be ya munaḡana Galilima.
43004004	Tauna Galili naḡonama aubainama Samaria kedanaḡa ya naḡona.
43004005	Naumeki da tauna Samaria nopone meagai isanama Saikama ya tavana. Boni Jeikob natunama Jousep doḡa ya utena, Saika meagainama diane.
43004006	Inam dabudine Jeikob na upama domnama e kenakenana. Suaratopu nama Yesu ya babara siauana aubainama, inam upanama diane ya mia be ya siperena.
43004007	Dabudine Samaria waivinama ya tavana upa redunama aubainama, be Yesu inam waivinama ya riuena, “Upa kwa utegu be yà tego.”
43004008	Be Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama taudi inam dabudine nam mate. Taudi a naḡona meagaie kani gimeridima aubainama.
43004009	Dabudine Samaria waivinama Yesu ya base be ya riuena, “Tam Jius banegimma be taugu Samaria waiviguma, be aba aubainama tam taugu kwa riuriueguna da upa yà utem?” Tauna nama ya riuna, baninama Jius banegidima nam airaḡan Samaria banegidima mate tiwai rawateḡeidina.
43004010	Dabudine Yesu ya paribee be ya riuena, “Deḡoda tam Mamaitua na puyoma sibo ku kataiena, naumeki da taugu mate sibo kuya kataieguna, inam raḡanine tam tokare kuyai baḡagu be yawasana upanama sibo è utem be kuya tegona.”
43004011	Dabudine waivi ya riuna, “Bada, tam anirau redu ḡarome nam ima kenakenana da upa kwa redu, dom ya dau kauana. Yawasana upanama nema kwa redu bake?
43004012	Waḡawaḡadama waḡedima Jeikob uma upanama ya uteutemaina, tam tauna kuya saḡapore, bo? Jeikob be na sedama be na yosima mate uma upanama a tegotegona.”
43004013	Be Yesu inam waivinama ya paribee be ya riuna, “Aitauḡa uma upane ta tegotegona, taudi tokare nuedima e raukasakasa munaḡana,
43004014	be aitau da upa taugu yà ute be e tegona, tauna nam airaḡan nuanama e raukasakasa munaḡa. Be uma upanama taugu yà ute be tauna nopone bigabiga maika e manini watanana, be yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama e paḡona.”
43004015	Dabudine waivi ya riuena, “Inam upanama kwa utegu da nam airaḡan nuaguma e raukasakasa munaḡa be uma dabudine upa redunama aubainama nam yài veraverau.”
43004016	Be Yesu inam waivinama ya riuena, “Kwa naḡo be am tauḡomama kwa riue be mate ko verauna.”
43004017	Dabudine waivi ya riuna, “Ai, taugu nam ei naḡina.” Be Yesu ya riuena, “Inam riukaua,
43004018	be tam noḡone tautauḡoma 5 kuya naḡidina, be tauḡoma yodi vadae kuya gose be kuya verauna inam nam tam am tauḡoma.”
43004019	Dabudine waivi ya riuna, “Taugu yodi è kataie da tam peroveta.
43004020	Tauma tamatamamaima uma oyanama debane Mamaitua a rarau duneena. Be taumi Jius ko riuriuna da Jerusalem inam vutuna aniraudune gabunama, be dabudine banaga sibo Mamaitua a rauduneena.”
43004021	Be Yesu waivi umanama ya riuena, “Aba yà riuriuena, kwai sumaḡena, raḡan e veraverauna e tavana, inam raḡanine banaga uma oyanama debane Tamadama ta raudunee bo Jerusalemma ta rauduneena, inam nam aiyaba, inam matabuna naumeki.
43004022	Taumi Samaria banegimima Mamaitua ko rarau duneena nam ko katai kauena. Be tauma kè katai kaue be ka rarau duneena, baninama Tauwai yawasana tokare Jius ḡarodie be e verauna.
43004023	“Be raḡan e veraverauna e tavana, vutuna yodi ya tavana. Arua Babau na rewapanama banaga nopodie e noyanoyana da taudi riukaue Tamadama Mamaitua ta rauduneena. Tamadama Mamaitua inam nama rauduneenama e ḡoeḡoe kauena.
43004024	Baninama Mamaitua tauna Arua, vutuna aubainama taurauduneenama taudi naumeki da Arue be riukaue ta rauduneena.”
43004025	Dabudine waivi Yesu ya riuena, “Taugu è kataiena da Tauwai yawasana tawai isana Keriso, tauna e veraverauna. Tauna e tavana raḡanine, tokare yaba matabudi ḡaromaie e giu waibatedina.”
43004026	Dabudine Yesu ya riuna, “Inam vutuna taugu, yodi tam mate tàwai giuna.”
43004027	Inam raḡanine Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama a tava munaḡa da ta kitana be Yesu inam waivinama mate awai giuna, dabudine taudi a base kauena. Be nam aitau Yesu i taravirena da tauna aba inam waivinama ḡarone ya ḡoeḡoe, bo aba aubainama inam waivinama mate awai giu.
43004028	Dabudine waivi upa duginama ya gose pore da ya munaḡana meagaie be banaga umanama ya riuedina,
43004029	“Ko verau be tauḡoma tenaḡa ko kita. Tauna abaḡa boni è voivoiedina matabuna ya giuedina. Tauna agunai Tauwai yawasana?”
43004030	Naumeki da banaga meagai a gose pore be a naḡona Yesu ḡarone.
43004031	Inam kauidima a tubutubuḡana maika, tauwai muriwatana Yesu a riuena da tauna kani sibo ya kanina.
43004032	Be Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taugu yau kanima e kenakenana yà kanina, taumi nam ko kataiena.”
43004033	Dabudine tauwai muriwatana ai giu vivira be a riuna, “Banaga aitau agunai muriḡa ya tava, be kani ya utena.”
43004034	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Taugu yau kanima inam tauriuporeguma na ḡoanama yà voiena, be noya ya uteuteguna yai kovina.
43004035	Taumi ko riuriuna da nawaravi 4 ta kovi be muridie maura e ravusana. Be yodi ko kita, maura kaiteka ya tavana.
43004036	Maura taurawatupanama, taudi tokare adi maesama verenama ta paḡona. Be maura ta rawarawa tupatupana inam giunama, baninama taudi banaga ta veraverauḡedina Mamaitua na waiguyauma nopone. Be taukuma be maura taurawatupanama, taudi rabuidi tokare tai nuavere tenaḡana.
43004037	Inam riunama ‘Banaga ḡesau taukuma, be banaga ḡesau maura taurawatupanama’, inam riukaua.
43004038	Avedi da taumi nam ko sipina, be taugu è riuporemina da maura ko rawatupetupedina. Banaga ḡesaudima a noyana be taumi nonoḡinama ko rawatupatupana.”
43004039	Dabudine Samaria banegidima toitoi inam meagaine Yesu ai sumaḡena, baninama waivi umanama ya giuna aubainama, “Taugu abaḡa boni è voivoiedina, matabuna tauna ya giuedina.”
43004040	Be Samaria banegidima Yesu ḡarone a tavatavana raḡanine, taudi Yesu ai baḡana da mate sibo adi meagaie a miana. Naumeki da Yesu taudi mate raḡan rabui kavakava a miana.
43004041	Be Yesu na rauguguyama kana taiye banaga riba ai sumaḡana.
43004042	Dabudine taudi waivi a riuena, “Noḡone tauma am giuma aubainama kèi sumaḡana, be yodi tauma mabimaie tauna na giuma kè vaie be kèi sumaḡana, yodi kè kataiena da tauna riukaua Tauwai yawasana dobu matabuna aubainama.”
43004043	Be raḡan rabui muridie Yesu inam meagainama ya gose, be ya naḡona Galilima.
43004044	Ko noḡoti da Yesu boni ya riuna da peroveta na dobu ḡomae nam tima vivivivirena.
43004045	Tauna Galilima ya tavatavana raḡanine, Galili banegidima ai aninena, baninama taudi na voiama dosidima Jerusalemma Naḡopore soinama nopone a kitedina aubainama.
43004046	Be Yesu na vaḡaie ya munaḡana Keinama deḡo maiḡone upa ya voie be yai rawawaenna. Be inam meagaine gabeman tenaḡa ya miamiana, tauna natunama tauḡominama Kapeniamma ya sida kauana.
43004047	Inam tauḡominama e vaiena be Yesu Judiaḡa ya veraverauna Galilima. Naumeki da tauna Yesu yai baḡana da tauna na vadae sibo ya naḡo be natunama yai yawasanina, inam gomeninama ḡaubonaḡa da sibo ya gurina.
43004048	Be Yesu ya riuena, “Taumi sibo koyawai sumaḡana, be nam mataira kitanama koyawai rabe.”
43004049	Be gabeman ya riuna, “Bada, kwa verau makai muriḡa da natuguma e gurina.”
43004050	Be Yesu gabeman ya riuena, “Kwa naḡo natumma ya yawasana.” Be gabeman Yesu aba ya riuriuena yai sumaḡe be ya naḡona.
43004051	Gabeman tauna ya munaḡa ya naḡonaḡo be na taunoyama kedae a banavi be a riuena, “Natumma ya yawasanana.”
43004052	Dabudine gabeman taudi yai taraviredina da suara aba gomana ya yawasana. Be taudi gabeman a paribee be a riuna, “Maiḡo suaratopu 1 okoroki poyapoya gomana ya gosena.”
43004053	Be dabudine gomana tamanama e noḡotina be maiḡo inam suerinama nama ruvane Yesu ya riuna, “Natumma ya yawasanana.” Dabudine tauna be na vadama noponama banegidima mate, matabudi Yesu ai sumaḡena.
43004054	Uma inam mataira aniwai rabuinama Yesu Galili provinsne ya voiena.
43005001	Uma kauinama muridie Yesu ya saḡa ya naḡona Jerusalemma Jius adi soima aubainama.
43005002	Be Jerusalem gananama bogane matakeda tenaḡa, inam Sipu adi matakedama. Be inam matakedanama diane topa ya midimidina, Hibru bonane tawai isana Betesda. Be inam topanama dianaḡa banaga sidesidedima adi vaguruma kerikeridima matabudi 5 a midimidina.
43005003	Be vagurudima nopodie anikaba miae banaga sidesidedima toitoi a miamiana. Banaga ḡesaudima matapotepotedima, ḡesaudima kaḡa nuakudukududima, be ḡesaudima nuakudukududima.
43005004	Taudi awai rabana da upa sibo yai burukwakwakwana.
43005005	Be nopodie banaga tenaḡa dabudine kaḡanama ya nuakuduna modi 38 a kovina.
43005006	Yesu inam tauḡominama doḡae ya kenakenana ya kitana, be ya vaie da inam tauḡominama sida bonideḡo ya paḡona. Dabudine Yesu inam tauḡominama yai taravirena, “Tam yawasana kwa ḡoeḡoe bo ibewa?”
43005007	Be tauḡoma ya paribee be ya riuena, “Bada, topa ewai dagudaguna raḡanine, taugu nam aitau turagu da ya sagugu be topae sibo è naḡo. Taugu topae naḡonama yàwai taina raḡanine, banaga ḡesaunama kaite e dokadoka ḡomena.”
43005008	Dabudine Yesu tauḡoma ya riuena, “Kwa midisuḡu, am duyama kwa paḡo be kwa naḡo.”
43005009	Inam dabudine yai raḡantenaḡe da tauḡoma ya yawasanana, be na duyama ya paḡo da ya naḡona. Inam kauinama Sabat raḡanine ya tubuḡana,
43005010	vutuna aubainama Jius babadidima tauḡoma ya yawayawasanana umanama a riuena, “Manaka Sabat! Tarawatu e riuriuna tam am duyama nam kwa kiroḡi!”
43005011	Be tauḡoma ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Banaga tauwai yawasaniguma tauna ya riueguna, ‘Am duyama kwa kiroḡi be kwa naḡo.’”
43005012	Be taudi tauḡominama ai taravirena, “Inam ai banaga nama ya riuem da tam am duyama sibo kuya kiroḡi, wa?”
43005013	Be tauḡoma nam i kataiena aitau tauna yai yawasani, baninama Yesu patara nopodie ya rausonaḡe be ya naḡona.
43005014	Muriḡanama Yesu inam tauḡominama tempol nopone ya banavi be ya riuena, “Yodi kuya kita, tam kuya yawasanana. Nam gewagewa kwa voia munaḡe, da tokare nam kai matane kwa naḡo.”
43005015	Naumeki da tauḡoma ya naḡo be Jius babadidima yai varidina da Yesu tauna yai yawasanina.
43005016	Yesu Sabat raḡandie noya ya voivoiedina. Vutuna aubainama Jius babadidima tauna raukivigewegewenama ai karena.
43005017	Be Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Taugu Tamaguma raḡan matabuna na noyama è voivoiena naumeki da yodi. Vutuna aubainama taugu mate yà noyanoyana.”
43005018	Uma giudima aubainama Jius a rarau rubu guratana da sibo Yesu ai gurina, nam Sabat tarawatunama waikatikotovinama taunaḡa debane, ibewa be mate tauna ya riuriuna da Mamaitua inam tauna Tamaḡominama. Be inam kauine tauna kabe Mamaitua i ruvaruva.
43005019	Be Yesu umanama ya paribeedina, “Taugu yà riuriu kauemina da Mamaitua Natunama nam tokare mabine aba e voiedi, ibewa. Tauna Tamanama abaḡa ya voiedi be ya kitakitana, vutudiḡa tauna e voivoiedina.
43005020	Baninama Tamanama Natunama nuanama ya paḡona aubainama, yaba matabudi ya voivoiedina nama tauna Natunama yai katai be e voivoiedina. Be Natunama tokare voia ḡesaudima dosidima mate e voiedi be ko basedina, be nam banaga waiyawasaninama taunaḡa.
43005021	Tamanama banaga gurie be e kawakawa midisuḡu munaḡedina, be kauinama teneḡinama nama Natunama na ḡoane banaga gurie be e kawa midisuḡu munaḡedi, be yawasana ta paḡopaḡona.
43005022	Be Tamanama etara matabudi Natunama nimane ya biridina
43005023	da banaga matabudi sibo Natunama a vivirena Tamanama ta vivivivirena maika. Be aitauḡa Natunama nam tima vivivivirena, taudi Tamanama mate nam tima vivivivirena, baninama Tamanama tauna vutuna Natunama ya riuporena.
43005024	“Taugu yà riuriu kauemina aitauḡa da yau giuma ta vaivaie, be tauriuporeguma tawai sumaḡena, taudi yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama kaite a paḡona, be nam tokare ta naḡo gienae. Taudi gurie be a davuna yawasanae.
43005025	“Be mate yà riuriu kauemina da raḡan e veraverauna e tavana, vutuna yodi ya tavana. Inam raḡanine banaga guriguridima taudi taugu Mamaitua Natunama bonaguma tai beavaiena, be aitauḡa bonaguma ta vaivaiena, taudi tokare yawasana ta paḡona.
43005026	Taugu nama è riuemina, baninama Tamaguma tauna vutuna yawasana pakanama, be inam yawasaninama tauna nopone e kenakenana. Be tauna ya voie da Natunama mate nopone inam yawasaninama e kenakenana.
43005027	Be tauna rewapana Natunama ya utena da banaga e etaredina, baninama tauna vutuna Banaga Natunama.
43005028	Nam ko base da raḡan e veraverauna e tavana, inam raḡanine banaga kokoagae kenekenedima matabudi tokare Mamaitua Natunama bonanama ta vaie be ta midisuḡuna.
43005029	Be aitauḡa vere a voivoiena, taudi ta midisuḡu be ta yawasana nonoḡana. Be aitauḡa gewagewa a voivoiena, taudi ta midisuḡu be gienae ta naḡona, inam vutuna adi kovoḡama.
43005030	Taugu nam nuague yaba ama voivoiedina, ibewa da Tamaguma yaba ewai aninedina ruvane, nama yà voivoiedina. Vutuna aubainama yau rauetarama inam didimaninama, baninama tauriuporeguma ya riuriueguna, ruvane nama banaga yà etaetaredina, be nam taugu yau ḡoane.
43005031	“Deḡoda taugume yai matamata munaḡeguna, tokare yau giuma nam tai kawa riukaue.
43005032	Be taugu è kataiena da tauwai matemateguma ḡesau tauna taugu e giugiueguna, inam matabuna riukaua.
43005033	Taumi boni tauwai noyanoya koya riupore nawedina Jon ḡarone, be tauna ḡarodie taugu ya giueguna inam matabuna riukaua.
43005034	Taugu Jon na giuma yà riuriu wainoḡotimina da taumi yawasana ko banavina. Be taugu yau matamatama inam nam banaga ḡoma.
43005035	Jon tauna kodam maika ya yanayanana, be taumi na yanae ami ḡoanama ruvane raḡan ḡaubonaḡa koyawai nuaverena.
43005036	Jon aubaiguma aba ya giugiuemina, inam matabuna ya verena. Be taugu yau matamatama vere vavasaḡidima inam voia dosidima, Tamaguma ya uteuteguna yà voivoiedina. Inam voiedima dosidima tawai maḡatarana da taugu Tamaguma ya riuporeguna.
43005037	Be Tamaguma tauriuporeguma tauna mate aubaiguma riukaue e giugiuna. Be taumi nam airaḡan bonanama ko vaie bo noḡonama ko kitana.
43005038	Tauna ya riuporeguna be taumi nam koi sumaḡeguna, vutuna aubainama na giuma nopomie nam tima kenakenana.
43005039	“Taumi buka poredima ko sievidi be kowai nuanoḡonoḡotedina da kabe yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama dabudine ko banavi. Be inam bukanama taugu e giugiueguna,
43005040	taumi sibo ḡarogue koya verau be yawasana koya paḡona. Be taumi debemima ya bado kauana.
43005041	“Deḡoda taumi ko kawa saḡegu bo ibewa, inam giudima taugu ḡarogue nam banibiribiridi,
43005042	baninama taugu è kataiena da taumi nopomie Mamaitua nam komawai nuapaḡoena.
43005043	Taugu Tamaguma isane ḡaromie è yovona, be taumi nam koi anineguna. Be deḡoda banaga ḡesau tauname isane ḡaromie e tavatavana, taumi kowai aninena.
43005044	Vutuna aubainama taumi nam teneteneḡina da koi sumaḡegu, baninama taumi ami banagama ta kawa saḡemina, vutuna ko ḡoeḡoe guratena. Be Mamaitua sibo taumi ya kawa saḡemina, taumi nam koma ḡoeḡoena.
43005045	“Be taugu tokare Tamaguma ḡarone nam ya samanimi. Taumi ami voiama maika kabe Mousis kowai muriwatane be kowai sumaḡe. Be Mousis tauna tokare Tamaguma ḡarone e samanimina,
43005046	be deḡoda taumi Mousis koi sumaḡena, naumeki da taugu mate sibo koyai sumaḡeguna, baninama Mousis na bukae taugu mate ya giueguna.
43005047	Be deḡoda tauna aba ya girugirumidina nam koi sumaḡedi, naumeki da taugu yau giuma tokare nema koi sumaḡa bakedi?”
43006001	Raḡan bisanama muridie Yesu wagae ya geru be yawawa Galilima ya davu be ya naḡona noaḡo nevane gerese. Be inam yawawinama isanama ḡesau ta riuriuna: Taiberias yawawinama.
43006002	Be patara dosinama Yesu ai muriwatanena, baninama tauna mataira dosidima banaga sidesidedima ḡarodie ya voivoiedina aubainama.
43006003	Dabudine Yesu tauna ya saḡa ya naḡona oyae be na tauwai muriwatanama mate a miana.
43006004	(Be Naḡopore soinama raḡaninama kaiteka maida ya tavatava be uma kauidima a tubuḡana.)
43006005	Be Yesu patara ya kitedi be tauna ḡarone a saḡasaḡana, dabudine tauna Pilip ya riuena, “Kani deḡo tà gimara be uma banegidima tai kanidi?”
43006006	Tauna nama ya riuna Pilip raurubunama aubainama, be Yesu kaite ya katai munaḡena da tauna tokare aba e voiena.
43006007	Be Pilip ya paribee be ya riuna, “Ai Bada, deḡoda tauda ḡarode 200 Denari sibo i kena be kani sibo tè gimarana, yaḡoro uma patarinama matabuna tokare nam tei kanidi be teneteneḡina.”
43006008	Dabudine Saemon Pita tuaḡanama Endru ya riuna,
43006009	“Uma gomeninama tauḡominama ḡaubonama, tauna ḡarone buredi 5 be iyana rabui ta kenakenana. Be inam nam teneteneḡina uma patara ya moraba kauana.”
43006010	Dabudine Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina, “Banaga matabudi ko riuedi da ta mia.” Naumeki da banaga matabudi mui debedie a miana. Be tautauḡoma sievinama 5 tausand nama.
43006011	Naumeki da tauna buredi ya ragaudi, da Mamaitua yai kaiwe be patara ḡarodie buredi ya soiedina. Be murine kauinama teneḡinama nama iyana ya voiena. Be banaga matabudi a kani da a kani siauana.
43006012	Be banaga a kanikani kovina murine, Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina, “Yodi ko naḡo be kani kanikani gosedima matabudi ko rawateḡeteḡeidi, nam i verena da kani tai yakaredi.”
43006013	Naumeki da taudi buredi kanikani gosedima matabudi a rawateḡeteḡeidi be posa matabudi 12 ai moḡavudina.
43006014	Be raḡanine banaga uma matairinama nama a kitakitana, taudi a riuna, “Tauna vutuna riukaua da peroveta boni a riuriuena yodi ya tavana.”
43006015	Yesu ya kita da taudi a ḡoeḡoena da tauna sibo a kawa guyau makaiena. Vutuna aubainama Yesu taunaḡa ya rausonaḡe be oya debane ya naḡona.
43006016	-
43006017	Naumeki da ravi ya tavana, be Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ḡarodie nam i tava munaḡana. Vutuna aubainama taudi a dobi be a munaḡana gerese. Be dabudine wagae a geru da yawawa a davu be a naḡona Kapeniamma.
43006018	Taudi a taunaḡo ḡaubonaḡa be sive dosinama yai ravusa be rabama yai karena.
43006019	Inam raḡanine ta kitana be Yesu topa debanaḡa ya babara be ḡarodie ya naḡonaḡona. Dabudine taudi a naira kauana,
43006020	be tauna ya riuedina, “Taugu! Nam ko naira!”
43006021	Dabudine tauwai muriwatana a ḡoeḡoena da tauna sibo a soru tavaitena wagae. Be yai raḡantenaḡe da waga kaite noaḡo nevane gerese ya midimidina.
43006022	Pomai raḡanboiboi patara muridie a gosegosedina, taudi Yesu a raberabena, baninama taudi maiḡo ravie a kita da waga tenaḡa kavakava dabudine ya midimidina be tauwai muriwatana taudiḡa inam wagane a geru da a naḡona, be nam Yesu mate.
43006023	Be waga ḡesaudima Taiberiasḡa a veraverauna a tava da deḡo Bada buredi yai aiaini be banaga a kanikanina, dabudine a ḡotana.
43006024	Raḡanine patara ta kitana be Yesu be na tauwai muriwatanama mate taudi nam dabudi, naumeki da inam wagedie a geru be a munaḡana Kapeniamma Yesu wanenama aubainama.
43006025	Raḡanine taudi noaḡo nevane a tava be Yesu a banabanavina raḡanine, taudi ai taravire be a riuena, “Tauwai katakatai, tam nema kuya verau bako?”
43006026	Be Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Maiḡo taugu èi kani siauemina, aubainama taumi taugu ko wanewaneguna. Be yau voiama dosidima aba tawai maḡataridina yaḡoro taumi nam koma katakataiena. Be inam voiedima tawai maḡatariguna da Mamaitua taugu ya riuporeguna.
43006027	Taumi nam kani ḡoma aubainama ko noyanoya, avedi, inam tokare ta bova be tai kavena. Be taumi yawasana kaninama ko wanena, vutuna tokare e kena nonoḡana. Yodibe Banaga Natunama yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama è utemina, baninama Tamadama Mamaitua tauna vutuna yai aninena.”
43006028	Be taudi ai taravire be a riuna, “Mamaitua aba e ḡoeḡoena ka voie?”
43006029	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Mamaitua na ḡoanama inam aitau ya riuriuporena tauna koi sumaḡena.”
43006030	Be taudi a riuena, “Aba matairinama kwa voie da tauma ka kita, yodibe kai sumaḡemna.
43006031	Maika girugiruminama porane ya riuna da Mousis waḡawaḡadama mara kaninama ya utedi be a kanina dobu kavakavane a babababarana raḡanine.”
43006032	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Ibewa, yà riuriu kauemina da inam nam Mousis mara kaninama i utedina. Ibewa da Tamaguma marae miemieninama ya utedina be yodi tauna mara kani ḡominama e uteutemina.
43006033	Be mara kani ḡominama inam tauna aitau marae be ya yovona da banaga matabuna dobue ei yawasanidina.”
43006034	Be taudi a riuna, “Bada, inam kaninama raḡan patapatanama kwa utemai.”
43006035	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Yawasana kaninama inam vutuna taugu! Be aitauḡa ḡarogue ta veraverauna, taudi nam airaḡan kani e karatidi, be aitauḡa tawai sumaḡeguna, taudi nam airaḡan nuedima e raukasakasa.
43006036	Be taumi ko kitakitaguna, be yaḡoro nam komawai sumaḡeguna.
43006037	Be taudi aitauḡa Tamaguma ya uteuteguna, taudi tokare ḡarogue ta verauna, be taugu tokare nam yà riutuaḡaiedi.
43006038	Taugu marae be è yovona tauriuporeguma na ḡoanama yà voiena aubainama, be nam taugu.
43006039	Be Mamaitua na ḡoanama inam umanama, tauna aitauḡa taugu ya uteuteguna nam tenaḡa maika yà viri yakasi, ibewa da raḡan damone taudi tokare gurie be yà kawa midisuḡu munaḡedina.
43006040	Tamaguma na ḡoanama inam banaga aitauḡa Mamaitua Natunama ta kita be tawai sumaḡena, taudi tokare yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama ta paḡona, be raḡan damone taudi gurie be yà kawa midisuḡu munaḡedina.”
43006041	Inam raḡanine Jius banegidima momodu ai karena, baninama Yesu ya riuna da tauna vutuna kani marae, be ya yovona.
43006042	Be taudi a riuna, “Uma tauna Yesu, Jousep natunama. Na dosima tauda tè kataiedina. Be nemanama da tauna e riuriuna, ‘Taugu marae be è yovona.’”?
43006043	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Momodu ko gose pore!
43006044	Nam aitau teneḡinama da tokare ḡarogue e verau. Be Tamaguma tauriuporeguma aitauḡa e veraverauḡedina ḡarogue, taudi tokare ḡarogue ta verauna. Be taudi vutudi tokare raḡan damone gurie be yà kawa midisuḡu munaḡedina.
43006045	Baninama girugiruminama porane peroveta umanama a riuna, ‘Taudi matabudi Mamaitua tokare ei kataidina.’ Be aitauḡa Tamaguma bonanama tawai beavaie be riunama ta paḡopaḡona, taudi tokare ḡarogue ta verauna.
43006046	Nam aitau tenaḡa Tamadama i kita rubuna. Ibewa da taugu Mamaitua ḡarone be è yovona, tauguḡa Tamadama è kitana.
43006047	“Yà riuriu kauemina, aitau da taugu ewai sumaḡeguna, tauna kaite yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama ya paḡona.
43006048	Yawasana kaninama inam vutuna taugu!
43006049	Taumi waḡewaḡemima boni dobu kavakavane mana a kanikanina, yaḡoro a gurina.
43006050	Be aitau uma kaninama marae yovoyovonama e kanina, tauna tokare nam e guri.
43006051	Be taugu vutuna yawasana kaninama marae be è yovona. Be aitau da inam kaninama e kanina, tauna tokare e mia nonoḡana. Be inam kaninama vutuna taugu tubuḡa ḡomiguma yai utaena, da dobue banaga ta yawasanana aubainama.”
43006052	Dabudine Jius banegidima ai saḡasaḡa gurata be a riuna, “Nemanama da uma baneginama tubuḡinama e uteda be tà kani?”
43006053	Be Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Yà riuriu kauemina, deḡoda Banaga Natunama tubuḡinama nam taumi ko kani be kosininama nam ko tego, taumi nopomie yawasana ibewa.
43006054	Be aitau da tubuḡa ḡomiguma e kanikani be kosiniguma e tegotegona, tauna yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama kaite ya paḡona. Be raḡan damone tokare gurie be yà kawa midisuḡu munaḡedina.
43006055	Baninama taugu tubuḡa ḡomiguma inam vutuna kani kaua. Be kosiniguma inam vutuna tego kaua.
43006056	Be aitau da tubuḡa ḡomiguma e kanikani be kosiniguma e tegotegona, tauna taugu nopogue be taugu tauna nopone.
43006057	Tamaguma yawayawasaninama ya riuriuporeguna na rewapanae taugu yà miamiana. Teneḡinama nama aitauḡa taugu ta kanikaniguna, taudi tokare yau rewapanae ta miana.
43006058	Be taugu vutuna kani kaua marae be è yovona. Taumi waḡewaḡemima boni mana a kanikanina, taudi a gurina. Be aitau uma kaninama e kanina, tauna tokare e mia nonoḡana.”
43006059	Yesu inam giudima matabudi Kapeniamma sinagog nopone banaga yai katakataidina.
43006060	Be raḡanine Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama toitoi nama giudima a vaivaiedina, taudiḡa ai giu vivira be a riuna, “Uma waikatakatainama nam i vere kauana, aitau tokare e paḡo?”
43006061	Dabudine Yesu ya kataie da na tauwai muriwatanama tauna na giuma aubainama a momomomoduna, naumeki be ya riuedina, “Taugu yau giuma ami waisumaḡama e kawakawa gewagewa, bo?
43006062	Be Banaga Natunama marae e munamunaḡana ko kitana raḡanine, taumi nema ko noḡota bako?
43006063	Mamaitua Aruinama tauna vutuna yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama banaga e uteutedina. Tubuḡa taunaḡa nam yawasana e utemi. Be taugu yau giuma aba è riuriuemina, inam vutuna Mamaitua Aruinama, yawasana e uteutemina.
43006064	Be yaḡoro taumi ḡesaumima nam komawai sumaḡeguna.” Yesu tauna noḡone ya kataiedina da aitauḡa tauna nam timawai sumaḡena, be aitau tauna tokare e boru dobiḡena.
43006065	Be Yesu giu yai kare munaḡe be ya riuna, “Vutuna aubainama noḡone è riuemina da nam aitau teneḡinama da tokare ḡarogue e verau. Be Tamaguma aitau rewapana e uteutena, tauna tokare ḡarogue e verauna.”
43006066	Uma giune Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama toitoi tauna a gose be ai naḡo teḡateḡana.
43006067	Dabudine Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama 12 a miamia kwasana yai taraviredi be ya riuna, “Taumi nemanama? Taumi mate naḡo ko ḡoeḡoe, bo?”
43006068	Be Saemon Pita Yesu ya paribee be ya riuna, “Bada, aitau ḡarone ka naḡo? Tam yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama riudima tamḡa ḡarome ta kenakenana,
43006069	be tauma kawai sumaḡemna be kè kataiena da tam vutuna Mamaitua na Babau vinevinema.”
43006070	Dabudine Yesu ya riuna, “Taumi 12 taugu è vinemina be nopomie tenaḡa tauna Seitan na taunoyama.”
43006071	Tauna inam Judas ya giugiuena. Be tauna Saemon Iskariot natunama. Be avedi da Judas tauwai muriwatana 12 nopodie, be tauna yaḡoro Yesu ya boru dobiḡena.
43007001	Inam kauidima muridie Yesu Galili noponaḡa ya babababara naḡona. Be tauna Judia naḡonama nam i ḡoena, baninama inam dabudine Jius babadidima Yesu kana kasirama a tomtomna da sibo ai gurina.
43007002	Be Kapekape soinama raḡaninama maida ya tavatavana aubainama,
43007003	Yesu tasitasinama tauna a riuena, “Tam Galili sibo kuya gose be kuya naḡona Judiama soie, be dabudine patare sibo mataira kuya voiedi be am tauwai muriwatanama sibo a kitedina.
43007004	Tam deḡoda kwa ḡoeḡoena banaga matabudi ta kataiemna, naumeki da patara matedie mataira dosidima kwa voiedina, be nam kwa miamia yababa.”
43007005	Taudi nama a riuna, baninama avedi da Yesu tasitasiḡominama taudi mate Yesu nam ti sumaḡena.
43007006	Vutuna aubainama Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Taugu yau raḡan yaḡama nam i tavana. Be taumi naumeki da ami ḡoane nama ko naḡona.
43007007	Banaga tokare nam ta tuaḡaiemi, be taugu ta tuatuaḡaieguna, baninama taugu yà riuriuedina da adi voiama a gewagewana.
43007008	Naumeki taumi ko naḡo soie, be taugu inam nam ama naḡonaḡona, baninama yau raḡan yaḡama yaḡoro nam i tavana aubainama.”
43007009	Naumeki da Yesu Galilima ya mia kwasana.
43007010	Be tasitasinama taudi a naḡonaḡona soie raḡanine, tauna mate muriḡa moisiriḡa ya naḡona soie. Be nam patare i taimaḡatarina.
43007011	Be soi nopone Jius babadidima Yesu a wane be a riuriuna, “Uma baneginama tauna deḡo?”
43007012	Be inam dabudine patara dosinama taudi kasave mareḡa Yesu awai giugiuena. Banaga ḡesaudima a riuna, “Tauna banaga verenama”. Be ḡesaudima a riuna, “Ibewa, tauna banaga e biribiri waideḡedina.”
43007013	Be nam aitau tenaḡa debanama i tora be patare i giu guratana, baninama taudi Jius babadidima a nairedina aubainama.
43007014	Soi ḡaubonaḡa da sibo ya kovina, Yesu ya saḡa ya naḡo tempol nopone be waikatakatai yai karena.
43007015	Dabudine Jius banegidima tauna a base be a riuna, “Uma baneginama tauna nam aikedae i girumana. Be nemanama da uma yabedima matabudi ya kataiedi?”
43007016	Be Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Aba yàwai katakataimina inam nam taugu nuague ama waikatakataimina. Ibewa da inam tauriuporeguma tauna na waikatakataima.
43007017	Be aitau da Mamaitua na ḡoanama voienama e ḡoeḡoena, tauna tokare e kataie da inam waikatakatainama Mamaitua na waikatakatai, bo taugume yau waikatakatai.
43007018	Banaga aitau da na noḡote e giugiuna, inam baninama tauna e rarau rubuna da banaga tauna kabe ta kawa saḡe. Be tauna aitau da tauriuporenama kawa saḡenama aubainama e giugiuna, tauna inam banaga verenama, be tokare nam ḡarone gewagewa ta banavi.
43007019	Mousis tarawatu ya utemina, be nam aitau tenaḡa inam tarawatudima kumawai muriwatanedina. Aba aubainama taugu waiguriguma ko ḡoeḡoe? Taumi inam tarawatu kowai kati kotovina.”
43007020	Dabudine banaga Yesu a riuena, “Tauma nam tam waigurimma ke riuena, tam agunai penama ya kokumna.”
43007021	Be Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Taugu Sabat raḡanine tauḡoma tenaḡa èi yawasani be taumi nuemima yai medina.
43007022	Be you, taumi mate Sabat raḡanine ko noyanoyana. Taumi Mousis na tarawatuma ruvane seda tautauḡomidima ḡarodie kopitom ko voivoiedina. Be inam vaivainama novemai Eibraham ḡarone be ya saḡana, muriḡa da Mousis tarawatu ya yovoḡena.
43007023	Deḡoda gomana Sabat raḡanine kopitom e paḡona, inam naumeki Mousis na tarawatuma na ruvae. Nama teneḡine taugu yodi banaga Sabat raḡanine èi yawasanina, yodi nemanama? Be aba aubainama yodi ḡarogue ko medimedi?
43007024	Inam kauidima ko kita yaḡedi da nam voia ḡavoe kitakitanama, vutuna ko kitakita wairuva. Avedi, be didimanae yaba ko kita wairuvedi be muriḡa da ko giuedi.”
43007025	Inam giudima aubaidima Jerusalem banegidima ḡesaudima a riuna, “Uma baneginama vutuna waigurinama ta riuriue, bo?
43007026	Tauna yodi umanema patare e giugiuna, be taudi nam aba ḡarone tima riuriuena. Agunai tauda dà babadama a banavi da tauna naumeki Tauwai yawasana.
43007027	Be inam nemanama? Uma baneginama tauda tè kataiena da tauna aikedae be ya tavana. Be Tauwai yawasana aikedae be e tavana nam aitau i kataiena.”
43007028	Yesu tauna yaḡoro tempol nopone yawai katakataina maika, tauna bonanama dosine ya riuna, “Inam riukaua taumi koya kataiena da taugu aitau be aikedae è tavana. Taugu nam yau ḡoane uma dabudine e tavana. Ibewa da Tamaguma ya riuporeguna, be tauriuporeguma riukaua e miamiana, be taumi tauna nam ko kataiena.
43007029	Be taugu tauna è kataiena, baninama taugu tauna ḡarone be è yovona. Tauna ya riuporeguna.”
43007030	Umanama giudima debedie taudi a rarau rubuna da sibo a vunuḡina, be nam ti vunuḡina, baninama na raḡan yaḡama nam i tavana aubainama.
43007031	Be patara nopodie banaga toitoi Yesu ai sumaḡe be a riuna, “Tauwai yawasana e tavana raḡanine, mataira ḡesaudima dosidima uma baneginama ya voivoiedina nama tokare e voiedi, bo? Vutuna aubainama uma tauna naumeki vutuna.”
43007032	Dabudine patara kasave Yesu awai giugiuena, Parisi a vaiedina. Vutuna aubainama taudi be pirisi adi babadama mate porisiman a riuporedina da Yesu sibo a vunuḡi be a panina.
43007033	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Taugu taumi mate raḡan ḡaubonaḡa tà miana, muriḡa be yà munaḡana tauriuporeguma ḡarone.
43007034	Taumi tokare ko waneguna be nam ko banavigu, baninama deḡo taugu yà miamiae, dabudi taumi tokare nam ko tava.”
43007035	Dabudine Jius babadidima adi banagama adi banagama mate a riuna, “Inam baneginama deḡo naḡonama ewai tai? Agunai tauna uma dobunama e gose be e naḡona wari dobue da nam tà kita munaḡe. Agunai tauna Jius banegidima ai daberaridi be wari dobue ta miamiana ḡarodie e naḡona. Bo Gurik banegidima ḡarodie e naḡo be ei katakataidina.
43007036	Tauna ya riuna, ‘Taumi tokare ko wanegu be nam ko banavigu be deḡo yà miamiana, dabudi taumi tokare nam ko tava’. Uma giudima banidima aba?”
43007037	Soi raḡaninama dosinama damone Yesu ya midisuḡu be bonanama dosine ya riuna, “Aitau da nuamma e rarau kasakasana kwa verau ḡarogue be upa yà utem be kwa tegona.
43007038	Aitau da taugu ewai sumaḡeguna, inam baneginama nopone yawasana watutunama e manini dobina maika girugiruminama porane ya riuriuna nama.”
43007039	Yesu upa ya giuena inam Arua e giugiuena, be taudi aitauḡa tauna tawai sumaḡena tokare e utedina. Inam raḡanine Arua yaḡoro nam i yovona, baninama Yesu yaḡoro dobue ya miamiana, tauna nam gurie i midisuḡu be i naḡona marae.
43007040	Be banaga umanama giudima a vaivaiedina, dabudine ḡesaudima a riuna, “Riukaua da inam tauḡominama tauna vutuna peroveta Mamaitua ya sausaugena raḡan damone e tavana, vutuna yodi ya tavana.”
43007041	Be banaga ḡesaudima a riuna, “Tauna Tauwai yawasana.” Be ḡesaudima a riuna, “Ibewa, Tauwai yawasana nam tokare Galilima be e verau,
43007042	baninama girugiruminama porane e riuriuna da Tauwai yawasana tauna guyau Deivid na damma nopone e tubuḡana. Be tauna tokare Deivid na meagaie Betliemma be e verauna.”
43007043	Naumeki da Yesu kana taiye banaga adi noḡotama ruvedie nama a dariḡa munaḡedina.
43007044	Banaga ḡesaudima a ḡoeḡoena da sibo a vunuḡina, be nam aitau tenaḡa nimanama Yesu tunine i boru rubuna.
43007045	Naumeki da porisiman a tava munaḡana Parisi be pirisi adi babadama ḡarodie. Be inam babadidima porisiman ai taraviredi be a riuna, “Aba aubainama Yesu nam ko vunuḡi be ko pani verauḡe?”
43007046	Be porisiman a riuna, “Uma baneginama na giuma ai rewapana kauana, nam aitau airaḡan nama i giu rubu be ke vaiena.”
43007047	Be Parisi a riuedina, “Taumi mate yodi tauna kowai murinaḡonaḡo, bo? Tauna inam banaga tauboru waideḡedima.
43007048	Ami babadama be tauma Parisi ko kitamai, inam tauḡominama kawai muriwatane, bo?
43007049	Ibewa, be uma pataridima buebuedima tarawatu nam ti kataiena, vutuna aubainama tokare Mamaitua ei tara tautauedina.”
43007050	Dabudine Parisi tenaḡa isanama Nikodimas, tauna vutuna boni Yesu ḡarone ya tavatavana, tauna ya midisuḡu be ya riuna,
43007051	“Tauda dà tarawatuma nema e riuriu bakeda? Banaga tà kovoḡa yababe, bo noḡone tà etara doke be muriḡa tà kovoḡi?”
43007052	Dabudine na banagama a paribee be a riuna, “Tam mate Galili banegim, bo? Girugiruminama porane kwa sievi be kwa kita da nema e riu bakem. Nam airaḡan peroveta Galiliḡa tokare e verau.”
43007053	Naumeki da ai daberaridi be tenatenaḡaḡa a naḡona adi vadae.
43008001	Be Yesu tauna ya naḡona oya olip debane.
43008002	Pomainama raḡanboiboi tauna ya munaḡana tempol nopone be dabudine patara a rawateḡeidina. Naumeki da tauna ya mia be waikatakataidima yai karena.
43008003	Tauna dabudi ya giugiuna maika, tarawatu tauwai katakataidima be Parisi taudi waivi tenaḡa a kita banavina, tauna na banagama debedie mui tauporenama. Vutuna aubainama taudi a verauḡena Yesu ḡarone. Be waivinama a riue da patara noḡodie ya midi
43008004	be taudi Yesu a riuena, “Tauwai katakatai, uma waivinama na banagama debedie mui ya porepore be kè banavina.
43008005	Nema kwa noḡonoḡota bake? Mousis na tarawatuma e riuriuna da umanama waivinama tauma sibo kè rauyeku be ya gurina.”
43008006	Be inam babadidima taudi keda a wanewanena da Yesu sibo aba ya vato waigewa be inam giudie sibo ai wavuna. Be Yesu ya raudune yovo be nimarakurakune doḡa debane yawai girugirumana.
43008007	Be taudi yaḡoro waitaravira awai borudidina. Naumeki da Yesu ya tausuḡu be ya riuedina, “Tam aitau da gewagewa nam ku voia rubuna, naumeki da tam banegimma yeku kwa rubu dokena.”
43008008	Dabudine tauna ya raudune munaḡa be doḡa debane waigirugiruma yai kare munaḡena.
43008009	Raḡanine waivi tauwai wavunama nama giunama a vaivaiena, naumeki da tenatenaḡaḡa ai naḡo teḡeteḡedina, be babada poredima taudi inam a doka ḡomedina. Be Yesu inam waivinama mate taudiḡa a gose poredina.
43008010	Naumeki da Yesu ya tausuḡu be waivinama yai taravirena, “Tauwai wavumama aikedae a naḡo? Taudi nam ti rauyekum, bo?”
43008011	Be waivi ya riuna, “Ibewa Bada.” Be Yesu tauna ya riuena, “Taugu mate nam tokare yà rauyekum. Kwa naḡona, be nam gewagewa kwa voie munaḡe!”
43008012	Yesu patara ḡarodie giu yai kare munaḡa be ya riuna, “Taugu vutuna dobu na yanama. Aitau da taugu ewai muriwataneguna, tauna tokare nam tadiwanawanae ei suratou naḡo. Ibewa da tauna nopone yana e kenana, inam raḡanine yawasana e banavina.”
43008013	Be Parisi taudi a paribee be a riuna, “Tam inam kaiyovue tamḡa aubaimma kwa giugiu raukosoḡaiḡai.”
43008014	Be Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Deḡoda taugume aubaiguma sibo è giu raukosoḡaiḡaina, inam yaḡoro riukaua. Baninama taugu aikedae è verau be aikedae yà naḡonaḡona taugu è kataiena, be taumi nam ko kataiena.
43008015	“Taumi ko etaetareguna inam banaga ḡoma ami noḡotama ruvane ko etaetareguna. Be taugu nam aitau ama etaetarena.
43008016	Be deḡoda taugu banaga etaredima è ḡoena, taugu yau rauetarama tokare didimanae è voiena, baninama Tamaguma tauriuporeguma murigue e midimidina, be nam tauguḡa ama miamiana.
43008017	Taumi ami tarawatuma e riuriuna da raḡanine matamata rabui giu teneḡinama ta vatona, inam giunama banaga tokare nam ta riuwai kaikaiyovu.
43008018	Taugu inam matemie yodi aubaiguma yà giugiuna, be wairabuiguma inam Tamaguma tauna vutuna tauriuporeguma.”
43008019	Dabudine taudi Yesu a riuena, “Yodi tamamma deḡo?” Be Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Taumi taugu Tamaguma mate nam ko kataiemaina. Deḡoda taugu sibo ko kataieguna, taumi tokare Tamaguma mate koya kataiena.”
43008020	Yesu tauna tempol nopone deḡo mane aniborunama gabune, dabudi ya midi be inam yabedima matabudi yai katakataidina. Be nam aitau Yesu i kaididi be i pani nawena, baninama tauna na raḡan yaḡama yaḡoro nam i tavana.
43008021	Be Yesu inam babadidima ya riu munaḡedina, “Taugu tokare yà naḡona, be taumi ko waneguna be ami gewagewae tokare ko gurina. Be deḡo yà naḡonaḡona, taumi tokare nam dabudi ko tava.”
43008022	Be Jius babadidima a riuna, “Yodi agunai waiguri munaḡenama ewai nuanoḡonoḡotena. Vutuna aubainama tauna ya riuna, ‘Deḡo yà naḡonaḡona, taumi tokare nam dabudi ko tava’. Bo inam giunama baninama aba?”
43008023	Dabudi Yesu na giuma ya kaiwatani be ya riuedina, “Taumi inam uma dobunama ḡaronama, be taugu ibewa. Taugu inam note banagiguma.
43008024	Vutuna aubainama è riuemina da taumi tokare ami gewagewae ko gurina. Be taugu inam vutuna taugu. Be deḡoda nam koi sumaḡegu, taumi tokare naumeki da ami gewagewae ko gurina.”
43008025	Be taudi a riuena, “Tam aitau?” Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Kaite yà riuriuemina, taugu inam vutuna taugu.
43008026	Taumi ami voiama debane nema sibo è riuriu bakemina, be tokare nam nama yà voia. Be tauna aitau tauriuporeguma riukaua da tauna e miamiana. Tauna vutuna aba e riuriueguna ruvane, nama dobue banaga yà riuriuedina.”
43008027	Be banaga dabudine taudi nam ti kataiena da tauna inam Tamanama ya giugiuena.
43008028	Vutuna aubainama Yesu ya riuna, “Raḡanine taumi Banaga Natunama ko kaisuḡu be koi dawena, inam raḡanine taumi tokare ko kataiegu da taugu vutuna taugu. Be taugu nam yau ḡoane yaba ama giugiuedina, ibewa da Tamaguma nema ewai katakataiguna ruvane, nama yà giugiuedina.
43008029	Tauriuporeguma tauna raḡan matabuna taugu mate be nam ima gosegoseguna, baninama taugu raḡan matabuna na ḡoanama yà voiedi be tauna ewai nuaverena.”
43008030	Banaga toitoi uma giudima a vaivaiena, taudi Yesu ai sumaḡena.
43008031	Taudi aitauḡa Yesu awai sumaḡena, tauna ya riuedina, “Deḡoda yau waikatakataima ko kaidididi be ko voteyeteyedina, taumi riukaua da yau tauwai muriwatanama.
43008032	Inam raḡanine taumi riukaua ko kataie be riukaua taumi e kuvesimina.”
43008033	Be taudi a paribee be a riuena, “Nemanama kwa riuriuna da kwa kuvesimai? Tauma Eibraham na damma, nam aitau ḡarone kamawai yaragana, riukaua nema e kuvesa bakemai?”
43008034	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Yà riuriu kauemina, aitau da gewagewa e voivoiena, tauna gewagewa ḡarone ewai yaragana.
43008035	Be aitau da gewagewa ḡarone ewai yaragana, tauna Mamaitua na damma nopone nam na waibadama ima kenakenana. Be Mamaitua Natuḡominama tauna na waibadama e kenakena watanana.
43008036	Vutuna aubainama deḡoda Mamaitua Natuḡominama e kuvesimina, taumi naumeki da kuvekuvesimima ko miana.
43008037	Taugu è kataiena taumi Eibraham na damma, be yaḡoro taumi waiguriguma kowai taina, baninama taugu yau giuma taumi nopomie nam ima kenakenana aubainama.
43008038	Taugu Tamaguma ḡarone yaba è kitekitedina vutudi yà riuriuemina. Be taumi tamemima aba ya riuriuemina, vutuna koi muriwatanena.”
43008039	Be taudi a riuna, “Tauma tamamaima Eibraham.” Be Yesu ya riuna, “Ibewa, Eibraham inam nam taumi tamemi. Deḡoda taumi sibo tamemima, Eibraham naumeki da tauna yaba ya voivoiedina ruvane, nama sibo koya voiedina.
43008040	Taugu riukaua Mamaitua ḡarone è vaie be è riuriuemina be yaḡoro da taumi vunuḡiguma kowai taina. Eibraham tauna tokare nam nama ya voia.
43008041	Taumi ami voiama ewai maḡatarana da taumi tamaḡomimima inam banaga ḡesau, be tauna na voiama kowai muriwatanena.” Be taudime a gudutaraḡa munaḡedi be a riuna, “Tauma Tamaḡomimaima inam Mamaitua be nam keda sedamai.”
43008042	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Ibewa, Mamaitua inam nam taumi tamemi. Taumi deḡoda sibo tamemima Mamaitua, naumeki da taumi koyai nuapaḡoeguna, baninama taugu Mamaitua ḡarone be è yovona. Be taugu nam mabigue è yovona, ibewa da tauna ya riuporegu be è yovona.
43008043	-
43008044	Taumi tamemima Diaboro, vutuna aubainama taugu yau giuma koya nuababaḡena, be taugu aba yà giugiuedina, taumi nam koma vaivaiedina. Taumi tamemima na ḡoanama vutudi kowai muriwatanedina. Tauna boni pakane da yodi tauna taurau vunuḡa. Baninama tauna riukaua e tuatuaḡaie be nopone nam riukaua ima kenakenana. Tauna taukaikaiyovu be kaiyovu Tamanama, tauna naumeki na yawasanama vutuna.
43008045	Vutuna aubainama taugu raḡanine riukaua yà giugiuena, taumi nam taugu komawai sumaḡeguna.
43008046	Aba gewagewane taumi tokare koi wavugu? Deḡoda taugu yà riuriu kauana, naumeki da taumi sibo koyai sumaḡeguna.
43008047	Tam aitau da Mamaitua ḡaronama, tam tauna riunama kwa vaivaiena. Be deḡoda riuguma nam kuma vaivaiena, inam anikitanama tam nam Mamaitua ḡarona.”
43008048	Be Jius babadidima a riuena, “Tam maiḡone aba kè riuem? Tam gewagewa banegimma be penama ya kokumna!”
43008049	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Taugu nam penama i kokuguna, ibewa da taugu Tamaguma yà vivivivirena, be taumi taugu nam koma vivivivireguna.
43008050	Taugu nam ama kawakawa saḡe munaḡeguna, ibewa da Tamaguma Mamaitua tauna e kawakawa saḡeguna, be tauna vutuna yaba matabuna taukita wairuvanama.
43008051	Taugu yà riuriu kauemina, Tam aitau da riuguma kwa voteyeteyedina, tam nam airaḡan tokare guri e taukonim.”
43008052	Dabudine Jius babadidima tauna a riuena, “Yodi kè vaia kauemna da tam riukaua penama ya kokumna. Tam kuya riuna da aitau riumma e voteyeteyedina, guri nam airaḡan tokare tauna e taukoni. Be you, Eibraham be peroveta taudi a gurina.
43008053	Tam nema maika kitam? Tamadama Eibraham be peroveta taudi a gurina, tam kwa saḡa poredi, bo?”
43008054	Dabudine Yesu ya riuna, “Deḡoda taugume yà kawa saḡe munaḡeguna, inam kawasaḡenama nam baniboruboruna. Taugu Tamaguma e kawakawa saḡeguna, tauna vutuna taumi ko riuriuna ami Mamaituama.
43008055	Be taumi tauna nam ko kataiena. Be taugu tauna è kataiena. Deḡoda taugu sibo è riuna taugu nam tauna e kataiena, inam raḡanine taugu tokare banaga kaikaiyovuguma è tubuḡana taumi maika. Be inam nam nama! Taugu tauna è kataie be riunama yà vovo teyeteyena.
43008056	“Tamemima Eibraham ya noḡonoḡotina da yau kaba verauma raḡaninama e kitana, aubainama tauna nuanama ya mosarina. Be inam raḡaninama tauna kaite ya kita be yai nuaverena.”
43008057	Be Jius Yesu a riuena, “Tam am suarama ḡauboḡominama nam 50 ku paḡona. Be nemanama da kwa riuriuna tam Eibraham kuya kita?”
43008058	Be Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Riukaua yà riuriuemina, muriḡa da Eibraham ya tubuḡana, taugu miemieniguma nama yà miamiana.”
43008059	Inam giunama debane taudi yeku a ragaudi da Yesu sibo a rauyekuna. Be tauna tempol ya dobi pore, da ya rausonaḡe be ya naḡona.
43009001	Naumeki da Yesu ya babababara naḡo, be tauḡoma matapotapotanama ya kitana. Be inam tauḡominama matapotapotanama tauna nama ya tubuḡana.
43009002	Be Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama tauna ai taravirena, “Tauwai katakatai, gewagewa aikedae ya tava be uma tauḡominama ya voie da ma matapotapotana ya tubuḡa? Tauname na gewagewa bo na dosima adi gewagewa?”
43009003	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Ibewa, nam tauna na gewagewa bo dosi adi gewagewa. Uma kauinama ya tubuḡana da inam tauḡominama ḡarone Mamaitua na rewapanama ei maḡatari be tà kitana.
43009004	Raḡan yodi e yanayanae tauriuporeguma na noyama tà voiena. Be kupi e veraverauna e tavana, inam raḡanine nam aitau tokare noya e voie be teneteneḡina.
43009005	Taugu dobue yà miamiana maika, taugu vutuna dobu na yanama.”
43009006	Raḡanine nama ya riuriuna, tauna doḡae ya kaviso be nimane kavisonama ya voie da dogodogo ya tubuḡana, be dogodogonama tauḡominama matanama debane ya rodana.
43009007	Yodibe ya riuena, “Yodi kwa naḡo kwa siguna Silom topane.” (isa ‘Silom’ baninama inam ‘Riupore’). Naumeki da tauḡoma ya naḡo be ya sigusiguna murine, matanama yai kita be ya verau munaḡana.
43009008	Tauna na banagama be banaga ḡesaudima taudi noḡone a kitana da tauna taukiḡikiḡi matapotapotanama. Dabudine taudi a riuna, “Inam tauḡominama vutuna kabe taukiḡikiḡi matapotapotana, bo?”
43009009	Be banaga ḡesaudima a riuna, “Ee, inam tauna”. Be ḡesaudima a riuna, “Ibewa, inam waria, be kitanama maika tauna.” Be tauḡominama ya riu raukosoḡaiḡai be ya riuriuna, “Inam vutuna taugu.”
43009010	Be taudi a riuna, “Aitau matamma yai yawasani?”
43009011	Be inam tauḡominama taudi ya riuedina, “Tauḡoma tenaḡa tawai isana Yesu, tauna dogodogo ya voie da matague ya roda be ya riuegu da Silom topane è siguna. Naumeki da è naḡo è sigusiguna murine, taugu èi kitana.”
43009012	Be banaga inam tauḡominama a riuena, “Baneginama yodi deḡo?” Be tauna ya riuedina, “Bai, taugu nam e kataiena.”
43009014	Inam kauinama Sabat raḡanine Yesu ya voiena. (v 13) Vutuna aubainama taudi inam tauḡominama noḡone matapotapotanama ai doka nawena Parisi ḡarodie.
43009015	Be dabudine tauḡoma nema be yai kita bakona, vutuna Parisi tauna ai taravirevirena. Be tauḡominama ya paribeedi be ya riuedina, “Tauna dogodogo matague ya roda, da murine è sigu, yodibe taugu èi kitana.”
43009016	Dabudine Parisi ḡesaudima a riuna, “Inam tauḡominama tauna Sabat nam ima vivivivirena. Inam kauine tauma kè kataiena da Mamaitua nam tauna i riuporena.” Be ḡesaudima a riuna, “Gewagewa baneginama mataira dosidima tokare e voiedi, bo?” Naumeki da Parisi inam giudima debedie taudi a dariḡa munaḡedina.
43009017	Dabudine taudi inam tauḡominama noḡone mata potapotanama ai taravira munaḡe be a riuena, “Tam aba kwa noḡonoḡoti, inam baneginama matamma yawai yawasanidina, tauna aitau?” Be tauḡoma ya riuna, “Tauna agunai peroveta.”
43009018	Be Jius babadidima taudi inam tauḡominama nam ti sumaḡena da tauna noḡone matapotapotana. Vutuna aubainama taudi na dosima a riuedi da a tava,
43009019	yodi be ai taraviredina, “Uma taumi natumi, bo? Tauna matapotapotanama nama ya tubuḡa, bo? Yodi nemanama da matanama yai kita?”
43009020	Dabudine na dosima a riuna, “Ee, inam tauma natumaima be tauna matapotapotanama nama ya tubuḡana.
43009021	Be yodi nemanama da yai kitana tauma nam ke kataiena. Tauna koi taravire be e riuemina, tauna ya morabana.”
43009022	Tauḡoma na dosima nama a riuna, baninama taudi Parisi a nairedina aubainama. Baninama Parisi taudi noḡone adi ogama a taraḡina da banaga aitau e riuna, ‘Yesu tauna Tauwai yawasana’, inam raḡanine baneginama tokare sinagog nopone be tà tavu dobiḡena.
43009023	Inam kauinama aubainama na dosima a riuna, “Tauna koi taravire be e riuemina, tauna kaite ya morabana.”
43009024	Naumeki da taudi inam tauḡominama raḡan wairabuinama a riue da ya saḡa munaḡa be a riuena, “Tam Mamaitua sibo kuya vivire be tauma riukaua sibo kuya riuemaina, baninama tauma ke kataie da Yesu tauna gewagewa baneginama.”
43009025	Dabudine inam tauḡominama ya riuna, “Taugu nam e kataiena tauna gewagewa banegina bo ibewa. Be aba è kataiena inam taugu mataguma potapotanama be yodi èi kitana.”
43009026	Dabudine Parisi tauḡoma matapotapotanama ai taravira munaḡe be a riuena, “Nema yai yawasana bakem? Aiyaba ya voie?”
43009027	Be tauḡominama ya riuna, “Taugu kaite è riuemina be taumi nam kowai beavaiana. Yodi aba aubainama ko ḡoeḡoena ko vaia munaḡe? Taumi mate tauna waimuriwatanenama ko ḡoeḡoe, bo?”
43009028	Dabudine taudi inam tauḡominama a kunure be a riuna, “Tam inam baneginama na tauwai muriwatanama, be tauma inam Mousis na tauwai muriwatanama!
43009029	Mamaitua Mousis ḡarone ya giuna, vutuna tauma kè kataiena. Be inam tauḡominama aikedae be ya tavana tauma nam ke kataiena.”
43009030	Be tauḡoma ya riuna, “Taumi ko nuanua babaḡana inam naumeki, taugu mate nam e kataiena tauna deḡo be ya tava, be mataguma yai yawasanina, inam vutuna è kataiena.
43009031	Tauda matabuda tè kataiena da gewagewa banegidima adi waibaḡama Mamaitua nam ima vaivaiena. Ibewa da aitauḡa tauna ta vivivivire be na ḡoanama ta voivoiena, taudi adi waibaḡama tauna e vaivaiena.
43009032	Boni pakane da yodi nam aitau tenaḡa ke vaie da banaga ma matapotapotana tubutubuḡinama i yawasana rubuna.
43009033	Uma baneginama tauna riukaua da Mamaitua ḡaronama, be deḡoda ibewa, tauna nam teneteneḡina da umanama kauinama tokare ya voie.”
43009034	Be Parisi a riuena, “Tam kuya tubutubuḡe gewagewa ya kaididimna naumeki da yodi. Be yodi tauma kwai katakataimai, bo?” Naumeki da taudi inam tauḡominama sinagog nopone be a tavu dobiḡena.
43009035	Yesu ya vaie da Parisi inam tauḡominama sinagog nopone be a tavu dobiḡena. Be Yesu raḡanine inam tauḡominama ya banabanavina ya riuena, “Tam Banaga Natunama kwawai sumaḡe bo ibewa?”
43009036	Dabudine inam tauḡominama ya riuna, “Bada, inam aitau? Kwa riuegu be yài sumaḡe.”
43009037	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Tam vutuna yodi kwa kitakitana, be ḡarome e giugiuna.”
43009038	Naumeki da inam tauḡominama ya riuna, “Bada, yàwai sumaḡana.” Dabudine tauna ya rauduneena.
43009039	Be Yesu ya riuena, “Taugu è yovona dobue banaga waitarapiriedima aubainama, da banaga matapotepotedima tai kitana, be banaga waikitedima taudi ta noḡonoḡotina da kabe tiwai kita, ibewa da taudi matedima ya potana.”
43009040	Be Parisi ḡesaudima dabudi a midimidina nama a vaivaiena, taudi a riuna, “Aiyaba, tauma mate matamaima ya pota, bo?”
43009041	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Deḡoda taumi sibo ko riuna, ‘Tauma matamaima ya potana’, inam raḡanine taugu tokare è sagumi da gewagewa nam ḡaromie ya kena. Be yodi taumi ko riuriuna da taumi matemima ewai kitana, vutuna aubainama taugu tokare nam yà sagumi, be ami gewagewama naumeki da nama ta kenana.”
43010001	Yesu ya riuna, “Taugu yà riuriu kauemina, banaga aitau sipu adi ganama matakedane nam e saḡa be tauna gana boganaḡa e raukai saḡana, inam baneginama tauna taudanedanene.
43010002	Be tauyosi tauna matakedaḡa be e saḡasaḡana sipu ḡarodie.
43010003	-
43010004	Be matakeda taurabenama tauna matakeda e kaiporena tauyosi aubainama. Be tauyosi tauna na sipuma tenaḡaḡa isedima e vatodi be tauna bonanama ta vaie, yodibe tauna ewai doka dobiḡedina. Be sipu tauna tawai muriwatanena, baninama tamedima bonanama a vaia maraḡamena.
43010005	Be banaga tabunama bonanama ta vaiena, taudi tokare naira ta naḡona, baninama tauna bonanama nam ti maraḡamena.”
43010006	Taudi aitauḡa inam wainasinama nama a vaivaiena, taudi wainasi baninama nam ti kataiena da Yesu aba ya giugiue.
43010007	Naumeki da tauna wainasinama, baninama ya giu yaḡedina, “Yà riuriu kauemina, taugu vutuna sipu adi matakedama.
43010008	Be banaga ḡesaudima noḡogue tavetavedima, taudi inam banaga danedanenedima, vutuna aubainama sipu taudi bonedima a vaia nuababaḡedina.
43010009	Be matakeda inam vutuna taugu. Aitau nopogue e saḡa be e naḡona gana nopone, tauna tokare yawasana e banavina, tauna tokare e mia genuana be kani nonoḡinama e kanina.
43010010	Taudanedanene e tavana, tauna sipu e danenedi, e vunuḡidi be e kawa gewegewedina aubainama e tavana. Be taugu è tavana sipu yài yawasanidina aubainama, be taudi yawasana verenama tai maurena, be nam aba ta maruabie.
43010011	“Taugu vutuna tauyosi vereguma. Be tauyosi verenama na yawasanama tokare ei utaena sipu waiyawasanidima aubainama.
43010012	Be tauyosi mane aubainama e vovo bagibagina, inam tauna nam tauyosi verena, be tauna nam sipu tamedi. Baninama tabei ta tavatavana raḡanine, inam taunoyanama na yawasanama aubainama naira e naḡona. Dabudine tabei tokare sipu tai retedi be tai daberaridina.
43010013	Inam tauḡominama naira e naḡona, baninama tauna mane aubainama e noyanoyana, be nam sipu imawai nuaboyedina.
43010014	-
43010015	“Taugu tauyosi vereguma. Taugu Tamaguma è kataiena, be tauna taugu ya kataieguna, teneḡinama nama taugu yau sipuma è kataiedina, be taudi taugu a kataieguna. Be taudi waiyawasanidima aubainama taugu yau yawasanama yài utaena.
43010016	Be taugu yau sipuma ḡesaudima gana ḡesaudie ta miamiana, taudi mate yà saḡedina gana nopone. Da taudi mate taugu bonaguma ta vaie be adi banagama mate dam tenaḡa ta tubuḡana, yodibe taudi tauyosi tenaḡa vagurune ta miana.
43010017	“Taugu yau yawasanama yài utae be ya paḡo munaḡena, vutuna aubainama Tamaguma ewai nuapaḡoeguna.
43010018	Be nam aitau tokare yau yawasanama e paḡo pore! Ibewa da taugume yau ḡoane yau yawasanama yài utaena. Taugu rewapana ḡarogue e kenakenana da yau yawasanama yài utaena, be rewapana ḡarogue da yà paḡo munaḡena. Nama Tamaguma ya riu vavasaḡeguna.”
43010019	Inam nama ya giugiuna raḡanine, Jius banegidima dabudine ai kawa dariḡa munaḡana,
43010020	be banaga toitoi a riuna, “Tauna ya bua kauana, penama ya kokuna. Aba aubainama kowai beavaie?”
43010021	Be banaga ḡesaudima a riuna, “Tauna na giuma vaienama nam banaga penama kokukokuna maika. Baninama penama nam teneteneḡina da banaga matapotapotanama ei yawasani.”
43010022	Tururu raḡanine Jerusalemma tempol soinama raḡaninama ya tavana,
43010023	be tempol nopone gabu isanama ‘Solomon na wagapatae’ dabudine Yesu ya babababara naḡona.
43010024	Be Jius banegidima tauna a midiḡuruvi be a riuena, “Tam Tauwai yawasana teika da kwa riu ḡomemai. Be nam kwa kawa nuaraḡaraḡa guratemai.”
43010025	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Taugu maiḡoka è riuemina, be nam komawai sumaḡeguna. Mataira dosidima Tamaguma isane yà voivoiedina taudi tawai maḡatariguna,
43010026	be yaḡoro taumi nam komawai sumaḡana, baninama taumi nam taugu yau sipu.
43010027	Taugu yau sipuma taudi bonaguma vaienama a kataiena, be taugu taudi è kataiedi be tawai muriwataneguna.
43010028	Be taugu yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama taudi yà uteutedina, da taudi tokare nam airaḡan gienae ta naḡo. Be nam aitau tokare e kwayagu be teneteneḡina.
43010029	Baninama Tamaguma tauna yai rewapana vavasaḡana nam maika aitau ḡesau. Tauna vutuna sipu ya uteguna, be nam aitau tokare tauna nimane e kwaya be teneteneḡina.
43010030	Tamaguma be taugu, tauma tenaḡa.”
43010031	Naumeki da Jius banegidima yeku a tama munaḡedi da Yesu sibo a rauyekuna.
43010032	Be Yesu taudi ya riuedina, “Taugu mataira dosidima toitoi Tamaguma na rewapanae è voiedi be koya kitedina. Yodi deḡo matairinama debane taumi rauyekuguma kowai tai?”
43010033	Be Jius banegidima a riuena, “Tauma nam inam matairidima aubaidima rauyekumna kamawai taina, ibewa da tam am waidiboḡama aubainama rauyekuma kawai taina. Tam banaga ḡoma be kwa riuriu munaḡemna da tam kabe Mamaitua.”
43010034	Be Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Koya kataie bo ibewa da ami bukama porane a giruma be umanama a riuna, ‘Taugu è riuemina da taumi dobu mamaituedima.’”
43010035	Be giruminama poranama aba e riuriuena inam riukaua! Avedi da Mamaitua riunama Israel babadidima ḡarodie ya riupore yovoḡena, be yaḡoro tauna yai isedina ‘mamaitua’.
43010036	Be yodi taugu yà riuriuna da taugu Mamaitua Natunama be aba aubainama taumi ko medimediegu? Taugu nam amawai diboḡana. Taugu Tamaguma ya vinegu be ya riupore yovoḡeguna dobue.
43010037	Deḡoda taugu Tamaguma na voiama nam yà voiedi, naumeki da nam koi sumaḡegu.
43010038	Be deḡoda yau giuma mate nam koi sumaḡe, naumeki da mataira dosidima yà voivoiedina, vutudi sibo koya kitedi be koyai sumaḡana. Inam raḡanine taumi tokare ko kataie da Tamaguma taugu nopogue, be taugu Tamaguma nopone.”
43010039	Dabudine Jius banegidima a rarau rubu munaḡana da Yesu sibo a vunuḡina, be taudi tauna a viri yakasi be ya naḡo poredina.
43010040	Inam kauinama murine Yesu upa Jodan ya davu be ya munaḡana deḡo boni Jon banaga yawai babataitodie, dabudine ya miana.
43010041	Be banaga toitoi a tava be a riuna, “Jon tauna nam airaḡan voia dosidima i voia rubudina, be tauna uma baneginama ya giugiuena inam matabuna riukaua.”
43010042	Vutuna aubainama inam dabudine banaga toitoi Yesu ai sumaḡena.
43011001	Beteni meagaine tauḡoma tenaḡa isanama Lasares tauna ya sida kauana, be nuvunuvunama rabui mate a miamiana. Tauna nuvunuvunama isedima Meri be Mata.
43011002	Uma Merinama tauna vutuna upa ḡabuḡabunama Yesu kaḡane ya ḡini be debavuvuḡine ya ravusina. Tauna vutuna nuvunama ya sidana.
43011003	Vutuna aubainama inam waiwaividima rabui Yesu na riuma a riupore be a riuna, “Bada, turamma nuamma taupaḡonama ya sidana.”
43011004	Raḡanine Yesu inam varinama ya vaivaiena, tauna ya riuna, “Inam sidanama tokare nam Lasares ei guri. Ibewa da inam sidane Mamaitua neneḡarinama ei maḡatarina, be inam neneḡarine Mamaitua Natunama e kawa saḡena.”
43011005	Yesu, tauna Mata, Meri be Lasares ewai nuapaḡoedina,
43011006	be yaḡoro tauna nam i naḡo makaina ḡarodie. Tauna raḡan rabui ya miana be muriḡa da ya naḡona ḡarodie.
43011007	Naumeki da raḡan rabui a kovina murine, Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama ya riuedina, “Yodi tà munaḡana Judiama.”
43011008	Be na tauwai muriwatanama tauna a riuena, “Tauwai katakatai, maiḡone kuya kita! Inam dabudine Jius babadidima rauyekumma awai taina. Be yodi tam dabudi kwa munaḡa, bo?”
43011009	Be Yesu ya paribeedina, “Raḡan e yanayanae tauda noya tà voiena. Banaga raḡan e yanayanae ta babarana tokare nam kaḡedima tai tutu, baninama taudi dobu yanayanane keda ta kitakita kauena.
43011010	Be kupie taudi tokare kaḡedima tai tutuna, baninama nam yana.”
43011011	Be na giuma ya kaiwatani be ya riuedina, “Turadama Lasares ya kena nuakoana, be taugu yà naḡonaḡona ḡarone taiḡosorinama aubainama.”
43011012	Be na tauwai muriwatanama a riuna, “Bada, deḡoda tauna ima kenakena, inam tokare sida e yawasanana.”
43011013	Be Lasares tauna ya gurina, vutuna Yesu ya giugiue be na tauwai muriwatanama ai noḡotana kabe tauna kena ḡoma i giugiue.
43011014	Vutuna aubainama Yesu taudi ya riu ḡomedi be ya riuna, “Lasares ya gurina.
43011015	Be taumi aubaimima nuaguma ya verena da nam ḡarone e tavana. Yodi inam keda ḡesaunama e kenakenana da taumi tokare koi sumaḡana. Yodi tà naḡona tauna ḡarone.”
43011016	Dabudine Tomas awai isana ‘Raḡaraḡa’ tauna tauwai muriwatana ḡesaudima ya riuedina, “Naumeki, matabuda tà naḡo be tauna mate tà guri tenaḡana.”
43011017	Yesu Betenima ya tavatavana, tauna ya vaie da Lasares ya guri be kokoagae ya kenana raḡan 4 a kovina.
43011018	Beteni da Jerusalem nam madani i dauna,
43011019	vutuna aubainama banaga toitoi Meri be Mata nuadubuedima aubainama a tavana Betenima, taudi nuvudima ya kovina aubainama.
43011020	Dabudine Mata e vaiena be Yesu ya veraverauna ḡarodie, naumeki da ya dobi ya naḡona Yesu verau bodebodenama aubainama. Be Meri tauna vadae ya mia kwasana.
43011021	Be Mata Yesu ya riuena, “Bada, deḡoda tam maiḡone uma dabudine ku tavana, nuvuguma tokare nam ya guri.
43011022	Be taugu è kataiena deḡoda yodi aba kwai baḡena, Mamaitua tokare e utemna.”
43011023	Be Yesu tauna ya riuena, “Nuvumma tokare e midisuḡu munaḡana.”
43011024	Be Mata ya riuna, “Taugu è kataiena da raḡan damone midisuḡu munaḡa raḡanine tauna tokare e midisuḡuna.”
43011025	Be Yesu tauna ya riuena, “Taugu vutuna midisuḡu munaḡa be yawasana. Aitauḡa da tawai sumaḡeguna, taudi avedi da a gurina, be yaḡoro tokare ta yawasanana.
43011026	Be banaga miemienidima aitauḡa taugu tawai sumaḡeguna, taudi tokare nam airaḡan ta guri. Inam giunama kwawai sumaḡe bo ibewa?”
43011027	Be Mata ya riuna, “Bada, taugu yàwai sumaḡana da tam vutuna Tauwai yawasana Mamaitua Natunama, dobue kuya yovona.”
43011028	Nama ya giugiu rovona murine, tauna ya munaḡana vadae tasinama Meri ḡarone be mareḡa ya riue da ḡavoe be ya riuena, “Tauwai katakatai ya tava be e ḡoeḡoena e kitamna.”
43011029	Be Meri inam giunama ya vaivaiena, tauna waiḡapa ya midisuḡu makai be ya naḡona Yesu ḡarone.
43011030	Mata deḡo Yesu ya banabanavie, inam dabudine Yesu ya miamiana be nam meagaie i tavana.
43011031	Jius banegidima Meri a miamia roguena, dabudine a kita da Meri vadae be ma girigirina ya dobi makaina. Dabudine taudi a noḡotina da Meri kabe nuvunama kokoagine ḡaba aubainama i naḡonaḡo, naumeki da taudi ai muriwatanena.
43011032	Raḡanine Meri Yesu ḡarone ya tavatavana, tauna ya raupari be ya riuna, “Bada, deḡoda tam maiḡone uma dabudine ku tavana, nuvuguma tokare nam ya guri.”
43011033	Yesu e kitana be Meri ya ḡabaḡabana, be Jius banegidima Meri a miamia roguena taudi mate a ḡabaḡabana. Inam raḡanine Yesu medi noponama ya karati be nuanama ya gewagewana.
43011034	Dabudine Yesu taudi yai taraviredi be ya riuna, “Lasares deḡo dabudine koyai kokoagi?” Be taudi a riuna, “Bada, tà naḡo be kwa kita.”
43011035	Naumeki da Yesu ya ḡabana.
43011036	Be banaga dabudine a midimidina taudi a riuna, “Ko kita, Lasares tauna nuanama ya paḡo kauena.”
43011037	Be ḡesaudima a riuna, “Uma tauḡominama banaga matapotapotanama yai yawasanina, be aba aubainama tauna Lasares varinama ya vaia yababe be ya guri?”
43011038	Dabudine Yesu medi noponama ya kara munaḡe be kokoagae ya tavana. Lasares kokoaginama inam gubae. Be gubanama gayane yeku dosinama ai miditomna.
43011039	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Yeku ko taurie ḡavoe e naḡo!” Be Mata ya riuna, “Bada, yodi tokare pana e morabana, baninama tauna kokoagae ya kenana raḡan 4 a kovina.”
43011040	Be Yesu ya riuena, “Taugu è riuem bo ibewa da tam kwai sumaḡana tokare Mamaitua neneḡarinama kwa kitana.”
43011041	Dabudine taudi Yeku a raurie da ḡavoe ya naḡo, yodibe Yesu gunuma ya kitasaḡe be ya riuna, “Mamai, yàwai kaiwemna da tam taugu bonaguma kuya vaiena.
43011042	Taugu è kataiena da tam raḡan matabuna taugu bonaguma kwa vaivaiena, be uma banegidima ta midimidina, taudi kadi taiye taugu bonaguma dosine yà riuna da taudi sibo a vaie be ai sumaḡa da tam taugu kuya riuporeguna.”
43011043	Yesu nama ya giugiu kovina, tauna bonanama dosine ya riuna, “Lasares, kwa dobi!”
43011044	Naumeki da tauḡoma gurigurinama gubae be ya dobina. Tauna nimanama, kaḡanama, debanama be tuninama matabuna garae sumasumanama. Naumeki da Yesu ya riuna, “Gara ko kuvesa poredi be e naḡona!”
43011045	Jius banegidima toitoi Meri nuadubuenama aubainama a tavatavana, taudi Yesu aba ya voivoiena a kita be tauna ai sumaḡena.
43011046	Be banaga ḡesaudima taudi a naḡo be Yesu aba ya voivoiena Parisi ḡarodie ai samanina.
43011047	Dabudine pirisi adi babadama be Parisi ai rawateḡeidina Sanedrion waiborunama aubainama. Be dabudine taudi a riuna, “Yodi aba tà voie? Uma tauḡominama mataira toitoi e voivoiedina.
43011048	Deḡoda tauda tà kita yababena, banaga matabudi tokare tauna tai muriwatanena. Inam raḡanine tauiḡara Romḡa tokare ta verau, be dà tempolma be dà dobuma ta kawa gewegewedina.”
43011049	Naumeki da tauḡoma tenaḡa isanama Kaiyapas, tauna pirisi adi badama inam modinama nopone. Tauna ya midisuḡu be ya riuna, “Taumi buebuemima,
43011050	nam aiyaba ko kataiena. Ya verena da inam baneginama tenaḡa sibo ya gurina, be tauda matabuda sibo tè yawasanana.”
43011051	Inam giunama nam Kaiyapas nuane i giu yababana, ibewa. Be tauna pirisi adi badama ya miamiana inam modinama nopone, vutuna aubainama tauna yai perovetana da Yesu sibo ya gurina Jius banegidima matabudi aubaidima.
43011052	Be nam Jius taudiḡa, ibewa da Mamaitua na sedama dobu matabuna nopone a daberara be ta miamiana, taudi mate aubaidima tauna e guri be e rawateḡeidi da taudi tenaḡa ta tubuḡana.
43011053	Naumeki da inam raḡanine be nokoi ya naḡona taudi Yesu na kasirama tomnama ai karena da sibo ai gurina.
43011054	Vutuna aubainama Yesu nam patara nopodie i noya munaḡana, tauna ya gosedi be ya naḡona Epreim meagaine. Inam meagainama dobu kavakavanama diane, be dabudine tauna na tauwai muriwatanama mate a miana.
43011055	Naumeki da Naḡopore soinama raḡaninama maida ya tavatavana aubainama, banaga toitoi Israel nopone miemienidima a rauria be a saḡa a naḡona Jerusalemma. Baninama muriḡa da Naḡopore soinama sibo ya tavana, be noḡone taudi adi vaivaima da sibo a sigu dokana.
43011056	Dabudine taudi a ḡoeḡoena da Yesu sibo a kitana. Vutuna aubainama taudi tempol dianaḡa a midi babara be adi banagama adi banagama ai taraviredi be a riuriuna, “Aba ko noḡonoḡoti, Yesu tokare soie e saḡa bo ibewa?”
43011057	Inam dabudine pirisi adi babadama be Parisi, taudi adi giuma bagibaginama a boruna da aitau Yesu e kitana, waiḡapa taudi ḡarodie ei maḡatarana. Yodibe tauna ta vunuḡina.
43012001	Raḡan 6 a kenakenana muriḡa da Naḡopore soinama e tavana. Be Yesu tauna ya naḡona Betenima Lasares na vadae, tauna vutuna ya gurina be Yesu ya kawa midisuḡu munaḡena.
43012002	Dabudine Yesu na kanima a vokaukauena. Naumeki da Mata kani ya tebodi be Yesu, Lasares be banaga ḡesaudima mate gunie a miamiana ya ute nawedina.
43012003	Be Meri dabudine upa ḡabuḡabunama ya paḡo da Yesu kaḡanama debane ya ḡini be deba vuvuḡine Yesu kaḡanama ya ravusina. Be inam upanama isanama ‘Nad’ be maesinama dosinama. Be inam vadanama noponama matabuna ḡabuḡa ya kaiyaḡotina.
43012004	Be Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama tenaḡa isanama Judas Iskariot, tauna vutuna tokare Yesu e boru dobiḡena, tauna umanama ya riuna,
43012005	“Inam upanama ḡabuḡabunama maesinama ya moraba kauana! Taumi sibo koya raugimare be mane banaga waikaruwaḡewaḡedima sibo koya utedina.”
43012006	Judas nam banaga waikaruwaḡewaḡedima i noḡotidi be inam giunama i vatona, ibewa da tauna banaga danedanenenama, aubainama nama ya giuna. Baninama Judas tauna mane taurabenama be wari raḡan tauname aubainama mane nevedima ya rarau soru poraḡana.
43012007	Be Yesu tauna ya paribee be ya riuna, “Nam Meri kwa tainuaraḡaraḡa, kwa gose pore. Tauna umanama ya voiana inam ya kawa nonoḡiguna waikokoagiguma aubainama.
43012008	Banaga waikaruwaḡewaḡedima raḡan matabuna taumi mate ko miamiana. Be taugu nam tokare taumi mate tà mia gurata.”
43012009	Taudi dabudine yaḡoro a kanikanina, be patara dosinama a kataie da Yesu tauna Lasares na vadae ya miamiana. Vutuna aubainama a verauna kitanama aubainama, be nam Yesu taunaḡa, Lasares mate kitanama aubainama a verauna, baninama tauna ya gurina, be Yesu yai yawasani munaḡena.
43012010	Inam kauinama aubainama pirisi babadidima adi ogama a taraḡina da Lasares mate sibo ai gurina.
43012011	Baninama tauna kana taiye banaga toitoi Jius babadidima a gosedi be Yesu ai muriwatanena.
43012012	Pomainama banaga soi aubainama a tavatavana, taudi a vaie da Yesu ya saḡasaḡana Jerusalemma.
43012013	Vutuna aubainama banaga toitoi garamo a ragaudi da a dobi a naḡona veraubodenama aubainama, be bonedima dosine a yogo be a riuriuna, “Hosana, waiaiaininama tauna vutuna Bada isane e veraverauna! Israel guyaunama waiaiaininama!”
43012014	Yesu donki natunama ya banavi be debane ya miana, maika girugiruminama porane ya riuriuna nama,
43012015	“Jerusalem banegimima nam ko naira, ko kitana ami guyauma donki natunama ya gerue be ḡaromie e veraverauna.”
43012016	Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama uma kauidima noḡone nam ti kataiedina. Be Yesu marae ya saḡa ya naḡonaḡona murine, girugiruminama porane aba a riuriuedina, vutudi Yesu na tauwai muriwatanama a noḡotidina, be a kataie da noḡone aba awai perovetaena yodi a tubuḡa be a kitana.
43012017	Be maiḡone Lasares ya guri da kokoagae ya kenakenana. Be Yesu Lasares gurigurinama kokoagae ya riue, be ya kawa midisuḡu munaḡe da ya dobina. Inam raḡanine banaga toitoi dabudi mate, be Yesu aba ya voie be a kitakitana, taudi inam varinama ai daberarina.
43012018	Be banaga toitoi inam varinama a vaiena. Vutuna aubainama taudi garamo a ragaudi be a dobi a naḡona Yesu naḡobodenama aubainama.
43012019	Dabudine Parisi taudi adi banagama adi banagama a riuedina, “Yodi aba tà voie? Banaga matabudi Yesu tawai muriwatanena.”
43012020	Inam soinama nopone dabudine Gurik banegidima ḡesaudima mate inam soinama aubainama a tavana.
43012021	Taudi a verauna Pilip ḡarone. (Pilip tauna Betsaida baneginama Galili provins nopone.) Be taudi Pilip ai baḡa be a riuna, “Yau tura, tauma Yesu kitanama ka ḡoeḡoena.”
43012022	Naumeki da Pilip ya naḡo Endru yai vari be rabuidi a naḡona Yesu riunama aubainama.
43012023	Be Yesu ya paribeedi be ya riuna, “Yodi raḡan ya tavana da Banaga Natunama neneḡarinama e maḡatarana.
43012024	Yà riuriu kauemina, deḡoda pesi nam doḡa nopone ko kuma be e guri, inam tokare kitanama teneḡinama nama e kenakenana. Be deḡoda pesi doḡa nopone kwa kuma be e gurina, inam raḡanine tokare e gogo tava be baninama toitoi e sivudina.
43012025	Aitau da tauname na yawasanama ewai nuaboyena, tokare na yawasanama e kawa gewagewana. Be aitau da uma dobune nam na yawasanama imawai nuaboyena, tauna tokare yawasana kenakena nonoḡinama e paḡona.
43012026	Aitau aubaiguma noya e ḡoeḡoena, naumeki da ei muriwataneguna. Deḡo yà naḡonaḡo bo yà miamiana, tauna taugu mate. Be Tamaguma inam banegidima aitauḡa aubaiguma ta noyanoyana, tokare e kawa saḡedina.
43012027	“Be yodi taugu èi nuaboya kauana be nema yà riu bako? Umanama yà riu bo avedi, ‘Mamai, kwa sagugu da uma nuaboyanama nam yà sigue.’ Ibewa, nam nama yà riu, baninama inam vutuna aubainama uma dobudine è yovona.
43012028	Taugu umanama yà riuna, ‘Mamai, tamḡa isamma kwa kawa saḡe munaḡemna.’” Naumeki da bona marae ya dobi be ya riuna, “Taugu kaiteka isaguma è kawa saḡe munaḡeguna be yodi yà voia munaḡena.”
43012029	Inam raḡanine patara bona a vaivaiena, banaga ḡesaudima a riuna, “Inam parere.” Be ḡesaudima a riuna, “Ibewa, inam anea Yesu ḡarone e giugiuna.”
43012030	Dabudine Yesu ya riuna, “Taumi anisagumima aubainama inam bonanama ya dobina, nam taugu.
43012031	Yodi raḡan ya tavana da Mamaitua dobu ei tarapirie be dobunama tauwai badenama e tavu dobiḡena.
43012032	Be taudi korosie tawai daweguna raḡanine, taugu yau banagama matabudi yà verauḡedina ḡarogue.”
43012033	Inam giudima tauna ya vatodina da banaga sibo a kataie da tauna tokare nema e guri bakona.
43012034	Dabudine banaga a riuna, “Tauma tarawatu nopone kè kataiena da Tauwai yawasana tauna tokare e mia nonoḡana. Be yodi nemanama da kwa riuriuna, ‘Banaga Natunama tokare korosie tai dawe? Banaga Natunama inam aitau?’”
43012035	Be Yesu ya riuedina, “Taugu vutuna ami yanama, be taugu tokare nam taumi mate tà mia gurata. Vutuna aubainama yodi raḡan daumorine taumi inam yananama noponaḡa ko babarana. Inam kedane tadiwanawana tokare nam e rupu tawemi. Baninama aitauḡa tadiwanawana noponaḡa ta babababarana, taudi keda nam tima kitakitana, taudi ta naḡonaḡona aikedae ta tavana nam ti kataiena.
43012036	Taumi yana yodi ḡaromie e miamiana maika, naumeki da taumi yananama koi sumaḡena, inam raḡanine taumi tokare yana natunatunama ko tubuḡana.” Be Yesu na giuma yawai kovina, murine tauna ya gosedi be ya naḡo waimatapoviedina.
43012037	Yesu mataira toitoi Jius matedie ya voiedina, be taudi yaḡoro nam ti sumaḡena,
43012038	baninama peroveta Aisaia aba ya riuriuena nama a tubuḡana. Tauna umanama ya riuna, “Bada, aitau tokare ama giuma ei sumaḡe? Be aitau ḡarodie tokare am rewapanama kwai maḡatari?”
43012039	Be mate Aisaia gabu ḡesaune umanama ya riuna,
43012040	“Mamaitua taudi matedima be nuedima yai potedina, inam kedane taudi matedie nam aba sibo a kita, bo nuedie nam aba sibo a kataie da nuedima a vitaredi be sibo ei yawasanidi.”
43012041	Aisaia nama ya riuna, baninama tauna kaite Yesu neneḡarinama ya kita be ya giuena.
43012042	Be yaḡoro banaga toitoi be Jius babadidima toitoi mate Yesu ai sumaḡena. Be taudi Parisi a nairedina, baninama deḡoda sinagog nopone be tima tavu dobiḡedi. Vutuna aubainama taudi nam ti maḡatara munaḡedina da taudi tauwai sumaḡa,
43012043	baninama taudi a ḡoeḡoena da Mamaitua sibo ya kawa saḡedina. Be adi ḡoana kauama inam sibo banaga taudi a kawa saḡedina.
43012044	Dabudine Yesu bonanama dosine ya riuna, “Banaga aitau taugu ewai sumaḡeguna, inam nam tauguḡa imawai sumaḡeguna, ibewa da tauriuporeguma mate ewai sumaḡena.
43012045	Be deḡoda aitau taugu ya kitaguna, inam tauriuporeguma kaite ya kitana.
43012046	Taugu è yovona dobu waiyananama aubainama. Be aitau taugu ewai sumaḡeguna, tauna tokare nam tadiwanawanae e mia.
43012047	“Be aitau da yau giuma e vaivaiedina be nam e voteyeteyedi, taugu nam yodi tauna yài tarapirie, baninama taugu nam dobu waitarapirienama aubainama e yovona, ibewa da taugu dobu waiyawasaninama aubainama è yovona.
43012048	Be aitau da taugu e riuriu tuatuaḡaiegu be yau giuma nam ei aninedi, tauna tokare kovoḡa e banavina. Baninama raḡan damone taugu yau giuma tokare tauna ta etarena.
43012049	Taugu nam nuague ama giugiu yababana, ibewa da Tamaguma tauriuporeguma tauna ya riu vavasaḡeguna da taugu aba yà giuena.
43012050	Be taugu è kataiena da tauna na giuma ewai kataimina da taumi yawasana kenakena nonoḡine ko tavana. Vutuna aubainama Tamaguma aba ya riuriueguna, ruvane nama yà giugiuna.”
43013001	Naumeki da Naḡopore Soinama raḡaninama ḡaubonaḡa da sibo ya tavana. Be Yesu tauna kaite ya kataiena da na raḡanima ya tavana da uma dobunama e gose be e munaḡana Tamanama risine. Dabudine tauna na tauwai muriwatanama yai kataidi da tauna ewai nuapaḡo kauedina.
43013002	Ravie kani na raḡanie Diaboro kaite Judas Iskariot, nopone noḡota gewagewanama ya boruna da Yesu e boru dobiḡena, Judas tauna vutuna Saemon natunama.
43013003	Be Yesu ya kataiena da Tamanama rewapana matabuna tauna nimane ya boruna da yaba matabudi ei badedina. Be mate tauna ya kataiena da tauna Mamaitua ḡarone be ya yovona, be yodi e munamunaḡana.
43013004	Vutuna aubainama Yesu kani nopone ya midisuḡu da na kwamama ya kaipore, be taweri ya paḡo da bogane yai rauvirina.
43013005	Yodibe tauna disi ya paḡo da nopone upa ya ḡini be na tauwai muriwatanama kaḡedima ya koḡedi be inam tawerine kaḡedima ya ravusidina.
43013006	Be raḡanine Yesu Saemon Pita ḡarone ya tavatavana, Pita ya riuena, “Bada umanema nama da tam taugu kaḡaguma kwa koḡa?”
43013007	Be Yesu tauna ya riuena, “Taugu yodi aba yà voivoiena baninama tam nam ku kataiena, be tokare kwa kataie da baninama aba.”
43013008	Be Pita ya riuna, “Avedi, nam airaḡan kaḡaguma kwa koḡedi!” Be Yesu ya paribeena, “Deḡoda taugu kaḡamma nam yà koḡa, tam taugu nam yau tauwai muriwatana.”
43013009	Be Saemon Pita ya riuna, “O Bada, deḡoda nama, naumeki da nam kaḡaguḡa kwa koḡedi, be nimaguma be debaguma mate kwa koḡedina.”
43013010	Be Yesu ya riuena, “Banaga aitau da tuninama matabuna topa nopone ya yovo be ya sigu ḡomana, inam baneginama kaḡanama taunaḡa tokare e koḡedina, baninama tauna kaite ya sigu be verenama e miamiana. Be taumi inam koya sigu be veremima ko miamiana, be ḡesaumima nam veremi.”
43013011	Yesu nama ya riuna, baninama tauna kaite ya kataie da aitau tokare tauna e boru dobiḡena. Vutuna aubainama tauna ya riuna, ‘Ḡesaumima nam veremi’.
43013012	Raḡanine taudi kaḡedima ya koḡakoḡa kovina, tauna na kwamama ya kote munaḡe da ya munaḡa na gabue ya mia be yai taraviredina, “Taugu aba yodi è voiena baninama koya kataie bo ibewa?
43013013	Taumi ko riuriueguna ‘Tauwai katakatai’ be ‘Bada’. Be inam ko riuriu kauana, baninama inam vutuna taugu.
43013014	Be yodi koya kita, taugu ami Badama be ami Tauwai katakataima be yaḡoro kaḡemima è koḡedina. Vutuna aubainama taumi taumiḡa ami banagama ami banagama mate kaḡemima sibo nama koya koḡedina.
43013015	Taugu yodi mataira verenama è voie be koya kitana, be taumi nama sibo koya voiana,
43013016	baninama taunoya tauna nam tokare na badama e saḡa pore, be mate tauwai noyanoya tauna nam tokare tauriuporenama e saḡa pore.
43013017	Yodi taumi uma yabedima koya kitedi be koya kataiedina, be deḡoda ko voiedina, taumi tokare waiaiaina ko banavina.
43013018	“Taugu nam matabumi ḡaromie uma yabedima ama giugiuedina, ibewa da taugu è vinemina aubainama tenatenaḡaḡa ami yawasanama è kataiedina. Be girugiruminama porane aba a riuriuena inam riukaua, taudi a riuna, ‘Banaga aitau da yau kanima nevanama ya kanina, tauna vutuna ya midi vitare be yai ḡavieguna.’
43013019	Uma kauinama muriḡa da e tubuḡana yodi yà riuriu wainonoḡimina, be tokare e tubuḡana raḡanine, dabudine koi sumaḡa da taugu vutuna Tauwai yawasana.
43013020	Taugu yà riuriu kauemina, aitau da yau tauwai noyanoyama ei aninena, tauna inam taugu ewai anineguna. Be aitau da taugu ei anineguna, tauna inam tauriuporeguma ewai aninena.”
43013021	Yesu nama ya riuriuna murine, tauna noponama nuaboya ya moḡavu be ya riuna, “Yà riuriu kauemina, nopomie tenaḡa tokare taugu e boru dobiḡeguna.”
43013022	Dabudine tauwai muriwatana tenatenaḡaḡa turanama turanama matanama ya kita be a nuanua babaḡana da Yesu aitau e riuriue.
43013023	Be taudi nopodie tenaḡa Yesu tura kaukauinama tauna Yesu diane ya miamiana.
43013024	Naumeki da Saemon Pita inam baneginama Yesu diane miemieninama mamareḡa ya riu kasave be ya riuena, “Bada kwa riue, aitau tauna e riuriue?”
43013025	Dabudine inam baneginama Yesu diane miemieninama ya kekera naḡo Bada diaḡomine be mamareḡa ya riu kasavena, “Bada, aitau tokare tam e boru dobiḡem?”
43013026	Yesu ya paribee be ya riuna, “Kwa kita be taugu raḡanine buredi riku nopone yai gayo be banaga aitau yà utena, inam baneginama vutuna taugu e boru dobiḡeguna.” Naumeki da Yesu buredi riku nopone yai gayo be Judas Iskariot ya utena. Tauna vutuna Saemon natunama.
43013027	Raḡanine Judas buredi ya paḡo be ya kanikanina, Seitan Judas nopone ya saḡana, dabudine Yesu Judas ya riuena, “Tam aba voienama yodi kwawai nuanoḡonoḡotena, naumeki da waiḡapa kwa voiena.”
43013028	Be ḡesaudima dabudine a kanikanina nam ti kataiena aba aubainama Yesu nama Judas ya riue.
43013029	Be Judas tauna mane taurabenama. Vutuna aubainama, na banagama ḡesaudima ai noḡotana kabe Yesu Judas i riuriupore nawe soi kanima gimerinama aubaina, bo mane banaga waikaruwaḡewaḡedima kabe e utedi.
43013030	Dabudine Judas ya dobi be kupiḡa ya naḡona.
43013031	Raḡanine Judas ya dobi be ya naḡonaḡona murine Yesu ya riuna, “Yodi raḡan ya tavana da taugu Banaga Natunama neneḡariguma e maḡatarana. Be abaḡa taugu ḡarogue ta tubutubuḡana raḡanine, Mamaitua neneḡara dosinama e paḡona.
43013032	Inam raḡanine Mamaitua tokare waiḡapa banaga ei kataidi da Banaga Natunama tauna ya saḡa vavasaḡana.
43013033	Yau sedama, noḡone nema Jius babadidima è riuriuedina, nama yodi taumi yà riuriuemina, da taugu tokare taumi mate nam tà mia gurata. Taumi tokare ko waneguna, be deḡo taugu yà naḡonaḡona, dabudi taumi tokare nam ko tava.
43013034	Be yodi riuvavasaḡa vaunama yà utemina inam: Ami banagama ami banagama nuemima ta paḡona, nema taugu yàwai nuapaḡoemina nama.
43013035	Deḡoda koi nuapaḡo vivirana, inam raḡanine banaga matabudi tokare ta kataiemi da taumi taugu yau tauwai muriwatanama.”
43013036	Dabudine Saemon Pita Yesu yai taravirena, “Bada, tam deḡo kwa naḡonaḡo?” Be Yesu ya riuna, “Taugu deḡo yà naḡonaḡona, dabudi tam yodi nam kwa tava be teneḡina, be tokare tam dabudine kwa tavana.”
43013037	Be Pita ya riuna, “Bada, aba aubainama dabudine yodi nam yà tava? Taugu yodi inam teneteneḡinama da tam mate tà gurina.”
43013038	Be Yesu tauna ya riuena, “Tam kuya noḡoti da teneḡinama taugu mate tà gurina. Be taugu yà riuriu kauemna da tam tokare raḡan rabuiteḡa taugu kwa bovieguna, muriḡa da kamkam e riuna.
43014001	“Nam koi nuaboya, Mamaitua koi sumaḡe, be mate taugu koi sumaḡeguna.
43014002	Tamaguma na vadae gabu toitoi ta kenakenana, be taugu yodi dabudine yà naḡonaḡona ami gabuma yà vokaukauedina. Be deḡoda gabu sibo ibewa, taugu tokare nam e riuemi.
43014003	Be raḡanine yà naḡo be gabu yà vokaukaua rovona murine, taugu tokare yà verau munaḡa be matabumi yai doka nawemina yau kaba miae. Be dabudine matabuda tokare tà mia tenaḡana.
43014004	Be taugu deḡo yà naḡonaḡona kedanama taumi koya kataiena.”
43014005	Be Tomas Yesu ya riuena, “Bada, keda nema ka kataie bake? Tauma nam ke kataiena tam aikedae kwa naḡonaḡo.”
43014006	Be Yesu tauna ya paribee be ya riuna, “Taugu vutuna Keda, Riukaua be Yawasana. Be nam aitau tokare Tamaguma ḡarone e tava be teneteneḡina, ibewa da taugue tokare Tamaguma ḡarone ko tavana.
43014007	Deḡoda taumi ko katai kaueguna, taumi tokare Tamaguma mate sibo koya kataiena. Taumi yodi da nokoi ya naḡona Tamaguma koya kataiena, baninama tauna kaite koya kitana.”
43014008	Dabudine Pilip ya riuna, “Bada, Tamamma kwai kataimai, yodibe nuamaima e verena.”
43014009	Be Yesu ya riuna, “Pilip, taugu noya èwai karee da yodi taugu raḡan matabuna taumi mate tè miamiana, be yaḡoro tam nam ku kataieguna da taugu aitau. Be aba aubainama kwa riuriuna, ‘Tamamma kwai kataimai’? Banaga aitau da taugu ya kitaguna, inam Tamaguma ya kitana.
43014010	Taugu inam Tamaguma nopone be tauna taugu nopogue, inam riunama tam kwawai sumaḡe bo ibewa? Abaḡa yà giugiuedina inam nam nuague ama giugiu yababedina, ibewa da Tamaguma nopogue e miamiana, tauna vutuna na noyama e voivoiedina.
43014011	Taugu inam Tamaguma nopone be tauna taugu nopogue, inam riunama tam naumeki kwai sumaḡena. Be deḡoda ibewa, naumeki da mataira dosidima yà voivoiedina, vutudi sibo kuya kitedi be kuyai sumaḡana.
